1b1(gi): rgyusgyurgyurgyurgyu
2a1(gi): le'u 'dogs // mgonan chos mag yon 'do
2a2(gi): na ma pa / n+tu/ su
2a3(gi): mas / 'i / gas sbyin / shes ga
2a4(gi): byinas// mi shes rig pa nyid pa nyid kyi sbyin pa // sa ldan
2b1(gi): rgyal ba gang gi'i mthu// rgyal sras khro bo snyan khung brgyud pa'i lung // dbyings la rig pa gab pa man ngag
2b2(gi): mchog/ gsung rab rgya mtsho brgyad kyi nyid khu 'di// dgongs rgyud zab mos smras pa'i tAn+t+ra gang nas byung /
2b3(gi): sgrom sgrub 'chad cing man ngag phyis 'byin pas// bdag gzhan sems kyi mdud pa dam po rnams// mang po
2b4(gi): rtsis kyi klung nas grol mdzad pa// mkhyen rab rtsal gyi slob dpon gang gis mdzad// dgongs rgyud thabs
2b5(gi): kyis 'grel pa'i phyag rgya la// lta bde ba rtag par sla ba'i don ched du// le'u dang grangs su bcad pa'i gsung rab
3a1(gi): @#/ 'di/ yon tan grangs su bcad pa'i dgos ched du yis bstan// gab pa'i sbas pa'i ma rtogs 'khrul
3a2(gi): pa yis/ sngon gyi bag chags rtsub mos 'tshams sbyar te// rnam smin las kyis dug gsum ma 'bar ba// bdud bzhi dpung
3a3(gi): 'joms ga dA la bya gang gi'i rmad du mdzad// khyad par gzhal yas 'phags pas ya mtshan rmad kyi bka'// thos pa'i skal dang
3a4(gi): ldan pa'i gang zag snga rabs 'das// mi srid srid par sbyor bas 'jig rten dam pa'i dpe// phung po lhag ma med par sngon sangs
3a5(gi): gang dang gang rnams rgyas// gsang ba'i 'phrin las gang yang sgrubs pa'i gnas// seng ge khro bo ma mo gnas pa'i sa// sems
3a6(gi): dga' yid 'ong bkra shis dben pa'i gnas// grub pa'i dgon gnas gang dang gang du mtha' ru phyin// lung brgyud lta bas bgyings
3b1(gi): pa'i man ngag rgya mtsho 'di// che btsan 'gran gyi zla med rgyal ba'i bka'// brtags na da lta nyid nas sangs rgyas 'di// ye shes mtshan gyi khyad par don la ji ltar gsol//
3b2(gi): dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mgo nan rtsis mgo'i le'u ste dang po'o// // tshe la dbang thob rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// lo rgyus gtan
3b3(gi): la dbab pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+ta las/ bcas dka' gleng gzhi'i le'u 'di gsungs so// bcas dka' gleng gzhi'i le'u 'di la don gsum ste/ de'ang gang
3b4(gi): dang gang zhe na// gdul bya mang po thabs gang gis brgyud pa ni/ rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'o// bka' rgyud zab mo rgyal ba'i snyan khung nas gang zag gi rna ba brgyud pa ni/ lung gi gleng gzhi'o//
3b5(gi): ting nge 'dzin thabs kyis brgyud pa ni/ man ngag gi gleng gzhi'o// gdul bya mang po thabs kyis brgyud pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi 'di la'ang don rnam pa lnga ste/ lha chen
3b6(gi): 'khor dang bcas pa thabs kyis 'dul ba dang / klu chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang gis 'dul ba dang / phyogs sbyong bcu 'khor dang bcas pa don gyis 'dul ba dang / rgyal chen
3b7(gi): rigs bzhi sku yig 'dul ba dang / gza' dang rgyuskar dgongs pas 'dul ba'i gdul bya'o// 'a rgyud zab mo rgyal ba'i snyan khung nas/ gang zag gi rna bar brgyud
4a1(gi): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thabs kyis brgyud pa'o// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bcas dka' gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
4a2(gi): / tshe la dbang thob rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// don gyis sa rnams gcad pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// don gyis gcod le'u 'di gsungs/
4a3(gi): le'u 'di la'ang don ched lnga ste/ lung chen po nyi shus sa gsal bar gcad pa dang / man ngag rnon po bcu drug gis rigs gnyis pa rgyud pa'i sgra gsal bar nom pa dang / dkyil 'am
4a4(gi): chen po brgyad kyis bsgrubs pa ma bslad par brtsam pa dang / dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig gis thabs che ba'i yon tan lhun gyis grub par bstan pa dang / drod chen po gsum gyis mgo mjug gi bya
4a5(gi): bya chung ma zos par basbyin pa'o// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+ta las/ don gyisas gcod kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / tshal dbang thob rigs 'dzin rnal
4a6(gi): gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin sgrub pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+ta las// sgrub pa zab mo'i le'u 'di gsungs// sgrub pa zab mo'i le'u 'di la'ang don rnam pa
4a7(gi): brgyad de/ de'ang gang dang gang zhe na/ gnas phun sum 'tshogs pa dang / dus phun sum 'tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum 'tshogs pa dang / rdzas phun sum 'tshogs pa dang / yo byad
4b1(gi): phun sum 'tshogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin phun sum 'tshogs pa dang / 'phrin las phun sum 'tshogs pa dang / dngos grub phun sum 'tshogs pa rnams so// de la gan
4b2(gi): la'ang gsum ste/ seng ge'i dgon gnas dang / khro bo'i dgon gnas dang / ma mo'i dgon gnas so// dus la'ang gsum ste/ nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma'i dus dang /
4b3(gi): dbyar dgun ston dpyid rigs kyi dus dang / phyi nang rgyu rkyen yo byad kyi dus so// 'khor la'ang gsum ste/ gang zag pho mo phyi'i 'khor dang / rgyal ba yab yum nang gi 'khor
4b4(gi): dang / shes rab gzungs ma gsang ba yum gyi 'khor ro// yo byad la'ang gsum ste/ ci 'bras bcud kyi yo byad dang / zhing bcu gal gyi yo byad dang / byang chub sems kyi
4b5(gi): yo byad do// rdzas la'ang gsum ste/ rten 'brel yo byad kyi rdzas dang / dam tshig gis rdzas dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rdzas so// ting nge 'dzin phun sum
4b6(gi): 'tshogs pa la'ang lnga ste/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyi nang gi chos thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang sgyur thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyag
4b7(gi): rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'khor byin gyis brlab pa dang / ging chen sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyu dang bum byin gyis brlab pa dang / tshogs chen 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdzas
5a1(gi): byin gyis brlab pa'o// 'phrin las phun sum 'tshogs pa la'ang bcu ste/ dang por zhe sdang 'tshams kyi 'phrin las dang / dmigs pa
5a2(gi): rten gyi 'phrin las dang // 'dul sbyong drag po'i 'phrin las dang // rgyan gzungs bsdebs pa'i 'phrin las dang // bsnyen pa dbul ba'i 'phrin las dang // thugs dam
5a3(gi): bskul ba'i 'phrin las dang // glu bro gar gyi 'phrin las dang // brtul zhugs chen po'i 'phrin las dang // dbugs chen 'byin pa'i 'phrin las dang // bkra shris bsdus pa'i
5a4(gi): 'dridren las so// dngos grub phun sum 'tshogs pa la'ang gsum ste/ mtshan brtags kyi dngos grub dang // mtshan ma med pa'i dngos grub dang // gnyis kar 'brel
5a5(gi): pa'i dngos grub bo// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+ta las/ sgrub pa bzang mo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // tshe la dbang thob rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// dngos po
5a6(gi): gtan la dbab pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// man ngag 'brel pa'i le'u 'di gsungs// man ngag 'brel pa'i le'u 'di la yang don gsum ste/ lta ba nyams
5a7(gi): drod kyi 'brel pa dang / dam tshig yum gyi 'brel pa dang / thug rje 'phrin las kyi 'brel pa'o// lta ba nyams drod kyi 'brel pa la'ang bzhi ste/ lung dang / man ngag dang / rig pa dang /
5b1(gi): gtan tshigs so// dam tshig yum gyi 'brel pa la'ang gnyis te/ sgrol ba thugs rje'i 'brel pa dang / sbyor ba chos nyid kyi 'brel pa'o// thugs rje 'phrin las kyi 'brel pa la'ang
5b2(gi): gnyis te/ mdzad pa'i 'phrin las dang / mi mdzad pa'i 'phrin las so// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tAn+tau las/ man ngag 'brel pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
5b3(gi): / da ni gal po dkyus kyi le'u 'byung ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ ji ltar dngos grub dam pa cog thob par 'dod na/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i stong
5b4(gi): pa nyid las langs te/ yi ge hUM du bsgoms la/ yid kyis bar snang gi khams thams cad/ gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa la 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa drug drug gi steng du/ rin po
5b5(gi): che'i khri phyogs bcur 'od 'bar ba bzhi'i steng du/ pad+ma'i le brgan 'od zer phyogs bcur 'bar ba/ de bas zhag gang tsam gyis mtho ba'i steng du ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par dmigs
5b6(gi): la de'i steng du rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings mngon gsum du bsgrub par bya'o// de nas yang hUM zhes lan drug
5b7(gi): tsam bzlas pas/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir rin po che'i ga pa'i 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong pas kyang klags pa/ ka ba gcig la'ang sprin med pa'i nyi ma bdun bdun gyis
6a1(gi): brgyan pa'o// 'od zer gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po bas kyang klags par dmigs la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
6a2(gi): cad na/ skye gnas bzhi las skyes pa'i sems can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rigs ngan dang / rigs med pa thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags thams cad
6a3(gi): 'od zer 'bar ba des bcom patags nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la dgod pa'i thabs 'dis bya'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yang yin
6a4(gi): la khams gsum gyi bdag po chen po yang bdag yin la/ khro bo chen po yang bdag yin no zhes dmigs la/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ snga ma'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
6a5(gi): rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin sku mdog dmar po dbu lnga phyag bcu drug par dmigs la/ rin po che dang rdo rje las byas pa'i gshog pa bzhi yang bskyed par bya'o// dbu lnga la bzhi ni phyogs
6a6(gi): bzhir 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta'o// dbu dbus ma'i klad par ni rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa
6a7(gi): bzhugs par dmigs la/ thob pa'i ngos bzhir yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dmar po phyag rgya tshul bzhin du gnas par bsgom mo// g.yas
6b1(gi): g.yon gyi dbu ni sku mdog dmar po spyan gsum pa ra dmigs la/ dbu ral pa'i dbus na sa rta mgo ljang khu re re byung ba/ lhag par dpal rta mgrin dngos su byung bar bsams te/
6b2(gi): rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrags pa tsam gyis/ nub phyogs kyi 'phra men ma rnams kyis 'khor mang po klu thams cad drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis dbang bsdu bar bya'o// lho dang byang
6b3(gi): phyogs su bltas pa'i rta mgo ljang khu la yang hUM hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor thams cad dang / grul bum gyi 'khor thams cad dang / 'phra min gyi
6b4(gi): tshogs thams cad kyang hUM hUM zhes bsgrags pa tsam gyis zhabs 'og tu song bar dmigs la gnas gtam par bya'o// shar phyogs su bltas pa'i mdog dmar po spyan
6b5(gi): gsum pa zhal nas kyang hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrags pa tsam gyis/ ljags 'dril zhing spyi bo'i gtsug tu rdo rje kha T+wAM kha 'bar ba gsum gnas par bsam mo// yang shar
6b6(gi): phyogs 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta bar bya'o// smin ma glog bzhin du 'gyu ba/ smin mtshams khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod par byas la/ rdo rje hU zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pa
6b7(gi): tsam gyis/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i gnas thams cad dang / 'phra men ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa zhabs 'og tu song bar dam ki sa la gnas brtabs par bya'o// phyag bcu drug
7a1(gi): g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis ni rdo rje lcags kyu 'bar bas 'gugs pa'o// g.yas pa gcig ni sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams par bya'o// g.yas
7a2(gi): pa gcig ni rje'u chung dang kha T+wAM kha lhan cig 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa gcig ni thod rlon khrag gis bkang ba nang nas bsregs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams mtha'
7a3(gi): klags med pa 'od zer bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs nas za ba'o// phyag g.yas pa bzhi ni rgyun mi 'chad par hUM zhes zlos shing rdo rje 'bar bas brdeg pa'o// phyag g.yas
7a4(gi): pa rnams kyi dpung rgyan dang gdub bu yang sbrul nag po mi srun pa'i kha nas hUM zhes zer ba bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba mang pos brgyan pa'o// g.yas kyi 'og ma gnyis kyi steng
7a5(gi): ma rin po che'i rgyu las 'byung bas nga rgyal bskyed pa'o// 'og ma ni sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs las mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyun mi 'chad par rdo rje 'bar
7a6(gi): bas 'joms pa'o// the'u gshog rnams ni gang gi'i snying las 'dren pa yin pas/ rdo rje lcags kyu rno ba'i mchog kyang yin la/ sgrol ba thams cad la brtson pa yin pas
7a7(gi): bsgral ba dam pa'o// phyag g.yon pa'i gcig ni sdig pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse nas bskal pa'i me chen 'bar ba'o// gcig ni lu gu rgyud kyi zhags pa'o// gcig gis ni
7b1(gi): thod rlon khrag gis bkang nas bdag nyid chen po'i zhal du dbul ba'o// gcig gis ni khro bo brgyad kyi snying rgyu ma dang lhan cig par chad par bcug nas za ba'o// gcig gis
7b2(gi): ni rnge'u chung dang kha T+wAM lcags kyu gsum lhan cig tu bzungs te gang gi snying las 'dren pa'o// phyag g.yon pa brgyad char yang sbrul nag po dang sngo bkra sha stag gis brgyan pa/ kha nas
7b3(gi): kyang hUM gi sgra sgrogs pa sha stag go// de dag gi snying po ni/ oM ha ha ru lu hU phaT/ ces brjod pas/ snga ma'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'phra men ma'i tshogs mang po dbang du bsdus
7b4(gi): nas sprin dpung bzhin du bsdus pa'i steng du/ bdag nyid chen po'i hU thang gcig tsam bzlas pas/ zhabs dmar po brgyad dus gcig tu byung bar bsam mo// de la steng phyogs kyi
7b5(gi): khams 'dul ba'i zhabs ni/ drag shul dpa' bar ldan pas stag gis ging bkris te/ steng phyogs kyi hU ka ra'i snying kar rdog pas pardzis te/ nyam thag pa'i 'bod sgrogs kyi sgra chen po
7b6(gi): 'byin pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni lho nu ba mtshams su ar+ya a tsa la mdog sngo skya ga na rkyal du mnan pa'i snying khar 'bas kyi bol man chad nub par ba lams te/ zhabs kyang bai DUR+Ya sngon
7b7(gi): po zhol phub kyis g.yogs pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni lho phyogs kyi khams 'dul ba yin pas/ ya man ta ka'i snying khar rdog pas mnan nas/ zhabs kyi bo la man chad nub par
8a1(gi): dmigs la/ zhabs kyang rdo rje rtse ba'i nang na ba zas klags pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni shar lho mtshams kyi ni la dan tra'i snying khar rdog pas mnan
8a2(gi): te 'bod sgrogs kyi sgra 'byin par dmigs la/ zhabs kyang bas khra ba smug pos dkris pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni ngos kyi khams brtul ba yin pas pad+ma kun ta la'i mdog nag po'i snying
8a3(gi): kar/ zhabs rdo rje phur pa dmigs pa btsugs pa zhabs kyang sbrul nag pos dkris te/ 'khor mang po dbang du bsdus pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni nub byang gi mtshams gdul ba'i phyir/
8a4(gi): Tak+ki rA dza kha bub tu mnan pa'i spyi bor/ zhabs dmar po'i mthal khro bo 'tshal ba'i khar dmigs la/ rkang gi nang gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs la/ zhabs kyi mthil khro bo 'cho
8a5(gi): pa'i kha dmar po'i 'od du 'phros pa'i nang du 'dod pa'i dbang po Dak+ki rA dza'i mgo ni ning du song bar dmigs la/ zhabs kyang rdo rje mche bas dkris te/ 'khor mang pos phyag byed pa'o//
8a6(gi): zhabs gcig ni sha ken gyi smad g.yogs can/ byang phyogs su skyong bas a mr-i ha kuN+Da li kha nub tu mnan nas/ rdog pas bskal pa thams cad bcom nas bo la man chod rlon pa'i nang du
8a7(gi): nub par dmigs la/ sdug bsngal thams cad myong bar byas te/ phyi ma'i dus na rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i gral thob par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so// zhabs gcig
8b1(gi): gis ni byang shar mtshams ma hA ba la'i ldan par mnan pas dung chen po bcom ste/ 'dod pa'i lha mos phyag byas nas/ zhabs kyang gzig gi 'gong gis dkris te/ 'khor gyi lha mo'i
8b2(gi): tshogs dang / ma dang / chung ma dang / bu mo dang / tsha mo rnams 'phrogs pa'o// g.yon gyi gshog pa rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba 'dod chags chen po'i rgyu yin no// the'u gshog rnams
8b3(gi): ni 'dod pa'i gtso bo yin pas shes rab kyi mchog dang sbyar ro// spyi gshog pa bzhi char 'babs pa ni sbrul nag pa'i rgyu las byung ba/ ba ra bar ni rdo rje rtse lnga'i rgyu las byung ba'o// bar
8b4(gi): bar ni rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba nyi ma stong gis brgyan pa'o// de dag thams cad kyi bzlas pa ni/ oM dza la dza la badz+ra hU/ badz+ra a mo ka trang / zhes brjod cing las thams cad bcol lo//
8b5(gi): sngags gong ma ni rdo rje dra ba ma/ 'og ma ni lha mo glog 'gyu ma'o// de la he ru ka khro bo thams cad kyi bzlas pa 'di yin te/ oM hu lu hu lu hU phaT/ ar+ya li hri dza/ nye ba'i snying po lan
8b6(gi): bzhi 'bum bzlas na las ci byas pa 'grub bo// de lta bas na dpal pad+ma rde rug bsgrubs pa'o// drag po'i bgegs kyi dbang du 'gyur bar mi 'byung ste/ byung na yang bar chod dang
8b7(gi): dngos grub gnyis dus gcig tu 'byung ste/ de la bud med kyi tshogs mang po dag rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ mdzes par byas nas 'ong srid kyis/ de la chags pa'i sems ma skyed
9a1(gi): cig/ bar bar du 'phra men ma'i tshogs chen po dag mi'i thod pa mang pos brgyan te/ lag na thod khrag dang mi ro thogs nas mi sdug pa'i 'bru tshugs su lta zhing /
9a2(gi): mi snyan pa'i tshul gyis bdag la bsad do// bcad do// brdeg go zer ba 'ong srid kyis// de la ma 'jigs par dbang chen gyi skur sgoms shig/ 'khor de rnams kyis rang dbang
9a3(gi): med par phyag byed kyis/ dngos grub kyi rtags dang po cig dang sbyar ro// de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin gyi tshul ston cig/ ral pa 'bar ba la mi mgo mang pos lus brgyan cing / lag
9a4(gi): na ma dung thung dang ral gri thogs pa dag mi'i rgyu mas bdag gi skye gnas 'dogs shing sbrul nag po dag bdag gi lus la za zhing dam du dkris te/ rtsib ma dag com tsam dam du sdom pa dag
9a5(gi): 'ong srid kyis/ de la ma 'jigs par dbang chen gyi skur sgoms dang / gnod sbyin dang grul bum gyi dbang por 'gyur te/ dngos grub kyi rtags gnyis pa yin no// de'i 'og
9a6(gi): tu bar snang la gnas pa'i lha khro bo rnams kyis bsdigs pa dag 'byung ste/ bar snang la gshegs pa'i sgra 'brug skad drag po sgrogs shing / sbrul nag po kha nas me dang dug skyug pa
9a7(gi): dang / a la la zer zhing sgra 'byin pa dang / mig g.yas g.yon nyi mar bsgyur te/ 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta ba dang / rang gi khog pa kha phyi nas mi ro gsar rnying bdag la stobs
9b1(gi): pa dang kho ma'i mtshan ma thams cad za ba'i khar bsgyur nas/ 'jigs tshogs kyi mche ba bdar nas rkang pa phung par bsgyur te bdag la 'debs shing gnod pa byed pa dang / mi mgo
9b2(gi): pags pa rlon pas g.yogs shing / lag pas rdo rje brdeg pa dag 'ong srid kyis/ de la ma 'jigs dang lha thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur te/ dngos grub kyi rtags gsum pa
9b3(gi): yin no// de ltar dngos grub kyi rtags dang / bar chad dang / nyams len ni dus gcig tu 'byung bas ngo shes par bya'o// de bas na dpal pad+ma he ru ka'i sku gsung thugs
9b4(gi): kyi cho 'phrul ni cir yang ston cing cir yang snang ste/ gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir na sku'i che ba dang / gsung gi che ba dang / thugs kyi che ba'o// sku gsung thugs yon tan
9b5(gi): 'phrin las cis kyang ma bsgribs pas ni/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i don zab tu bstan te/ sku'i che ba la yang gsum ste/ chos kyi sku bdal ba chen po/ longs spyod
9b6(gi): rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad/ sprul pa'i sku ji ltar 'dul zhing ston pa'o// gsung gi che ba la yang gsum ste/ chog gi gsung dang / rig pa'i gsung dang / don
9b7(gi): gyi gzung ngo // thugs kyi cho ba la yang gsum ste/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i thugs dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i thugs dang / gnyis su med pa'i thugs so// de ltar khro mo
10a1(gi): khams gsum rnam par rgyal sku gsung du ni grub/ gsung gsum du ni bstan/ thugs gsum du ni dgongs nas/ sku gsum gyi tha ma sprul pa'i sku la/ gsung
10a2(gi): gi tha ma ni tshig gi gsung bsgrags/ thugs gsum gyi tha ma ni 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i thugs dgongs nas/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i don du sku mdog mthing ka/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas
10a3(gi): dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing ka/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje dang / rde'u chung dang / mdung rtse gsum/ g.yon pa na dril bu dang / rgyu zhags dang / thod rlon gsum/ bskal pa'i me ri dang /
10a4(gi): sbrul nag spungs pa dang / thod rlon gyi 'phreng bas rgyan du mas brgyan te/ nyid kyis nyid la che ba rngom pa'i tshig 'di smras so// nga ni khro bo rnam par rgyal// chos sku bdal ba chen pos ni//
10a5(gi): skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings su// mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams bshad// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so// longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis// seng ge glang chen khri steng
10a6(gi): nas/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// yod dang med pa'i chos kyang bstan// me long lta bu'i ye shes so// sprul pa'i 'gro don byed pa'i skus// 'jig rten phal pa'i sa
10a7(gi): rnams su// dngos po mtshan ma'i chos bstan pas// bya ba nan tan ye shes so// tshar gsum can gyi rde'u chung gis// lcang lo can gyi pho brang bcom// snang mdzad chen po a la
10b1(gi): la/ taganod sbyin chen po a la la// chos kyi dbyings nyid a la la// sangs rgyas bden tshig a la la// tshar gsum can gyi rnge'u chung gis// 'jig rten phal pa'i sar brdungs
10b2(gi): pas/ mtshan ma dngos po'i chos rnams las// yod med chos las spyod par shog/ tshar gsum can gyi rde'u chung gis// 'og min gnas kyi sa ra brdungs pas// yod
10b3(gi): med chos la spod pa rnams// rang bzhin med pa'i don rtogs shog/ de skad ces smras pas/ stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/ de ltar ma gyur
10b4(gi): gcig kyang med// dper na dam tshig mchog rab yin// smad par bya ba ma yin te// gtso bo rab tu sdug pa la// drang du smra ba gang byed pa// bsgrags pa'i tshig gis
10b5(gi): brgyan nas su// sri zhu sems kyi gdung ba la// ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor ba// mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid ye shes te// gnyis ka nges par mnyam na ni// stong
10b6(gi): gsum dbang por gdon mi za// 'jig rten khams na rgyal po bzhin// dus gsum kun gyi gnas dang rten// dper na rang gi gnas lung du// rang gi dri chen maN+Dal bya//
10b7(gi): rang gi gur kum chag chag gdab// spos dang du ru ku ru dang // li shi dang ni ga pu ra dang // lang ti pa la mchog tu bsngags// me tog maphreng bas kun tu brgyan// de lta bu'i
11a1(gi): gnas mchog tu// gzhan zhig nges par bsgral nas ni// rdo rje srin po'i ting 'dzin sbom// rag sha'i mig gis blta bar bya// kha nas sngags kyi
11a2(gi): tshig zlos shing // pha rol rnam shes hUM gis drangs// snying khar mngon sum dmigs bya na// pha rol mngon sum 'chi bar 'gyur// mgo dang snying dang rkang lag dang // yang
11a3(gi): man ta ka'i 'khor la dbul// gzhan yang lhag ma ci yod pa// he ru ka la yon du dbul// gnas lugs 'phrul gyi dgongs pa'o// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// lag cha phur
11a4(gi): pa mchog yin te// zhi ba'i sor ba zhi zlum po bya// rgyas pa'i sor brgyad zur yang brgyad// dbang la zla gam ma nges par bzang // drag po'i sor drug zur gsum pa'o// kun gyi
11a5(gi): rtse mor hU bzhag ste// ngos su ha ha ru lu bsgoms// rgya mdud thog tu oM bsam mo// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// pho nya 'od zer dud kha 'phro// shar gyi phyogs nas mngag pa ni//
11a6(gi): mgo dgu pa la rkang gcig po// lus nag po la 'od dpung ga nag/ ral pa gnag cing mche ba gnag/ mig kyang gnag cing lag pa gnag/ mgyogs shing rlung gis bskyod du
11a7(gi): med/ 'di dag dpal gyi pho nye ste// zhum pa med cing stobs chen 'joms// g.yas pa gsum ni snga re 'phyar// g.yon pa gsum ni lcags kyu 'dzin// yan lag sbrul nog
11b1(gi): mchog gis brgyan// g.yon gyi lcags kyus snying nas drongs// g.yas kyi sku res nges par bcom// 'di ni sgo srungs mchog yin te// pho nya rgyun du mngagA par bya// bgegs
11b2(gi): rnams nges par phung bar byed// rkang gcig de yi pho nya ni// kha dog 'bar ba ci 'dran// gcig la gcig gis rab tu 'khril// yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro// mig kyang med cing cang
11b3(gi): mi smra/ long ba kun gyi mchog yin te// rta babs kun gyi sgor bsgoms te// lan 'ga' drag tu mngag pa'i tshe// gnyis ka song nas der phyin te// gang la dmigs pa len par
11b4(gi): byed// sus kyang bzlog par mi nus so// lho lo phyogs nas bkye ba ni// mgo brgyad po la lag brgyad po// rkang pa brgyad la mig kyang med// g.yas pa bzhi ni rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon
11b5(gi): ba bzhi ni bur ba 'dzin// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // gshin rje'i gnas rnams nges par 'joms// mgo brgyad de yi pho nya ni// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // bskal
11b6(gi): pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa rlung dang mtshungs// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // gang la dmigs par len par byed// nub kyi phyogs nas dgye ba ni/
11b7(gi): mgo drug lag drug yang drug po// g.yas pa gsum ni phur pa dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma gtong // ma phyo bas ni rlung gi shug pa dang 'ang // 'di ni dpal byi pho nya yin//
12a1(gi): ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // rang gis rlung phyogs song ba'i tshe// khro bo kun la nges par 'chi// rkang drug de yi pho nya ni// lcags kyi
12a2(gi): spyang mo rkang gsum ni// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// gzugs la rdog pa brdeg cing 'gro// rang gi rkang pa phur ba yin// lcags kyi phur pa rab tu drag/ 'od zer dud
12a3(gi): kaus reg pa ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang 'jigs byed na// gzugs can sgra khyod smos ci dgos// byang gi phyogs nas dge ba ni// mgo gsum lag drug rkang gsum po//
12a4(gi): bag pa drug ni rgyud drug 'joms// mi sha za zhing bdud rnams sgrol// gnod sbyin gnas rnams 'joms par byed// rkang gsum de yi pho nya ni// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa
12a5(gi): mo lcags kyi khyid rkang gsum la// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsgril ba bzhin// bang ni rlung gis bskyod du med// skad ni gnam gyi 'brug pas che//
12a6(gi): rab tu mi bsrun 'di dag ni// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ rkang gcig gyen la bsgrengs pa yis// ya bdud chen po'i snying las 'dren// rkang gcig thur du byung
12a7(gi): bas ni/ ma bdud chen po'i snying las 'dren// rkang gcig thad kar byung bas ni// dgra bo ma lus snying las 'dren// 'byung po ma lus nyal thag gcod// sku ni lcags thag
12b1(gi): bsgril ba 'dra// tshems ni spu gri gshibs pa 'dra// maM sa za zhing ri klungs rgyug/ 'jig rten khams kun za ba mo// gnod sbyin kun gyi steng du rgyug/ glo snying nang
12b2(gi): khrol 'byin zhing za// bar snang khams su khros pa'i tshe// nyi zla kun kyang thal bar rlog/ gza' skur kun kyang dum bur gcod// shin tu khros nas sbas pa'i tshe// bdud
12b3(gi): kyi snying khrag dron mo 'thung // rdul cha tsam yang med par mdzod// ku ku ra tsa la lo kha// zhes brjod cing zad do// de nas 'di rnams bstan pa'i phyir// dpa
12b4(gi): chen nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// sgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i tshe// bar snang rdo rje sems dpa' yis// cha lugs ci 'dra 'khor dang bcas// sems kyis mnyam par dgod par bya
12b5(gi): bdag 'dra men ma'i 'khor mang po dang // gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mang po rol par 'dod na// bdag dbang chen gyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te// sku mdog dkar por bsgyur te/ glu dang
12b6(gi): bros brten par bya'o// bdag 'khor mang po dang mnyam par 'dug pa'i dus na/ sku mdog dmar por bsgyur ro// lam du zhugs 'gro ba'i dus na/ sku mdog ljang kur bsgyur te/
12b7(gi): he zhes bya ste rgod cing 'gro'o// gang du phyin pa'i gnas su b+hU che ba byas la 'dug go// 'on tang ma mo thams cad dbang du 'du'o// nyal ba'i chen a zhes byas 'chog ngor phud tsam
13a1(gi): zhig gnas par bya'o// bdag nyid gser btso ma'i kha dog bzhin 'tsher bar bsgyur te/ kun tu bzang mo nam mkha' las langs nas mngon sum du 'dzum
13a2(gi): par mdzad pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / 'dod pa sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyi rtse mo yang byas par bsam mo// de ltar bsams pa'i yon tan ni// sa yi 'og tu mda' 'phangs pas// gnas
13a3(gi): kyi steng gi lha bran 'chi// spyod lam grub pa 'di ltar ro// mtshon thogs kun gyi rgyal po ste// ral gri 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur// 'jam dpal 'khor gyis phyag byas pa'o// zhes smras
13a4(gi): so// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// gnod sbyin 'phra men 'khor bcas kyis// bdag la rab tu brtse 'gyur na// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// sa yi 'og tu mngon sum bya// lus
13a5(gi): kyis hA zhes brjod par bya// ma sa dag kyang mang du bzung // nam mkha' la ni sems dpa' bsam// bgrang 'phreng klad la bskor bar bya// de ltar byas na bdag rgyal zhing // nad
13a6(gi): gtong mo ni 'ching bar 'gyur// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// gnod sbyin rnams las 'khol 'dod na// de yi gzugs ni khrag gis bri// dur khrod chen por song nas ni// snying khar phur
13a7(gi): pas mnan nas su// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hU zhes bzlas// ma 'ongs bar du bsdad nas ni// zhag bdun gyis ni zhugs par 'gyur// gnod sbyin rnams la ci dgar spyod//
13b1(gi): bdag gi bran dang 'dra bar 'ong / 'phra men rnams la 'khol 'dod na// 'phra men gzugs ni khrag gis bri// yan lag phur pas mnan nas su// snying khar rjog
13b2(gi): pas mnan byas te// dgug pas brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'ong // 'phra men las la ci dgar 'khol// khong gis lan na khong dag 'chi// bdag
13b3(gi): gis lan na bdag nyid nyams// gnyis gtso las la 'khol 'dod na// de yi gzugs ni khrag gis bri// phur bu snying dang kha ru gdag/ dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas/
13b4(gi): zhag bdun gyis ni dbang du 'du// phyag na rdo rje dga' bar 'gyur// mi mo rnams las la 'khol 'dod na// bud med bu tshod khrag gis bri// snying khar rdog pas
13b5(gi): mnan nas ni// phur bu dril zhing bsgom par bya// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par rdungs// ci bgyi gsung zhes zer te 'ong // de nas bdag gis spyad par bya// bud med rnams la ci
13b6(gi): dgar 'ong // bgegs rnams las la 'khol 'dod na// so so'i gzugs dag khrag gis bri// phur bu'i rtse mor ming bri zhing // gong du hU gcig bzhag nas ni//
13b7(gi): tshon skud rnam lnga'i skud pas gdags// lan gsum bskor te gdag byas na// bdag gi dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// ji ltar bsgo ba nyan par byed// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod ci byed kyang //
14a1(gi): 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsnyen pa 'bul// nang par mal nas langs nas kyang // yid dam gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// gom gsum 'phags nas dran par bya//
14a2(gi): bshang gci byed pa'i sa dag tu// dri chen lag tu blangs nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun tu kha bltas te// su sa ma mthong bar kham gsum za// dri chu khyor bar blug nas ni// sus
14a3(gi): ma mthong bar hu ba gsum bdung // shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dri zhim mdun du bzhag nas ni// yan lag bzhi'i sa la gzugs// phag skad theng gsum du ra bar bya//
14a4(gi): ru lu ru lu tshal ba bzlas// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas pas// gnod sbyin dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// dri chu mdun du bzhag nas ni// khyi skad thang gsum dus nas ni// ru lu ru lu
14a5(gi): kha long kha// ku ku ra tsa kha long kha// nyon dang mtshan du thun phrad du// ri mo 'chol ma sbyor bar bya// skye bos mthong bar gyur na nyams// su sa ma mthong na dngos grub yin// byang
14a6(gi): chub sems ni lce la bzhag/ dus dang rnam pa med par ni// sbyor ba kho na las su bzang // skabs su bab pa'i dus so// dur khrod gnas su byug par bya// zhing dang ban d+ha
14a7(gi): mang du bsag/ rang gis dben sa gang yin pa// skye bo rnams las tha ga pa srings te// srod dang tho rangs nam gyi gung // dro dang nyin phyed dgongs ka'i dus// dbyangs dang skad
14b1(gi): drug shes par bya// dus drug kun tu rde'u chung brdungs// srod 'khor gsum pa bro brdungs te// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te// rta skad 'tsher ba'i klu skad blang // ru lu'i
14b2(gi): bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas shing // snum chen gsur gyi spos me btang // nam gyi gung la mi nyal zhing // 'phrin las gong ma bzhin du bya// byang gi phyogs su khe bltas te// glu dbyangs
14b3(gi): khyi skad thang gsum zugs// tho rangs langs nas phyag rgyar gsal// byang sha ra mtshams su kha bltas la// dbyangs ni shin tu gdung bar bya// de yang bsnyen pa gong ma bzhin//
14b4(gi): dus la bab pa'i dro mchod la// phyi nang drag tu mtshams bcad do// rnge'u chung di ri ri lan gsum brdung // sha khrag gtor ma rgyun mi bcad// glu bro shar gyi phyogs su
14b5(gi): dbul/ nyi ma phyed kyi dus su ni// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// grul bum skad du ku tse bya// 'phrin las dgongs pa gong ma bzhin// dgongs mchod dus la bab pa'i tshe//
14b6(gi): grib so bzlog pa'i cho ga bya// ha cang skad ni mi che bar// der yang rde'u chung dir dir brdung // dbyangs dang ni yid tsam ni brdung bar blang // der yang dus drug kun tu yang //
14b7(gi): gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyun mi bcad// mi yi bu mo bsnyen par bya// lan 'ga' da dang ma ldan na// du ku rgya ra rgyal rtsogs// ba dang bud med gang yang rung // shin tu dkon
15a1(gi): nas med pa'i tshe// byes dang 'gron po byed pa na// lus las sprul pa'i lha mo yis// sbyor ba'i dam tshig mi bcag go/ de ltar byas na dngos grub
15a2(gi): thob/ rgyun dang rgyun med rtags par ni// sman ni lus la bsrel bar bya// / sgrub pa chen sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud bcas// drag po'i khro bo khyab la sogs//
15a3(gi): tshangs pa'i gdung chen bshag tu gtams// yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// brgya byin lha yi dbang po bsgral// khyab 'jug chen po 'khor dang bcas// theg mchog a nu yo
15a4(gi): ga yi/ gzhung las byung ba bzhin du bsgom// yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// theg rgyal a ti yo ga'i gzhung // khyab dang gnas dang 'byung la sogs// rnam pa gsum po
15a5(gi): gzhal ya sa khang // snod bcud 'byung ba'i yum du gsal// ting 'dzin gsal ba skad cig la// bskyed nas gsang yu ma bzhi yi mkha'// b+ha ga dgyes pa'i nang du bsgom//
15a6(gi): de yi dkyil du bdag po dmigs// de la rang bzhin med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bu ra rab rtogs na// gzhal yas khang zhes mkhas pas gsungs// dbang chen bsdus pa'i
15a7(gi): tan+ta las/ gzhal yas khang tshangs pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / tshel dbang thob rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// ting 'dzin gtan la dbab pa'i
15b1(gi): phyir/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i han+ta las// sgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u 'di gsungs// sgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u 'di la yang le'u rnam pa bzhi ste/ gang dang gang zhe na/ sgom khog rtsa
15b2(gi): ba'i le'u dang / gsang ba tshe'i le'u dang / sgrol ba thugs rje'i le'u dang / mdzad pa 'phrin las kyi le'u dang bzhi'o// / dang por sgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u
15b3(gi): 'byung ste/ 'di skad ces so// rnam par mi rtog ye shes skye med cing // gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i mtha' gnyis ma chags dbyings// thams cad spros bral mnyam nyid ji bzhin
15b4(gi): ngadang \u0f7frnam rtog brjod med smra bsam yul las 'das// oM ma hA shu n+ya ta badz+ra swa b+ha wa ad ma ko haM/ ma ltar byams pas snying rje yongs la khyab// mkha' ltar go 'byed cho
15b5(gi): / 'phrul 'byung ba'i yum// kun la khyab pa sa ye shes gsal ba'i ngang // rin chen gter ldan che ba'i khyab par ston// oM d+harma d+ha tu swa b+ha wa ad ma ko ha/ yi ge hUM ni
15b6(gi): sems kyi rang bzhin te// chags pa'i skyon bral rin chen sna lnga'i mdog/ 'byung ba lnga dang yum lnga ye shes lnga// gdul bya'i 'phrin las rnam pa lnga ru sbyor// oM badz+ra
15b7(gi): tsit+ta hU/ zhabs bskyed mthing ka'i spro bsdu las// gsal ba'i go 'byed nam mkhar 'gyur// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pas kun tu bzang // gtos ni 'byung ba kun la
16a1(gi): khyab rna ru ljang ku'i spro bsdu las// rgya gram rlung gi dkyil 'khor shar bar gsal// thams cad skyed byed yum chen dam tshig sgrol// gtos ni
16a2(gi): nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// nga nyid dmar po'i 'phro 'a du las// rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtshor 'khyil// thams cad bskyed pa'i yum tshon ma ma ki/ gtos ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang
16a3(gi): mnyam// thig le sngo skya'i 'phro 'du las// keng rus chen po ri rab ste// thams cad brten pa'i yum chen sangs rgyas spyan// gtos ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// ha nyid
16a4(gi): ser po'i 'phro 'du las// bskal pa'i me dpung chen por 'bar// 'byung ba drod snyoms yum chen na bza' dkar// gtos ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// hUM mdzad hUM gis
16a5(gi): byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// 'bru lngar spros pas yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal// dbang chen yu ma du brtsegs pa'i byin brlabs kyis// yi ge hUM yang ma nyams nam mkha'i
16a6(gi): dbyings na gsal// yi ge hU gis byin brlabs kyis// dbang chen yum lnga'i mkha' dkyil du// gzugs khams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// lha chen brgyad ni rmad du bting // 'dod
16a7(gi): khams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// phyogs skyong bcu ni rtsig par brtsigs// sku bzhis dpal brgyad tshangs pa'i phyir// rgyal chen bzhi ni ka ba ra btsugs// gti mug la sogs ye
16b1(gi): shes bskyed pa'i phyir// klu chen brgyad ni gdung du bres// gzhal yas ma bsgribs yongs su gsal ba'i phyir// gza' chen brgyad ni gdan du bor// dus bzhi 'gyur ldog med par
16b2(gi): bya'i phyir// rgyu skar rnams ni phyogs nas mig tshags byas// rgyal mtshan bzhi dang bla brer bcas// nya sbrul mchog phran za ra tsags// bde gshegs gzhal yas khang gi rang
16b3(gi): bzhin no// oM de ba ka pa la bruM/ de ba ka ba la bruM/ de ba ka pa la bru/ oM rag sha ka pa la bruM/ rag sha ka pa la bruM/ rag sha ka pa la bruM/ au n+ya tsa ka pa la bru/ N+ya tsa ka pa la bruM/ rgyatsa
16b4(gi): ka pa la bru/ na ga ka pa la bru/ na ga ka pa la bruM/ na ga ka ba la bru/ sur+ya ka ba la bruM/ su r+ya ka ba la bruM/ su r+ya ka pa la bruM/ kro d+ha ka pa la bru/ kro d+ha ka pa la bru/ kro d+ha ka pa la bru/
16b5(gi): ha ru lu hUM phaT/ ha ha ru lu hU phaT/ ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ dzaHhU ba ho/ de lta bu yi dbus nyid du// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi maN+Dal la// dbus ni zla gam e yi dkyil// bcu drug 'khor
16b6(gi): lo'i mtha' bskor zhing // hri las pad+ma nyi shu bzhi// zur bzhi rin chen khri rkang la// sprin mang nyi ma bdun gyis brgyan// bar khyams gnyis dang sgo bzhir ldan// bde gshegs
16b7(gi): bzhugs pa gnas kyi dbyings nyid do// rdo rje gzhal yas nam mkha'i tshad mnyam pa// ka ba yid bzhin bres pa brgyad du bstan// rin chen mchog sbyin dbang gis yum du d+hon/
17a1(gi): kun tu rol pas spyir yang bsgrol ba'i dbyings// ba ga maN+Dal g+hu la sid+d+hi hU/ hUM dbang phyug ma rab bsdus sing 'jam pa la// drug gsum zil
17a2(gi): gnon rnam dag 'joms mdzad cing // mthu rtsal che bas khyad par kun las 'phags// don dam gsang sbas dbang phyug rgyal ba'i bka'// sing nga dzam b+ha la bi ma la si d+hi hUM/
17a3(gi): hUM khri rkang rin chen 'bar ba'i skur ston pas// yon tan drug stong dpag tshad 'phang dang mnyam// sprin med nyi ma bdun brtsegs gsal bas brgyan// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung sku
17a4(gi): la 'khril// rat+na traM// hU 'dam gyis skyon bral pad+ma ra ga'i mdog/ dri zhim dbyibs legs kha dog so sor gsal// chos dbyings che ba'i khyad par rab skyon phyir// rigs mchog
17a5(gi): brjid ldan gsang ba yum gyi mkha'// pad+ma d+ha ra hI/ hUM 'jig rten 'od kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor ni// thabs mchog brjid ldan 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed//
17a6(gi): stong gsum mun nag kun nas sel mdzad pa'i// ye shes gsal ba'i me long mA ma ki/ sU r+ya man+da la hU/ tsan+da a/ nyi zla de dkyil gdan stengs su// nam mkha'i yi ge hU phaT ste/
17a7(gi): rnam gsum tshul gyis sku nyid rdzogs// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// oM badz+ra swa tA ya ta ta ad ma kau&haM/ bcom ldan dpal mchog rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sku gsum lhun
17b1(gi): grub dbu gsum brjid par bstan// mthing ka da kar gsal pad+ma ra ga'i zhal// rgyu drug rtsad gcod ye shes drug gi phyag/ g.yas pa rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma 'dzin// g.yon pa dril
17b2(gi): bu rin chen ral gri 'dzin// rnam pa thams cad mchog dang rab ldan pas// thams cad rgyan gyis ma lus yongs su rdzogs// spyan drangs mchod pa rdzogs pa dang // sgrub pa'i
17b3(gi): don du bsnyen pa 'bul// dbang dang byin pa rlabs dngos grub gsol// gsol ba btab ste gnang thob dmigs byas las// bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje las// rigs gnyis lung
17b4(gi): gis brgyud pa dang // 'gro drug gnas nas drang ba'i phyir// yi ge hUM drug cho 'phrul bstan// khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed hu sgra can// hU gis khams gsum ma lus dbang du
17b5(gi): bsdud/ hUM gi sa ma rig dug gsum mun khang 'joms// hUM gi sa du sa gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed// hUM gis thams cad 'jigs shing thams cad sdud// hUM gis ngan song
17b6(gi): gnas rnams stongs par byed// hU gis bla med byang chub gnas su sgrol// hUM mdzad hUM gi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// hU drug la 'od zer bdun spros pas// lhun gyis rdzogs
17b7(gi): pas sangs rgyas thugs dam bskul// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can sdig sbyangs te// bla med byang chub bde chen dbyings su sdud// oM pad+ma ma hA shri he ru ka ma ha tsit+ta sarba duSh+Ta
18a1(gi): na ha na ta ka pa tsa hU phaT/ sku bzhi gcig tu bsgoms pas kun tu zhal// sku mdog pad+ma rgyal 'dra'i dbu lngar ldan// dbu skra khams nag ral pa gyen
18a2(gi): du 'khyil// bco lnga'i spyan bzlog smin mtshams khro gnyar brjid// snyan bcu gsan cing shangs lnga sgra chen byin// zhal lnga rngam zhing brjid pa'i sma ra dkyug/ ljags lnga 'dril
18a3(gi): zhazhing dka ra ba'i mche ba gtsigs// bcu drug phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// zhabs brgyad gzir non stang thabs tshul du bzhugs// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad phyag na bsnams
18a4(gi): pa ni/ rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang // cang he'u kha T+wAM thod rlon khrag gis bkang // rdo rje rtse dgu dang ni rtse lnga dang // rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/
18a5(gi): g.yon gyi phyag brgyad phyag na bsnams pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub lu gu rgyud// thod rlon zhal du stobs dang khro bo brgyad snying 'dzin// cang te'u kha TA lcags kyu lhan cig
18a6(gi): bsnams// ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ ha ha ru lu hU phaT/ chos dbyings yon tan 'byung ldan gzhal med khang // rgyal ba 'khor bcas dbu lnga'i cod pan 'dzin// phyogs bzhi dbus dang
18a7(gi): / rigs lnga'i skar ston pa// smye mthun lnga ra lngar snang ba'i nam mkha'i rgyan du che// o tsakra o bru/ tsakra hU bru/ tsakra tra bruM/ tsakra hri bruM/ tsakra ha bru/ bud+d+ha ya ta sta ta a hA/ rat+na ya
18b1(gi): tata a ha/ d+ha ra ma ya tasta ta aM/ karma ya ta ta sta ha ta a ha/ ka ma la mu ka/ ka ma la sa ti/ ma la la sha/ dza au a hU/ dbu gtsug lhag pa ra rta mgo ljang nag sngo// phyogs
18b2(gi): bcur khyab par gzigs shing dbang gi rta skad sgrogs// dbang gi rta gdong mgyogs pa'i 'phrin las ni// rnam shes yid myur glog gi brgyan du snang // oM shrI pad+ma pa mu ka yo ga
18b3(gi): sho ri ha ya gri ba hri hI/ skye ba med las skye ba'i tshul// mtshan ma med las mtshan mar snang // thugs khar dpal be'u sha ra ba ni// skyes bu chen po nyid kyi rtags// oM dz+nyA na
18b4(gi): sa ta hU dza o a hU/ rdo rje rin chen sbrul nag gshog pa ni// rtogs pas 'phang gcod 'phrin las rlabs kyis sdud// nyi ma stong gis brgyan pa'i the'u gshog pa can// mkha'
18b5(gi): 'gro rgyal po rgyal mo'i sprul par 'gyed// oM dza la dza la a mu ka hU/ dz+wa la nga la a mo ka tra/ mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par rab ston phyir// nga rgyal mthu snyems bdud kyi dpung
18b6(gi): bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngo ba chen po brgyud// che ba'i rtags dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug yang chen gnon// au nas shastaM pa ni/ nas shas+t+raM pa ni hU~M/ su b+ha suM ni b+ha hU/ zhabs
18b7(gi): brgyad ting 'dzin brgyad kyi chas dang ldan// bka' dang dam tshig gnas par bya ba'i phyir// snying ka ra khrig ma bsgrubs shing rgal rtsi ba 'joms// nyon mongs nyam thag bod sgrags sgra
19a1(gi): chen 'byin// dpa' bo rab brjid ting 'dzin stag gi chas// rno gdug bzlog byed brgya bye'u lcags kyi chas// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje tshal ba'i
19a2(gi): chas dbang gi bse khrab smug po gzi 'bar chas// ngas brjid gnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chas// dbang phyug dmar gsal mche ba chags pa'i chas// shu ka na smad
19a3(gi): g.yogs chu ris dar gyi chas// gcan gzan rgyal po thabs mchog gzig gi chas// zhabs kyi chas brgyad ting 'dzin bye brag gis// phyogs mtshams khro bo tshul bzhin gnas
19a4(gi): par bya'o// hU ka ra dang mi g.yo mgon// gshin rje gshed dang dbyug sngon can// g.yas kyi zhabs bzhi'i gdan du 'ding // pra be sha phaT sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya sta/ pad+mo 'khyil dang
19a5(gi): 'dod pa'i rgyal// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa stobs po che// g.yon gyi zhabs bzhi'i gdan du 'dings// pra be sha ya phaT/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya sta/ raM 'bar ba khro ba ye shes thugs
19a6(gi): rjer ldan// gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms nyon mongs dug bsreg cing // shes rab gsal bas ma rig mun pa sel// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar bstong la gnas// ra dzA
19a7(gi): la pa ra na hU/ dung chen khong gseng rgyu ma'i thod 'phreng ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas ye shes lnga dang ldan// sku gsum thugs ldan rdo rje rtse gsum 'bar// dbang po dbyer med
19b1(gi): stong pa'i rgyan du snang // oM rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri sma sha ni ba bi sha na/ ni la dza la ma la ma ku te ma ha tra tangad pra be sha ka pa la/ ru lu ra li ha sa sti kha TA kha tri shu la/ dun du ma la hu hU paT
19b2(gi): phaT/ thod sbrul mnyen lcug 'jigs byed rgyan du che// sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pa'i rnga ma brjid can// klu lngas mchod phyir sku yi gnas lnga ra 'khril// dug lnga ma spangs
19b3(gi): dbang gi rtags su ston// na ga ra dza ha ra ru lu hUM phaT/ rno gdug zhen pa bzlog pas bdud kyi g.yul bzhi 'joms// khams gsum g.yul las rgyal ba'i rtags su bstan//
19b4(gi): zhing lpags gos su gsol bas dur khrod bdag/ 'gro sras 'doms su bsdus pas phyi nang gsang ba gcig/ glang chen ko rlon brjid du che ba dang // stag chen sham thabs dpa'/
19b5(gi): bar ldan pa dang // zhing lpags rlon pa thabs la mkhas pa yis// na bza' rgyan gyis sku la mnga' gsol lo// bsneg ta dza la hU/ skye med dbyings nas skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan//
19b6(gi): mi gnas dbang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yum// kro d+hi sho ri gzi ldan phyag rgyar gsal// oM e ka te bi ka staM ma ta ka
19b7(gi): te swA hA/ ngo o a hU/ zur gsum logs gsum gdan stengs su// phyag rgya chen po'i gzhi las ma g.yol te// rnam pa byang chub sems las rtags bzhugs kyang // 'jug
20a1(gi): dang smon dang lhan pas 'gro don mdzad slad du// rigs mchog gsang yum kham rgya drug tu gsal// bud+d+ha badz+ra o/ sarba badz+ra hU/ rat+na badz+ra tra/ d+ha ra ma badz+ra hri/
20a2(gi): karma badz+ra ha/ g+hun badz+ra phaT/ thod rus nyi lha ra sha ra ba'i bar khyam dang po la// chos nyid spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin las// mtshan ma'i dngos po rtog pa mi mnga' yang // khams
20a3(gi): gsum 'khor ba rnams kyi don slad du// sprul skra long ba brgyad sman long drug cur gsal// o sho ri kha'i sho ri kha'i hUM/ me ri sprin lha ra 'khrigs pa'i bar khyams tha ma la// bdo ba'i
20a4(gi): bdud 'joms 'bar ba'i khabs brgyad la// skye med don rtogs lcags kyi spang mo brgyad// phyi nang gnyis med rtog 'joms khyi brgyad gnyis// rtsa ba rang sngags brjod pas phyag rgyar gsal//
20a5(gi): tib ha tsag kra sho na mu ka kha long kha/ ku ku ra tsa ra ga sha kha long kha hU phaT/ 'bor chen dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi sgo bzhin// theg chen dgu dang ldan pa'i phyir// mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po//
20a6(gi): rnam thar brgyad la gzud pa'i phyir// mgo brgyad lag brgyad rkang brgyad po// ye shes drug ldan rtogs pa'i phyir// mgo drug lag drug rkang drug po// sku gsung thugs dang dbyer med
20a7(gi): phyir/ mgo gsum lag drug rkang gsum po// sngags brjod tsam gyis phyag rgyar gsal// hu d+hu hU phaT/ hra hUM phaT/ hri hUM phaT/ ha hUM phaT/ steng 'og phyogs mtshams thabs dang shes
20b1(gi): rab las// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin med par rlung // 'khor ba dong sprugs bag chags bsregs pa'i phyir// sngags brjod tsam gyis me 'brug rlung du gsal// dzi na kha
20b2(gi): to tsa ra yag sha ku ban tsa hU/ hU bde gshegs pho brang rin chen gzhal yas ni// yid bzhin sbyor ldan rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings// shes rab zab mo rnam dag yum gyi mkha'//
20b3(gi): b+ha ga'i klong nas sprul pa mang po 'byung // sna tshogs yon tan gsang ba mdzod kyi gter// khro bo 'byung gnas dpal chen rngam pa'i yum// hug bcom 'brug sgras stong gsum yongs
20b4(gi): su 'dir// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings// phyogs bcu rgya ma chad pas dpag cing tshad las 'das// tshad med yon tan dpag gis mi lang skye// klu chen po mo
20b5(gi): bsnol ba'i gdung phya ma la// rgyal chen rigs bzhi gzhibs pa'i ka ba btsugs// lha chen dregs pa bcom pa'i rtsig rmang la// phyogs skyong pho mo bsnol ba'i rtsib du brtsegs//
20b6(gi): gza' brgyad bad du bor ba'i dral dra ba la// rgyu skar rnams kyis phyogs nas mig btsags byas// zhing chen bla ri mchog phran 'a phan gdugs dang // nya chen glung pu sbrul chen za ra
20b7(gi): chags/ chu srin sgo dang me ri sprin lhar 'khrigs// zong rur bar khyabs rdo rje gzer mgol// nyi ma zla ba bar snang yos ltar skad// dbus kyi 'khor lo lte ba zlum po la// skar ma
21a1(gi): rgyal gyi 'od zer gdub tu bskor// snga ma 'das pa'i rgyal sras gsang ba'i gnas// slad kyis 'byon pa'i rgyal sras gshegs pa'i shul// da ltar bzhugs
21a2(gi): pa'i khro bo gzhal yas la// gar gyi dbang phyug chen pos bstod pa'i phyir// ting nge 'dzin lha'i bu dang gang zag rnal 'byor pas// smon lam 'thun pa'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshal bstod//
21a3(gi): oM d+harma d+ha du gu ya maN+Da la ra ga sid+d+hi bru/ de ltar bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas// spyan drangs mchod pa rdzogs nas ni// sgrub pa'i don du bsnyen pa
21a4(gi): dbul/ dbang dang byin rlabs dngos grub stsol// gsol byas te gnang yid kyis dmigs// dkyil 'khor bsdus la bkra shis gsol// lus bsrung ba dang gi bgo bya// dbang chen
21a5(gi): bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // gong du bskyed pa'i gzhal yas su// lha rnams kyis sku bskyed byas na// gtso bo sku mdog
21a6(gi): phyag mtshan ni// gong du smos pa'i gzhung dang mthun// yum gyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin// g.yon pa rin
21a7(gi): chen za ma tog/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i phyir// gzi ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gru gsum mu dang ldan par dmigs// gtso bo yab kyi thugs kha ru/
21b1(gi): rtse lnga o dang bcas par dmigs// mu dang o du ldan byas te// yig 'bru bcu bzhi'i 'phreng ba yis// thugs nas sku yi gsang brgyud pas// dang po gsung gi yig 'brul//
21b2(gi): gnyis pa thugs kyi phyag mtshan te// gsum pa skur 'grub yungs 'bru'i tshul// oM las dbang chen yab yum sku// yan lag bzhi las gyur pa ni// rigs bzhi yab yum brgyad kyi sku
21b3(gi): hu lu gong ma ta ki ma mo brgyad// hu lu 'og ma ta kaM 'phra men brgyad// de yi yon tan 'phrin las la// sku gsung thugs su grub pa ni// khams brgyad chen mo drug gi sku// hU las sgo srungs
21b4(gi): bzhi ru gyur// phra las long ba dmus longs tshogs// ta las sbyang mo khyi yi tshogs// e las yum gyi gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor gzhung dang mthun par dmigs// yi ge 'bru las
21b5(gi): bskyed pa yis// dkyil 'khor lha rnams bzhugs su gsol// a ni ma skyes chos kyi dbyings// rA li rig pa byang chub sems// hri ni sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ dz+nyA sa ni thams cad dbang
21b6(gi): du sdus// de ni yig 'bru bcu bzhi la// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrubs pa'o// dbang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// yi ge bcu bzhi 'od du 'phros// gzi ldan yum gyi gzhal
21b7(gi): yas su thugs nas sku yi gsang brgyud de// gser zhun lha bur 'khyil ba las// dz+nyA na sA hA zhes brjod pas// ye shes sems dpa'i skur bsgyur te// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog
22a1(gi): dmar/ g.yas pa yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin// g.yon pa rin chen za ma tog/ gsang ba tshe yi dngos grub ste// byang chub sems kyi grub rtags so//
22a2(gi): gtso bo yab yum thugs ka nas/ hU dang e yi spro bsdu las// rdo rje pad+mor byin brlabs nas// yum gyis yab la 'di skad bskul// hU bde gshegs gnyis med rnal 'byor zab
22a3(gi): mo la/ thabs dang shes rab zung du ye 'brel yang // 'gro don yid bzhin shugs kyis mdzad slad du// byang chub sems kyi spro bsdu gtang ba'i phyir// gnyis med sbyor ba da ni
22a4(gi): dus la babs// a la la ho/ yab kyis yum la 'di skad bskul// hU rdo rje rgyal po kun 'jug phyir// rin chen rdo rje bla na med// chos kyi rdo rje glu blangs pas// las kyi
22a5(gi): rdo rje gar byed 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// nan tan mchod pa dbul ba ni// tshoms 'gyur gnyis kar spro bar bya// a la la ste dus la bab// oM bruM/ hUM bru/
22a6(gi): tra bru tri bru/ a bruM/ ni bruM/ bde gshegs rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor nas/ dza las lha mo lcags kyu can// stong khams khyab par spros pa'i tshe// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe la mnga'
22a7(gi): mdzad ma// rdo rje rigs 'dzin tshe la dbang bsgyur zhing // ri rab rmang dral rgya mtsho'i gting dral te// dregs pa gshin rje'i lag na gnas pa'i nr-i// ji ltar lcags kyus nya rnams
22b1(gi): drangs pa bzhin// zla gsal dri med thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// a yu tshe yi las rnams grub par mdzod// oM hu lu hu lu hU phaT/ e a ra li hI dza hU phaT/ gsang chen
22b2(gi): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yig 'bru bcu bzhi'i 'phro 'du yis// nri yi rang bzhin hUM du gyur// hU las ye shes sems dpa'i sku// sran ma tsam gyi zla dkyil du/
22b3(gi): yungs 'bru tsam gyi phyag rgya gsal// yid bzhin rin chen zam tog/ mi 'dzin 'dzin pa'i tshul du gnas// mi gnas pa yi sgra thabs ni// skye ba med pa'i dbyings su sba//
22b4(gi): gsang ba yum gyi mkha' la sba// rang rig ye shes gdeng la sba// de gsum dang du lon nas ni// 'du 'bral bya ba'i ming yang med// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// gas
22b5(gi): gnas tshe'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // gong du bskyed pa'i gzhal yas su// dkyil 'khor lha rnams sngags kyis bskyed// spyan drangs mchod pa
22b6(gi): rdzogs nas ni// khams gsum rgya drug bsgral ba'i don slad du// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i thugs dam bzhes pa ni// log rtog 'khrul pa'i zhen pa bzlog pa dang // skye shi 'khor ba'i
22b7(gi): ladam nas dbyung ba'i phyir// rtogs pas bdag bsgral don dang ldan pa la// thugs rje chen pos ga zung nas bdag pad+ma la rnams// 'phrin partag sa gnang ba'i cho ga btsal nas//
23a1(gi): brtul zhugs chen po drug gi bro// zhing bcu sgrib pa rgyun gcod do// de ltar sgrib pa rgyun bcad nas// sgrol byed ging gis dbang drug sbyin// de yang gang dang
23a2(gi): gang zhe na// yi ge 'khor lo phra dgod pa'i dbang dang // dri med ye shes pad+ma can gyi dbang dang / shes rab snang ba kun tu 'od kyi dbang dang // sgrol ba shugs kyis bsdus pas
23a3(gi): gsang ba yum gyi dbang dang / rdo rje dang pad+mor ldan pas byang chub sems kyi dbang dang / 'debs pa phyag mtshan thugs rje mchog gi dbang ngo // 'debs pa phyag mtshan
23a4(gi): thugs rje yis// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgyu bral nas// pra be sha phaT/ ces sgo phye ste/ sems kyi bdag po nr-i dud kha// gzung bas ti yi dngos bzhir 'gyur// thugs kyi sa bon hUM
23a5(gi): bar du skad cig gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// ti hU ti hU zhes brjod pas// ti yang hU du gyur nas ni// sku gsung thugs su gnas su gnas pas ni// dug gsum dngos
23a6(gi): la 'bigs par byed// khams gsum yongs la khyab par padal// chos dbyings gnas kyi mtha' ru phyin// gsang lung 'phrul gyi dgongs pa'o// de ltar gyur pa'i dud kha
23a7(gi): na// bsgral ba'i yon tan bcu bzhi ste// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// 'khor ba'i gnas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dmag tshogs kyi nang du/
23b1(gi): mi 'jigs pa chos nyid kyi dpung snyil ba dang / gti mug gi mun khang du ye shes kyi sgron me bteg pa dang / ma rig pa'i rgyu dang bcas pa'i sems bral nas/ rig pa'i ye shes kyi
23b2(gi): gter btsugs pa dang / 'khor ba'i ru mtshon chen po gcag pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i g.yul so spyod pa dang / dug gsum gyi mdud pa ni bkrol ba dang / dpal thar pa'i sgo
23b3(gi): ni phye ba dang / ye shes mtshon gyi char ni phab pa dang / rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas nas spar ba dang / skye shi med pa'i yul du phyin pa dang / 'du 'bral med pa'i grogs dang phrad pa dang //
23b4(gi): rang bzhin med pa'i sku ni thob pa dang / g.yung drung brtan pa'i sa ni rnyed pa'o// kun gyi thun mong ma yin yang // bdag dang gzhan gyi don slad du// dang du blangs nas bya bar
23b5(gi): gsungs// phung po lhag ma'i rjen shul la// gnas kyi bro brgyad brdung bas gsung // mgo la lang ka mnan pa'i bro// nang khrol tsit+ta 'khor ba'i bro// rnam shes tshogs
23b6(gi): brgyad ta krid brgyad kyi bro// phung po khams dang skye mched zhabs kyi chas brgyad bro// yan lag bzhi la lha mo za byed bzhi'i bro// nang khrol srid pa'i bro grang ngan song gnas
23b7(gi): kyi tho g.yang gzhi ma long las la 'khrug pa'i bro// brla bzhi khro bo gzir chen gnon pa'i gro// de ltar bro brgyad pa rdungs nas ni// smon lam btab nas phung po grol//
24a1(gi): tshogs la rol nas lhag ma bskyang // dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ thugs rje'i sgrol ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// /
24a2(gi): / gong du bskyed pa'i gzhal yas su// lha rnams sngags kyis bskyed nas ni// spyan drangs mchod pa rdzogs pa dang // ma bsgral ba yi phung po la// brtul zhugs bro drug
24a3(gi): brdung bar gsung // bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms la// ngan song gsum gyi phung po la// 'khor ba'i lam lnga bgag pa'i phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lnga 'phra bkod pas/
24a4(gi): rgyud drug 'bros khung gcod pa'i rgyu// lus ngag sems kyi sa gzhi la// yig 'bru 'khrigs pa'i bro brdungs pas// dug gsum rdul phran bzhin du bshig/ phung po khams
24a5(gi): dang skye mched sogs// rdo rje dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas// phyag rgya chen por bdag bsgyur cig/ mtshon lnga rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du//
24a6(gi): khams gsum bskor ba'i bro brdungs pas// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por bshad// thig le gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje las kyi bro brdungs pas// dbang phyug gar
24a7(gi): gyi rgyal por 'gyur// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dpa' bo rdo rje'i bro brdungs pas// dgra bo kun gyi klad la brdung // ma tshogs 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rkang pa phur
24b1(gi): ba'i bro brdungs pas// bgegs dang 'byung po'i snying la 'ardung // gying chen 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'khor lo thabs kyi bro brdungs pas// ming sring rnams kyi snying la brdung // 1
24b2(gi): 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bskal pa rgyab kyi bro brdungs pas// rgyab nyan rkun bu'i snying la brdungs// kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dkyil du// tsit+ta 'bar ba'i bro brdungs pas// mnyam
24b3(gi): pa nyid kyi dbyings la brdungs// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la// las kyi ling ka bro brdungs pas// bag chags gdug pa'i tsho gas la brdung // tshogs chen 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du//
24b4(gi): yungs ka ra gser gyi bro brdungs pas// bka' las 'das pa'i snying la brdung // za byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje mche ba'i tshems bdar bas// bka' las 'das pa'i snying
24b5(gi): la brdung // ha ha ru lu ha ha ru lu hu phaT/ ngan song gnas kyi bro ste dang po'o// rta yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// zhing bcu
24b6(gi): bsgral ba'i phung po la// gtum chen rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs shing // dbang mchog rta skad tse re ra// khro bo'i 'brug gla'ur ru ru// dpal gyi rnga sga ldir ri re// rol pa'i rngabro chems sa
24b7(gi): tshems// gsang ba'i spyugs pa kyu ru ru// bsal pa'i glog 'bar lcibs se ldings// rdo rje thog 'beng sa lal ma 'a6// hUM gis dbang bkur kham sad yum g.yo// phaT kyis sku spu
25a1(gi): 'jig rten khyab// ra gyis me 'bar thams cad bsregs// gcan gzan mu kha sprin ltar gtibs// ka ka 'dab chags skar ltar 'khrugs// sngon gyi
25a2(gi): thugs dam paskang ba'i phyir// kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings su// khams gsum dongs sgrol mdzad pa che// za byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rus pa'i phung po spungs pa
25a3(gi): la/ gcan gzan mche bas bro brdungs pas// bdag tu lta ba'i zhe sdang bcom// khrag 'thung chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khyil ba la// ma tshogs mkha' 'gros
25a4(gi): bro brdungs pas// 'dod chags ngo bo rtsad nas bcom// rnga ma chen 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// sha chen phung po spungs pa la// sder chags 'dus pa'i bro brdungs pas//
25a5(gi): bdag tu lta ba'i nga rgyal bcom// gtum chen rnga ma pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang po yan lag tshogs pa la// gshog pa rlabs kyi bro brdungs pas// bdag tu rtog pa'i phrag dog
25a6(gi): bcom/ 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// sbugs kyi khri rkang zlum po la// rdo rje mchu yi bro brdungs pas// gti mug rmongs pa'i ngo bo bcom// sku gsung thugs kyi
25a7(gi): dkyil 'khor du// dug gsum gzhom pa'i las byas pas// sngon gyi dam tshig chen po bskongs// ma bdun mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// stan 'gan 'khrugs pa'i las byas
25b1(gi): pas/ rnal 'byor bskang ba'i cho ga rdzogs// dbang chen gar gyi dkyil 'khor du// bdud bzhi gdul ba'i las byas pas// khams gsum bsgral ba'i cho ga rdzogs// phyag mnyam
25b2(gi): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bka' las 'das pa'i las byas pas// dgra bo mnan pa'i cho ga rdzogs// ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hU phaT/ rta'i bro ste gnyis pa'o// khrag
25b3(gi): 'thung chen po'i brtul zhugs ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// dbu ni rigs lnga'i tshogs la rol// thugs ni skye med dbyings la rol//
25b4(gi): phyag ni 'phra men tshogs la rol// gshog pa gti mug klu la rol// zhabs ni khro chen brgyad la rol// sku ni rnga ma brjid chas la rol// rdo rje gsang ba'i yum la rol// gsung ni pho
25b5(gi): nya'i tshogs la rol// 'khor ba'i skam ling chen po la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ra mda' gnyer// khong snying yum gyi b+ha ga la// khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad pa'i tshe//
25b6(gi): ye shes lnga yis rus dpon mdzad// khro bo rdo rje go tshags sdoms// sprul pa'i pho nyas dang ru chu ma// dug gsum dpal gyi mnga' khar 'dri ma// rdo rje mtshon gyi char pa pho ba// lus ni
25b7(gi): rdul phran bzhin du bshigs// sems ni yum gyi mkha' la stobs// ta ha ru lu zhu phaT/ khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro ste gsum pa'o// zhe sdang zhabs kyi cha lugs las//
26a1(gi): khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// khams gsum ma lus bza' ba'i phyir//
26a2(gi): dpal gyi khyi brgyad las la bkye// tshems ni sra snyi med par rno// skad ni phyi nang med par zug/ de phyir bdud kyi me la ts+tsha ba// bang ni ngal du ba med par mgyogs// de phyir ye shes
26a3(gi): sprul pa'i khyi// khyi zas gtsang sme med par za// de phyir ma sa dri chen za// skom du kha mngar med par 'thung // de phyir khrag dang dri chu 'thung // shar gyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi//
26a4(gi): 'brug sgra ldir ba'i lha chen 'dul// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// glog 'bar lcibs kyi gshin rje 'dul// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// rdo rje khyung gshog klu 'brug 'dul//
26a5(gi): byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// gnod sbyin pho mo'i skal rtsibs 'joms// shar lho mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// drang srong bdud 'dul cham la 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas rgyug ni//
26a6(gi): za byed srin po'i don snying 'byin// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// rlung lha sngon po'i ba dan gcod// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// bgegs chen po mo'i sha la rol// steng gi
26a7(gi): phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// nyi zla gza' skar kha lo kha// 'og gi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// sa bdag pho mo thibs kyis gnon// kun kyang mi bzad ci 'dra na// mche ba rgya zor bkug pa 'dra//
26b1(gi): spyan na nyi zhu ras la// ras pa 'i par 'dings pa 'dra// b+hur mo gnas rmugs zhun ma'adra// rkyed kyi 'phrin las dus lapag// kuku ma mal la la gyu // khyi'i bro ste bzhi par
26b2(gi): phag gi brtul zhugs chen po ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// blang dor med pa'i mnyam pa la// phyogs bcu zas su tha
26b3(gi): ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i khron rkong re mkhas// khron du ma gyur gang yang med// sku ni 'bar ba'i cha lugs la// gnam lcags dur mo'i ze bas brgyan// zhal ni phag rgod mche bar sprul/
26b4(gi): gsung ni grul bum phyogs bcur sgrogs// tshems ni sra sti med par rno// shangs ni nyon mongs thal bar rlog/ sbad nas khros pa'i bro brdungs te// srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud//
26b5(gi): dmyal tshogs me dpung rtsad nas gcod// du ru du ru tshal pa tshal pa hU phaT/ phag gi bro ste lnga pa'o// rdo rje gshog pa'i byin brlabs la// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po ni//
26b6(gi): zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// rdo rje gshog chen gdengs pa'i tshe// khams gsum khyab par gzan mtshol// rdo rje gshog chen bcum pa'i tshe/
26b7(gi): rgyud drug sems can spar mor 'dzud// rdo rje mchu chen gdengs pa'i tshe// rgyud drug sems can ral mi mdzad// bya yi brtul zhugs chen pos ni zhing bcu bsgyur ba'i lhag rol pa/
27a1(gi): dkar po'i tshogs dang dmar ngo'i tshogs// dbyar gyi char sprin 'khrigs pa bzhin// lding zhing 'babs la 'babs shing gzhol// gtan la 'bebs pa'i las
27a2(gi): mdzod cig/ ma mo ko dag sha yang ma ma ko dag sha ya ha ha ru lu hU phaT/ bya'i bro ste drug pa'o// sgom log rtsa ba'i le'u las/ mdzad pa 'phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
27a3(gi): / de yan chad du ma bsgral ba'i phung po la/ brtul zhugs chen po drug gi bros rgyu'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa sbyangs pa dang / gnod byed kyi dgra bgegs 'dul ba bstan nas/ 'di man
27a4(gi): chad du ma bsgral ba'i lhag ma la/ sgrol ba gnas kyi bro brgyad brdung bar gsungs te/ de yang mgo la lang ka mnan pi'i bro zhes pa/ hU ru tra bsgral ba'i ngo bo la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel
27a5(gi): bsdams nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dbu gtsug tu// mthing nag grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// hri las grub pa'i rta mgo la// hUM gi
27a6(gi): 'brug stong dir ri ri// de yi byin brlabs chen po las// lang ka mnan pa'i bro brdungs 'chal// rta gdong chen po'i stong gsum g.yos// rta skad rngam pa'i thugs dam bskul// bka'
27a7(gi): bzhin las la gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban hri hri/ zhes drag tu brjod do// lang ka gnon pa'i bro ste dang po'o// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i bro zhes pa/ hUM lang ka bsgral ba'i tsit+ta/
27b1(gi): las/ lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams shing // khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i thugs dkyil nas// hUM las grub pa'i dpal be'u las// ye shes lnga yi phyag rgya 'khrungs// de yi byin brlabs
27b2(gi): chen po las// rigs lnga khrig tu sprin ltar gtibs// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i ri dgas la// ye shes lnga yi khyibakye ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas ra mda' gnyer// khong snying yum gyi ba gal//
27b3(gi): rgyud drug 'khor ba'i ling 'debs so// rnam shes brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod brgyad kyi lam 'byung ste// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod thugs rje'i bro// srin po bsgral ba'i snying la brdung /
27b4(gi): dz+nyA na sid+d+hi ba ra na yang yang zhes brjod do// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i bro ste gnyis pa'o// rnam shes tshogs brgyad ta krid brgyad kyi bro zhes pa/ hUM ru tra bsgral ba'i rnam shes la/
27b5(gi): lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams te// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// nga rgyal mthu bsnyems bdud kyi dpung bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i
27b6(gi): sngo ba chen po brgyad// che ba'i rtags dang ldan pas dbang phyug yang chen gnon// drag shul chen po'i gdul bar bka' stsal to// hU dang ka yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo mthing nag sprin lhar
27b7(gi): 'khrigs// khro chung tshon gang skar lhar 'khrug/ hUM chen ka ra'i phyag rgyar gsal// nyi zla bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta krid chen po dag la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro//
28a1(gi): bdud ni phye mar btag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen pal la// rlung naga' tshubasems phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje bu yug 'tshubs// hU a dang ra'i
28a2(gi): 'phro 'du las// khro bo ljang sngon sprin ltar 'khrigs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrug/ mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgyar gsal// srin po bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ha krid chen po
28a3(gi): dag la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar btag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen pa la la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma sprin ltar 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje bu yug
28a4(gi): 'tshubs// yang dang a yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo mthing nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrug/ gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgyar gsal// gshin rje bsgral ba'i
28a5(gi): rnam shes la// ta krid chen po bdag la gshags// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen pa la la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur
28a6(gi): 'khrigs// 'od zer rdo rje bu yug 'tshub// ni dang la yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo sngon po sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrug/ dbyug pa sngon po'i phyag rgyar gsal/
28a7(gi): ta krid chen po dag la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen pa la la// rlung nag 'chubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje/
28b1(gi): bu yug 'tshubs// pa dang ma yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo dud kha sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrug/ pad+mo 'khyil ba'i phyag rgyar gsal// sa bdag bsgral ba'i rnam
28b2(gi): shes la/ ta kring chen po dag la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen pa la la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur
28b3(gi): 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje bu yug 'tshubs// ta dang ka yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo dmar skya sprin ltar gtibs// phung po khams dang skye mched la// zhabs kyi cha brgyad bro brdungs zhes
28b4(gi): hUM/ srin po ru tra bsgral ba'i phung po la// phung po khams dang skye mched la// lu gu rgyud kyis sbrel bsdams nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// mi gnas ye shes thugs
28b5(gi): kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha chen mgo bcu dur khrod brgyad du sprul// zhe sdang gdug po'i tshogs brgyad gnas su bsgral// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dregs pa 'dul ba'i phyir/
28b6(gi): zhabs kyi chas brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi ngang // byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi 'phro 'du dang // 'phra man mu kha brgyad kyi 'byon tshul gyis// ta krid brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang ba'i
28b7(gi): phyir/ gar dang brda yis mtshon nas spyan 'dren na// dam tshig gsang ba'i grol gshegs su garol// dpa' bo ting 'dzin d+hag gi chas mchog gis/ dregs pa'i mgo bcad banaH
29a1(gi): gsang ba'i bro// rno gdug bzlog byed rgya bye'u chas mchog gis// rtog 'joms spyod pa brtul zhugs chen po'i bro// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje chas mchog gis/
29a2(gi): mi 'gyur g.yung drung skyid rtags dpal gyi bro// dbang gi bas khrab gzi 'bar chas mchog gis// khams gsum dbang sdud ra k+ta chags pa'i bro// dpal brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag chas
29a3(gi): mchog gis// mkha' dbyings rnam dag gsang ba yum gyi bro// dbang dbyug dmar gsal che ba'i chas mchog gis// sdug bsngal nad med zug rngu gcod pa'i bro// shu kin smad g.yogs
29a4(gi): dar gyi chas mchog gis// dur khrod gnas su ma mo mnyes pa'i bro// gcan gzan rgyal po gzig gi chas mchog gis// rdul sbyong drag po las kyi tshar gcod bro// gdul bya'i
29a5(gi): zhabs kyi thams cad zil gyis gnon// dzaHhU ba hos spyan drangs tshur gshegs la// ngag gi dbang phyug thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// dbang chen yum du brtsegs pa'i sa gzhi la//
29a6(gi): nga rgyal dbang du bsdu ba'i bro rang btsugs// dregs pa 'dul phyir gzir mnan stabs kyi tshul// srid gsum ma lus dbyings su bsgral ba dang // lha chen khyab 'jug zil gyis mnan pa
29a7(gi): dang / gsang po'i ru tra thal bar brlag pa'i phyir// phung po khams dang skye mched don la gshegs su gsol// tra ga raka ru tra ma hA tsit+ta dza dza/ zhes drag tu bskor/ phung po khams dang skye
29b1(gi): mched zhabs kyi chas brgyad kyi bro ste bzhi pa'o// yan lag bzhi lha mo za byed kyi bro zhes pa/ hU/ srin po ru tA pasgral ba'i yan lag la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel
29b2(gi): bsdams nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// thog med las kyi ma mo dbang sdud de// yan lag chen po gser gyi sa gzhi la// lcags kyu dmar por 'khor ba'i
29b3(gi): nad khrag 'byin// a mo de ba 'dir gshegs a ku sha// yon han lhun grub cir yang sprul pa'i yum// dur khrod gsang ba'i lha mo glog 'gyum// rdo rje zhags pas khams
29b4(gi): gsum cig car bcings// lha mo glog 'gyu 'dir gshegs pA sha hUM// gsung gis thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i yum// rdo rje dra ba bka' yi rjes gcod ma// lcags
29b5(gi): sgrog dmar pos rgyu drug cig car sdoms// rdo rje dra ba 'dir gshegs yo pa// sku mdog mi bzad 'bar ba'i yum cig ma// rdo rje sder mo ral pa'i cod pan can// rdo rje dril
29b6(gi): bus ma lus dgyes par bskyed// dur khrod sgra yi tshogs 'gyur ga na Da ho// zhes brjod la drag tu bskor ro// yan lag bzhi la lha mo za byed ma bzhi'i bro ste lnga pa'o//
29b7(gi): nang khrol ngan song gnas kyi bro zhes pa/ rku srin po ru tra brgal ba'i blo shul la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel nga snga mas nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// sdug bsngapa yongs
30a1(gi): bsgral mdzad pa'i 'phrin las kyis// ngan song gting nas sbyongs pa'i bro brdungs 'tshal// mkha' lding shugs kyi 'gro ba'i brtson 'grus dang // 'phra men
30a2(gi): mgo brnyan tshogs kyi rkan sgra yis// khams gsum 'khor ba dngangs pa'i glu blangs te// lhag phud med pa'i nang khrol spungs pa la// bya rog 'ug pa bzhad dang khA la sogs// stag seng
30a3(gi): spyang khu 'jigs pa'i gdon rnams ni// la la lding la la la 'babs// la la 'jol zhing la la 'thog/ ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // zhing bcu gnas nas blang phyir gshegs su gsol//
30a4(gi): zhes brjod la nang khrol kha phye la/ sdang mig gis blta zhing gtum bag gis rab tu bskor ro// nang khrol ngan song gi gnas kyi bro ste drug pa'o// g.yang gzhi ma mo
30a5(gi): 'khrugs pa'i bro zhes pa/ hU srin po ru tra bsgral ba'i g.yang gzhi la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms la/ sha khrag dam ra la dgyes pa'i ma
30a6(gi): mo mkha' 'gro rnams// gsad pa'i god srung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor skyong // ma bdun las la 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'khor ba'i gting snyegs zhing bcu'i nang khrol la//
30a7(gi): dug gsum rngub pa'i shul gyis ltar gshegs shing // gsang ba'i zhing chen bdal ba'i sa gzhi la/ phyogs skyong rgyal po las la 'khrug pa'i bro// srin po smug na gzugs rje chags pa'i
30b1(gi): brogro/ gling bzhi kun 'byams rab tu rngam pa'i bro// bstan ma bcu gnyis mchen 'khrug pa'i bro// g.yang gzhi bzhin gyi bro gra 'dir gshegs la// khyi phag bya dang rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyi
30b2(gi): ngadang bdag tu lta ba'i mun khang bshig/ ru tra'i gnas bcom sha'i maN+Dal// sha zan stong gis chun lag dings sed dmigs/ dmar gyi rba klong 'khyil ba la// khrag 'thung stong gis rkan sgra chi
30b3(gi): li li/ rus pa tshogs kyis mkhar du gtams pa la// mche ba dung gis rang kha thams sa thams// g.yang gzhi sprin gyi ba dan lhubs sa lhub// 'di 'dra dur khrod 'bar ba'i sa gzhi
30b4(gi): la dpal chen 'khrugs pa'i bro sgra dir ri ri// skyes bu ging chen 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la// ma mo las la 'khrugs pa'i bro brdungs pas// bdud dang srin po'i mig 'bras thang la
30b5(gi): rlog/ gti mug klu dbang snying khrag kha nas skyug/ lang ka gdon gyi kha so sil bur 'gyur// rak+ta ru tra ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ ces brjod la/ drag tu bskor ro// g.yang gzhi ma mo 'khrug pa'i
30b6(gi): bro ste bdun pa'o// rkang lag khro bo gzir gnon bro zhes pa/ hU srin po ru tra bsgral ba'i bla gzhi la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur
30b7(gi): bsgoms nas// rkang lag rdo rje phur pa'i bro// ya sha can gyi snying la brdung // rdo rje khro bos thugs kha nas// khro bo 'bar ba'i thug pa ru// suM b+ha ni yi sgra bsgrags nas/
31a1(gi): sngags dang phyag rgya rol pa'i bro// zhe sdang can gyi snying la brdung // bskal pa mtha' yas mi ldang phyir// brjid pa'i sbubs dang sngags kyi 'tshams// oM su b+ha
31a2(gi): ninIni su b+ha ni hU/ g+h+ri ha na g+h+ri ha na hU/ g+h+ri ha na pa ya g+h+ri ha Na pa yA hU/ A na ya b+ha ga ban/ bid+ya rA dza ya na na/ zhes brjod la mnan/ khro bo gzir gnon bro ste brgyad pa'o// dbang chen bsdus
31a3(gi): pi'i tan+na las/ mdzad pa'i 'phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // bar cis kyang mchod pa sgrol ba gnas kyi smon lam 'di gsungs so// hoHsmon lam
31a4(gi): du gsol ba ni/ mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ dpal dur khrod kyi mnga' bdag/ he ru ma bdun 'phra men tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang ba dang / rgyu dug gsum gyi rtsa ba bcad nas/
31a5(gi): 'bras bu ngan song gsum stong par bgyi ba'i slad du rgyu nyon mongs pa'i sems can 'di dag las/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga lus la bkod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lnga dang ldan te/ phung po
31a6(gi): rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ sha khrag mang po mchod pa'i tshogs su rol pa'i sa/ zas kyi bde ba nyams su bsgyur bas/ 'byung ba chen mo bzhi rigs kyi yum chen mo bzhir gyur cig/
31a7(gi): rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ye shes brgyad kyi bdag nyid du bsgyur bas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las mang po'i sgo nas cis kyang ma bsgribs par gyur cig/ khog pa ni rin po che'i
31b1(gi): gzhal yas khang du phul bas/ rin po che'i 'od zer sna bdun las gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang / rgyan sna tshogs mdzes pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par gyur cig/ nang khrol sna tshogs kyi
31b2(gi): dkyil 'khor dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang gnas thun mong ma yin pa nas/ glo ba las kyi he ru ka la phul bas/ glo ma bu thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las/ hU dbugs kyi rang bzhin sgra chen
31b3(gi): po 'byung bas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi sgra bsgrags pas rnam smin dbang du 'du bar gyur cig/ mchin pa pad+ma he ru ka'i tshogs su phul bas/ mchin gri dbang gi bla res
31b4(gi): sprin gyis khebs pas/ gti mug klu ni dbang du bsdus/ mkhris pa chos nyid bdud rtsi phul ba las/ chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char chen po 'bab par gyur cig/ mkhal ma g.yas g.yon rdo rje
31b5(gi): rigs kyi pha lam/ rin po che'i rigs rdo rje'i rigs la phul bas/ rin po che'i rigs la phul bas ni/ dgos 'dod kyi re ba yid bzhin bskongs par gyur cig/ rdo rje rigs la phul
31b6(gi): pas dus gsum 'gyur ba med de/ sra mkhregs rdo rje dang 'dra bar gyur cig/ tsit+ta rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs ye shes sems dpa' la phul bas/ chos nyid sgyu ma'i don ye shes sgyu mas rtogs
31b7(gi): nas sprul pa sgyu ma'i sku sngon du byung ste/ rnal 'byor pa mang pos 'gro ba'i don byed par gyur cig/ lha bcu gnyis lha mo bcu gnyid kyi tshogs su phul bas/ skye mched bcu gnyis lha mo bcu
32a1(gi): gnyis su gnas bsgyur te/ rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi gdan tshogs chen po mdzad par gyur cig/ rgyu ma shes rab kyi
32a2(gi): lam du phul bas/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nyon mongs pa lnga dang dug gsum las/ 'bras bu'i chos sku gsum ye shes lnga las/ gzhan du 'gyur dbang med pa nyid las nyid du sangs rgyas par gyur
32a3(gi): cig/ gnye ma thabs kyi dkyil 'khor du phul bas/ thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rje'i mdzad spyod kyis 'khor ba 'di ni dbyings su bzlums pas/ phyi dang nang gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs
32a4(gi): par gyur cig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la/ mid pa chos thar byed kyi sgo srungs su phul bas/ chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong nam du yang nub pa'i dus med par gyur cig/
32a5(gi): sgrol ba'i shes rab thar byed kyi sgo srungs su phul bas/ phyi nang gsang rgyud phun sum tshogs pa nas/ da yang nub pa'i dus med par gyur cig/ chu so rgyu thar byed kyi sgo srungs
32a6(gi): su phul bas/ 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / ma byon pa dang dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdung ba rgyud mtha' nam du yang mi 'chad par gyur cig/
32a7(gi): tshil nag gshin rje thar byed kyi sgo srungs su phul bas/ gshen rje dang bcas pa'i ma mo 'tshams 'dral ba'i 'byung po cher bcad nas/ gzhal yas khang dus gsum du bkra shis par/
32b1(gi): gyur cig/ mgo mngon par byang chub pa'i dkyil 'khor du phul bas/ mig shes rab kyi sgron ma sa ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar gyur cig/ kha za byed kyi hom gyis rgyu drug
32b2(gi): gis rtsa ba gtor ma ra ba zhes par gyur cig/ da las kyi khro bos dug gsum rtsad nas gcod par gyur cig/ lce 'jig rten srid pa'i me dpung du phul bas/ 'khor ba'i bag chags
32b3(gi): bsreg pa'i gnyen por gyur cig/ sna sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'bud pa'i rlung du phul bas/ skyon gyi ma gos chags sel cing 'thor ba'i gnyen por gyur cig/ rna ba yon han ma
32b4(gi): 'gags pa'i sgro mor phul bas/ gsung rab rgya mtsho chos kyi sgra thos pas 'phrin las rgya mtsho ji ltar bcol ba bzhin thos shing grub par gyur cig/ pags pa dbang gi bla re ra phul ba'i
32b5(gi): saye shes thibs su che ba'i khyad par las/ ba spu nyag re las kyang sprul pa lham dral gyis 'jig rten yongs su 'khrigs pas 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du byed par gyur cig/ srin
32b6(gi): lag g.yon pa gyen du bsgrengs pas ni/ bka' drin chen po nam shar yang mi nub pa'i g.yung drung gi rgyal mtshan chen po ni btsugs/ gsang sngags phyogs bcur dar ba'i dbang
32b7(gi): sa bdud bzhi bsnyal zhing mgo mnan pas/ chos kyi ru mtshon chen po 'phyar ba'i mthus/ 'khor ba'i g.yul so ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su bzlog/ dpal so rnon po
33a1(gi): ni dug gsum gyi dgral btsugs pas/ 'phrin las rgyal thabs chen po bsnyems te rgyu ngan song gsum ni stongs/ sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu dbu rdog ni btsan/
33a2(gi): 'bras bu ye shes lha'i rgyal srid ni thob par gyur cig/ dgra lag pa g.yas thur du bcag pas ni/ mu stegs kyi lta ba sum brgya drug cu klad pa gcod pa'i gsang ba'i 'gan de'i yum
33a3(gi): gyi mkha' dbyings su brdung ba yis/ nag po'i phyin ci log gis stan gzhi gshig/ tshel bar du gcod pa'i bdud bzhi ni btul/ mtshan ma log par ston pa'i dgra bgegs
33a4(gi): mang po ni phri/ dus gsum nye bar lhung ba'i ye 'grog mang po ni log/ dug chags mang po kun nas ldang ba'i dgra bgegs mang po ni bcings nas/ bdag cag rdo rje che ge mo rnams
33a5(gi): ye shes bla ma'i sa non/ dbang phyug chen po'i gral thob/ phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs par gyur cig/ de skad ces gsungs so// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sgrol ba
33a6(gi): gnas kyi smon lam gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // mdzad pa 'phrin las kyi le'u bzhis/ bstan pa'i tha ma la brnyes pa mchod pa'i le'u 'byung ste/
33a7(gi): mnyes pa mchod pa'i le'u la yang / rang bzhin gnas nas spyan 'dren le'u dang / bstim gnas bzhug gsol gyi le'u dang / bkur sti phyag 'tshal gyi le'u dang / mnyes pa
33b1(gi): mchod pa'i le'u dang / rtogs pas bdag bsgral le'u dang / thugs rjes gzhan bsgral mchod pa'i le'u dang / bcol ba'i 'phrin las kyi le'u dang / 'phrin las kha bskang phyag
33b2(gi): rgyu'i le'u dang brgyad kyis bstan to// de la dang po rang bzhin gyi gnas nas spyan 'dren gyi le'u 'byung ste/ gong du bskyed pa'i dbu lnga'i gzhal yas khang du rdo rje dbyings
33b3(gi): kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa 'di skad do// hU/ dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// rnam par snang mdzad rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas// dbang rnams rdzogs par
33b4(gi): mdzad pa'i dron slad du// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// rigs lnga'i spyi'i phyag rgyas spyan 'dren na// gar gyi spyi gtsug rgyan du gshegs su gsol// dzaHhU ba ho//
33b5(gi): o dzi ka na dzi ka/ la te sha ra hi/ hUM badz+ra d+hi ka/ muM d+hA du sha ri/ swa rah+na d+hI ka/ mau mo ha ra ti/ oM a ro li ka/ pya ra ga ra ti/ hA pra dz+nyA d+hi ka/ ta badz+ra ra hi/ ka ma la mu ka/
33b6(gi): ka ma las ki ka ma la la gakam sa/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ snga ma bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa 'di skad do// hUM/ dbang gi rgyal po khro
33b7(gi): rta mchog dpal// 'phrin las myur mgyogs gar yang thog pa med// drag shul srin po gdul ba'i don glad du// rta mgrin dbang go dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// rtagadong zhal gyi phyag
34a1(gi): rgyas spyan 'dren na// dbang gi rta skad 'tsher zhing gshegs su gsol// dzaHhU ba ho/ oM shri pad+ma mu ka yo ki sha ri ha ya g+hi ba e h+ye hi hri/ gong du bskyed pa'i dkyil
34a2(gi): 'khor du/ ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor spun drangs pa 'di skad do// hU/ mkhyen rig ye shes mnga' ba 'khrul pa'i gnas// phra mo'i ting 'dzin khro bo dpal gyis thugs// tshon gang
34a3(gi): gsal bar shar bas ma rig rmongs pa sel// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// rigs byed lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan 'dren na// shes rab sgron dang bcas nas
34a4(gi): gshegs su gsol// dza hU baM ho/ dz+nyA na satwa hU/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+thA/ gong du bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa 'di skad do// hUM 'khor
