96b5(gi): ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po nyid// byis pa dman pas mi rtogs te// rnam par dbye dang rgyu 'bras dang // zhen 'dzin bdag la mngon rtog cing // bdag gzhan log pas mngon bsgribs te//
96b6(gi): ma rtogs don phyir gsang ba nyid// sku gsung thugs ni ro gcig pa'i// ma lus bde chen rdo rje 'chang // gcig tu cha shas yul med cing // 'dus byas med
96b7(gi): cing rba rlangs med// bar chad mtho zag pa med// chog tu rmad byung ba sa kri khyab// bde chen rnam mkha'i jo bo ltar// khyab cing zhi ba rdul dang dra la// 'dzad chags chags
97a1(gi): bral snying po mkhyen// dpag med phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas kyang // bde chen snying po don bral zhing // bdag gzhan zhi ba'i don lhas pas// gsang las shin
97a2(gi): tu gsang gyur pa// rang sems snying po bde chen po// cha shas tsam yang rtog pa med// e ma bde chen gsang ba yi// ma lus mnyam zhing snying po la// gsang ba 'jam zhing dal
97a3(gi): bar gzigs// ma lus bde chen snang ba nyid// kun gyi yul du ma gyur pa// sman dang sbyor ba mi shes shing // rigs min yul min phra ba nyid// gsang chen rmad du byung ba'o//
97a4(gi): phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// 'dul ba'i don phyir snang ba ni// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yis// zad
97a5(gi): med 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ni// rang bzhin rtogs pas mnyam sbyor nas// ro gcig par ni bsdus par brjod// rang sems rdo rje'i snying po nyid// stong pa stong min bde ba min// /
97a6(gi): chags dang ma chags yul las 'das// rtag min chad min dbu ma yi// yid spyod cho ga'i rtog pa min// mtshon dang mtshan ma las grol bas// dpal ldan snying po brtan pa
97a7(gi): che/ rang sems bde chen 'dus ma byas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// mchog tu rmad du gyur pa'i gnas// snying po don du bsdus pa'o// ma lus
97b1(gi): bdag tu mnyam sbyor ba// bdag nyid chen por ro gcig pa// ma lus 'dir ni gnyis su med// dam pa'i don du 'dir gcig pa'o// ma lus sku gsung thugs sbyor ba/
97b2(gi): gzhan med bde tshon rtag tu mdzes// thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems// gnyis med sa la rtag par bzhugs// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig tu rab tu che ba'i lha//
97b3(gi): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// ma lus 'dir 'dus rnam par dag/ ma lus bde chen thig le nyid// gsang ba'i don du dbyer med pas// gnyis dang gnyis med
97b4(gi): yul las 'das// gang du yod dang med pa yis// mtha' dbus rgyu 'bras las 'das pa// gnyis med thabs las gang byung ba// 'di ni gsang ba'i dri med de// gang gi mchog
97b5(gi): tu gyur pa nyid// ma lus gnyis su med par gnas// gnas pa rtogs gom las byung ba// dam pa'i rang bzhin gnyis med pas// nam mkha'i mtha' lhar mtha' dbus med//
97b6(gi): mchog tu phra ba'i bdag nyid de// dbang po spyod yul las 'das shing // ma dmigs sgom dang spyod las 'das// yul min shes min mtshan ma min// bdag med ye shes las
97b7(gi): byung ba/ gzugs med stong med gnyis ka min// bde ba chen po'i ngo bo ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// gcig pu thig le'i bdag nyid de// mtha' dbus kun pa mi
98a1(gi): gnas pa'i// gnyis su med pa'i ngo bor brtag/ sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dbyer med ye shes bdag nyid de//
98a2(gi): gang du rtog dang mi rtog pa'i// zhen pa'i 'du shes ma lus pa// rang bzhin thabs kyi rnam par dag/ gnyis med ye shes bde chen no// gnyis med cha shas chags pa med//
98a3(gi): mkha' ltar khyab cing rgya che ba// bsam dang spyod pa yul med pa// sangs rgyas ye shes grangs med pa'i// dam pa'i rang bzhin kun khyab kyang // dman pa rnams kyis mi shes so//
98a4(gi): sangs rgyas kun dang dbyer med pa'i// bde ba chen po'i gsang ba ni// mkha' ltar khyab pa'i bdag nyid de// ye shes yin pas dri med de// las dang nyon mongs la sogs pa// ma
98a5(gi): chags pad+ma'i rang bzhin ltar// ma spangs rang bzhin dag pa ni// bde chen lhun grub ye shes nyid// 'di ni rmad byung gsang ba ste// spod dang 'du shes bral ba'i phyir// dbang dang man/
98a6(gi): ngag bral ba yis// bskal pa bye bas mi shes so// las dang nyon mongs bya ba dang // lta bas kun tu khebs pa yis// bdag la gnas pa gzhan la rtogs// gnyis 'dzan zhe na
98a7(gi): mtha' rtag pa yin// mtha' dbus bral ba rtog pa min// rang 'byung ye shes dri ma med// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// thog ma tha ma mtha' dbus bral// shes dang mi
98b1(gi): shes las 'das shing // byin brlabs sgom min stobs las byung // ma lus mtha' nyid mnyam sbyor bas// gnyis med ye shes phyogs cha 'das// mkhyen dang mi mkhyen rnam
98b2(gi): par spangs// bsam sbyor phyogs 'dzin yul las 'das// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gsang ba gsang chen las byung ba// kun kyang gnyis med thig ler ba rtag/
98b3(gi): ma bcos rang bzhin dang dag pa'i// phyogs men nam mkha'i rang bzhin lhar// ma brtags dag pa'i thams cad mthong // chos dbyings snying rjes chags zhes bya'o// mnyam
98b4(gi): nyid gsang ba rtogs dka' bas// khams gsum sdug bsngal nyam thag la// thabs dang thugs rjes khyab pa yis// snying po khyab par gnas pa yin// gang dag thabs chen
98b5(gi): ldan pa yis// dka' thub gdung ba la sogs pa'i// byis pa'i spyod pa yongs su spangs// thabs mkhas lha dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// de nyid sgyu mar gsal ba yis// ma lus
98b6(gi): gsang bar brtag pa yis// thabs mkhas 'dod pa thams cad pa// ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyad par bya// dka' thub gdung ba las 'das shing // shes rab bde ba las byung ba'i//
98b7(gi): 'dod pa lnga ni shin tu bde// bde ba chen po rnam par dag/ nyon mongs bag chags dri ma med// nam mkha' dang za ba'in du gnas// ji ltar me dang du sa dag gis// gzung ba de
99a1(gi): yis sel ba ltar// thabs dang ldan pa cho ga yis// mun pa snang ba bzhin du sel// 'di ni rjes chags bde ba'i mchog/ dbang po che 'bring cha las
99a2(gi): 'das/ dpal ldan he ru ka yi thabs// nam mkha'i khams ltar bsam yas pa// slob dpon yon tan kun ldan pas// dbang dang man ngag las byung ba'i// thabs dang mi
99a3(gi): ldan chags sbyar bas// sbyor ba log pa'i cho ga bzhin// dus min 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// dmyal ba chen por the tshom med// rang bzhin ngan dang las kyi bkol// dkon
99a4(gi): mchog slob dpon mched rnams dang // dam tshig 'jigs cing kun la 'tshe// pha dang ma la snying ring zhing // gdug pa che dang snying rje med// log lha dam nyams log lta
99a5(gi): 'khus/ thar pa'i thag pa chad pa dang // sngags kyi theg pa la smod cing // thabs log gnod pa sna tshogs kyis// kun la gnod pa'i las byed pa// 'di dag bsgral
99a6(gi): ba'i zhing yin te// dngos su bsod nams mchog yin na// thabs dang sngags kyi rim pa yis// myur du bsgral ba'i smos ci dgos// dpal ldan he ru ka yi dngos//
99a7(gi): thabs dang shes rab gdengs ldan zhing // thugs rjes khyab cing chags sogs min// byin rlabs nyams drod mchog dang ldan// re dogs med pa'i brtul zhugs ldan//
99b1(gi): gdug sogs thugs rjes yal bar min// sbyor dang thabs mkhas ting nge 'dzin// goms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yis// bar chod re dogs zhi byas te// phyogs bcu gdug pa
99b2(gi): ma lus pa// dgug cing bstim pa'i las byas nas// a la sogs pa dag byas la// dag pa'i zhing du nan tan bya// gsang ba dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// bdag gzhan
99b3(gi): don kun rdzogs par gnas// lhag ma'i phung po bsgrubs rdzas dang // mchod rdzas sid d+hi dag dang sbyar// bkra shis gdul bya'i thugs rje yis// dag pa'i zhing dang mchod pa
99b4(gi): yis/ byin gyis brlabs pa gsum byas nas// rdzas dang 'phrul zhal ka pA la// brtags pa'i bye brag kun shes nas// dngos grub myur du thob bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i
99b5(gi): dkyil 'khor kun tu bkram// dur khrod rdzas dang mar me dang // mchod pa'i bye brag la sogs pa// rtog pa gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i// cho ga'i bye brag 'di shes bya//
99b6(gi): dpal ldan gsang rtogs rnal 'byor pa// khams gsum zhing khams rdul snyed pa// rang gi dam tshig bzhin du bsgral// dam pa shes na mchog tu gyur// gzhan du
99b7(gi): 'jigs skrag rmongs pa dang // dmyal ba nyid du skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin rtogs dang thabs ldan pas// 'jigs skrag re dog med pa yis// gsang ba'i thabs la gang
100a1(gi): spyod pa// dug gi dug nad zhi ba bzhin// lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang // bsgrubs rtags khyad par bshad pa kun// thabs dang mthu dang ting 'dzan gyis//
100a2(gi): bdag nyid chen por gsal byas te// ma lus dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// blang ba'i thabs la brtson pa yis// thabs dang mthun pa'i cho ga yis// gang la mchod dang bsgrub
100a3(gi): par bya/ byin ci log dang ma rabs dang // nyams dam dam med log pa dang // ma 'dres gsang ba'i dgrar gyur pa// gsang ba'i rtogs pa rdzun gyis tshigs// gang du
100a4(gi): dgongs dang dgongs ldan pa// thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu yis// mi sgrib dngos grub 'phel bya'i phyir// gdul ba'i cho ga bzhin du smra// thabs mkhas nges pa'i mthur ldan
100a5(gi): zhing / byang chub sems la rab brtson pas// dka' thub gdung ba kun spangs la// gang la zhen pa med pa yis// phyi nang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// thabs chen gsang ba'i cho ga/
100a6(gi): yis/ bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir bshad// ji ltar pad+ma'i kha dog ltar// skyon bral yon tan mchog tu mdzes// kye ho skal ldan rang bzhin sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid de//
100a7(gi): thabs mkhas byin rlabs ldan pas rim par mngon rtogs shing // ma lus dam pa'i thabs su shes pas phyi nang chos kun du ma la// bya dang mi bya grol ching med de mya ngan 'das pa
100b1(gi): mchog tu zhi// dman dang dam pa gsang ba cig pa so sor phye bas bdud kyi sa las// byin brlabs thabs kyi spyod pas rig pa 'dzin pas grol 'gyur zhing // myur du 'khor ba spong
100b2(gi): zhing bde chen rang las gsal bar 'char 'gyur ba// rtog ge dman pa logs par bsgribs shing bcings pas mi shes pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig lnga// grub pa bzhi dang
100b3(gi): ldan pa yis// yin pa'i ngo bo sdom pa can// dam tshig bdud rtsi yin par grags// mi sha khyi sha mchog yin te// glang chen rta sha de bas mchog/ bya sha de dag byin brlabs la//
100b4(gi): cho ga bzhin du bza' bar bya// dri chen byang chub sems dang sha/ dri chu khrag dang mnyam sbyar ba// yi ge gsum dang lnga yis sbyang // rgyal ba lnga yi ngo bor gsal// thabs la mkhas
100b5(gi): pa'i cho ga yis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byin brlabs te// srin lag mthe bong mnyam sbyar bas// mchod dam zos te 'thungs na ni// ye shes lnga yi dngos grub thob// lha dang mi dad
100b6(gi): rigs 'dzin dang // rgyal ba sras bcas mkha' 'gro la// mchod pa'i sems kyis gtor na ni// dgyes te ci 'dod dngos grub stsol// rigs ngan gdon dang 'byung po dang //
100b7(gi): ma rungs tshogs la gtor byas na// byin brlabs gzi brjid nus mthu yis// de ma thag tu badrag par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// rnal 'byor kun gyi bsgru kha'i
101a1(gi): rdzas mkha' 'gro rnams kyi dam tshig ste// skal med dam sri dug tu 'gyur// rmad byung gsang ba'i dam tshig lnga// so so 'am yang na gcig tu ni// bcud//
101a2(gi): len yang na rang ji bzhin// thabs dang cho gas byin brlabs dang // lo dang zla ba dus gsum du// ma nyams rnal 'byor longs spyod na// thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob//
101a3(gi): sangs rgyas kun gyis mngag pa'i// dam pa'i las ni gang 'das pa// rigs chad yang na brlag pa dang // bde chen zab mo 'di las ring du gyur// de phyir de las ring du mi 'da' ba'i//
101a4(gi): sngags pas brtag tu spyad par bya// chags pas bde ba'i dam tshig gsum// rgyal ba kun gyi longs spyod de// rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pa la// rgyal ba kun gyis gnad byin
101a5(gi): la/ 'dod pa kun gyi rjes chags pa// chags pa chen po bde ba che// chos nyid bde ba'i longs spyod de// dman pa rnams kyi spyod yul min// gang la thabs chen ldan pa'i skyes
101a6(gi): bu yis// rab 'bring tha ma khyad par gzhan// lha dang thos dang tsham pa dang // myong dang reg dang dran pa yi// ma lus bde chen gsal ba yis// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par
101a7(gi): 'gyur/ ji ltar thabs chen po yis ni// dug gi dug nad sel ba ltar// thabs chen ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// gzhan gyi dug kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur// ma lus gsang ba'i
101b1(gi): thabs sbyor bas// gzugs rnams kun la lta ba dang // sgra rnams rtag tu nyan pa dang // dri la rtag tu longs spyod cing // ro la chags par spyod pa dang // sna tshogs rig
101b2(gi): pa la brtson pa// rang gi longs spyod bde ba'i mchog/ bdag dang gzhan dang phun sum tshogs// bza' dang bca' dang btung ba dang // bgo dang rig dang 'jigs pa dang //
101b3(gi): thabs dang chags pa sna tshogs pa'i// 'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs la// ci 'dod par ni brtson bzhin du// dka' thub gdung ba kun 'das shing // khrus dang sdom
101b4(gi): pa gtsang sbra byed// dga' zhing ngo mtshar rmad ldan pas// rang gis dam tshig smyon par byed// 'jigs dang re dogs med pa yis// theg pa mchog la thabs kyi 'jug
101b5(gi): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// bde ba chen po'i gzigs mo 'di// byang chub rdo rje bcas pa'i yul// gzhan dang kun gyi spyod yul min// dpal ldan he ru ka yi
101b6(gi): dngos/ yang dag sgrub pa thabs kyi mchog/ 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pas// de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi brtul zhugs mchog/ bde ba chen
101b7(gi): po'i ngo bo nyid// gsang chen gsang ba rmad byung ba// thig le thog ma med pa yi// zhen pa kun dang bral ba'i don// dngos po kun dang bral ba'i don// dngos po kun la
102a1(gi): spyad pa yis// bskal par sbyangs pa'i mi snyed pa'i// 'bras bu yid bzhin lhun grub ltar// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar rang snang gsang // 'bras bu phun sum
102a2(gi): tshogs pa 'grub// ri bo nags tshal dben pa'i sar// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sbyor ba yis// tshe 'dis 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir// cho ga rim pas bshad par bya// dad dang rang
102a3(gi): bzhin skal ldan la// rtogs dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// dbang rdzogs 'byor pa kun ldan pa// snying rje thabs mkhas rnal 'byor pas// bkra shis byin ldan nyams dga' zhing //
102a4(gi): bar chad med pa'i sa brtags la// cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin du// rtsod dang mi shes skyon spangs phyir// bslang zhing gtor ma byin par bya// 'byor dang dus tshigs bzang po la//
102a5(gi): bkra shis 'phel 'dod yar ngo la// rang bzhin byin rlabs ldan pa'i phyir// 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i rog bya// dur khrod chen po dang 'phel ba'i// dbang dang bsgrub pa'i mchod pa dang //
102a6(gi): dngos grub la sogs mchod pa rdzas// rmad byung ngo mtshar bcas pa gzhag/ dpal he ru ka 'dod pas// bkra shis 'byor pa'i sa phyogs nas// byin brlabs bkra shis dag pa'i
102a7(gi): rdzas/ de la bar chad bskrad par bya// brtul zhugs rol pas de blangs la// dag pa'i dngos grub rdzas su brlabs// ma dag thugs rje rdzas dag ni// cho ga sngags dang phyag rgya
102b1(gi): dang ting 'dzin sngags kyis de sbyangs lam// ji ltar rig pas byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje mtshon gyi byin brlabs pas// cho ga bzhin du spros pa yis// snod dang rdzas dang
102b2(gi): mar me dang // sha dang nar khro la g.yang gzhi dang // bam ril khog pa stod smad dang // dbang po yan lag ring thung 'phreng // rtsa rgyus thig dang ldan pas te// bdud rtsi dmar
102b3(gi): gyis dkyil 'khor dang // dmar chen zla gam ldan pa yis// re ga thal ba chen pos bris// 'jigs dang mdzes pa med pa'i sa// dur khrod rdzas la rten bcas shing // rmad
102b4(gi): byung rdzas la longs spyod na// rang dga'i longs spyod la brten na// rdzu 'phrul lus kyi cho ga bzhin// myur du 'grub par the tshom med// dur khrod dkyil 'khor chen po la//
102b5(gi): gsang ba'i pho brang rten bcas shing // zla gam rdzas la grub pa yis// dga' dang mos pas 'jug pa dang // dbang dang bsgrub pa gang rtsom pas// dpal ldan rdo rje sems
102b6(gi): dpa'i gnas// tshe 'dis thob par the tsom med// khams gsum rang byung dur khrod du// bde chen rdzas la rten bcas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub nyid// myur
102b7(gi): du dka' ba med pas 'grub// rnga ba zin ngan dang skal med dang // gtsang sme car dang le lo can// dam tshig nyams dang med pa yis// skal pa bye bas mi 'grub pa// khrag
103a1(gi): 'thung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rgyal ba kun gyi snying po mchog/ byin rlabs yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// zhal mthong lha dang gnyis med cing //
103a2(gi): 'bum phrag sa ya bye ba sogs// bsgrub pas mngon du gyur pa na// bdag nyid myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po mchog/ thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i//
103a3(gi): dngos grub kun gyi gzhir gyur pa// rang las byung zhing thabs kyi skad// rnam shes brgyad po dgur gsal zhing // rang 'byung snang ba gcig gi dang // ye shes dgu yi snang ba/
103a4(gi): nyid/ dur khrod rdzas las grub pa yis// pho brang rmad byung gsang ba'i gnas// rang byung gsang ba'i dur khrod na// ye shes dgu yi snang ba bltams// dgu bkag gcig
103a5(gi): phye b+ha gar 'dus// bdag nyid chen po lhun gyis grub// 'khor ba'i maN+Dal yongs bkram pas// bdag nyid chen po'i longs spyod 'dis// skal ldan rmad byung longs spyod
103a6(gi): gter/ 'dod 'byung rin chen gter gyi mchog/ man ngag thabs kyi gding ldan zhing // grub pa nyams kyi drod ldan na// gsang ba rdzas la brten nas ni// dngos grub
103a7(gi): sku gsung thugs su blang // shin tu gsang ba mthar phyin nas// spyod lam zab cing stobs ldan pas// bdag nyid stobs dang ldan pa ru// gsang chen thabs kyi spyod pa
103b1(gi): ste/ grub pa thabs kyi rim pa ni// skal ldan 'ga' las ma gtogs pa// dman dang rang bzhin skal ba la// 'phrig pas gnyis ka lhung bar 'gyur// mtshan ma'i rdzas
103b2(gi): la brten nas ni// dman pas bskal par mi rnyed pa'i// chos sku lhun grub thob 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// bla med gsang ba thabs kyi mchog
103b3(gi): dman dang dka' thub kyis gdungs pa'i// gang zag dag ni rnam par spangs// skal ldan can gyi bsgrub par bya'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba rnams// gdul bya'i
103b4(gi): bsam pa rdzogs mdzad nas// 'bar ba'i tshogs su snang nas ni// dur khrod tshogs la rol mdzad// rang bzhin mdzad pa thabs dag dang // mos dang thabs kyi sku
103b5(gi): gsung thugs// rdzas dang cho ga kun 'dus pa// 'dir ni rnam par snang mdzad par// byin brlabs 'tshams pa'i sa phyogs su// bar chad zhe phyir cho ga bya// bkra
103b6(gi): shis sgrub pa mchog dus su// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten mchog dang // bkra shis dag pa'i rdzas blangs te// sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs par bya// 'khor ba chags
103b7(gi): pa'i maN+Dal la// bdud rtsi lnga yang ldan par bya// dur zod srad bu phyin pa rlabs nas// gas ba mtha' ga yang thig pa tab nas// pho zang rmad byung bri bar bya//
104a1(gi): dmar nag zla gam me ri 'bar// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i mtshon gyis bri// thal chen regs bcad pa yis// rmad byung dur khrod rgyan dang ldan//
104a2(gi): bkra shis rdzas dang mtshan ma dang // dur khrod rgyan chad kram pa dang // phyi nang dag pa'i mtshams bcad de// pho brang lhan cig rten cig dang // gzi chen 'bar ba gcig
104a3(gi): bltams pa// dngos grub mtshan ma gcig bsdus pa'i// cho ga yi ni nan tan bya// las dang bya ba ma tshogs bya// rnam g.yeng 'grub par dka' ba'i// dad pa dam
104a4(gi): tshig kun ldan pa'i// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// thig le gcig pa'i cho ga bsgrubs// myur du 'grub par the tshom med// sngon du bya ba kun byas nas//
104a5(gi): stong nyid ma bcos chos dbyings las// snying rje nam mkha'i klong bdal pas// cho 'phrul rig pa'i yi ger shar// gang nas dur khrod gzhal yas khang // 'bar ba'i rgyan
104a6(gi): dang bcas pa ru// rig pa'i rgyal po he ru ka/ yab yum rten dang bcas par bskyed// byin brlabs dbang skur gsal ldan nas// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sprin gtibs
104a7(gi): pas/ rig pa'i rgyal por gang gyur pa// phyi nang 'byor pa'i yo byad dag/ rang gis rang la thim mchod de// grub mchog brtan par ma gyur par// bstim brtan
104b1(gi): gshegs par bya ba min// bar chad bskrad par mchod bskul nas// gso ba'i cho ga nan tan bya// bdag nyid grub gnas ma thob par// bsgrub cing dam bca' brtan
104b2(gi): par bya/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// byin brlabs thabs chen kun 'dus pas// srog dang bcas pa'i gdung dbyangs kyis// 'phro 'dus dbyings nas
104b3(gi): thugs dam paskul// dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mi gnas dpal chen he ru ka/ yab yum gnas kyi lha dang bcas// thugs dam dbang gis gshegs nas
104b4(gi): kyang // dur khrod rdzas la rten bcas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dus drug mchod dang stong tshig dang // bar chad par brtsam par bya//
104b5(gi): bsnyen pas sgo gsum bag chags sbyang // nye bsnyen lhar gsal snod du rung // bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub dmigs la dbab// bsgrub chen nyid du ba snyim par bya// bsnyen
104b6(gi): bsgrub bye brag bzhi nyid ni// lam dang bsgrubs dang gsang ba dag/ lha yi phyag rgya shes par bya// dbang thob yon tan rdzogs pa dang // rdo rje gsum dang dbyer med pas//
104b7(gi): bdag med ye shes mkha' ltar dag/ mthong ba'i don la brtan dgos pas// rdzun grub ye shes thogs pa med// lam gyi khyad par tid du 'dod// dngos grub dur khrod la sogs/
105a1(gi): pa/ mtshan ma brtan po phyi rol te// rang nyams gom brtan rig pa 'byung // thig le 'bar zhing bde ba dag/ snyigs ma dang bral bde chen po// gsang
105a2(gi): pab chen po mkha' ltar dag/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// rdzas gsum rten la dmigs bcas shing // sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bsgyur nas// re dogs med par
105a3(gi): dngos grub 'byung // dbang po khyad par ci 'tshams par// dngos grub bye brag thams cad kyang // bsdus rgyas gsum gyi thabs kyis ni// dur khrod mchog gi phun sum tshogs//
105a4(gi): bde ba chen po'i rol pa ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le las// thugs rje 'dul ba'i gar stabs kyis// sna tshogs sgyu mar bstan pa mtshar// yod med dbus su mi dmigs
105a5(gi): shing / bdag med ye shes las byung ba// thabs chen ma lus goms pa yin// rang byung sgyu ma'i phyag rgya nyid// dpal ldan dngos grub kun bsdus pa// rtogs pa'i
105a6(gi): cho ga bshad pa 'di// 'gro ba skal ldan don du ni// 'das pa'i rgyal ba kun gyis bshad// gsang ba las kyi khyad par 'di// gnas dang dkyil 'khor rdzas sogs
105a7(gi): dang / sngags dang phyag rgya rim pa yis// zhi rgyas dbang drag rim pa yis// las ni rim pa kun kyang 'grub// bya ba'i rim pa mtha' dag la// 'phrin las bzhi ru 'dus
105b1(gi): pa nyid/ dur khrod rdzas la rten bcas nas// rnal 'byor pa yis brtsam par bya// sdug bsngal don du zhi bar bya// tshe thung phongs pa rgyas pa ste// dregs dang nga rgyal
105b2(gi): dbang du gsungs// ma rungs gdul la drag po ste// sngags gsum rig pa la sbyar nas// las bzhi bye brag brtsam par bya// bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa yis//
105b3(gi): cho ga'i sbyor ba thams cad la// rten 'brel sngags kyi phyag rgya yis// ma nor sbyor bar las brtsams par// ji ltar bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa ste// rang bzhin thabs
105b4(gi): kyi byin rlabs nyid// gang ltar bsam pa bzhin du 'grub// bdag nyid chen po la gnas pas// gzhan nas spyod yul ma grub pa// ting 'dzin bde ba ma yin pas//
105b5(gi): dngos sogs mtshan ma spong ba yin// thams cad bdag nyid chen po ste// byin rlabs nus mthu rang snang ba// rang gis rnal 'byor goms pa'i stobs// thun mong mun sa
105b6(gi): ma yin pa'i// bdag dang gzhan don lhun gyis grub// tha mal rtog pa zhi ba dang // nyams dang bde ba rgyas pa dang // dran rtogs snang ba thim pa dang // zhe sdang bag chags
105b7(gi): mi snang ba// rtogs dang goms pas stobs ldan dang // bdag la snang ba'i sbyor ba yi// bdag nyid rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor rdzas dang thab khung med// cho ga
106a1(gi): sngags dang phyag rgya med// ma lus rang bzhin mnyam sbyor bas// gdul bya mos pa ji bzhin du// 'phrin las ma byas rang bzhin rdzogs// sbyin
106a2(gi): sreg med cing bya ba med// bdag med gzhan med mnyam pa nyid// rang bzhin rtogs goms sbyor ldan pas// 'bad rtsol med par 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor sangs
106a3(gi): rgyas rang bzhin te// snying po sku gsung thugs su bshad// rang bzhin mdzad pa'i ngo bo dang // dgongs pa bde ba sku gsung thugs// snying po ro gcig kun 'dus pas//
106a4(gi): bde ba chen po ngo bo nyid// thams cad 'dir 'dus gnyis su med// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// sgyu ni bde chen sgyu ma ste// gsung ni brag cha lta bu ste/
106a5(gi): thugs ni rang byung gnyis su med// snying po dbyer med don rdzogs la// sku dang phyag rgya bzlas pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du mchod pa dang // sbyin sreg la sogs mang
106a6(gi): bshad pa// dang po las can sbyang ba dang // mtshan pa'i don la gzhug phyir bstan// ma bcos don la dbyer med pas// yan lag med cing cha shos med// 'phel
106a7(gi): grib med cing sbyang du med// gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong bsam sbyor 'das// nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon dang // chu yi rlabs dang brag cha ltar// rnal 'byor rgyun du nan
106b1(gi): tan bya mtshan ma yal ga 'bras bu min// snying po'i don nyid 'bras bu ste// gdod nas ma ba tsal rdzogs pa la// rtogs nas thams cad 'byung rdzogs phyir// rgyu rkyen bya
106b2(gi): byed kun las 'das// lha rnams gcig phyir phyag rgya gcig/ snying po'i don nyid 'bras bu ste// snying po gcig phyir bzlas brjod gcig/ dkyil 'khor gcig phyir rdzas kyang
106b3(gi): gcig/ rnam shes rang bzhin gcig tu ste// snang ba gcig tu 'dir bsdus bya// de bas so so'i phye ba dag/ mos sogs dman pa'i don du ste// dam pa'i don du kun
106b4(gi): gcig pa'o// gdul bya'i bsam pa dang sbyar nas// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo bzhin du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dag/ brdzus rgyas rim par phye ba yis// cho ga dgongs
106b5(gi): pa la sogs pa// lam sogs gsol ba'i rim pa ni// gang phyir nus pa med pas na// de'i las la nus pa med de// goms shing nus pas gtan 'phel ba// de bas gso
106b6(gi): ba mchog tu bshad// dkyil 'khor rdzas dang ting 'dzin dang // gtor ma 'bru dang bcud nyid dang // dngos grub rdzas dang cho ga dang // nyin mtshan 'jug pa'i skabs ngag tu//
106b7(gi): gso ba'i cho ga brtsam par bya// las kyi chos thams cad la// mchog tu dgos par bshad pa ste// gzhan du rdzas rogs sna tshogs la// byi dang rlabs ma mtshan 'byung mi 'gyur//
107a1(gi): gsang chen thabs kyi cho ga 'di// rang la gnas shing 'grub pa'i// dur khrod chen po la brten pa'i// bsgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad yin// ji snyed thabs
107a2(gi): dang theg pa dang // 'dul ba'i phyag rgya cir snang yang // thabs kyis 'dul ba'i don du zad// phyi nang snod bcud spyod yul 'di// rnal 'byor thabs ldan skyes bu yis// me long dngas
107a3(gi): pa'i gzugs brnyan ltar// gzhan med rig pa rang snang ba'o// sgo gsum spyod yul mtha' yas pa// bdag nyid chen por gsal ba yis// zhe na chags gdung ba kun spangs la//
107a4(gi): mchog gi sbyor ba spyod bya zhing // yang 'jigs pa med par bya// mchod pa dus drug ji lta bzhin// dkyil 'khor nyin mtshan dus 'tshams su// dur khrod thal ba tshon gyis te// dngos
107a5(gi): grub rdzas kyang de bzhin no// ting 'dzin 'jug pa'i thun mtshams su// gter ma bza' btung byin brlabs dag/ nang nub dus su de bzhin te// nyi zla rdo rje bla 'og gu ra// ji lta
107a6(gi): bzhin du rtag tu bsrungs// zas dang gos dang bcud ldan pas// skyo med 'jug pa'i yid ldan pas// sgo gsum skye mched byin parlabs pas// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes
107a7(gi): rab bo/ dbang dang dur khrod rdzas dag la// lha'am byin brlabs thabs kyi bya// gshegs dang bskul dang bar chad 'dul// mchod bstod gsol ba gdab pa ni// mchog
107b1(gi): gi bsgrub pa'i dus su ste// dus drug dag tu shes par bya// gang du thabs dang mi ldan pas// ji ltar bsgrubs kyang mi 'grub cing // byin brlabs med cing g.yel ba dang //
107b2(gi): bar chad nyams len 'byung bar 'gyur// 'khor ba dag par bya ba dang // mchog gsum bdag nyid las byung zhing // rdo rje gsum tshe 'dis 'grub cing // rdo rje dbang gi cho ga bya//
107b3(gi): dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mtshan ma'i rdzas dang rten bcas shing // gsal ba'i mar me dgu bltam pas// bar chad gdug pa kun btul nas// lha dang slob dpon
107b4(gi): ma lus pa// dad dang gdung bas gsol btab ste// dur khrod gsang ba'i me tog dor// thun mong gsang ba'i me tog 'thor// thun mong gsang ba'i mig phye// phyi nang gsang ba'i
107b5(gi): dkyil 'khor bstan// rang dang mthun pa'i dam tshig phog/ dbang mchog thob phyir rgyud dag phyir// chags pa med pas mchog rnams dbul// sa bon rang la gnas pa la//
107b6(gi): byin rlabs ldan pa'i rdzas gsum gyis// snod ldan bu la dbang bskur na// tshe 'dis rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur// dag pa'i chu dang khams gsum gyi// bdag po rin chen dbu
107b7(gi): chan dang // thabs dang shes rab longs spyod cing // mi 'gyur shes rab pha rol phyin// slob ma 'grub pa nyid yin te// phyis ni brtul zhugs bdag po'i ming // lung bstan
108a1(gi): gzengs bstod de bzhin phyir// rang la rdzogs pa'i dbang nyid la// sgom dang lha dang byin brlabs te// sngags dang phyag rgya stobs ldan pas// cho ga bzhin
108a2(gi): du dbang bskur bya// rang gis dkyil 'khor legs bstan la// lha yi mtshan mthong 'phreng dang // cod pan ko rlon g.yang gzhi dang // stag lpags sbrul gyis brgyan pa
108a3(gi): rnams/ khra gzhal thal ba'i mtshan ma dag/ rnga dang thod pa phur bu dang // nyungs kar gu gul bdud rtsi lnga// sha lnga bam ril stong smad dang // dbang po yan lag ring thung
108a4(gi): 'phreng thong gshos stir dbyug pa dang // rdo rje gshog pa me ri 'phreng // rang bzhin gnas la de bzhin thim// de'i dngos po gsal bstan nas// bstan pa'i cho ga ji bzhin
108a5(gi): durang lus phyag rgyar gsal gyur cing // dur khrod brdal ba'i dbang thob nas// rdo rje 'chang chen bdag 'gyur phyir// bde chen cho ga gsum du bstan// nyi zla bdud rtsi sbyin
108a6(gi): bya zhing // dur khrod bde ba gsal gyur nas// sgra dang lha mor byin rlabs cing // bud med gsum la bdag sbyor bas// rdo rje nyi bla sbyor ba yis// 'khor ba bde ba chen po
108a7(gi): 'bar/ rdo rje thig le 'du 'bral med// bde chen thig le rgyun chad med// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// ye shes rgyun nas mtshon ma'i rten// dbang po'i khyad par rdza
108b1(gi): bzhin du// thabs kyi cho ga la brten nas// bag chags sgrib pa kun bsal zhing // nam mkha' lta bu nye bar gnas// tho ba dang rnal 'byor brtan goms pas// thabs kyi
108b2(gi): rim pas legs mthar phyin// lo zla bskal pa dpag med par// bdag gzhan 'dod pa'i don 'grub 'gyur// gang du brtag cing mthar phyin nas// dur khrod zhal bu mtshan
108b3(gi): ldan par// dngos grub bkra shis rdzas gyur pa// tshe dang zla rgyas zla phrom dang // dpa' bo bdud rtsi lnga ldan zhing // gsang ba ming dang gsol byang bcas// rgyas btab
108b4(gi): byin brlabs brtag par bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// gsang ba don gyi ltas 'khrug pa// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// thabs kyis
108b5(gi): bsal ba'i cho ga bya// gang du gas la goms bstan pa yis// ji ltar bsgrubs pas nger 'gyur te// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub ster// bdag la 'char bar the tsom
108b6(gi): mod/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i// dngos grub bye brag mtha' yas par// rten 'brel thabs kyi cho ga yis// da ltar myur du thob par 'gyur// dur khrod
108b7(gi): la brtan bsgrubs pa yang // bsgrub chen bye brag gnyis 'dus te// dbang dang dngos grub gsang ba ste// gzhan dag phra mo'i las su bshad// dam tshig dbang dang
109a1(gi): ldan par bcas// rdzas dang cho ga tshang ba yin// bag chags dag cing snod rung ba// 'di ni bsnyen pa'i cho gar bshad// mchod dang bshags dang
109a2(gi): bzlas bskul bas// rtse gcig dgongs dang lha nye ga/ 'di ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa ste// bar chad med par rab dang byas// nyin mtshan med par rab bsgrubs par// byin brlabs
109a3(gi): rtags dang cho 'phrul 'byung // 'di ni bsgrub pa zhes bshad do// chu dang me long dngas pa la// gzugs brnyan sna tshogs snang ba ltar// rnal 'byor rang rgyud dag pa la// dngos
109a4(gi): grub sna tshogs rang la 'char// rtags dang mtshan ma gang byung ba// bar chod thabs kyis bsal byas te// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la blangs/
109a5(gi): 'di ni bsgrub pa chen por bshad// lha dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis// cha yis rnam par bgos nas kyang // rdo rje slob dpon la nod cing // rnal 'byor gral gyi rim pas spyad//
109a6(gi): gsang ba'i thabs dang ldan pa yis// byin brlabs thabs dang ldan pas blangs// drod tshad yal zhing ma blangs na// bar chang 'bras bu yal bar 'gyur// bkra shis byin rlabs
109a7(gi): 'byung ba'i// skye ba bdun nam lnga gsum gyis// rtags ldan na so dar la bab// rma med gtsang ma brtags nas ni// bar chad bsal zhing bsrung ba dang // sbyang dang byin brlabs
109b1(gi): bkrus pa dang // cho ga bzhin du bsgos bcab la// dbang dang dngos grub lha'i rdzas// mchod pa la sogs pa yi don// mtha' yas 'di las 'byung ba ste// dper na yid bzhin nor
109b2(gi): bu de/ tshe dang pra dang yo byad dang // rkang mgyogs grub pa'i rdzas la sogs// dur khrod rdzas la brten pas 'grub// snying dang mtshan ma nang khrol dang // yan lag snga ni dur khrod de//
109b3(gi): ma mo brgyad kyi rdzas su dgod// 'phra men gsang ba'i gnas yin te// ni'u seg sgo ma'i don du bshad// skal tshigs dbang phyug rnams kyi rdzas// ban+d+ha dbang po lnga ldan pa// yab yum
109b4(gi): bdag gi mtshan mar bshad// dur khrod rdzas la rten bcas shing // gsal ba'i rdzas la mdangs ldan par// gsang ba'i dam tshig mchog gi bsgrubs// rigs 'dzin mkha'
109b5(gi): 'gro'i byin rlabs so// rdzas rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ni// dur khrod mchog las byung ba ste// rmad byang gsang ba'i rdzas mchog ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu bshad// yon tan
109b6(gi): kun ldan rnal 'byor pas// gsang ba'i dur khrod rdzas la brten// sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin brlabs pas// dngos grub ya mtshan bsam me khyab// dang po bag chags dag pa'i
109b7(gi): rtags/ de nas sgra dang nye ba'i rtags// de nas dngos gub 'byung ba'i nga Na ma dub ba rtan pa 'angs// skyang dang bstam pa bsrung ba dang // p+la ba'i thabs la a par bya// rdzas dang me long rnal 'byor pa/
110a1(gi): mig rnon la sogs partags pa ste// sgra dang lha mor snang ba dang // 'od dang du ba sgra dang dri// lhag ma'i ro dang nyams dang ni// 'phel dang nyams kyi bye brag rnams
110a2(gi): thig le 'byung zhing bde ba rgyas// gsang ba'i thabs la brtson byas te// nyams len 'byung po gsal nas ni// dngos grub blangs la brtan par bya// bsgrubs pas 'grub pa'i
110a3(gi): bye brag ni// rnal 'byor shes pa'i bye brag drug/ me long gsal ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar// dngos grub 'byung ba'i mtshan ma 'char// dngos grub bye brag ji snyed pa// lha dang
110a4(gi): rdzas dang gsang ba dang // mkha' las 'byung ba 'di dag ni// thabs la mkhas pa gsum gyis blang // legs par dngos grub thob nas kyang // bstan pa'i cho ga gsum ldan bya//
110a5(gi): rnal 'byor skal ldan su yang rung // dur khrod rdzas la brten bcas shing // brtul zhugs rdzas la longs spyod pas// thabs mkhas sngags dang phyag rgya yis// bar chad med par
110a6(gi): gang ba sgrubs pa// ji ltar pa sgrubs pas mya ra du 'grub// gsang du rnal 'byor bsgrubs pa'i tshe// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro rigs 'dzan dang // bsgrub pa pho mo la sogs pa//
110a7(gi): sus mo rig pa'i brda yis bstan// lus ngag brda yi mtshon byas te// 'jig rten ming brda las 'das pa// spyi bor byug pa phyag gi brda// dpral ba lan du shes par bya//
110b1(gi): mig bsgrims ting 'dzin sgrim pa'i brda// g.yas pa lag pa zan gyi ste// g.yon pa sha yi brda ru bshad// g.yon pas g.yas kyi srin lag 'thor// chang gi brda ru shes par bya/
110b2(gi): nyug ma'i dri ste phyag bzhag pa'o// phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis shig pa'o// g.yas su 'dud cing lta ba ni// khams bde ma zhes dri ba ste// g.yon pa lan du shes par bya// ga ra la
110b3(gi): bsnyen pa gyen du bkrol// mchod pa 'bul ba'i brda ru bshad// lce la reg pa'i lan tshwa'i brda// pad+ma rdo rje la reg pa// sbyor ba 'dod pa'i brda yin no// bskyed pa dus la ma bab
110b4(gi): brda/ mchu brdam song shing ga pa'i brda// la gdangs mig bzlogs lce sbyang ba// 'jigs par sten zhes bya ba yin// 'phreng ba ston par byed pa dag/ bzlas pa bgyis par bskul
110b5(gi): ba'o// rdza rnga dril bu drag bskul ba// bskul bar bgyis par ston pa'o// ngag brda rnam par bshad pa ni// a hi bu ho phyag gi brda// pra ni bu ho lan gyi brda// da ra gzungs ma nyid
110b6(gi): kyi brda/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor pa yi brda// rA ga chags pa'i brda yin no// ho ni mchod pa stobs pa'i brda// a ha ra ni sku la gcig pa'i brda// tra ta khro ba cig pa yi brda//
110b7(gi): cha ni yan tshwa zhes pa ste// hiSh+Ta ha na slob ma chug/ puts+tsha ton mchod pa lho bas// ma nA rA ga chags chen po// ni tshe zhes ni bya ba ste// khur blang rgyas ste// tshang ni dang 'bo
111a1(gi): 'jam dpal gri// ra sa ya na bdud rtsi ste// ma hA maM sa sha chen yin// bran mo tshod ma'i brda yin te// skyur po g.yon can ma zhes bya// ma harag+ha/
111a2(gi): chags chen po// ha la ha la 'jigs par gyis// tiN+Da bstan par gyis shig go/ e hi tshur spyon zhes bya ste// a hi bar bzhud ces pa'o// sa ma ya ni dam tshig brda// sa ma
111a3(gi): ya na ho la sogs pa bzhi// chags pa spyod pa'i brda bzhi yin// phaT phaT spro bar bstan pa ste// hu hU zhes pa bsdu ba'i brda// ma hA 'gu h+ya gsang ba'i brda// ma hA ma ra gsod
111a4(gi): pa'i brda// ma hA s+pho Ta ya ma zhes bya// spor gcig pa ru shes par bya// kha hi gsol cig pa yi brda// pad+hi rings longs par bstan pa ste// dzA hu nyol cig pa yi brda//
111a5(gi): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rnal 'byor dbang phyug po dang mo// brda sprod lan dang bcas pa ste// dngos grub bzhi ru shes par bya// dngos grub bzhir gyur rnal 'byor tshogs//
111a6(gi): bya ba'i las rnams mthar phyin nas// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang // 'jigs dang dga' brod kun spangs te// klu dang gar dang rol mo dang // g.yab mo gdung ba'i dbyangs dang bcas//
111a7(gi): bshags dang mchod cing bskul ba ste// dngos grub 'dod par gsol gdab cing // dam tshig ting 'dzin drag bskul bas// tha ma'i dus su shes bya ste// rdzas ni sku yi dngos grub ste/
111b1(gi): ru khu 'od bcas gsung gi don// dpal be'u sems dpa' thugs kyi don chog/ kha zas longs spyod bdud rtsi che// dang po lha dang dpal gyi dbang // gnyis pa rdo rje slob dpon gyis//
111b2(gi): gsum pa mched ldum yongs kyis te// dus gsum mchod pa rol par bya// lha dang bla ma yum gyi mkha'// blang ba'i yul du shes par bya// rdzas dang bde ba 'phel ba dang // shes
111b3(gi): rab 'phel ba'i byin brlabs che// dbang dang gzi byin ldan pa dang // ting 'dzin dgongs pa drod dang ldan// 'gro ba 'dul zhing bsngags pa thob// rdzas dang chos la 'brel pa med//
111b4(gi): lam mtha' sngon du ma gyur kyang // thun mong dngos grub thob rtags yin// gzhan don rtags la mngon dga' yang // rang don nyams su lhun gyis grub// mya ngan 'das la brod pa
111b5(gi): med/ 'khor ba 'jigs pa'i chos dang bral// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje 'dzin pa rdul snyed dang bcas pa dgyes te mngon par bstod do// de dag kyang rang byung gi thog le thog ma dang /
111b6(gi): tha ma med par thim nas cang mi snang bar gyur to// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba phyi ma rnam par bkod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// /
111b7(gi): / dpal he ru ka'i gal po dur khrod mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhas la shi di ling ha dang / bod kyi ban d+he bai
112a1(gi): nas bsgyur ba'o// he ru ka 'dus rgyud kyi rgyud phyim rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka tan tu nA ma/ bod
112a2(gi): skad du/ dpal khrag 'thung gal po che zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis lung du bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ rang snang bkod
112a3(gi): pa med bkod pa// 'og min nyams dga' gnas kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po// rgyal ba kun gyi spyi gzugs can// sa bcu gnas kyi dbang phyug che// byang chub
112a4(gi): sems dpa' sems chen 'khor// rigs bdag brjod du med pa yis// rmad byung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// gsang sngags che ba'i byin brlabs ni// so sor snang ba 'di ltar bzhi/
112a5(gi): gdul bya zhe na chags can rnams la// 'dul byed ston pa gsang ba'i skus// 'dod pa rang rkyen tshig tu gsungs// gdul bya log sred can rnams la// 'dul byed ston pa sprul pa'i
112a6(gi): skus/ bkring drang rgyud pa'i tshig tu gsungs// gdul bya rigs rgyud can rnams la// 'dul byed ston pa longs spyod rdzogs// ldem dgongs sbyor ba'i tshig tu gsungs//
112a7(gi): gdul bya blo gros can rnams la// 'dul byed ston pa chos kyi skus// don dam nges pa'i tshig tu gsungs// gdul bya 'dul byed 'dul thabs rnams// spyir na theg pa ma lus
112b1(gi): ston/ 'dir ni kun kyang gsang sngags nyid// snang srid chos kyi phung por grol// a ho/ lung chen zab mo'i 'khor lo 'di// dgongs rgyud sbas pa'i rgyud chen po// lung gi
112b2(gi): mdo mchog snga ma bdun// de bzhin phyi ma bdun nas phyung // sku rnams ston pa'i sdud pa po// gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje nyid// bdag gzhan phyi rabs grol mdzad pas// rdo rje
112b3(gi): snying po nyid kyi phyung // phung po rdo rje rigs lnga nyid// nyon mongs ye shes chen por gsal// bar chad dngos grub nyid du grol// rdo rje'i sku la 'chi bdag med// tshe 'dir thun
112b4(gi): modo phyi ma ni// phyag rgya chen po mchog tu grub// dman pa lus kyi byang chub sems// blo gros chen po rnam pa lnga// sems can kun la phan don du// he ru ka yi gal po
112b5(gi): gsungs// ma la ya yi brag phug tu// ye shes snying po can rnams kyis// theg mchog rmad byung nyams su len// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhir mthar phyin bsgrubs// yang dag
112b6(gi): gsang ba'i thugs mchog la// bsgrubs pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams// mi tshe gcig la mngon sangs rgyas// lus ma bai ra bar lha skur 'gyur// rab 'byam mdo rgyud ma
112b7(gi): rus kun// mtshan gyis rnam grangs du ma dag/ dpe don yu ba dang gang zag ldang // 'di dag lngar ni 'dus par 'gyur// dpe las mtshan du gsol ba ni// dbang po gsum
113a1(gi): la go bar sla// don las mtshan du gsol ba yang // che ba rnam grangs ngo bo dang // gtso bo la sogs dum dag/ rig pa can la snang ba'o// yul la
113a2(gi): mtshan du gsol ba yis// gnas kyi nges pa rnyed par 'gyur// gang zag mtshan du gsol ba ni// zhu ba po dang mdzad par 'byed// ldang tshad mtshan du btags pa yis//
113a3(gi): shu log rnam par gsal ba'o// yang dag thugs kyi bsgrub pa lha// rdo rje rigs dang thugs kyi lha// thugs yang sku gsung thugs gsang 'gyur// mkha' 'gro bde mchog
113a4(gi): ces bya ba// sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor sku yi rgyud// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo can// 'khor lo bde mchog gsung gi rgyud// thugs ni sgyu ma bde mchog 'di// he ru ka
113a5(gi): yi gal po nyid// lung 'dir rnam grangs bsam yas kun// gzung bar bde phyir bsdus bshad do// dmigs pa'i yul dang sgrub pa'i thabs// 'bras bu yin te rnam pa gsum//
113a6(gi): ji snyed chos kyi rtsa bar bshad// a ho/ bcud 'byin man ngag snying po 'di// rgyal ba rigs 'dzin gang zag gsum// dgongs rigs rna bar brgyud pa 'di// gang la thug pa'i bar
113a7(gi): du ston/ mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa yis// sems nyid sangs rgyas rgyu ru shes// 'bras bu sngags kyi theg pa yis// sems nyid sangs rgyas nyid du bsgom// rgyu dang 'bras bu gang yin
113b1(gi): pas/ phyogs kyang rab tu shes par byed// las dang nyon mongs zad pa yis// phung po gang nas 'khor bar zags// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po nas// sangs rgyas sar sgrol dgos
113b2(gi): pa yod/ chos rnams rtsa ba sems nyid yin// sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod las 'das// de mthun chos mtshan so sor gsungs//
113b3(gi): ji ltar gdung sems ldan pa'i mas// bu nyid mi bsku'i tshig smras ltar// rgyal bas 'gro ba mi bslu'i phyir// blo dman rnams la man ngag bshad// blo mchog ldan pa'i rigs
113b4(gi): rnams la// gdam ni sems kyi yul du bstan// ngag ni rna ba'i dbang por blugs// de phyir gdams ngag ces su gsungs// gdams ngag dag gis don rnams ni// mtha' drug
113b5(gi): sgo bzhi lung dgu dag/ bco brgyad skabs dang dkyil 'khor dgu// yo byad gnyis dang rgya mtsho ba zhis// lung chen dgongs pa rtogs par 'gyur// lta bas thag pa Ta dag deng du bya//
113b6(gi): dam tshig dam pas bzhi bzungs nas// rim pa dbang gis bsgrod pa dang // spyod pas la yang dor bar bya// nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyis blang // man ngag dag gis don rnams bsgrubs//
113b7(gi): 'dren par byed pa tshig gi sgo// dam tshig dbang gi k+ko dang ni// bskul chags dbyangs su brang ba'i sgo// gdul bya 'phrin las sgo dang bzhi// lta ba'i yung dang bad+hUHrdzas dang // dang
114a1(gi): tshig dbang dang ma T+Ta mnan// mchod rdzas byin brlabs snyan pa'i lung // sgrol ba'i lung dang 'phrin las lung // bar chod bgegs chen mnan par bya// rang
114a2(gi): bzhin snod dang dam tshigs dang // gnod min rdzas dang sa gzhi dang // bsod nams rdzas dgod ma TI mnan// byin rlabs bzhugs dbang pog de bsrung // bsgoms bsgrubs
114a3(gi): rtags mtshan zhi khro bskyed// dngos grub blang zhing bar chad bzlog/ 'bras bu bdag gzhan don du bsngo// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan 'tshams// mchod pa dbang bskur
114a4(gi): ting nge 'dzin// lhun grub thugs rjes dngos grub blang // shes rab dang ni ting nge 'dzin// rnal 'byor kun gyi yo byad yin// lta ba rgya mtsho thag bcad de// spyod pa rgya mtshos la
114a5(gi): dor nas// bsgrub pa rgya mtshos nyams su blang // 'bras bu rgya mtshor mngon sangs rgyas// kun la gces par rab gsungs gdams// lung chen dgongs pa rnam pa bzhis//
114a6(gi): bsgrub par bya ba'i rim pa ni// yi dam bsgrub chen bdun gnyis dang // snang ba gsum lung bsdus lung gsum// 'bar ba chen po 'tshams kyi lung // mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab
114a7(gi): pa dang / lus ngag sgrib pa bshags byas nas// bdag nyid yi dam zhi khro bsgom// za ba tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i 'phro 'du bya// lhag ma
114b1(gi): bskyang zhing dkyil 'khor bsdu// sbubs chen dbang bskur sid+d+hi len// yi dam nub gcig cho ga rdzogs// bsgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// ma dag pa la mtshams bcad nas//
114b2(gi): thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya// bdag nyid chen po rtsa ba'i lung // bzlas brjod bsnyen pa dbul ba dang // gdug byed pho rnams thugs rjes bsgral// chags bcas
114b3(gi): mo rnams chos nyid sbyar// 'di ltar gang gis shes 'gyur ba// de ni yung chen dgongs pa rtogs// brtsal can blo yi gting du byos// rgyu ni khams gsum sems can la//
114b4(gi): nyon mongs pa yi snang ba dang // lam du rnal 'byor pa rnams la// nyams kyi snang ba 'char ba dang // 'bras bu bde gshegs sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo snang /
114b5(gi): snang ba gsum gyis bdag nyid du// chos rnams ma lus 'dus pa yin// dpal chen khrag 'thung chen po'i lung // rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu 'dus// a ho ta he ru ka
114b6(gi): yi gal po 'dir// rgyud lung man ngag dbyer med phyir// kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bcas pas// mdo don chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs// rgyud ces bya ba rgyal ba'i bkag/ zhus na
114b7(gi): phra mos 'phel cing rgyas// rgyal nga'i dgos pa mang la 'brel// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bor gsal// 'brel dang ma tshang med pa dang // phun sum tshogs pas rgyud sa bya//
115a1(gi): rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bshad pa'i rgyud// khyim gyi mar gyur pa dang // mtshangs kha skong dka' ba gcod// skal pa rtag pa dum bu rnams// chu bo'i rgyun nam
115a2(gi): sman sbyor ram// thags dang 'dra bar gnas pas na// dmangs ltar bya ba ma lus byed// lung zhes bya ba nges pa'i don// gsung gis 'gyur bas gzung ster mtshon// bder
115a3(gi): gshegs gsung gi dgongs pa yang // ngo bo ji lta ji snyed gnyis// rdzun bral gzung bar bde ba dang // nges par zad pa lung gi tshogs// drang bar ston pa mtshan nyid lung //
115a4(gi): nges don ston pa sngags kyi lung // 'dres par ston par mdo sde nyid// mngon du phyung ba bskyed rdzogs lung // rna bar rgyud pa man ngag lung // phyung ba'i lung nyid 'chus
115a5(gi): pa srangadaper na lung can sdod lta bu// bzung bar bde bar bya ba ni// blon po lta bu ro gnas pa yang // gnyis kyis bzung bar bla phyir ro// man ngag ces pa la
115a6(gi): bzla ba// skyes bu'i thugs la ba rnag pa'o// snying po bcud kyi mchog nyid ni// thugs la rab tu sbas nas bzhugs// tshogs chung myur du 'grub par byed/ bya ba sgra
115a7(gi): bas nges pa'i tshigs// gtso bo ye shes man ngag dang // 'jig rten 'khor ba'i man ngag yin// gser 'gyur rtsi dang dug 'gyur sman// mun sel snang 'gyur ras dang chen
115b1(gi): rgyal po lta bur kun la che// rang sa zin par gnas pa nyid// rgyud lung ngan ngag dbyer med pa// gnas lugs rang bzhin zhi khror gnas// rang rgyud phung po zhe khror shar//
115b2(gi): gdul bya sprul pa'i zhi khro dang // mthar phyin 'bras bu'i zhi khro rnams// chos rnams yongs la khyab par gnas// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// 'di lngas rab tu
115b3(gi): bsdus pa las// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad nyid// 'jam dpal khros pas gshin rje gshed// gsung ni snang ba mtha' yas nyid// rigs gnyis lung gi rgyud pa dang //
115b4(gi): spyan ras gzigs dbang rnga ma chen sku// gsung ste pad+ma dbang gi rigs// mi bskyod rdo rje'i thugs mchog yang // rdo rje khrag 'thung thugs nyid do// yon tan kun bzang nyid
115b5(gi): las grub// yang na rin 'byung che mchog nyid // 'phrin las don yod grub pa las// karma he ru ka nyid du// rdo rje gzhon nu rab snang ba// de nyid 'phrin las sgrol la
115b6(gi): brtson/ kun la lnga lnga tshangs 'gyur yang // khrag 'thung gal po bshad kyis nyon// dman pa lus kyi sems dpa' yis// gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa la// rab tu dga'
115b7(gi): bas 'di skad gsol// rdo rje'i snying po chen po khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdud pa'o// byang chub ge bam dpa' rnams kyi ya// cho ba kun pa ston pa mdzad/ khyod ni
116a1(gi): nam mkha'i rang bzhin can// gar mkhan lta bur sangs rgyas pas// gar gyi dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal// tshangs pa'i gsung gis kun la khyab// 'brug
116a2(gi): sgra'i dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal// nam mkha'i stongs ltar kun la khyab// mi rtog thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal// yid ni rin chen mchod sdong 'bar// dgos 'dod bskong ba khyod phyag
116a3(gi): 'tshal/ bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs// glog ltar myur mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// 'khor ba rgya mtsho bsam yas kun// sangs rgyas zhing du gnas bya'i phyir// khams gsum
116a4(gi): sems can kun don du// bdag cag dam pa'i rigs can no// lha mchog blo gros mtha' yas dang // gnod sbyin blo gros dang sel dang // klu chen blo gros rgya mtsho dang // srin po blo gros
116a5(gi): thabs ldan dang // mi'i blo gros rabazhi rnams// thub pa'i dbang po lung bstan ltar// da ltar dus 'dir rgyud rnams gsungs// lung dang man ngag ma lus pa// khyed kyis rab tu
116a6(gi): gsal bar bya// mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs mchog nyid// bsgrubs pa mtha' yas rdul rnyed las// thugs kyi man ngag zab 'gyur ba// he ru
116a7(gi): ka yi gal po 'di// bdag cag rnams la bshad par 'chal// lus ngag yid gsum gus pas nyon// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po 'dis dam pa'i chos byung khungs kyi
116b1(gi): rtag pa ste dang po'o// / de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan dam pa nges 'khor 'das ye nas dbyer med pa'i don chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen po'i nying
116b2(gi): 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas 'di skad gsungs so// yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde// rnal 'byor
116b3(gi): zab mo'i sku gsum rdzogs// byi ltar rgyud kyis bdag nyid che// bdag med rig pa chos kyi sku// ye shes lnga yi ngo bor gnas// stong zhing gsal la ma 'dres mnyam//
116b4(gi): don rnams 'grub pa chos rnams brtan// dug lnga ye shes chen por grol// rang byung ye shes gcig tu gnas// chos sku blo gros don dmangs// sarba d+harma a a// bde
116b5(gi): gshegs skun tshungs dang klu// rdo rje bi sna gnod sbyin mo// rin chen gtog 'dod 'dus pa'i sku// pad+ma gu lang mkha' 'gro ma// las ni sna tshogs rta mchog nyid// 'dul
116b6(gi): gzhi theg pa bzhi po rnams// bzang ngan gsang sgor drang ba'i phyir// thams cad gsang don rab dgongs nas// thams cad blang dor med par brten// dus kyis sgyid yug
116b7(gi): gdul bya rnams// spro bskyedang 'bras bu drang ba'i phyir// rgyud las 'grub pa'i don dgongs te// bsang bar mos patsadrub// shes bya'i rlom sems byed pa dag
117a1(gi): zhen gsal thig chen sgor drang phyir// bden pa ma mthong 'bras ma thob// dgongs nas bskal par dbyangs rtsal grub// phyogs 'gas chog 'byin gang zag
117a2(gi): rnams/ theg spyod rgya cher bskul ba'i phyir// bsgrub pa'i yan lag bsgrub dgongs te// rgya cher spyod ston mos 'tshams ston// skrag cing sdang dang che tshad rtsod// mngon zhen
117a3(gi): ci la'ang mi 'jug rnams// nges pa'i don la gzhug pa'i phyir// lha spyod mthun bstan 'dir gzhug go/ gang la mos pa'i gdul bya dag/ mtshan nyid gsum gyis mthun drang phyir//
117a4(gi): med la kun brtags med par bstan// yong 'dod gzhan dbang med gog cing // rtag la yongs su grub par bstan// kun brtags skye bo'i spyod yul de// gzhan dbang byang chub
117a5(gi): sems dpa'i// yongs su grub pa'i sangs rgyas so// yon tan phyogs res dregs pa dag/ zil gyis mnan pa'i drang ba'i phyir// gnyen por gyur pa'i yon tan rnams//
117a6(gi): brjod de zhi byas gsang sgor bzhugs// 'du shes log pa'i log sregs can// sbas pa'i thabs kyis gdul ba'i phyir// brda dang bcus tshig sna tshogs kyis// zab mo'i don
117a7(gi): la gzhug par bya// shu kra dang ni gla rtsi dang // bzhi mnyam dang ni ru hi nyid// si ta pa ga shu rnam pa lnga// rgyal ba rigs lnga 'grub pas na// rigs rgyud longs spyod ldem
117b1(gi): dgongs kyis// lha srin thig zhugs rnam pa gnyis// btul nas gsang sngags zab mo nyid// bde chen kun tu 'dus pa'o// yul med chos nyid nam mkha' la// rten
117b2(gi): med rig pa rnam par 'gro// mkha' 'gro rnam bzhes tshogs kyi rje// sprul pa dpal ldan khrag 'thung nyid// tshangs pa rtswa yi mgo can sku// gu lang klung gi mgo can gsung /
117b3(gi): khyab 'jug seng ge'i mgo can thugs// yon tan dbang phyug de la sogs// mgo cig tu ni lung bstan pa// rnam par phye ste lung yang bstan// dril nas lung ni bstan par bya//
117b4(gi): bzhag pa'i lung yang bstan pa'o// mtshan nyid gsum gyi mthun drang phyir// med pa kun btag med par bstan// yod 'dod gzhan dbang mi 'gog cing // rtags la yongs
117b5(gi): su 'grub par bstan// kun btag skye ba'i spyod yul te// gzhan dbang byang chub sems dpa' ni// yongs su grub pa sangs rgyas so// yon tan phyogs ris dregs pa dag/
117b6(gi): zil gyis mnan pa drang ba'i phyir// gnyen por gyur pa'i yon tan rnams// brjod de zhi byas gsang sgror gzhug/ khro gtum tshad med byams par snang // bsod chen snying rje'i rang
117b7(gi): bzhin te// bskal zhing bad pa la 'ga' ba'i mchog/ phal bal mi da sa so// sring kun la rgyal pas sbyar// dgra bgegs rnying rjes sad par bya// rdzas
118a1(gi): mchog dga' ba'i ma byin blang // rdzun smra btang snyoms chen po nyid// log sred sprul skus dkri drang brgyud// kun kyang bde mchog chen po nyid// yum
118a2(gi): ldum na gsang ba'i sku// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// ji ltar 'dod par spyad cing rol// 'jig rten khams 'dir bud med kyis// bde
118a3(gi): bas tshe yang nyi zla 'dra// rdo rje'i sku ste gzi mdangs 'bar// seng ge'i gsung dang 'dra bar sgrogs// zhen chags gsod skus rang rkyen chags// sku gsum lus la rdzogs pa ni/
118a4(gi): lus ngag yid la gang gnas pa// sku gsum zab mor gnas pa yin// lung chen nang gi mtshan nyid ni// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni// rang bzhin dmigs yul 'khor
118a5(gi): rtsal tshigs// chos sku chen por ye nas gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang // me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// chos kyi sku yang grub pas na// yang dag chos sku dri ma
118a6(gi): med/ ye shes sku ni phung por grol// 'khor 'das longs spyod rgyal srid che// so sor kun rtog mnyam pa nyid// ye shes gnyis 'dus longs skur bzhugs// chos dbyings
118a7(gi): mkha' dbyings dag pa na// gdul bya sems can don 'gro ba// sprul pa'i 'khor lo chen po yang // zhi dang khro bor rang snang ba// sprul sku bya ba grub pa yis// ye shes ngo bo la
118b1(gi): ni 'gyur// spyir ni 'dul ba rnam pa bzhi// mdzad pa khyad par rnam pa gsum// sku gtams rab byung dka' thub mdzad// sangs rgyas bdud btul 'khor lo bskor//
118b2(gi): cho 'phrul bstan nas mya ngan 'das// mdzad pa mchod rten brgyad par snang // 'jig rten pa dang mthun byed phyir// 'jig rten mdzad pa rnam pa drug/ 'khor bas las ni rnam par
118b3(gi): grol/ de phyir 'das pa'i mdzad pa drug/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku rnams la// mi yi yul du 'dul mdzad pa// bcom ldan shAkya seng ge yis// mdzad pa nyi shus byang chub bo//
118b4(gi): rnal 'byor ye shes yul dang ni// ye shes las dang nus mthur bcas// sku lnga yul du lta ba yi// rnal 'byor zab mo rang snang bas// gsang ba'i man ngag rgyal po 'di//
118b5(gi): bdag gzhan 'khor bar snang ba kun// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos skur thim// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas yin// rang bzhin 'bras bu yul grangs rtsa la// yon tan skyon dang
118b6(gi): gol sa dang // bzhag thabs sems kyi de kho na// mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin rnams// chos kyi sku las gzhan ma yin// sems nyid chos nyid sangs rgyas shes//
118b7(gi): rna ma shes phung por snang kun// rigs lnga rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// de nyid pas ni gzhan min pas// sangs rgyas bde chen rang pa gnas// mi rtog dbyings las
119a1(gi): thugs rjes chags// ci 'dul der snang yir bzhin sku// thabs kyi spyod pas kun 'dul yang // brtags pa tsam snang chos kyi dbyings// ngo bo rang bzhin
119a2(gi): rnam grangs can// cir yang ma yin chos nyid ni// cir yang snang bar shar ba las// cir yang bsgyur du btub pa'i phyir// cir yang sgrub tu btub pas 'grub// sku gsum
119a3(gi): ye shes lnga rang bzhin// khams gsum dbyig sgron bya ma rta// bcom ldan 'das nyid khrag 'thung nyid// rang sems de nyid rang snang ba// zab mor snang ba de kho na// yang gsang
119a4(gi): dbyer med chen po las// ye shes gsum ni chos sku'i gzhi// rtag pa chen po'i rang bzhin can// mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur stong // bzhugs gnas chos kyi dbyings
119a5(gi): nyid na/ ye shes bzhi dang sku gnyis 'khor// chos dbyings nam mkha' khyab tshad 'dul// kun tu bzang po chos sku'i chos// rdo rje 'chang chen longs spyod chos// chos sku'i
119a6(gi): sprul sku rigs lngar snang // sku dang gsung thugs dgu ru snang // chos sku gzugs sku gnyis la snang // yongs su grub pa chos kyi sku// don dam bden po chos kyi sku// phung po
119a7(gi): lhag med chos kyi sku// nam mkhas khyab pa chos sku'i mtha'// mya ngan 'das chos bsten pa'i tshad// chos sku gzhi yin dang por gnas// snga ma rgyu la phyi ma 'bras// chos kyi sku
119b1(gi): la ye shes 'jug/ sems can kun gyi thugs yin la// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che// 'gyur med chos sku rtag pa nyid// ye shes skad cig cha mi rtag/ stong pas
119b2(gi): rtag pa ma yin la// rang bzhin snang ba mi rtag min// ye shes gnyis ni longs sku'i gzhi// mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhin can// mtshan nyid me long lta bur gsal// 'og
119b3(gi): men gnas na bzhugs par mdzad// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// gzhi dang snying po me tog 'dus// longs sku'i chos skur rnam snang mdzad// longs sku'i longs
119b4(gi): sku gang chen mchog/ longs sku'i sbrul sku khyab snang mdzad// sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum gsum// longs skus bcu'i ngo la snang // gzhan dbang longs spyod rdzogs skur
119b5(gi): sbyar/ bden gnyis kun rdzob bden pa yin// lhag bcas lhag med gang yin dang // mtha' ni zhing la rnam par spyod// tshad ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas// go rims bar du gnas
119b6(gi): pa la/ rgyu 'bras snga phyi'i snang ba dang // longs sku'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sku'i gzi brjed rnam snang mdzad// kri ya yo ga u pa ya// longs sku rtag pa chen po'i sku// ting nga
119b7(gi): 'dzin chal mi tas dang // rang bzhin 'od la rtag pa min// ngo bos snang bas ma rtog med/ yongs phras snum par/ nan nam shes spru'i sku sa ni/ rango bzhir rgyun
120a1(gi): mi 'chad par 'byung // kun brtags mtshan nyid dag dang sbyar// bye ba phrag rgya'i gling la bzhugs// rnam pa bzhi yi 'khor dang ldan// stong gsum 'dub
120a2(gi): ba'i zhing du snang // sprul sku'i chos sku rdo rje dbyings// sprul sku'i longs sku shAkya thug/ sprul pa'i sprul pa thub pa drug/ sku dang gsung thugs rnam pa dgu// 'gro ba drug gi ngo la
120a3(gi): snang sgyu mar snang ba'i mtshan nyid can// kun rdzob bden pa'i bdag nyid che// lhag med ma yin lhag ma can// stong gsum 'jig rten mtha' la thug/ sprul pa'i tshad ni
120a4(gi): zangs med 'gyed// tha ma yin te dang por 'byung // snga ma rgyu la phyi ma 'bras// bsod nams ye shes tshul gyis 'jug/ sku gsung thugs las gsung dang ldan// bstan
120a5(gi): pa'i chos ni sde snod gsum// rgyun mi 'chad pas rtag par bshad// skye 'gag med pas mi rtag la// ngo bo stong pas rtag pa min// las kyi snang bas mi rtag min// mkha'
120a6(gi): 'gro sprul pa'i sku yin pas// 'gro la ji ltar snang mdzad pa// sgyu ma mkhan dang 'dra bar sprul// gnas pa'i sku gsum ye shes lnga// rnal 'byor zab mo snying ka chos// chos nyid
120a7(gi): gser 'dra zlum po dngul// oM dang su tri za 'og gur// ye shes rtsa ni mthing ka la// gru bzhi zhag thogs sbrul 'khyil pa// le brgan shel sgong snying po hUM// sa bon a dang
120b1(gi): rni gnas yin// rang rgyud rtsa ni 'od dmar zhing // zla gam mig rgyu rtsa sgra'i rtag// zangs zhu ra gan rtse song ltar// sa bon pri du snying po A// yon tan rtsa ni dmar nag la//
120b2(gi): gru gsum ldang nag phug ron ske// bya nag o ga zhol lta bu ste/ blo rnags chen po'i snod yin no// ma rtogs 'khor ba'i rgyu yin la// rtogs nas 'bru gsum mya ngan 'das// kun
120b3(gi): gzhi yid dang nyon mongs sgo// ser mthing dmar dang nag la gnas// ser po rtsa la mthing ka dbugs// dmar po khrag la dmar nag sgo// de dag dang sa ma gang yin pa// rab
120b4(gi): tu rgyu bar byed pa'o// 'od gzhi'i dag pa na yi ge drug/ skyon dang yon han gnas pa la// yi ge gnyis gnyis gnas pa yang // snyigs ma gsum la rgyu bar byed// 'gro ba drug
120b5(gi): tu skye ba yi// kha zin rnam shes sa bon la// las rnams bsogs par byed pa yang // rigs drug kun la rang rgyud gnas// brgyad dbus rtsa dang khra sbugs kyis// dngas ma
120b6(gi): chen po gsum du gnas// de'i dkyil 'khor na dngas ma lnga// 'od du 'khyil bar gnas pa yin// de yi dkyil na bzhugs pa ni// thig le chen po byang chub sems//
120b7(gi): ser zhun ze'u ga ke ru// nyi ma chos dbyings snying ngor bzhugs// gnas luka sa ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi// lhag pa'i chos sgrub cing grol med// ye nas lhun gyis grus par
121a1(gi): mA bac+doMs ka dka chen por gnas// gnas sngags 'khor 'das gnyis su snang // 'das pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sa bcu'i byang sems sgrib sbyong
121a2(gi): mdzad/ me long byad kyi dkyil 'khor can// sprul pa bye ba bsam yas pa// rigs drug 'dul ba'i sku can rnams// 'jig rten khams ni 'di nyid du// gzhan dag sprul
121a3(gi): par snang ba'o// rnal 'byor sems nyid chos kyi sku// phung po rigs lnga longs spyod rdzogs// nyon mongs drug po thub drug po// zab la rgya che'i chos rnams kun// sems nyid
121a4(gi): gcig tu 'dus pas na// sems can chos kyi phung por grol// grol dang ma grol tha snyad tsam// gnyis su bya ba ga la yod// ces gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las/
121a5(gi): gzhi dmigs par bya ba'i yul/ rang bzhin 'khor 'das kun sangs rgyas par bstan pa ste brtag pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
121a6(gi): sku dang gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan 'phrin las ma lus shing / lus pa med pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gi sgrub pa po 'di skad gsungs so// shes rab kyis ni blo phye nas/
121a7(gi): nges par brtags pa'i sa gzhi la// blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan// des ni lung chen 'grub par 'gyur// lha mi'i theg pas mi dge spang // sems can srog ni gcad mi bya//
121b1(gi): rdzas pa sogs rnam pa gang la yang // ma byin par ni blang ba min// srog chags mo ru gang gyur pa// mi tshangs par ni spyad mi bya// ngag gis spang bar bya ba yang // rdzun gyi
121b2(gi): tshig ni smra ba spang // de bzhin ngag ni 'khyal pa dang // tshig ni rtsub mor smra ba dang // phra ma byed pa de bzhin spang // yid kyis brnabs sems spang ba dang // de bzhin
121b3(gi): gzhan la gnod sems dang // log par blta bar mi bya'o// yi ge logs la lhag chad med// mchod pa dkyil 'khor gsum la 'bul// sbyin skyabs 'bras bu rlom sems
121b4(gi): med/ skyo dub med gus mi ngoms nyan// gsal dag 'dres 'byin 'khrugs sdebs klog/ don tshags yon tan gzungs su 'dzin// yon tan lnga ldan don rnams
121b5(gi): 'chung / de bzhin kha ton mdzad pa dang // lung dang man ngag rig spyod sems// mtshan bcas mtshan med rtse gcig bsdus// sangs rgyas chos la spyod pa rnams//
121b6(gi): 'di bcu shes par rab tu bya// mu stegs theg pa rab shes na// mi spyod spang phyir khyed la bshad// lhab drug cu rtsa gnyis la// sngon mthar rtog po bcwo brgyad dang //
121b7(gi): phyi mthar bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi yin// sngon mthar rtag par lta ba bzhis// kha rtsig rtag par lnga bzhi dang // la ni mi spong lha bzhi dang // yong med mtha' la lta ba pa'i// tu med par
122a1(gi): ni lta ba gnyis// phyi ma'i mtha' la lta ba ni// 'du shes sod sgra bcu drug dang // 'du shes med par smra ba brgyad// 'du shes can yang ma yin la/
122a2(gi): ma yin par yang ma yin brgyad// chad par smra ba bdun dang ni// tshe 'dir mya ngan 'das dang sngo// nyan thos bden bzhi bsgrub pa ni// dal 'byor mi lus thob dka' bas/
122a3(gi): mi khrus gtsang ma thob dus 'dir// bden bzhi bsgrub pa'i gang zag bya// rang gi ngo bo sdug bsngal dang // kun 'byung 'gog pa lam du snang // gcig la brten nas gcig dgos pa/
122a4(gi): go rims nges par bya ba'o// 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras rnam gnyis dang // de bzhin mya ngan 'das par nges// theg pa che chung thun mong dang // chen po'i dbang du byas nas dbye// sdug
122a5(gi): bsngal bden pa mi rtag pa// phyi ni dur khrod sems can shi// nang ni mi rtag rgyud skye ba// 'chi ba'i gdam ngag sgom pa nyid// spyir ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal dang // 'gyur ba dang ni
122a6(gi): 'du byed yin// skye rgas na dang 'chi ba dang // dgra gnyen yod dang med pa yin// lha ltung lha min mtha' rtsod byed// mi 'gyur byol song mdze thog pho la// bkres skom yi dgas snang ba
122a7(gi): dang tsha grangs dmyal bar snang ba'o// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin no// chos dang gang zag bdag tu ni// 'dzin pa rgyu la yod ma yin// kun
122b1(gi): 'byung rgyu ni 'dod yon dang // de la chags pa'i nyes dmigs bcas// kun 'byung dug gsum la brten nas/ 'bras bu 'gro drug ngan song ngo // rab skye rgyu'i rnams rtog dang // 'bras
122b2(gi): bu 'di byo'i sdug bsngal skye// rkyen gyi rnam pa 'di lta mod// da ltar 'das dang ma 'ongs rkyen// 'gog pa 'gog par snang ba dang // rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'o// zhi ba nyon mongs nyes
122b3(gi): dmigs med// longs spyod spyod lam tshor ba bzhi// gya nom nyon mongs tha ba dang // ngan song sdug bsngal tha ba gsum// nges par 'byin pa rgyu dang rkyen// lam dang 'bras bu nges pa'o//
122b4(gi): lam gyi bden pa spyi yi lam// khyad par lam du snang ba yin// rig pa stan chos bya ba byed// 'thad pa bsgrub dang chos nyid yin// bsgrub pa thun mong bsgrub pa dang // thun mong ma yin
122b5(gi): bsgrub pa dang // nges 'byin rgya ni 'khor ba las// 'bras bu mya ngan 'das par 'byin// rang rgyal chos la blo sbyang phyir// phyi dang nang gi rten 'brel chos// phyi ni rgyu dang 'brel pa drug
122b6(gi): de bzhin rkyen dang 'brel pa drug/ 'di yod phyir na 'di 'byung la// 'di bskyed phyir na 'di skye bas// snga ma'i rkyen gyis phyi ma 'byung // rang gi mtshan nyid bcu gnyis ldan// dbye ba ma
122b7(gi): rig rmongs pa dang // bsod nams mi g.yo 'du byed dang // rgyu 'bras rnam shes ming bzhi rdung // gzugs ni 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur dang / bya ma med drug dang de ba dren rag/ tshor
123a1(gi): ba bde thug btang snyoms la// 'dod gzugs med pa'i srid pa dang // sgra ste 'i 'dod brtul zhugs len// sngon skyes 'chi dang bar dor srid// skye ba dang ni nA
123a2(gi): shi yin/ grangs des gang gis gang brten ltar// ma thob sapa yo la sbyor// gang gis gang brkyen ji ltar 'grub// grub pa'i 'bras bu dngos su skye// zhes dmigs rgas shing 'chi
123a3(gi): bar 'gyur// go rim nges par bya ba yang // snga ma rgyul phyi ma 'bras// kun nas nyon mongs ma rig sreg/ len pa na shi 'du byed yin// las ni kun nas srid rnams shes// skye ba'i
123a4(gi): kun nas nyon mongs pas// maud gzugs ste rig tshor spyo rgas// ring rgyu ma rig pa la sogs// sred sogs nye ba'i rgyu yos bsdus// ma rig sogs bcu 'di la rdzogs// skye
123a5(gi): ba rgas shing phyi ma'i rdzogs// ma rig srid gsum snga mar rdzogs// bdun po 'di rdzogs skye rgas phyi// ma rig pa ni 'dod khams mtshungs// gzugs khams bsam gtan dang po
123a6(gi): yang / ma rig pa ni ma gtogs la// gzugs med khams kyang de ltar ro// theg chen byang chub sems dpa' ni// bden pa gnyis kyis don rtogs nas// lam lnga sa bcu mthar
123a7(gi): phyin pa/ sangs rgyas sa la gnas par 'dod// shes bya tsam gyi snang ba la// bden pa gnyis kyi gzhi yang 'grub// tha dang rta 'am glang po dang // bzlog byas gcig pa bkag pa tsam// /
123b1(gi): snang 'dzin stong par 'dzin pa yi// shes ngos bden pa'i rgyu mtshan gnyis// bden gnyis gzhan du 'dod pa yis// mu stegs gnyis dang nyan thos gnyis// tshogs gnyis rdzogs/
123b2(gi): par bsgrub pa dang // rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' yang bsal// sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa// bden pa gnyis su yang dag 'dus// kun rdzob blo yi spyod yul yin//
123b3(gi): don dam blo yi spyod yul min// don dam kun rdzob gang yin pa// so so'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// snang ba mi tshol bslu ba dang // bden dang du mar yod pa yin// bkag pas
123b4(gi): mi 'byung chos nyid min// sgros 'dogs mi chod gzhir mi gcig/ kun brtags gzhan dbang kun rdzob la// yongs su grub pa don dam nyid// sdug bsngal kun 'byung kun rdzob
123b5(gi): la/ 'gog pa lam ni don dam gsungs// 'khor ba'i chos la brtag mi bzod// dam pa'i bden pas bslu ba min// 'khor ba'i ming don kun rdzob drang // 'das pa'i ming don
123b6(gi): don dam nges// snang ba'i yul la rig pas gnod// yang dag ma yin skyon gyis 'jigs// brtags shing gzhigs nas rang bzhin med// rgyu rkyen mthun snang don byed nus//
123b7(gi): spros 'dogs bcad nas 'ams su blang // gang ma ngag rtogs nas nyams ku klang / chos dang longs spyod sprul pa gsum// kun gyi 'bras bur gnas pa'o// bslu zhing blo ye rul
124a1(gi): gyur pas// kun rdzob spyi yi mtshan nyid do// slu bar byed pa'i ngo bo can// brtag dpyad mi bzod sgrib pas na// kun rdzob ces pa nges pa'i tshig
124a2(gi): kun rdzob dbye ba yang dag dang // log pa'i kun rdzob ces bya'o// so so'i mtshan nyid rab bshad bya// snang la don med mi nus log/ snang yul mi snang mi nus yin// rigs/
124a3(gi): snod yang dag ma yin zhing // kun rdzob bsgrub par byed pa yin// don byed rtog yul gsal byed dbang // kun rdzob gnyis kyi khyad par dbye// bum par snang ba don byed nus//
124a4(gi): snang la mi nus thag pa sprul// snang yang mi snang don mi nus// mi srid chos bzhi la sogs yin// don dam pa yi mtshan nyid ni// spros pa thams cad bral ba yin// ye shes
124a5(gi): dam pa'i yul yin pas// ngo bos yin par de 'dod la// shes bya'i nang nas dam par ni// gyur phyir nges pa'i mtshan nyid do// dbye ba rnam grangs don dam dang // rnam grangs
124a6(gi): ma yin pa yin no// rnam grangs ma yin mtha' brgyad bral// so so stong pa bco brgyad ni// 'di ltar rab tu dbye bar bya// dbang po lnga ni ther zug min// nang ni stong pa nyid yin la//
124a7(gi): gzugs sgra dri sogs 'jigs 'gyur phyir// dngos po med pas phyi stong nyid// phyi dang nang gi skye mched rnams// phyi nang stong pa nyid gyur pa// rang bzhin gyis stong gzhan gyi min//
124b1(gi): stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid// 'jig rten chen po stong pa nyid// myang 'das don dam stong pa nyid// khams gsum 'dus byas stong pa nyid// 'gog gnyis nam mkha' 'dus ma byas// rtag
124b2(gi): chad mtha' 'das stong pa nyid// 'khor ba'i thog mtha' stong pa nyid// chos rnams dor ba med pas stong // kun gyis ma mdzad rang bzhin stong // phung po khams kyis chos rnams stong //
124b3(gi): rang bzhin nyid kyis stong pa dang // dus gsum mi dmigs stong pa nyid// dngos po dngos por gzung med stong // rten 'brel ngo bo nyid kyi stong // mngon mthong rtogs shes ngo bo med//
124b4(gi): bcwo brgyad spros pa'i mtha' dang bral// de ni khyad par shes par bya// snod bcud yang dag don dam par// nam mkha' lta bur stong pa'o// gnas shing brten par 'os pas dngas//
124b5(gi): skye bo mos pa spyod pa dang // tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor lam yin// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ni// sems can don mthong rab tu dga'// tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dri ma med// chos
124b6(gi): kyi snang ba 'od yang byed// sgrib gnyis sreg pa'i 'od yang 'phro// sbyang dka' sbyong bas sbyang yang dka'// 'khor 'das mngon du gyur pa dang // nyon mongs las ni ring du gyur// mtshan
124b7(gi): ma yod med gnyis mi g.yo// yang dag legs pa'i blo gros bzang // chos kyi sprin gyis kun la khyab// kha rol phyin pa bcu dang rdzan// dang po rnam sbyang dkar po mthong // rigs dang
125a1(gi): ldan pas rigs kyis// grangs la zhugs pas brgyad pa'i sa// de nyid rtag mthong mthong ba'i sa// 'dod khams 'dod chags bsrab pa'i sa// 'dod pa'i 'dod
125a2(gi): chags bral ba rnyes// bsrung ba mi nyams bsrung ba'i sa// nyan thos su bdun rnam par gnas// dbyings la ye shes shar ba kun tu 'od// pad+ma'i spyan 'dra mi 'gag longs spyod rdzogs
125a3(gi): yi ge 'khor lo gdul bya sprul pa 'gyed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa zhes bya ba'o// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun phyogs// rnam pa lngar ni rab tu gsungs// dran pa nye bar gzhag la
125a4(gi): sogs/ tshogs kyi lam du bya ba yang // lus dran tshor ba dran pa dang // sems dran chos ni dran pa'o// yang dag par ni spong byed pa// tshogs lam 'bring por bshad pa yang /
125a5(gi): mi dge ma skye mi bskyed la// sngar bskyes pa rnams spang ba dang // dge ba ma bskyed bskyed byas la// bskyed rnams phyir zhing spel lam bsgom// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bdun pa dang // brtson /
125a6(gi): 'grus dang ni sems dang ni// spyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul bcas pa yang // lus ngag yid la tshogs bsog pa'o// sbyor lam dang brtson dran pa dang // ting 'dzin shes rab dbang po dang //
125a7(gi): da brtson dran ting shes rab stobaso// drod rtse bzod mchog bcu la sbyor// bsgom par bya ba'i lam 'di ru// byang chub yan lag rnam pa bdun// dran dang chos dang brtson dang
125b1(gi): dga' shin tu ting 'dzin btang snyoms bdun// mthong ba'i lam du 'phags pa yi// lam ni yan lag brgyad nyid de// lha rtogs ngag dang las kyi mtha'// 'tsho ba rtsol dran te nge
125b2(gi): 'dzin/ 'phags pa'i 'bras bu de kho na// sngon ma mthong ba mthong ba'i lam// mthar phyin pa yi lam nyid la// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// rnam grol mi slong khyad par lam// 'bras
125b3(gi): bu chos sku thob pa'o// kri ya dag pa chos nyid dang // ye shes mu bzhi bral ba'o// gzhan don sa bon snying rje nyid// bsod nams tshogs bsags rnam dag bdun// tshad med pa
125b4(gi): ni rnam pa bzhi// byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed// chos nyid sgra dang yig 'bru thugs// me shes yongs rdzogs sgyur drug bsgom// bka' nan go khrab dar dpyangs ni/
125b5(gi): khro bo gnyis kyis bcing bar bya// gza' skar dus tshigs zas gos gtsang // brtul zhugs dka' thub spyod pa spyad// mi tshe bdun na sangs rgyas pa// rigs gsum mgon pos
125b6(gi): 'gro ba 'dul// u pa ya ni 'thug po bkod// rigs bzhi rgyal ba'i sku ru gnas// brtul zhugs spyod pa dang du blang // rigs bzhi rdo rje 'chang bar gnas// yo ga'i theg pas
125b7(gi): gnas 'dod pas// 'og men rdo rje dbyings su lha// me tog zla ba rdo rje'i gzugs// spr-i bsdus bsgom pa'i DU ru gsal// ting 'dzin byin brlabs dbang bskur mchod// mngon
126a1(gi): byang lnga dang cho 'phrul bzhi// bsgom zhing mchod par bya ba yang // bsod nams ldan phyir bya ba yin// 'thug por bkod pa gnas pa yang // mi tshe drug gis
126a2(gi): sangs rgyas pa'o// ma hA yo ga'i rgyan bdun yang // gleng ba slang ba dang sangs rgyu'i tshul// rgyas bshad mtha' dang bshad pa'i tshul// dbye ba'i rnam pa gang zag snod // bden
126a3(gi): pa'i dgongs par shes par bya// gleng bslang ba yi grangs lnga ni// rgyud 'di'i ming ni ci zhig yin// rgyud 'di su zhig don du mdzad// byed po ston pa su zhig yin// rgyud 'di'i
126a4(gi): ljang tshad ji lta bu// dgos pa ci zhig yod par shes// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i rgyud// dug lnga'i skye bo 'dul slad du// kun bzang rigs lnga rgyal bas gsungs//
126a5(gi): chog de bzhin le'u dang // rim par phye dang dum bu'o// thun mong mchog nyid bsgrubs phyir dgongs// sangs rgyas pa mi tshul bzhi ste// rgyud dang gleng gzhi des tshig rgyu//
126a6(gi): mim+b+ha rang byung rigs sna dang // 'dul rlom theg pa spangs mtshungs// rdzas bshad mtha' ni rnam pa dru// drang don des don dgongs pas bshad// dgongs sbyin/
126a7(gi): bzhin la// ji bzhin ma yin nyid du bshed// bshad pa'i tshul ba ni khyed la bstan// tshig phyir sbas dang mthar thug yin// nyan bshad dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// tshogs dang
126b1(gi): slob ma dag tu 'dod// snod kyi gang zag rnam palnga// ut+palA pad+ma dkar dmar dang // tsan dan rin po cheyi dpe// bden pa'i dgongs pa rnam pa gnyis// kun rdzob dan
126b2(gi): dam bshad par gyis// lung rnams kun gyis bcud 'byin pa// theg chen chos kyi snying po nyid// bsgrubs pa'i yang snying sangs rgyas lam// lung chen bdun gnyis gcig tu
126b3(gi): dril/ snang srid ye sangs rgyas pa lta bu'i lung // lha sku phyag rgyar gsal ba bskyed rim lung // bzlas brjod bsnyen pa 'bul ba sngags kyi lung // chos nyid yum la rol pa sbyor
126b4(gi): ba'i lung // zhing bcu rtsa nas gcod pa sgrol ba'i lung // tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhal zas mchod pa'i lung // dbang skur dngos grub len pa bsgrub chen lung // spyi mdo tsam du
126b5(gi): 'di yang blo kha dbye// bgegs chen bar chad bsrung ba 'tshams kyi lung // lus ngag yid sgrib sbyong ba tshogs gsog lung // sman rag gtor ma 'bul ba byin brlabs lung //
126b6(gi): zhi khro bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa rtsa ba'i lung // bsgom dbyangs nyams su len pa bsnyen pa'i lung // 'dod yon tshogs su 'bul ba za ba'i lung // lhag mchod dkyil 'khor bsdu ba
126b7(gi): rdzogs rim lung // rgyas par mi bgang zur tsam blo la dbye// rdzogs pa 'gyur med ye nas gnas pa ni// chos nyid 'gyur med nam mkha' lta bur che// snang sring rnam dag lta ba'i
127a1(gi): dkyil 'khor ni// khyung chen gshog rdzogs mkha' la lding ba 'dra// sems nyid sgom pa nang na rang gsal ba// rgya mtsho rdzi yis ma bskyod gnas pa yin// lus
127a2(gi): ngag yid spyod rnam rtog zil gnon pa// seng ge'i skad kyi gcan gzan skrag pa 'dra// rtogs pa'i 'bras bu dus su 'byung ba ni// yid bzhin rin chen rtse la khu byug ldeng // snang srid
127a3(gi): ye sangs rgyas pa chos kyi sku// mdo tsam bshad nas blo kha dbye bar bya// theg chen rgyal po sa dang 'dra// rang gi rgyal srid skyong bar byed// rje'u rigs chu bo'i rgyun lta bu// rang gi
127a4(gi): ngang rgyud dal 'babs ring // bram ze tshab me dang 'dra// bco sreg rab tu 'bar ba'o// dmangs rigs rlung dang 'dra ba do// kun la khyab cing yang ba nyid// gtum po drag po
127a5(gi): gdol pa'i rigs// bdag gzhan drag por 'gyur bar byed// las dang skal bar gang ldan partag/ rang bzhin ngang tshul bshis kyi bzang // ngan pa'i las spyod kun tu spang //
127a6(gi): ras snam dkar po lta bu la// ser tshur rdzas ltar len pa yin// dad pas mi 'phangs srog lus longs spyod gtong // bla ma'i sku la dang spro sgo gsum gus// yid dam yid ches chos
127a7(gi): 'dod dang // mi ldog brtan po can 'di'i rigs// nyan pa sgra tsam kha bub med pa dang // bsam pa sgros thob dri ma med par byed// bsgom pa nan tan sgra don dug yang 'byin//
127b1(gi): gsang thub zhabs rdol lkugs pa lta bur nyid// tshab dang spyod pa dam tshig ni// nges pa bzhi dang ldan pa de// ji ltar sa gzhig shin po las// dngos grub lo tog smin pa'i bzhin//
127b2(gi): slob ma'i blo yang rnam pa brgyad// dad pa'i zhing sa brtson 'grus lhag/ mos gus rjed gtor gtong phod gnyer// rang rgyud rigs rgyud brdul bod ldan// phyir mi ldog par gnas
127b3(gi): pa'o// brgyad ldan de la gdams ngag sbyin// bsgrub pa'i lung bdun bstan par bya// brgyud ldan shes rab gdams ngag ldan// dbang bskur byin brlabs snying rjer ldan//
127b4(gi): blozhan shes rab chung ba yis// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// phung byed gnyis ka sreg pas na// de bas gzhan du bstan pa min// gti mug can khyod gnyid log la/

127b6(gi): chos nyid bcos bslad bral ba las// khyod kyi sems kyis gang la bcos// sems nyid gdod nas sangs rgyas la// da sdod sangs rgyas gang nas tshol// ma rtogs rtsol
127b7(gi): bas 'bad bsgrubs kyang // dngos grub rnam gsum thob mi 'gyur// bla ma tshogs gnyis gtso bo la// tshogs gnyis rab tu bsags par bya// phyir spros 'dogs yos su

128a5(gi): gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ dam chog gsang ba mchog 'di dag sngags 'chang ba'i don du gsungs so// bsdum pa'i yi ni dam tshig dang // gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul zhugs can//
128a6(gi): de dag bsgoms nas nyams su blang // thabs dang shes rab lam yin no// 'dren pa slong sprin bla ma lha// lus ngag yid snum rtsa ba'i sku// nye ring dge ba'i mched rnams na
128a7(gi): sdum par byed pa lus la phan// rtsa ba bskyed dang bzlas pa gsung // sku nyid phyag rgya chen po la// bden phan chos kyi phyag rgya gsungs// thugs ni don brtags dam tshig
128b1(gi): bdag gzhan don grub 'phrin lasan+ta// sgyu dang thugs thob dpa nA dang // sgrub bstod pa rnabs son// gang rnam pa bani smras d+ha// bzlab gnas dus dang rdzas dang //

128b4(gi): gi zhe yang bcad// de dag kun tu spyad par bya// rang lus rgal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// shes par bya ba rab tu ga ces// theg pa'i sangs rgyas mang po yang // rigs lnga shes
128b5(gi): nas bsgrub par bya// nyon mongs spangs nas byang chub med// daphyir spang bar bya ba min// gtsang bar bsrung ba dus kyi rgyun// nyin zhag rgyun la bsgom par bya// lus dang dag
128b6(gi): yid dag gis ni// bsgrub cing dang du blangs te bsrungs// mi bsrung 'jigs pa'i las byed pa// ngan sems spu sems gnod sems dang // ngan du smra dang 'khu ba dang // bsre
128b7(gi): dang gu 'phrog las byed na// de ni nyams par 'gyur ba'i rgyu// rgyal po blor rmongs 'grar ldang zhing // g+ha srin nor yal tshe yang thung // dug 'thung rje bu ngan song 'gro//
129a1(gi): mi dam nyams bkal chen cig/ gsung gi dam nyams bskul pa gnyis// thugs ni bskal pa gsum du 'dod// nyams na brtul te bskang ba na/

129a7(gi): dang 'bral mi bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mnyam par bzhag/ rjes gcod lhan cig skyes la lta// bza' gsum bde ba chen po nyid// thig le 'dzag pa drug yang bsrung // ye shes
129b1(gi): phyag rgya dngos mi 'bral// mnyam bzhag tha rlabs rnam pa gsum// shin tu rnam par dag pa yis// de kho na nyid la spyad par bya// bza' ba bde chen bde stong la// sgrib pa gnyis
129b2(gi): las shes sgrib srung // pad can ye shes dngos mi 'bral// de dag mi nyams bsrung ba'i tshul// ji lta ba bzhin rgyud la bskyed// rnam grangs rjes su dran mi nyams// nyams
129b3(gi): myong gang skyes mi nyams cing // bla ma la gus khyad par can// srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'dren nyams pa// bum dbang nyi shu rtsa brgyad nyid// lam grol ring du 'gror nyams pa//
