130b2(gi): kun rdzob gzugs dang ni// don dam gzugs kyi bdag nyid du// de yi gtso bo rnam pa gsum// la lAn ni shes rab la// ra sa na ni thabs yin te// a ba 'dun
130b3(gi): gnyis med gzugs// dri chu rgyu ba 'changs ldan ma// rag ta rgyu ba ro mchog ma// byang sems rgyu ba spyi khyer ma// chos rnams phra mo'i rang bzhin la// dga' byed ma ni shin

130b6(gi): bdag nyid yin/ phyir dri bya'o// gsang ba'i g.yon na de kho na'o// dmigs pa shes rab lha mo'o// lte bar phyag rgya chen po'i dang // rgyu mthun bdag nyid bA me ni// snying
130b7(gi): kha'i lte ba g.yon pa na// 'khor 'das la rgyur kur ma dzA// nu ma g.yon na bde chen bsgom// b+ha ba ki ni gnas pa'o// mgrin pa'i g.yon nas gnas pa ni// dri ma med byed
131a1(gi): she ka'o// lag mthil g.yon na dang po la// dus ngas byed pa d+ho Sha'o// ma mchu g.yon na gnas pa yang // bde chen 'bebs pa'i 'bi Sha'o// khur

132a5(gi): kyi 'khor lo gnas pa yin// in d+ha dz+nyA dang ma ta ra// kha ra ba ri dang si ta na ha// u sa ma dang ni la la ni// te dzo te dza bya ba dang // u ba d+hu ti 'khor lo gsung // ra sa na dang

132a7(gi): Da ka dang ni// tsan d+hi ma ra d+ha ri ka/ 'di brgyad yon tan 'khor lo gnas// rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis po// dkyil 'khor bzhi la gnas pas na// srog shing gsum dang yang dag
132b1(gi): ldan/ nyi ma sla ba ra hu la// lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor na// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la// kA li sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pas na// yi
132b2(gi): ge drug cu rtsa bzhi'o// rtsa ba 'dab ma bzhi pa ste// sa'i sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi// stong pa bcu drug yi ge ni// rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas spyan// sems sogs ngo bo

140a3(gi): kyi khro bo chen pos ni// mtshams kyi bgegs rnams zil gyis gnon// phyogs bcur khro rgyal bdud rje rnams// ya mtshan che la phyag 'tshal te// bdud dgra thams cad yongs
140a4(gi): bcom nas// bgegs rnams ma lus zhi bar mdzod// o sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni hU/ gr-i ha Na gr-i ha Na hU/ 'grits+tsha pa ya 'grits+tsha pa hUM/ An ya ho/ b+ha ga wA na/ bid+d+ha rA dzA hU phaT/
140a5(gi): rnam thar gru gsum yum gyi mkhar// thod par dam sri phur par gdab// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// sprul pa'i skrod gtong chen po dang // za byed chen po'i rnga mas
140a6(gi): stabs kyis// gnan pa'i las rnams dus la bab// hUM mdzad hU gi Ar+ya a tsa la// sprul pa'i 'od zer rngam pa'i mdangs dang ldan// nu dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // dgra
140a7(gi): bgegs tshogs 'joms mi g.yo mgon// hUM Ar+ya a tsa la/ ban d+ha ban d+ha kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ ri rab chen po'i rmang duswa// ya ma ra tsa'i zas su sbyin// chu srin 'bar
140b1(gi): ba'i kha ru btsang // 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas mnan// bdun rgyud rigs ni brlag 'gyur na// nam yang ldang bar mi 'gyur te// byang chub sems ni bskyed na btang //
140b2(gi): 'phrin las 'dul sbyong bro yang brdung // snon lam bshis pa gdab par bya'o// dur khrod ras sam sogs pa la// gshi ni rje bskyed pa stim 'phrin las bcol// gsang
140b3(gi): chen lhun grub po zang nas// las kyi gshin rje'i bdag po la// bcom ldan chos rjes bka' stsal ltar// de bzhin rigs 'dzani bsgrub pa po// bka' gsang gzhung
140b4(gi): chen 'di bsgrub cing // yang dag don la nges 'jug na// 'di dag nor bu rin chen te// 'di la gnod cing bar gcod pa'i// lha srin sde brgyad 'byung po kun// khyed
140b5(gi): 'khor dang g.yog lags kyis// rnam par smin pa'i chos shod la// gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// bla med 'bras bu ma thob par// sa 'di yan chad ma btang zhig/
140b6(gi): dpal chen mi 'pham bka' ma 'da'// bdag cag ye nas gnyis su med// phyi 'khor skyong ba'i mu ran la// rdo rje'i yal dam thub par mdzod// oM ya ma ra tsa sa do ma
140b7(gi): ya[:]kri kri sa snA dz+nya nga ma ri sa ma ya skaM/ sogs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bri// ba skyed pa stim mchod la 'phrin las bco'// bag la ba be dpung zabar 'dra'i klong // 'chi
141a1(gi): med khro bo chen po'i sku// zhal g.yas rab tu bzhad pa ni// 'dzam bu na da'i gser 'od 'dra// dbus ma ma gad ljang khu'i mdangs// g.yon pa pad+mar
141a2(gi): ga'i 'dra// dbu yi thor tshugs rgya gram mdzes// rigs bdag don yod grub pa bzhugs// thabs mchog snying rjes rdo rje dang // shes rab dril bu thugs khar bsnol// yid
141a3(gi): bzhin nor bu rin po che// mtshon cha'i rgyal po ral gri g.yas// chags med skyon bral pad+ma dang // las kyi rdo rje rgya gram g.yon// gdug pa sbrul gyis phyag zhabs brgyan//
141a4(gi): thod 'phreng tshangs skud do shal mdzad// dpa' bo stag lpags shram thabs can// bgegs chen bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// 'phrin las thog ser bgegs la 'bebs//
141a5(gi): dngos grub bar chad bsrung du gsol// oM a mri ta kun Sha li tshan d+ha sa ma ya stam// phyi nang bgegs rnams bskrad pa yi// gsang sngags 'phreng ba bshad kyis nyon// o
141a6(gi): na ma sa ma na ta kA ya wA ki tsaut+ta badz+ra naN/ khA kha khA hI khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta Na da ma ka/ a si mu sa la pa ri shud d+ha/ ba sha hasta/ tsa tur+N+Na dza tsa tur mu kha/ shang tsa ra na/ gad
141a7(gi): tsha gad tsha/ sarba duSh+Ta pra na a pa ha ri ni mahA/ big+ha na big+ha na ga ta ke/ bi kri ta na na/ sarba b+hu ta ba shang ka ra/ aT hA sa na d+ye ne/ bya g+ha tsa ra ma ni ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba
141b1(gi): ka ra t+ma ni/ tshan+da tshin da sarba ma na hA na/ b+hin d+ha b+hi na d+ha pa ra mu tran/ a kaR+Sha ya/ a da kaR+Sha yA/ sarba b+hU tan/ ni ra ma tha/ nir ma tha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ pre b+h+re sha ya/ pre b+he sha
141b2(gi): yamaN+Da la man bya ba ba sa hA/ dza bi ta na ka ra ya/ ku ru ku ru ma na ka d+ya na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma bi la ma ba/ ma bi la ma pa/ sa ma ya ma nu smA ra/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ s+phoT
141b3(gi): ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba sha pa ri pu ra ga he he b+ha ga wa na/ ki na tsa ra ya si/ ma ma sarba satwA ya sA hA/ ga shin rje gshed kyis phyi ba srung ba'i sngags so// au na ma sa man ta kA ya wa ka
141b4(gi): tsat+ta badz+ra naN/ na ma badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ ma ha daM da ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ri shu d+hA shu/ pa she ha s+tha ya/ au a mr-i ta ku na ba li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ti ShA ti ShA/ ban
141b5(gi): d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha daM ha/ pa tsa pa tse/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba beg+ha na na bi nA ya ka rna/ ma hA ga na pa ti dza bi ta na ta ka ra ya sAhA/ bdud rtsi 'khyi laM pa nang
141b6(gi): bsrung ba'i sngags so// gtsang mar sbyar ba'i phud dag dang // sha khrag las byas gtor ma yis// 'byung po kun la sbyin byas te// gshin rje'i gnas su sngags kyis
141b7(gi): bskyed/ phyogs bzhir tho bzhi btsugs nas kyang / rgyal po chen po sde bzhi'o// phyi mtshams bcad ze'i 'grin la sa bcol// khyi mtshams bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa'i/
142a1(gi): mthu chen phyogs skyong 'khor bcas la// gtor mtsha re sbyin nas kyang // phyi mtshams bsrung ba'i 'phrin las bcol// phur pa dar gyi cod pan can//
142a2(gi): ngos la nubacu bris pa yang // khro bo bcu ru byin brlabs nas// phyi mtshams bsrung ba'i 'phrin las bcol// de nas phyag rgya chen po yis// maN+Dal nag po gru gsum du//
142a3(gi): bar chad dam sri mnan byas te// bag yangs bde bas nan tan bya// 'bur lugs ris su bris pa yi// chos kyi rgyal po bdud rtsi 'khyil// phyi nang sgo byang gdags par
142a4(gi): bya'o// sa dang dus kyis gnas 'di ru// yang dag don la mi brtson zhing // byang chub don la mi gnas pa'i// mi dang mi min gang yang rung // thams cad gcig tu brdzus
142a5(gi): nas ni/ rdul phran bzhin du brlag pa dang // sems nyid theg pa chen po yi// rnam thar dag la dgod par mdzod// ye shes 'phrin las can gyi mdzod// btang snyoms
142a6(gi): yal bar ma btang zhig/ badz+ra sa ma ya dza dza/ rnal 'byor chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsang ba'i dam can so so nas// thams cad thugs rje bskyang zin gyis// da lta
142a7(gi): nyid du so sor dengs// cis te mi 'gro 'dug gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang // de ma thag tu bkas nas ni// bdun brgyud rigs kyang brlag par 'gyur// bden
142b1(gi): pa bdar zhing bskrad par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin gshed por che// oM badz+ra kro d+ha nu kA ra hUM ga rdzag rdza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha b+hi dza ya hUM han ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha na la dan
142b2(gi): Sha hUM da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya man ta ka hU pa tsa pA tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ar+ya a tsa la hU bin da bin dA hU phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta h+ya 'gri ba hu hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a
142b3(gi): pa ra tsat+te hU tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThaHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mri ta kun d+ha le hUM tshin d+ha tshan d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kye bi dza ya hUM b+hi na da b+hi na da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU s+pho ha s+pho/
142b4(gi): ta nu phaT/ oM bru hU~M b+hu tr-i bru hri bru a bru/ A~M dza la badz+ra/ man tra sum b+ha ni/ man d+ha dz+wa la badz+ra badz+ra dza la badz+ra hUM phaT/ g.yas pa dpa' bo 'bru lnga yab// g.yon pa dpa' mo 'bru

142b6(gi): yang rdo rje'i bla bres la// 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi bcas// phyogs mtshams rdo rjes gtams pa la// gsang ba rdo rje'i mtshams la ma 'da' zhig/ 'khor lo ral gri dbyug tho dang /
142b7(gi): phur bu rdo rje'i tshul mchog nyid// de dag rang rang so so yi// phyag rgya rab tu bcas nas kyang // badz+ra badz+ra rak+Sha/ dz+nyAn kra ba rak+Sha/ kAk+Shi ra na da rak+Sha/ a koT mu dgar rak+Sha/
143a1(gi): kI le ki la ya rak+Sha/ mtshams bcad nang 'di tshun chad du// su yang 'da' bar ma byed cig/ ci ste bka' las 'das gyur na// tho ba lcags kyu 'bar

143b5(gi): ye shes lngar ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po chag
143b6(gi): chag 'debs// ma hA ba su maN+Dal hU/ byang chub sems ni ye shes rang bzhin te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i
143b7(gi): dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po chag chag 'debs/ oM ma ha rA na maN+Dal hU/ bdud rtsi mangs ye shes lngar ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i

144b7(gi): bu sran ma la sogs pa// 'bring ngam zhi ba'i tshon du bshad// dur khrod thal chen ldong ros dang // de yi so ba gdur ba dang // sol bas bri ba khro ba yi// dkyil 'khor
145a1(gi): dag la rab tu shis// rdo thal sa ser ba la ldong // rgya bskyed dmar po bya ba dang // rams las byas dang 'bru bsregs pa// tha ma'i rdul tshon dag tu

145a7(gi): thugs kyi mtshan mar bri// dbus su 'gying phur btab nas bskor// zla gam dmar po nub bstan sgo// nang du zla gam gi chung dgu yang bri// nub phyogs zla gam dkar por bya/
145b1(gi): mu khyud thod pa rdo rjes bskor// yang na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// zla gam dgu dang ldan par bri// gru chad ljang khu lta snam dmar// sgo ni phyogs dang mthun pa la// dpal
145b2(gi): gyi pho brang ba stim la bzhag/ ye shes lngar ldan sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i snga rol tu// bsregs mnan cho ga rab tu bya// ma 'dres pa rnams yol bas gcod//

146a3(gi): chu nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i// ma rig pa yi ling thog rnams// bde gshegs dgongs pas bsal bar bya// tsak+Shu pra be sha pa
146a4(gi): de nas bsre bar bya ba yang // rdo rje slob dpon gtso bo nyid dang // rdo rje mched dang lcam dral la// lus dang srog la babs gyur yang // zhe sdang mnar sems mi bskyed do//

146a7(gi): tshig mchog las ma 'da' zhig/ sa ma ya na ra ka na// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i man ngag ni// gnas pa rtsa yi dkyil 'khor dang // grub pa sngags kyi yi ge dang // rten pa

146b4(gi): par bya/ de yi snying po phog byas nas// rdo rje'i gral bsre 'phreng ba gtad// rig pa srog gis 'brel ba'i 'phreng thag la// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i 'phreng bas brgyus/
146b5(gi): rtse gcig sna dang 'grogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis// 'jab bsnyen zur ma chag par bslang du gsol// badz+ra mA la traM/ rtsa ba sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dang // bsnyen bsgrub
146b6(gi): rnam bzhi bsnyen cing bsgrub pa dang // yi dam lha mchog 'dzab bsnyen drang ba'i phyir// dam tshig rdo rje gral du mchi bar gnang // ti khA sa ma ya hU/ dam tshig bsre bsnan ma byas na//
146b7(gi): gsar rnying mched rnams gang la 'dre// dkyil 'khor dbus su rgyal rigs kyi/ khan d+ha yab yum snying po bri// phyogs bzhir bya ba rigs rje'u rigs dang // darangs rigs
147a1(gi): bram ze lha mo bzhi// mtshams bzhir khrus mkhan gar mkhan dang // gdol pa btso lag mkhan rnams kyi// tshal bu mnyam pa lha mo re// snying por ltar
147a2(gi): bskyed dbang byin brlabs// spyan drangs dkyil 'khor bdag la dgod// zhal bu ka pA la'i mtshan gsol ba// 'phrul zhal yid bzhin 'phra med rgyan gyis klubs// rkang med
147a3(gi): mkha' la 'gro ba'i tog tog skan sgra can// sngon gyi skyes bu bsgrub pa'i rdzas yin gyis// su zhig dngos grub 'dod pa ngal long // gang zhig nga'i bka' ltar mi byed dam
147a4(gi): la mi gnas pa// nga yi gzugs mthong tsam gyis 'chag pa dang // sgra dag thos pa tsam gyis rlag par 'gyur// dkar po zangs yag 'tsher ba ni// snga rabs 'das pa'i bcom
147a5(gi): ldan 'das// chos kyi sku dang rab ldan zhing // 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// rlon pa lcang lor bcas pa ni// da ltar bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// longs spyod
147a6(gi): rdzogs pa'i sku dang rab ldan zhing // 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// dmar por ri chags pa ni// slad kyis 'byon pa'i bcom ldan 'das// sprul pa'i sku dang rab ldan
147a7(gi): zhing / 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// dbus na rang byung grub pa'i lha// thugs mchog badz+ra he ru ka/ badz+ra kro d+hi sha ri gnyis// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po nas/
147b1(gi): dzahU ba hos sbyangs shing // dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog dang // dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// lha chen bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par
147b2(gi): bzhugs su gsol// thabs kyi rgyal po dpal chen nyid kyis gnas/ kho brang ba rtags dang ldan pas snod bcud rgyan du che// sprul pa lhung lo mang po'i kha bad can// dbang
147b3(gi): po rnam lnga snod bcud rgyan bkram nas// mi gnas dpal chen yab yum bzhugs pa'i rten du 'bul// badz+ra shri he ru ka/ badz+ra kra d+h+r-i shwa ri s+thA/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stam/
147b4(gi): sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ldan/ rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste// rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin// thabs dang shes rab gnas su ldan// brtags kyi phyag rgya bzhugs su gsol/
147b5(gi): oM bi d+ya dz+nyA na badz+ra hU/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+ho/ sa ma ya tiSh+TA lhan/ o d+ha ra ma d+ha du ga na d+he hUM/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya sta/ sa ma ya tiSh+mA lhan/ phyogs mtshams rang/
147b6(gi): 'byung grub pa'i lha// ma mo chen mo me 'bar ma// rdo rje thugs kyi khro mo brgyad// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// mchog
147b7(gi): bran pa snol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing bcan ngar bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mo me 'bar ma// ki'u ri chen mo gshegs su gsol// mthi nag ba'i
148a1(gi): ral pa can// sngon tshe ye shes bsnyen pa'i lha// sngon gyi thugs dam bdag dang gcig/ dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas 'dir// zhing chung ba snol ba'i
148a2(gi): gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan pa ra bzhugs su gsol// tso'u ri pra mo be ha li// pus ka g+ha sma sma na sha ni// tsan d+ha tshul mchog de yang dgod// skye med chos kyi
148a3(gi): dbyings nyid la// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // zla gam dbang gi dkyil 'khor gsal// dbang phyug mchog phran gdan steng na// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs dgung//
148a4(gi): yang dag don gyi lha dgur gsal// rang bzhin 'od gsal ye shes dgu// sgrib pa dgu po rab ba sa la phyir// dmigs med gas la rtog med tshul gyis// dgyes shing
148a5(gi): brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM dz+nyA na dI pa a lo ke dza la tiSh+Ta lhan/ skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid na// bde skyid dga' ldan lha yi yul// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// dur
148a6(gi): khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // ma Ta bsgral ba'i khog pa la// zla gam dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// ye shes dgu yi snang ba gsal// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis//
148a7(gi): snod bcud 'jig rten kun la khyab// khyab pa'i ye shes chen po yi// 'khor ba dang ni byang chub kun// mi gnas pa yi tshul gyis ni// thugs rje dbus kyi gzhal yas su//
148b1(gi): dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // gti mug 'thibs pa'i mun pa bsal du gsol// oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha sU/ sa ma ya ho//
148b2(gi): sa ma ya s+ho/ sa ma ya ti sta wA na/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// skye med byang chub sems nyid ni// sku gsung thugs su nges par gtogs// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis
148b3(gi): ni/ rtogs pa chen po dung gi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // zhe sdang 'bar ba'i mun nag bsal
148b4(gi): du gsol// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// snod bcud kun gyis 'jig rten dang // 'khor ba dang ni byang chub kun// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs// mi dmigs
148b5(gi): ba yi tshul gyis ni// rgyas pa chen po gser gyi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // nga rgyal 'bar ba'i
148b6(gi): mun pa bsal du gsol// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// rang dang phyi yi mtshan nyid rnams// ma 'dres so sor gsal bar rtogs// gnas pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni//
148b7(gi): dbang skud chen po b+hu ru'i gag pa yas sa// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nad kyang // 'dod chags 'bar ba'i mun nag pas ba du
149a1(gi): gsol bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// bdag don sku gsum lhun gyis rngub// gzhan don 'og min gnas su sbyong // ci yang ma yin tshul gyis ni/
149a2(gi): mthar phyin chen po g.yu yi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtun par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // phrag dog 'bar ba'i mun nag bsal du
149a3(gi): gsol/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// snod bcud kun gyi 'jig rten dang // 'khor ba dang ni byang chub kun// thams cad stong zhing bdag med de// stong pa nyid kyi tshul
149a4(gi): gyis ni/ byams pa chen po'i shel gyi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // 'khor ba ljongs pa
149a5(gi): mun nag bsal du gsol// 'da' ka thugs kyi ye shes kyis// rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid du bzhag/ ting nge 'dzan gyi sku gsum rdzogs// mi 'da' ba yi tshul gyis ni//
149a6(gi): snying rje chen po'i rin chen gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // ting 'dzan rmongs pa'i mun nag
149a7(gi): bsal du gsol// dbyings su sgrol ba'i ye shes kyis// 'khor ba'i khru mun ba ri ba la// sku gsung thugs su lhun gyis sgrol// pha rol phyin pa'i tshul gyis ni// dga' ba
149b1(gi): chen po bse yi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // ma rtogs so sor 'dzin pa'i mun nag bsal
149b2(gi): du gsol// klong du gyur pa'i ye shes kyis// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi sems can khrag 'thung tshogs// lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis ni// btang
149b3(gi): snyoms chen po rdo rje'i gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // phyin ci log gi mun pa bsal du gsol//
149b4(gi): oM ma hA dz+nyA na di pa'aM/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+thA/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// zhing bcu ru tra'i tshogs rnams bsgral byas nas// sha chen lang ling rkang gi dum bu dang // zhing gi
149b5(gi): ras ros dur khrod rdzas chen rnams// dpal gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// srid pa gsum gyi gdug pa kun bsgral te// shes rab zab mo yum gyi mkha'
149b6(gi): dbyings su// mtha' dang dbus med dkyil 'khor rang bzhin te// rang bzhin phyi nang med par lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzas// yid bzhin longs spyod 'dod dgu 'byung ba'i rgyu// /
149b7(gi): ye shes chen po bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags// phrag dog ma spangs ning gi bayang gzhi 'di// dkyil 'khor chen po'i bla rer dgram par bya'o// mchog phur bzhi dang lcags
150a1(gi): phur bzhi// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir gzugs pa dang // mtha' ma rtsang gis srin mo 'gros// ba su ta yi zhags pas bskor// dpal bshos
150a2(gi): zla ga ma ra g+ha yi// thig le dgu pa 'bul ba dang // rmad du byung ba gtor ma dang // dmar gyi a rga chen po dang // 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang // mchod pa rnam pa lnga
150a3(gi): po dang / zab mo mchog gi tshe zan dang // mda' dang dar sna rgyal mtshan dang // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' ma bskor// yum ni mtshan ldan dam tshig skong // byin gyis
150a4(gi): brlab par byas nas ni// mig gi rten du g.yon phyogs bzhag/ kro ti sha ri nyid yin no// bu mo mkhas pas legs bkal ba'i// thag bzangs 'phra ras dri shun gos//
150a5(gi): dur khrod 'gal bas brgyangs nas ni// tshon rtsi sbyin med bzang po yis// thod pa lnga yi rkong bu'i nang // dpa' bo 'bru lnga ye shes kyis// dam tshig ldan zhing dbang thob pa'i// /
150a6(gi): lha bzo mkhas pas bris pa'i sku// lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor bzang po ni// bsgrub pa po rnams dgongs pa yang // ting 'dzin gsal phyir dmigs rten dgram// thang sku'i rgyab
150a7(gi): tu sku gsum gyis// byin brlabs sngags yang bri bar bya'o// oM ye d+harmA he dupra b+ha ba he dun te Sha na ta thA ga to h+ya ba dang taM ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba b+ha b+ha te ma ha shra ma Na ye swA hA/ chos skur
150b1(gi): byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra ku sha mr-i ta a ha sa/ sa myag a ri ti/ i dra pa ya bod a ga ra rgya/ a t+ya ba ti u rnan tu phye te ku ru sa hA/ longs skur byin gyis
150b2(gi): brlabs pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na pany+tsa kA ya wa ka tsit+ta/ gu na karma b+hud d+ha tra sha kra ni ku ru/ sarba dz+nyA na bA ga sa man ta a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ sbrul skur byin gyis brlabs
150b3(gi): pa'i sngags so// rang lus dur khrod gzhal yas khang // lus nyid dkyil 'khor 'dom gang la// don snying lnga dang nang khrol drug/ rdzas kyis mdzes par gzhag pa la// mgo
150b4(gi): dang yan lag dkyil 'khor ba rgyan// kun gzhi yum gyi rkong bu'i nang // yid kyi rang byung me ru ga sal// zhes gsungs so// he du ka'i gal po las/ dkyil 'khor du dam
150b5(gi): tshatshig bsre mnan bya zhing rdzas dgod pa bstan pa ste/ brtag pa bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba'i ting
150b6(gi): de 'dza ni la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// mi dmigs chos la blo ba rtags shing // ye shes can gyi sbyin stobs kyis// thams cad tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab//
150b7(gi): nus mthu can du de dag 'gyur// dbang 'gyur chen po'i ting 'dzan ni// sngon du dbang rnams thob pa dang // dam tshig snying rjer ldan pa yis// ngan pa'i las rnams dag
151a1(gi): byas la/ dur khrod sar ni byin gyis brlabs// chos mkha' yid bzhin 'jigs byed gnas// lha dang dam can gnas 'dir 'dus// rnal 'byor bag

151a3(gi): 'dus pa kun 'tshogs nas// gtso bo yab yum sku bskyed de// byin brlabs cho ga kun rdzogs nas// khro bo'i rgyal po ji bzhin bskyed// 'khor rnams mkha' 'gro brgyad

151a6(gi): mtsho'i rnams// e h+ye ti tshur sbyin tshur spyon 'khor dang bcas// dzaHhU baM ho/ spyan 'dren ma lus gshegs su gsol// ka la kau la ha ha dga' ba'i bzhad mos khong //
151a7(gi): bde drongs bde mchog a ho su kha sham pa rgya// hiShA shi sha slob ma tshud cig snang bar mdzod// rol cig dgongs shig 'dod pa'i tiSh+Tha kha kha khA hi// sbyin no bskul lo d+ha
151b1(gi): ra d+ha ra ha ra ha ra zo zhig khA hi// ngo mtshar mchog tu bstabs kyis kha kha khA hi/ kyai zla ba la sogs dmar chen snying po lnga// mang sa la sogs tshe 'phel dpa' bo'i bcud// ma tsa
151b2(gi): me tsa rag+ha ru hi re ma hi// nye bar bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dam pa ma lus rab sgrubs shig/ dri med gzi ldan mchog gi mchod pa dam par sbyar ba 'di// ye shes rgya mtsho
151b3(gi): rnams la 'bul lo rab sprul cig/ ma chags par yang bsnams su gsol// ma lus pa ra yang bzhes su gsol// a la la ho/ oM ma ma ki ri ki ri a hi hi s+thA sA maM/ mi
151b4(gi): gtsang dag byed nying 'dzin ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las skyes pa// khro mo dbang phyug zhu ba'i chus// gsang nas thams cad dag par 'gyur// o chos nyid ye nas rnam
151b5(gi): pabar dag pa la// gang la phog pa dag cing gtsang bar 'gyur// gtsang dang nyes bral lta ba yangs pa'i chu// ma gtsang zhen chags sbyong ba lha yi chu// dri med gtor bas
151b6(gi): dga' ba spyod pa'i chu// sprul pa bag chags 'khru ba 'bru'i chu// gang la phog pa dag cing gtsang bar 'gyur// o kro d+hi sha ri sarba drabyam shid daya/ oM aM hu hri thA/ yid
151b7(gi): zhin 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin ni// yo byad cha gsum 'go' byas nas// mtshams gcad rol pa'i thos sbyang shing // tra las yid bzhin rin chen 'bar// tshogs kyi longs
152a1(gi): spyod ma lus dang // 'khor gyis brgyan ni thams cad kyang // ba ril log pa stod smad dang // zhing btsos dang ni lbu dum dang // rkang dang lbu tshags tsan+ti'i tog/
152a2(gi): so so'i bye brag kun tu dgram// gzhan yang dur khrod mchod pa dang // rmad byung gtor ma sha lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bor bcas// rag+ha spyan gzigs rol mo'i sgra//
152a3(gi): so sor 'tsham pa nyid du bkod// sman phud mchod pa gtor mar bcas// dngos grub rdzas su bcas par dgram// lha yi dpag bsam shing chen dang // gnod sbyin bum pa
152a4(gi): bzang po dang // klu yi yid bzhin nor ltar 'bul// tA rat+na hri log kya tru/ sku gsung thugs kyi ting 'dzin ni// thar byed gang dag bshad pa ni// ri mo gcig pa de bzhin te//
152a5(gi): yang dag thams cad ri mo gcig/ 'dod chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir// mig gi rten yang mngon par gzhag/ srog gi ye shes las byung ba'i// kro d+hi sha ri dpal 'bar
152a6(gi): ma/ thang sku hUM la rab rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha dgur gsal// thod sku gsung dang thugs kyi mtshon// byin brlabs rab gnas rdzogs pa'i phyir//
152a7(gi): gzhi dang 'dres de dbyer med bsgom// brtan pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// brtan bzhugs mchod pa'i cho ga bya// ban d+ha bde gshegs sku yi sku// yig 'bru bde
152b1(gi): gshegs gsung gi gsung // mar me bde gshegs thugs kyi thugs// don gyi stang bu tshang ba lagadon gyi lha ni brgya rtsa brgyad// gting mtha' med pa'i skye 'gro rnams// sangs rgyas sa la dgongs su
152b2(gi): gsol shri he ru ka kro d+hi shA ri ha ho phaT b+h+yo/ dbyings dang ye shes ting 'dzin ni// rkong bu chos dbyings yum gyi mkha'// mar me ye shes yab kyi 'od// sku gsum 'gro
152b3(gi): ba'i don yang mdzad// chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas nas// ye shes chen po sku gsum gyis// 'khor ba'i ma rig mun bsal nas// 'khor lo tshogs chen sa la gsal//
152b4(gi): o a lo kaM dzA la di pa hU hU/ 'dod yon lha mo'i ting 'dzin ni// gzugs sgra dri ro reg byas chos// bla med mchog gi mchod pa sbyar ba 'di// nyon mongs dug sel yid bzhin
152b5(gi): bdud rtsi'i mchog/ chos nyid dag pas rigs lnga'i dam tshig lnga// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yi rab rgyas pa// thugs dam bzhin du
152b6(gi): ci bder bzhes su gsol// oM ru pa sha pa ha hU ha hra hI kA ya o/ shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen 'phreng ba 'phro// dbyangs snyan yid 'grog
152b7(gi): gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcu re g.yos// tsU tra hI/ a sa ma ya tru/ kun tu tshim byed bro gsung thim// lha mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro//
153a1(gi): 'od gsal 'tsher bas kun tu gsal// bdud rtsi bsil gro 'jam pa'i dbyangs// du bu a ga sa ma ya hU ho/ rig pa'i brlabs las byung ba'i// lha mo
153a2(gi): tshogs kyi mchod pa ni// gar dang dbyangs su byas nas kyang // gzugs dang dbyibs su 'bul lags kyis// sbyor chen tshul du bzhes su gsol// gzhan yang thabs
153a3(gi): tshul mtha' yas pa'i// mchod sprin bla med phyogs bcur 'bul// nam mkha' mdzod kyi gter la sogs// bla med mchod sprin rab 'byam rnams// dad pas
153a4(gi): dmigs te 'bul lags kyi// sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dgongs te// dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhes su gsol// oM pU tsa me g+ha sa mut+sa s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM/ stong pa snying
153a5(gi): rje'i bdag nyid ni// zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yi// dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen// gsung snyan yi
153a6(gi): ges kun la khyab pa yis// spros med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs// mi gsung lha mor dam bcas 'dul mdzad pa// sgyur 'phrul tshul mnga' ldan pa 'ga' ma
153a7(gi): mchis/ gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes su chags pa yi// na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad de// g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas kyang // g.yon pa yis
153b1(gi): ni dril bu'i sgra skan khrol// lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur pa yis// dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur// gcig gi lag pas kun la 'khyud pa ste// gnyis
153b2(gi): pas rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa mi bzad me tog phreng ba 'thor// bzhi pa bde ba yis ni mda' yang 'phen// gang zhig klu 'di len par byed pa de//
153b3(gi): bde ba rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje gsor ba snying rje chen po yis// dril bu gsil ba shes rab stong pa nyid// gar gyis zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel//
153b4(gi): bde chen rol pa che la dgongs su gsol// oM badz+ra d+hA tu ho/ sgrol ba gnas kyi ting 'dzin chen po ni// dpa' bo 'bru lnga rlung lha'i rta la zhon// ar+thi su tri pr-i du drug rnams
153b5(gi): sreg gnas sbyong nying 'jan rgyu rnams byin gyis brlabs// sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba'i 'gro ba la// snying rje'i shugs kyis sdug bsngal bzlog pa'i phyir// nyon
153b6(gi): mongs kun bsal rgyu drug lam bkag nas// byang chub bgrod phyir 'phags lam rnam thar bstan// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga dang zhal zas lnga// sku lnga chos lnga dbyer med
153b7(gi): rang bzhin gcig/ de phyir dag pa nyid kyis dag pa nyid mchod de// chos nyid la yang chos nyid thim par mchod// dkyil 'khor la yang dkyil 'khor thim par mchod//
154a1(gi): dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dam pa 'dis// rgyal ba sras bcas rigs kyi yum rnams dang // phyag brnyan gtum chen rngam pa'i tshogs la sogs/
154a2(gi): rnal 'byor grub pa'i tshogs dang rigs 'dzin dang // rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// oM g+ha na tsakra pU dza me g+ha sa mud s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU/ sbyor ba gnas kyi
154a3(gi): ting 'dzin ni// gling bzhi phyi yi sbyor ba dang // sgo bzhi nang gi sbyor ba dang // dkyil 'khor bzhi ni gsang ba la// bde ba bzhi ni de kho na// ma lus thams cad bde stong gcig
154a4(gi): shin tu bsgyings pa'i dpa' bo skrag pa dang // bkra shis mtshan ldan mi mo brgyan pa gnyis// dpa' bo dgyes pa'i sbyor mchod bde ba yang // skal ldan rnams la 'bul lo
154a5(gi): rab sprul cig/ shes rab dbyings ma yum gyi gzhal yas su// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchog bkod de// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i sbyor mchod kyis//
154a6(gi): 'phags pa thams cad mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul// mnyam nyid dbyings su rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi// bde mchog longs spyod rdzogs pa sku yi brgyan// 'dod dgu yon
154a7(gi): tan mdzes pas rab brgyan pa// rnal 'byor ye shes rgyan du bzhes su gsol// o a nud ta ra pA tsa me g+ha s+pha ra Na hri ma~M ga ga na khaM hUM phaT swA hA/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i ting 'dzin
154b1(gi): na/ bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khril ba che// lag g.yon phyag rgya rta mgrin nyid// gzhal yas nang na bdud rtsi lnga// sbyor khong gsum pa sku gsung thugs// gnod byin
154b2(gi): phag rgod mche ba chen// dam sri bar du gcod pa bsreg/ chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa ltar// gtor byas thams cad dag par 'gyur// oM A hUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta Tu hI tha/
154b3(gi): oM A nu/ oM a mr-i ta kun pa li badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha ha na han hU phaT/ oM d+harma a mri ta bi shud d+hi kun Sha li d+harma d+hA du rbu a/ sman phud bsdu bar mdzad pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor dbang phyug
154b4(gi): bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rgyal bzhi khro'i 'khor tshogs mchod pa'i phyir// rmad pa'i gnas lnga sman chen lnga sbar ba// rgyal brgya mtsho mched la mi mnga' yang // thugs dam
154b5(gi): dgongs pa smad grags bskang ba'i phyir// gnyis su rtogs pas 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dag pa nyid kyis dge ba nyid mchod na// sgrib pa gnyis byang sku gsum lhun grub
154b6(gi): 'gyur/ dpal mchog rdo rje sems dpar zhal mches la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol ba rnams// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams dang mnyam sbyor ba'o// rnal 'byor
154b7(gi): mchog gi thung ba'i rtags cig rtsol// a la la ho/ de nas sgo skor ba rdzub gsungs// glan du sbyor ba gang byed pa// 'chi mad bdud rtsir sa yin// pra tsam phul tsam mi
155a1(gi): mnga' yang // bag tsam rdul tsam a ti ho// rdo rje slob dpon sman 'bul ba// snyigs ma'i skyon spangs 'khor ba'i mun bral bas// dug lnga sman du
155a2(gi): bsgyur ba sar sa yan// rnal 'byor yongs kyi thugs dam bskang slad du// gtso mchog rnams la 'bul lo byin gyis rlobs// bde gshegs rigs lnga'i bdud rtsi byang chub
155a3(gi): sems 'khor ba'i dug sel zhi khro mchod pa'i mchog/ sems rgyud dag pas mnyam nyid dbyings su bsdus// bla ma dam pas bzhes mchod dngos grub stsol// oM AHhU
155a4(gi): badz+ra a mr-i ta hU tsI tha/ thugs rje chags pa'i ting 'jan ni// ban d+ha stong gsum khor yug nang // 'bras bu lnga bsgral rak+ta 'khyil// hu las gzar bu rdo rje 'bar// zhing bcu
155a5(gi): bsgral ba ra g+ha'i rgya mtshor 'khyil// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzar bus lan gsum phyar// dpa' bo dpa' mo g.yog 'khor bcas pa la// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol
155a6(gi): phyir 'bul// b+hu ban d+ha ka pa la k+Sha bru/ o AHhUMHmu la rag+d+ha hU hri thA/ rmad byung gsang ba'i ting 'jani ni// rtog pa lta ba'i gtor ma ni// chos rnams stong pa nyid du
155a7(gi): gnas/ mtshan ma rdzas kyi gtor ma ni// khyad par dpal gyi gtor ma kun na nyal// sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma 'ben du bcas// thugs rje sprul pa'i gtor ma yongs la khyag
155b1(gi): rig pa byin brlabs gtor ma rnam pa gsum// phyi ni rin chen khang pa gtor ma'i snod// bcud ni ha'am o las yongs gyur pa// 'dod pa yon tan drug gi lha mor
155b2(gi): sprul/ oM b+ha ling sha te dzo b+ha ling ta/ ba la b+ha hi/ gu h+ya sa ma ya swA hA/ snod ni bru las b+ha na d+ha ga zhal yas khang // gtor ma hUM ha yig 'bru phyag mtshan sku// sku ni yang
155b3(gi): dag don gyi lha skur gsal// hU hA/ gsang ba nyi ma zla ba'i ka'u nang / byang chub sems su sha lnga bdud rtsir zhu// thabs dang shes rab tshogs su lhun gyis grub// oM A rbu
155b4(gi): rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gnas dang zhing dang dur khrod mtshan ldan gnas// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// 'bras bu lnga pasgral sha khrag
155b5(gi): rus pa'i tshogs// rmad byung dam rdzas mchod pa 'di 'bul na// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dngos grub stsol// oM A hUM/ su ra ho// upa b+h+yo/ ka ma lamA le/ badz+ra a
155b6(gi): mr-iH ha ra pra ti dza/ b+ha ga wa na dzaHzhu ba ho/ a la la ho/ tra rat+na tAM lo kya phaT/ thod pa rlon pa'i phyag rgya yis// gnas khang byin gyis brlab par bya// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag
155b7(gi): rgya yis/ 'dul ba ba mo byin gyis parlabs// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i phyag rgya yis// rdzas dang sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs// bdud rtsi bum pa'i phyag rgya yis// 'ja' gang
156a1(gi): byin gyis brlab par bya// nor bu rin chen phyag rgya yis// yo byad byin gyis brlab par bya// ka pA la dang rta gdong rgyas// bdud rtsi byin gyis
156a2(gi): brlab par bya// ral gri thod pas rak+tas brlab// dpal bshos thod pas gtor ma la// rkong bu sdong bu mar me nyid// ral gris sgrol la dza hUM sbyor// thun mong phyag
156a3(gi): rgya rnam pa lnga// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las/ thams cad byin gyis brlab pa ste brtag pa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
156a4(gi): rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// zhi rtags rgyan gyis mdzes byas la// sgro dbye phyag dang dam bcas de// gnas lugs phung po
156a5(gi): gdul bya dang // mthar phyin 'grub par 'gyur byed ces// dbang phyug rigs 'dzin mar ldan nas// sgo ba sna tshogs bshad pa ni// tshe yi dam pa grub pa ste// gos
156a6(gi): lnga dag tu bshad pa yin// bdag 'dzin gzhan rtogs btang snyoms pa'i// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i rtogs// sgrib gnyis nyes skyon dag pas na// ye shes gos
156a7(gi): ni dkar por bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol// chags bya chags byed spangs nas ni// thugs rje thams cad chags byed pas// dbang du gyur yang
156b1(gi): ma chags te// tshul khrims gos ni dmar por bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol// bdag tu mi 'dzin byams pa yin// yon tan yid bzhin gter chen
156b2(gi): 'phro/ kun gyi re 'dod skong ba'i phyir// sbyin pa'i gos ni ser por bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol// gnyis med las kyi sprul pa yis// ji ltar
156b3(gi): 'dul zhing don mdzad pas// 'gro kun ba de la 'god pa'i phyir// brtson 'grus gos ni ljang khur bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol// chos nyid dang
156b4(gi): las bcos su med pa yi// kha dog mthing ka cir yang mi 'gyur zhing // mi 'gyur mi shes rang bzhin pas// shes rab gos ni mthing khar bstan// rnal 'byor dbang
156b5(gi): phyug na bzar gsol// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// dbu rgyan dang ni phyag gdub dang // dpung rgyan skan cha do shal dang // se mo do dang me tog rgyan// byang
156b6(gi): chub yan lag bdun du bshad// dam chos rnams 'byed dbu rgyan rin chen spras// theg pa so so'i chos rnams bye nas ston// de yi rtags su rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan 'di//
156b7(gi): rnal 'byor dbang phyug dngu yi rgyan du gsol// dga' nga yang dag mdzes pa'i me tog 'drang // thams cad ma lus mnyes shing dga' bar byed// de yi rtag pa su me tog
157a1(gi): 'greng ba 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku yi rgyan du gsol// snyan cha lus sems bsil byed shin tu sbyangs// nyon mongs 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal
157a2(gi): tsha gdungs sel// de yi rtags su snyan cha bsil byed 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug snyan gyi rgyan du gsol// do shal ting 'dzin dbus mchog 'phreng bas brgyus//
157a3(gi): ting 'dzani 'bum phrag sna tshogs 'phro bar mdzad// de rtags mgur chu rin chen 'phreng ba 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'greng ba'i rgyan du gsol// rin chen mchog spras
157a4(gi): dpung rgyan dra ba 'di// chos rnams ma lus ma bsgyel sa le mkhyen// de rtags rin chen sna tshogs dpung rgyan 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dpung pa'i rgyun du gsol//
157a5(gi): bdag 'dzin sprul pa sna tshogs se mo do// bdag gis don rtogs gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// de yi rtags su mu tig se mo do// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i rgyan du
157a6(gi): gsol/ phyag gdub sna tshogs las mdzad brtson 'grus ldan// dgos pa'i don rnams myur bar grub par mdzod// de yi rtags su gser gyi gdu bu 'di// rnal 'byor
157a7(gi): dbang phyug phyag gi rgyan du gsol// sku yi stod g.yogs gsung mchog smad dkris dang // thugs kyi ze 'dir yon tan chos kyi gos// mdzad pa las kyi phu rung na bza'
157b1(gi): rnams/ bdag nyid chen po che ba bsgyings par brjid// tshul khrims rnam dag gos kyis brjid pa'i sku// nyon mongs rang rgyal don mdzad rtags su ni// sku mchog che ba'i
157b2(gi): brjid tshul chos gos 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug stod g.yogs rgyan du gsol// 'khor ba'i sems can ma stongs bar du ni// thugs rjes 'gro ba kun la chags pa'i rtags//
157b3(gi): gsung mchog thugs rjes chags pa'i smad dkris 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sham thabs rgyan du gsol// cir yang sa le mkhyen pa'i thugs kyis su// shes bya kun la
157b4(gi): marmongs rtags su ni// thugs mchog shes rab ldan pa'i dar gyi cod pani 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chos gos rgyun du gsol// tsha ba'i yon tan 'gro rnams kun la
157b5(gi): snang dpa' zhing gzi brjid che bas bsgyings rtags su// yon tan che ba'i gzi mdangs na bza' 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku yi rgyan du gsol// gsang sngags
157b6(gi): spyod pa'i don mchog zab mo 'di// snod du ma gyur pa la gsang ba'i rtags// mdzad pa'i 'phrin las kar gyi gsang gos 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku yi rgyan du gsol//
157b7(gi): oM ma'o// dur khrod gsang ba chen po yis// rmad byung zhing lams dga' tshal 'dir// rnal ldan dbang phyug rgyal ba'i rdzas// 'du sang tshogs pa'i rigs 'dzin rnams
158a1(gi): e ma'o dga' mchog bde chen grogs// dam tshig srog gi lu gu rgyud// sprul pa'i gshog drug gra rgyas pa// chos nyid mkha' la lding ba'i rigs//
158a2(gi): de ring phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// dbang phyug yin pas ci bder spyod// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i brda sbra phye// bya ba'i las rnams thams cad kun// brda yis smra zhing brda bar
158a3(gi): bya'o/ gsang mchog lhun grub dkyil 'khor la// tshad med bzhi yis sgo phye zhig/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// zhi zhing bral brtag dka' ste// dbang phyug
158a4(gi): chen po mchog gi lha// rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs 'dzin 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// yang dag bsgrub par dam bcas dang // ting nge 'dzin la gnas
158a5(gi): 'gyur pas// phyag rgya chen por bdag gyur cig/ bde gshegs sems kyi snying po las// ma rtog 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// sangs rgyas pa la dgod pa'i phyir//
158a6(gi): byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas 'di tshe bsgrub bya'i phyir// sku gsum sa la goms par bya// bskal pa bye bar mi 'grub par// tshe gcig 'grub pas
158a7(gi): khyad par 'phags// dang po chos kyi dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyi bsgom// bsgrub med yum gyi b+ha ga la// brjod med sems kyi ngang du gsal// chos
158b1(gi): kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad du yang khyab par bya// brtsal med ma bsgrubs ji bzhin la// kun snang nam mkha'i ngang nyid 'byung // med pa'i rgyu las mngon
158b2(gi): gsal ba// sems kyi rang bzhin ye shes gsal// dam pa'i yi ge a las ni// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar shar// tshad med bsgom las khyad par 'phags//
158b3(gi): sku gsum rang la gnas pas na// thugs rje gyung ba rang shar sku// kun gzhi nyon mongs yid dang sgo// e las nam mkha' mtha' dbus med// yaM las rlung gi dkyil
158b4(gi): 'khor te/ ba las chu yi rba klong 'khyil// su las gser gyi sa gzhi chags// la las rin chen ri ra ba steng // ra las ye shes me 'od 'bar// 'bru lnga'i 'phra bkod yum
158b5(gi): lnga'i rgyu// mkha' dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos lhun grub yum gyi mkha'// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i bzhugs gnas rten// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
158b6(gi): khang / mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i rgya// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang // rig pa'i gdan dang ye shes rgyan// rkang mdo lte ba snying ka sgal// rlung me chus ri rab
158b7(gi): can/ lus snying dang mig sna po l+ye// dbyibs sgo rkang pa na phag glar gan pa// ye shes 'ab ra ba'i ga kha yas mu// seng ge glang na rma bya khyung // nyi zla nga d+ma rin po che//
159a1(gi): gtso dpa 'khor dang rim par gsal// mngon par bya ba ni chub pa dang // zag pa zad par mkhyen pa dang // bar du gcod pa'i chos nges bstan// nges
159a2(gi): par 'byung ba'i lam bstan no// gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pa'i stobs// las kyi rnam smin mkhyen pa'i stobs// mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs// khams ni
159a3(gi): sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs// dbang po mchog dang mchog me na mkhyen// thams cad 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen stobs// ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs// sngon gnas//
159a4(gi): rjes su dran pa mkhyen// shi 'pho skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs// zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang // sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang

159a7(gi): bral bar 'dod// snying rjes de dag bde dang ldan par 'dod// dga' bas bdag don yongs su grub par 'dod// btang snyoms dgra dang zung du mi 'byed 'dod// gnod
159b1(gi): pa nad rnams zhi ba dang // tshe dang longs spyod 'phel rgyas shing // pha rol sems 'gyur dga' ba'i dbang // gnod sbyin phung bar byed pa'o// rin chen sna bdun mdzod
159b2(gi): mig dang // kun tu 'od dang pad+ma spyan// yi ge 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i gdan// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// thugs rje che dang ldan pa yis// dkyil 'khor lnga la
159b3(gi): sogs pa'i 'khor// rdo rje sems dpa' dbus gnas te// kun bzangs yab yum thub drug bcas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// rnam snang yab yum dbus
159b4(gi): gnas te// sa yi snying po sgeg mo dang // byams pa spos me gshin rje gshed// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o// rin 'byung yab yum dbus gnas te// nam mkha'i
159b5(gi): snying po 'phreng ba ma// sgrib sel me tog stobs po che// yon tan dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o// mtha' yas yab yum dbus gnas te// spyan ras gzigs dang glu ma dang //
159b6(gi): kun bzang mar me rta mgrin dpal// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'o// don grub yab yum dbus gnas te// phyag na rdo rje gar mkhan mo// 'jam dpal dri chub
159b7(gi): bdud rtsi 'khyil// 'phrin las dkyil 'khor lnga pa'o// dkyil 'khor lnga dang ldan 'gyur ba// dbus ma bcu la gzhan ma brgyad// chom bu lnga ru gsal bar bsgom//

160a2(gi): nam mkha'i dkyil nas ye shes shar// nges pa las ni rdo rje che// de las bcom ldan rdo rje sems// gsang ba'i yum dang gnyis med 'khril// bar de rang rigs bde
160a3(gi): ba'i cha yi ge hUM du gnas pa yin// pha ma'i chas shas dum bu ni// phyag mtshan rdo rje nyid du grub// chen po lnga las sku grub pa// yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o//
160a4(gi): mi bskyod mthing ka dkar dmar zhal// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen g.yas// drile bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// dbyings phyug g.yas bstan g.yon dril sngo// srog 'dza ni rlung
160a5(gi): ni yi ge hUM// nam ka mu zhes bya ba nyid// rnam shes phung po shes rab dang // zhe sdang chen por rang gnas so// yum gyi gsang ba'i gzhal yas su// byang chub sems
160a6(gi): las skur gsal ba// rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gnyis// spro zhing rang la thim par bya// snang mdzad dkar sngo dmar ba'i zhal// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen g.yas/
160a7(gi): dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// sangs rgyas spyan g.yas bstan g.yon dril bu dkar// sa dang 'dres rlung yi ge oM// sa ni la zhes bya ba nyid// gzugs kyi phung po tshul
160b1(gi): khrims dang // gti mug chen po rang 'byung ngo // rin chen ser sngo dmar ba'i zhal// rin chen rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas// dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// ma ma g.yas
160b2(gi): bstan g.yon dril sngo// chu dang 'grog rlung yi ge sA// chu ni maM zhes bya ba nyid// tshor ba'i phung so ting nge 'dzani// nga rgyal chen po rang 'byung ba// mtha' yas dmar sngo
160b3(gi): dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas// dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon// gos dkar g.yas bstan g.yon dril dmar// 'du shes phung po ye shes dang // 'dod
160b4(gi): chags chen po'i bdag nyid de// me dang drod mnyam yi ge aM// me ni bya zhes bya'o// don grub ldang dkar dmar ba'i zhal// ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas// dril bu rin chen
160b5(gi): pad+ma g.yon// sgrol ma g.yas bstan g.yon dril ldang // rlung gi yi ge rlung ni yi ge ni// rlung ni ta zhes bya ba nyid// phrag dog chen por snang ba'o// 'du shes phung po'i pha
160b6(gi): shes grol// sems ldan lnga bcu rtsa gcig ni// lnga po kun tu 'gro ba ni// reg pa gsum 'dus yongs su gcod// yid la byed pa sems kyis 'jug/ tshor ba dge dang
160b7(gi): mi dge bstan// 'du shes rnam shes don rnam 'byed// sems dpa' skyon yon gnyis ka min// lnga yul so sor nges pa ni// 'dun pa bsamanga'i dngos po gcor//
161a1(gi): mos pa mos yul nges par 'dzin// dran pas 'dris pa ma brjed de// ting 'dzin sems ni rtse gcig pa// shes rab rab tu rnam par 'byed// bcu
161a2(gi): gcig dge ba zhes bya ni// dad pas mngon par yid ches byed// ngo tsha shes pas mtho med// khrel yod kha na ma tho 'joms// ma chags dge rtsa chags gnyen po// zhe sdang
161a3(gi): med pa'i dge rtsa byams// gti mug med pa'i dge rtsa rtogs// brtson 'grus le lo'i gnyen po ste// shi na hu sbyangs pas gnas ngan mig/ bag yod mi chags zhe mi sdang //
161a4(gi): btang snyoms ma chags brtson 'grus gnas// rnam par mi tshe snying rje nyid// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs drug po ni// 'dod chags nyer len lnga zhen chags// khong khro sems can
161a5(gi): kun mnar sems// nga rgyal gus med kun la bgyid// ma rig las 'bras bden mi shes// lta ba lnga la lta ba dang // the tsom yid gnyis za ba dang // nye ba'i nyon
161a6(gi): mongs nyi shu ni// khro bas 'phral du gnod pa byed// khon du 'dzin pas mdud par 'dzin// 'chang bas kha na ma tho 'khyud// 'chags par rlang pos nyer 'bebs nyid//
161a7(gi): phrag dog gzhan la sems khong 'khrugs// ser snas sbyin pa min mthun byed// sgyu ni gzhan baspu yang dag min// g.yo ni bdag gi nyes thabs bzungs// rgyags
161b1(gi): ba phun sum tshogs la dga'// rnam par 'tshe ba mtho 'tshams zhing // ngo tsha med pas bag ma 'dzem// khrel med gzhan la mi 'dzem pa// rmugs pa sems ni klong bde//
161b2(gi): rgod pa sems ni ma zhi ba// ma dad yan ni yid mi ches// le los dge ba sems mi spro// bag med sems ni mi srung ba// brje dngas pa ni don mi gsal// rnam par
161b3(gi): g.yeng ba sems pa 'gro// shes bzhin ma yin mi shes 'jug/ gzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ni// 'gyod pa yid la gcags pa'o// gnyid ni dbang med sems sdud pa//
161b4(gi): rtog pa kun tu 'chol ba'i yid// spyod pa rtogs pa yid brjod pa'o// sems dang mi ldan bcu bzhi ni// thob pa nyid dang ldan pa'o// 'du shes med pa'i snyoms 'jug
161b5(gi): dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang // 'du shes med pa'i rnam shes 'gags// srog gi dbang po las kyis 'phangs// rigs 'thun sems can de lus 'dra//
161b6(gi): skye ba rigs dang 'thun par 'byung // dga' ba de dag rgyun gtan 'gyur// gnas pa de dag rgyun yang chags// mi rtag pa ni rgyud rgyun chad// ming gi tshogs ni bla dgasal//
161b7(gi): tshig gi tshogs ni bye brag tshig/ yi ge'i tshogs ni dbasal byed// so so skye bo 'phag 'a chos med// de lha'i rtsing 'thun 'jug pa yogs/ za nya bzha9shes
162a1(gi): 'phro yum gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil// rlung lnga mnyam nyid yid gsum hUM// chos gsum a ni skye ba med// sa snying dkar gsal myu gu
162a2(gi): dril/ gzugs ni sa le 'gying bag da kar// byams dkar klu shing g.yon pa dril// b+hu pe dkar mo spos khang bsnams// mig la me yi rlung rgyu bas// rgyu bas
162a3(gi): k+Shi ni rnam shes dang // mig gi dbang por snang ba la// hU ni gzugs la spyod pa de// dza ni dpyid dus yin par bshad// nam snying mthing ka ral gri dril// sgra ni
162a4(gi): mA le 'phreng ba sngo// sgrib sel sngon po bo nyi bsnams// puSh+pa sngon mo me tog bsnams// rna bar rlung gi rlung rgyu bas// rab tu rgyu ba rnam shes traM// lha ni rna ba'i dbang
162a5(gi): po yin/ hra ni sgra la spyod pa de// hUM ni dbyar dus yin par bshad// spyan ras dmar skya pad+ma dril// dr-i ni gr-i ti bi wang bsnams// kun bzang snye ma dril bu
162a6(gi): da mar a lo de mar mo mar me bsnams// shin tu rgyu ba sna la gnas// sa ni hri la sangs rgyas gzigs// dri ni glu ma yi ge hri// hU ni kun bzang mar me baM/
162a7(gi): dus ni ston dus yin pa'o// phyag rdor ljang ku rdo rje dril// ro ni ni ra ti gar 'dzani ldang // 'jam dpal ut+pal dril bu ldang // gan d+he ljang ku dri chab bsnams/
162b1(gi): lce la mngon par rgyu ba ste// dza me a phyag rdor gar byed ma// mu a 'jam dpal dri chab nyid// rnam shes dbang po dgun gyi dus// lha dbang phyag na pi wang bsnams//
162b2(gi): lha min thub pa go cha basnrums// shAkya thub pa gseg par bsnams// shakya seng ge po nyi bsnams// yi dgas thub pa rin chen sgrom// chos kyi rgyal po me chu
162b3(gi): bsnams// kri hUM suM br-i k+Sha ye las// sprul sku thub pa chen po drug/ 'dus pa'i rgyu ni nyon mongs drug/ de rkyen pha rol phyin pa drug/ rigs drug rang bzhin yon
162b4(gi): tan drug/ sa boni drug gi yi ge dang // mi shes chen po rnam drug pas// mngon par shes pa drug gis gzigs// gshin rje gshed po thod dbyug bsnams/
162b5(gi): dza dza dkar mo lcags kyu bsnams// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje bsnams// a mo ser na gzhags pa bsnams// ha mgrin dmar nag thod sprul bsnams// lo ga
162b6(gi): dmar mo lcags sgrog bsnams// ba dud rtsi ldang nag rgya gra ma bsnams// pa smi ljang nag dril bu bsnams// yang dag rgyu ba'i rlung las ni// rig pa hUM las
162b7(gi): rtag min dza// rigs byed zhulas chad min nu// reg bya nu de bdag mi dngam// reg shes hUM ni mtshan min to// bar+d+had dbas khon brjod pa'i ljag la// bca
163a1(gi): pa phyag rgya mtshon pa'i rtags// nyon mongs sgrib pa rnam dag pas// nyon mongs mthar byed ces bya la// las kyi sgrib pa rnam thar byed// snyoms
163a2(gi): par 'jug pa'i sgrib mthar byed// shes bya'i sgrib pa mthar byed pas// mthar byed ces su bshad pa yin// nyon mongs sgrib pa rnam dag pas// las kyi sgrib pa rnam
163a3(gi): dag 'gyur// las rnams kun la rnam dag pas// las kyi 'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur// de nas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis// gsung gi dkyil
163a4(gi): 'khor 'di dag gsungs so// a A/ i i/ u u/ r-i rA/ ma laM/ e ai/ o au/ a aH/ ka kha ga b+hA nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyanya/ Ta pra ba d+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/
163a5(gi): pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa hA k+Sha/ shes rab stong pa nyid du gnas// thabs ni snying rje chen po nyid// shes rab yum la thabs ni yab// shes rab
163a6(gi): snod la thabs ni bcud// 'gyur myed shes rab 'gag med thabs// shes rab dbyings la ye shes thabs// shes rab don ni zab pa yin// thabs kyi don ni rgya che'o//
163a7(gi): hUM badz+ra d+hi ga/ mung+ga tu sha ra/ au 'dza na dzig/ la de sha ra hi/ sA rat+na d+h+rig/ maM mo ha ra hi/ aM a ro lig/ byaM ra ga ra hi/ ha pra dzA d+hI ga/ haM badz+ra ra ti/
163b1(gi): k+Shi hi ra dza ya/ TuM ma s+ya sa ma ya stAM// traM a gar+b+hA ya/ tra mA le sa ma ya ho/ hri pad+ma ban+ta ma/ hri gi d+hi ra ho ha/ dzI ma ku ru pa na hri/ a ni tsi rA ho ha/ mi dar ni sA hA/
163b2(gi): dza d+hu pa pra be sha/ thig le ni sa r-i pa ya sA hA/ hUM pu Shad+ba a we sha ya/ hUM sA hA ra tsa ya sA hA/ baM di paM su ki ni/ mu shri aM raM ga ya sA hA/ haM gan+d+he tsat+si ho/ hU hUM hUM/
163b3(gi): badz+ra tsat+te au/ a a A/ badz+ra b+ha tra sa man+ta a/ oM mu ni kring sa hA/ oM mu ni hu~M truM sa hA/ oM mu ni sr-i sA hA/ oM mu ni bru swA hA/ oM mu ni k+ShaM sA hA/ e mu na ye sA hA/
163b4(gi): hUM ya man ta kri ta phaT/ badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi sho ri dza la ni hU phaT/ hU bi g+hA na na ta kr-id phaT/ ra tA d+ha ra ma nA kro d+hi sha ri dze la ni hUM phaT/ hUM pad+ma ta kr-i he phaT/ pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA
163b5(gi): kro d+hi shA ri dza kha ni hU~M phaT/ hUM bra dz+nyA na ha kri ta leT/ A~M karma d+ha ra many+dzu kro d+haM shA ri dzA la ni hUM phaT/ bskyed pa rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// phung po lnga ni sangs rgyas gang na/
163b6(gi): phung po lnga la byin gyis rlobs// 'byung ba lnga ni rig ma'i gdan// ye shes lnga dang 'byung lngar rtogs// mige sogs skye mched dang sa ma ni// byang chub sems dpa'
163b7(gi): yab yum gang na// rang rgyud bkra shes 'phrin las byed// b+ha mo mchod pa byed pa'o// nyon mongs drug po thub pa'i gdan// dbying ba dang ye shas kun bzang de// rigs
164a1(gi): drug thugs rjes 'bras bur 'dren// yan lag lus khams sgo ba'i gdan// khro bos bgegs pa skrod 'phrin las mdzad// sgoms tshan
164a2(gi): med bzhir byin rlobs// rtsa nas sku yi dbyings su gsal// khams kyi bdud rtsi rnam pa bde// yi ge rang bzhin stong zhing gsal// rlung ni rang bzhin khrung 'jug byed
164a3(gi): rnal 'byor sgom par gang byed pa// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// ye nas mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas// de phyir rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed// oM
164a4(gi): mahA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA at+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA sa man+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha At+ma ko&ha/ oM ma hA pra ta be k+Sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa
164a5(gi): b+ha ba at+ma ko ha/ oM ma hA kr-i ha a nu ta na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma koHhaM/ oM sarba ta thA g+he ta kA ya badz+ra se b+ha ba at+ma koHha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badz+ra sA b+ha wa at+ma koH
164a6(gi): oM sarba ta thA ga ha tsit+ta badz+ra sA b+ha wa At+ma koHhaM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ha ma hA a nu rA ga na dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+ha wa ang+gi koHhaM/ oM sarba ta thA gA ta ma hA pU dza badz+ra sA b+ha wa it+ma
164a7(gi): ko&ha/ sangs rgyas bde gshegs bla ma yis// rigs ma yum gyi bum pa'i chu// bdag la dbang bskur yid ma bstim// de phyir dam tshig dkyil 'khor bskyed//
164b1(gi): gsang bsku yi byin rlabs dang // gsung ni shes rab ye shes la// thug pa ni bde ba chen po de// yum gyi chags pa rjes chags mchod// gsang sngags 'di ni yon
164b2(gi): tan las// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di bcu yis// sku dang gsung thugs mi zad pa'i// rgyan gyi 'khor lo ra ba sgrub cing // phyi dang nang gi 'dod pa yis// yon tan
164b3(gi): mchod nas las rnams bsgrubs// bsgrubs pa'i rnal 'byor bskal bzang la// rig pa'i dbang lnga bum pas rdzogs// dbang bzhi las mang sogs bsgom pa'i//

164b5(gi): sa ma ya dza/ au e h+ye hi b+ha ga wa na/ ma hA ka ru ni ka/ dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya k+ta/ dza hU baM ho/ pra be sha ya a/ pra be sha ya a A/ pra be sha ya a a/ a be

164b7(gi): ma gra dzA ye/ oMn ma sams gis m+b+ha/ bi sho kru bar+dz+dza/ sarba cad la ud ka rbe/ bla ngan hri yang geg na la ny+dza/ na mang du kya / ki rba bar u
165a1(gi): sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi nu/ sa ma yo sa su/ sarba ta thA gas/ sarba mahA mu ka mid dz+nyAn+da/ oM a hU~M/ rakat+tA tsisi~M gur+d+ha ni tsu s+yAhA/ shrI badz+ra

165a6(gi): dang shes rab ldan gyur na// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// 'bru rnams bsnol te rtse sprad pas// bde ba chen po 'byin pa'i rgya// rnam par grol ba mtshon pa'i

166a1(gi): dam tshig phyag rgya bzhi// yab ni phyag rgya chen po'i sku// mkha' gsang byin brlabs las kyi rgya// 'khor bskyed chos nyid las mi bda'// gsal

167b1(gi): lta bu la/ phrag pa'i lhun ni mdzes par grub// phrag sor shin du rgyas pa la// ro yang thams cad bro ba'i mchog/ n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab// dbu'i spyi gtsug dang

168b7(gi): Ta he he ru ru ka hU~M tsu phaT swAhA/ oM hr-i swing sa tsi la ni tsu hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM hU hu ho badz+ra yur+ya hu~M hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hUM hU ma tra ba ni hU hUM phaT swA na/ oM bad ti de d+ha pa ra ma sha n+tu/
169a1(gi): hu phaT swA hA/ oM phaT phaT tsa na ta ki hU~M nu phaT swA hA/ phung po lnga po thams cad kun// dpa' bo drug pa yang dag gnas// dbang po dpa' mor
169a2(gi): gnas pa yin// lus dang ngag yid rdo rjer gnas// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba 'di dag gsungs so// zhi bas mchod pas mnyes
169a3(gi): pa dag yan lag mkhas pas dbul bar bya// dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pas khyab pa'i sku// spun 'dren gshegs su gsol bar mi dmigs kyang // thugs rje'i

169a5(gi): spyan 'dren cing // bka' yi lcags sgrog pho nyas gnas stobs la// bad gshegs dril bu mas ni rnam grol dgyes pa bskyed// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la//

169a7(gi): mnga' yang // ye shes pang du mi gnyis gcig pas na// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor 'dir// mi g.yo dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/
169b1(gi): dbyings kun rang bzhin rnam par dag pa las// thugs rje'i dbang gis sprul pa'i skur bzhengs pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// rang snang sna tshogs
169b2(gi): rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i ye shes kyis// srid pa rgya mtsho'i mtha' yas kun// kun bzang mchod
169b3(gi): sprin mchog tu rol// srid rtsa dbyings su shar ba'i mchod rdzas de// de nyid ma bcos yum gyi thig ler shar// chags yul bde ba'i 'od dpung dmar la 'khyil//
169b4(gi): nyon mongs dbyings su bstim phyir arga ba zhes// 'byung ba lnga nyid ye shes bcud shar ba// snang srid mdangs ldan rang rig me tog gsal// gnyis med ngang las
169b5(gi): kha dog cir yang gsal// 'bras bu bcud ldan me tog 'od dpung 'bar// ma bcos rang byung dam rdzas spos mchog 'di// kha dog dbyibs gas la dbang po chem
169b6(gi): byed pa/ stong gsum dri ba sung gang ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// 'bar bkri shangs la mchod pas mnyes gyur cig/ snod bcud dbyer med yab yum dag pa la// 'bras bu
169b7(gi): rang byung ye shes me shar nas// mtha' dbus med par gsal ba'i 'od 'bar 'di// 'khor ba'i yun khang gco ma phyi leb su gsol// gnyis mad mkha da
170a1(gi): dag pa'i pho brang du// nyon mongs spyon bral dag pa byang chub sems// cir yang 'char phyir dri yi 'od dpung 'bul// nal gyi dbyings su thim nas
170a2(gi): mnyes gyur cig/ nam mkha' kun bzang dbyings nas cir yang 'byung // 'byung ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar// lha bshos rin chen yid bzhin longs spyod
170a3(gi): 'di sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du thim par bya zhes// sgra yi dngos por snang ba yang // yod par ma yin shin tu grag/ sgra yis rab tu tshim gyur yang // sgra nyid
170a4(gi): rang bzhin gang yang med// sgra 'byung rang bzhin mchod pa 'bul// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa'i rdzas// rtsa brgyad stong
170a5(gi): la sbyar ba'i sman// rA sa ya na la sogs rdzas// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyu drug sems can kun sgrol ba'i//
170a6(gi): dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// bcom ldan rigs lnga yab yum dang // byang chub sems dpa' lham dral dang // kun bzang yab yum thub drug dang // sgo skyong
170a7(gi): yab yum mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la// tshangs pa 'phrul gyi
170b1(gi): dngos grub sprul du gsol// lce yi rdo rje dam tshig la// rdo rje can gyi hU~M bsgoms te// mthe bong dang ni srin lag rtses// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// bdud
170b2(gi): rtsi rnam lnga sbyar ba la// myangs na byang chub gsum thob 'gyur// dri med rnam dag nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// khog rtog mtshan ma mang po sprin phung bzhin//
170b3(gi): ye shes nyi zer 'od kyis rab bsal phyir// dag pa'i don du rtogs nas mchod par bgyis// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa
170b4(gi): lnga chos nyid skye ba med dbyings las// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'bul// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid
170b5(gi): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad// dri med mi g.yo mnyam nyid dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon
170b6(gi): han shin tu phra ba'i cha yang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' la yang 'gran du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can
170b7(gi): rnamamakha dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// dag tu drim med pa zhugs rje'i du bam las 'gyur // smon lam 'grub pa mgag pa meda'i chos nyid can/
171a1(gi): 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid drug su rnam par mdzad// tshad med chad dang bral ba shin tu yongs/
171a2(gi): mu rdzogs pa'i// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'bang dam pa brnyes gyur yang // khams gsum rnams ma dngos grub stsol mdzad pa'i// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi gas
171a3(gi): 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma ho/ shin tu bzang ba'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go 'phang mchog brnyes pa'i// khams gsum
171a4(gi): kun la dngos grub mchog rnams nges rtsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la
171a5(gi): 'dzin sangs rgyam tham sa cad kyig// yang dag sa na na // rgyun gcig can na brjid byas kyang // pangs rgyam thams ca 'gyu pa
171a6(gi): de nas rgyal ba thams cad gnyis su med par bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// bsnyen pa'i don du 'di dag bya// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rdo rje
171a7(gi): sems dpa'i thugs ka nyid// gsang ba'i sngags don bsgom par bya// de bzhin yum la bsgom pa dang // rigs bzhi yab yum bsgom pa dang // sems dpa' zla
171b1(gi): ba'i 'od bcas dang // kun bzang yab yum sngags don bsgom// thub pa pad+ma gser gyi 'od// sgo ba nyi ma mthing ka'i 'od// o dang a de nu swa bcas// dkyil
171b2(gi): 'khor gnyis kyi tshul bzung bsgom// AM bo d+hi tsa he ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+ha hu A/ mchog dang thun mong gang 'dod pa// smon la ma rab hu gdab par bya// ye nas
171b3(gi): mnyam nyid chos sku dag pa la// ma ri ge dbang gis sgros dang skur ba nya ba ste// de zlogs don phyir rgyal ba'i dam mnos nas// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thugs dang ci 'gal
171b4(gi): ba thugs rje tsho mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol// ye shes rgya mtsho sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba// de nyid du ni
171b5(gi): bdag la stsol// zhes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ched du gsungs so// de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa
171b6(gi): thams cad kyis/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams la yang dag pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor bsgom pa 'di dag gsungs so// mi dmigs chos nyid de bzhin gshegs// rang bzhin
171b7(gi): 'od gsal kun du snang // a nyid sbubs dkyil 'khor 'thung // e ya baM su khaM ra bru// bru las ni chen gzhal ya khang / seng ge glang d+harma bya he'u// dkyil
172a1(gi): 'khor bsam las lhun gyis grub/ phyag rgya ban las spyan drangs nas// rang snang bzhi bcu phyag 'tshal zhing // sems can don phyir nan han mchog
172a2(gi): bskyed cing // ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang // mi dmigs don du dngos grub mchog gi rnams// bdag la stsal zhing brtan par bzhugs su gsol//
172a3(gi): sku mdog zhal ni rnam par sgyur// sku ni gar stabs glog 'gyur ba// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa 'bul// mchod pa zhes dbang dang dngos grub stsol// spo sa dang me tog
172a4(gi): mar me dri// bdud rtsis mchod la dngos grub blang // arga me tog bdud spos dang // mar me dri che ba bshos dang sgra// phyi nang gsang bar sbyar ba rnams// bdag
172a5(gi): dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul// rgyal ba'i sras dang thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// dngos grub stsol dang gsol bar mi dmigs kyang // sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis
172a6(gi): dngos grub stso la// tshogs dang gtor ma pany+tsa a mr-i te// s+thA na g+ha na la sogs ci 'byor pa// ting 'dzin yid kyis dmigs pa'i mchod pa 'di// rgyal ba rgya mtsho
172a7(gi): rnams kyis bzhes su gsol// chos sku skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la// gzugs sku sgyu mar skye ba'i skur bstan nas// thugs rje kun la khyab pa'i don byed pa//
172b1(gi): rgyal ba bzhi bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gnyis med pa sgrub don du// spyi dang khyad par bsnyen 'dzab 'bul// de nas zhun mar gcig pa yis// bsgrub pa
172b2(gi): zab mo yang dag bshad// de bzhin nyid du kun tu snang // rgyu yi ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// yi ge 'bru lnga'i 'gro 'du las// nam mkha' rlung dang bdud rtsi mtsho//
172b3(gi): rin chen sa gzhi ri rab steng // ye shes me 'od kun tu gsal// zu 'phros rin chen gzhal yas khang // seng ga nyi zla pad+ma'i sbeng // yid bzhin rin chen gdan rgyan
172b4(gi): gsal// nam mkha'i dkyil nas ye shes shar// 'phro 'dus gsal bar gyur pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum bsgom// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur cig
172b5(gi): sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// ting 'dzin gsum po brtan byas shing // rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas// chos kyi phyag rgya chen por bsgom//
172b6(gi): lam kun ma nor kun bsgoms yin// stong nyid ye shes me long las// ma skyes mi 'gag gzugs snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' snang ji bzhin du// dbyings las
172b7(gi): phyag rgyar gshegs su gsol// sangs rgyas kun 'dus mi bskyong yang yum btso// rang snang thug pa rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// legs par bzhugs su gsolan ni/
173a1(gi): yab yum gnyis su med pa la// kar dbyangs mchod pa 'di 'bum gyis// ma shes pa la las dngos grub stsal// bdud rtsi mchod pas dngos grug

173a3(gi): gdab par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung gal po chen po las// chos nyid zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ brtag pa dgu pa'o// /
173a4(gi): de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga' bdag khro bo 'byung ba'i rgyud ru dra chen po 'di dag gsungs so// rtag par rang rgyud ru dra ni// mos pa rjes su bzhag shes pa/
173a5(gi): skyes bu yul gyi 'dod pas gdungs// log pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs lnga// brtags pa'i dbang gis gzung 'dzin du// zhen pa'i dbang gis 'dod yon lnga// brtags
173a6(gi): pas ji bzhin don la sgrib// nyon mongs dbang gis gzung 'dzin skyon// bdag dang bdag gis 'dzin pas na// khams gsum 'khor ba'i grong khyer brgyud//
173a7(gi): sngon tshe 'das pa'i dang po la// sangs rgyas srid pa'i sgron mar byung // slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo yis// slob ma dge slong nag po la// gsang sngags mtha'
173b1(gi): drug bstan pa las// don de steng du ma gyur cing // log pa'i lung du bshad pa yis// dmyal ba yi dgas kha 'khor te// tha mar las kyi srin por skyes/
173b2(gi): khams gsum 'khrug pa'i bdud du 'gyur// dang po gang las 'byung bas med// tha mar gang du 'gog med la// bdag gzhan 'dzin pas sngon smin te// skad cig bde
173b3(gi): dang thar pa med// ma rtogs zhen pa'i 'gro ba dag/ zas la dug gis btab pa'am// ri dgas smig rgyu snyegs pa ltar// sdug bsngal nyid las thar pa med// sprul
173b4(gi): pa 'dod pa skong ba yi// bsam pa yid dang 'thad shes pa// sna tshogs me tog gling byin 'dra// las dang smon lam mthun dbang gis// byin brlabs gang ldan bla ma la//
173b5(gi): gdug pa ru tra 'dul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas 'dus nas bka' 'gros bcad// cho 'phrul bskul ba byas nas ni// las bzhi rdo rje skos la btab// rigs nges dad
173b6(gi): ldan shes rab can// las dang thugs rjes 'phrad rung la// rang bzhin dag pa'i las dbang gis// dug gis dug nad bsal ba ltar// dug lnga gzung 'jani 'dod
173b7(gi): bain+da/ ma lus thabs kyis 'dul bar 'dul// sprul pa'i khrag 'thung cir yang snang // la la 'di ltar snang bar 'gyur// mthong nag dkar dang dmar ba'i dbu/
174a1(gi): rdo rje zhing mchog kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu ba na d+ha ba su zhags// yum dang gnyis su med par 'khril// yang ni 'di ltar snang bar 'gyur// ba skal pa me

174a3(gi): pa gsum na thogs pa ni// g+hi ri'i dbyug pa chen po dang // rdo rjes dkrug cing 'thung ba dang // khyung gi khra chen spor ba'o// g.yon gyi gsum na thogs pa ni//

174a7(gi): yum dang gnyis su med par 'khril// yang ni 'di ltar snang bar 'gyur// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar smug nag dbus// g.yas kyi dang po ti ra la// bar ma rdo rje ban
174b1(gi): g.yon gyi dang po rgyu nags la// bar ma khyung ki khri chen po// tham s+thi ra'i blo snying 'dren// yum dang gnyis su med pa'o// yang ni sprul pa 'dir snang ba/

174b3(gi): rnams skra la rdzogs// yang ni sprul pa 'dod pa skong // g.ya sa dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthong nag/ rdo rje khyung dang zhing dbyug g.yas// dung chen zhing dbyug zhags

176a1(gi): gzung bar bya// oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badz+ra a b+hi Sha ke/ kye kye dpal ldan rdo rje che ge mo hU o a/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// phyag na

176a6(gi): ma/ bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye// mi phyed phyag rgya rab tu bsgrubs// rdo rje'i sbyor bas yang dag 'byung // bdag nyid chen mo khyod ci bzhin// mnga' bdag la yang
176a7(gi): de bzhin mdzod// 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi tshogs nang du// bying bskyabs med bdag la skyobs// ji ltar rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub sras la dbang bskur
176b1(gi): lhar bdag gi gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// sems kyi rgyun gyi dbang bskur ro// mgon po sprul pa'i ru tra khyod// mtshan ni he ru ka dpal nyid// bde ba bzhi

176b3(gi): dpa' che// zung la mchod pa rtag tu gyis// khyed zhabs pad+ma'i bka' drin gyis// gtso bo dbang bskur rnam gsum thob// de ring rnam pa bzhi pa yang //
176b4(gi): gtso bo bdag la bka' drin stsol// ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing // rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu// rdul bral mtha' ste zhi ba nyid// khyod nyid kyang ni bdag gi

176b7(gi): med nyid// ngo bo mi 'gyur bcos su med// mthun dang mi mthun byung tshor ni// rgyu rkyen gnyis po dang bral bar// ngo bo mthong bas ro shes gsal//
177a1(gi): phyi khyad med de bzhin nyid// ma bcos lhun grub ru tra ni// klong yang snying por chub shes pas// nam mkha'i ngang nas 'byung 'jug med/

177a3(gi): skyes bu la// sgo gsum mdzad pa phyogs riges med// des na lung thob byin brlabs ldan// de phyir 'dul byed ru tra yi// bsgrub pa phyi rab sa rnams don bshad//
177a4(gi): gru gsum rtsang thod me dpung 'bar// thod pa'i nang du ling ga'i gzugs// gru gsum brnag pa zla gam ste// mu khyud yab yum gling drug 'khor// nyer bzhi spu
177a5(gi): gro thod pas mdzes// gang ba sgrub lha yi lto bar 'khor// rta lug bya khyi nag po yab// mon dang nal snying yum gyi rta// gtor ma dpal bshos dang nag mda'
177a6(gi): bdud ni gri mda' bshos bu nag/ srog bdag bshos bu mda' lhar dkar// ma mo rma sha shu drug dug/ klu sman sna tshogs dkar gtor glu// ba tsan la gri
177a7(gi): mda' bshos bu dmar// za 'og mda' dang rdo rje legs// mgon po bang thod stag la bcibs// nag mo dre'u zhen thod pa can// bdud nag khram zhags rta nag
177b1(gi): bcibs// srog bdag 'khor lo dr-i rta da ka ra// mo nag dre'u rta kha tra thod// klu ljang sbrul sbal chu srin zho na// ba tsan dmar da ra ma dung sbrul rta dmar// rdor snyeng
177b2(gi): ljang se ra sgra p+la yin// AM badz+ra hri le gtubs ni la ma pa sa u ne u ni hri da ya/ badz+ra yag sha kA la/ ma hA g+hA na g+hu hri hri da ya/ badz+ra ging ka ra ra ga sha ka li
177b3(gi): ma ma mu khram khrag la mu sha hI/ dun ru dra ru thu ma b+ha/ ra tsa tsa pa la a shug me/ ma tra ga ra kra nag mo ting laM b+h+yo/ na ga ng+gu ti ne ga du ru sha la tsat+pa sha dza ya/
177b4(gi): badz+ra tri na sa du kha thu tI/ srog la thu ma ri la/ tsa la breng shag/ tsan+da thun rmugs/ khrag thibs rbad/ mi sheg rbad/ nri hur thu dza khram rba da pho phyogs
177b5(gi): dgra bla'i mtshon cha deng // gri rgod pa tsan gyi rim pa dang // mdze nad klu yi lto bar gnas// rims dal khrag ni ma mos 'bebs// 'thib na da drag po bdud yin
177b6(gi): lasmyo 'bog rgyal por shes pa nyid// kun gyi rtse ba ru tra nyid// yab dang yum la yang dag gnas// mun nag dmag 'dren zhub can 'od// ba na d+he g.yag
177b7(gi): dre'u mun nag bdud// byas pa s+ya shar seng ge ging // bud med ma sring ma mo nyid// sbal myong mtsho dang sbrul ni klu// rta dmar khra 'ug skyes pa pa can//
178a1(gi): zhang blon skrag skrag spyad khu legs// snying po gang yin brda dang sbyar// dur khrod pho brang lcags mkhar nas// ru tra nag po yab yum gtso// 'khor drug
178a2(gi): 'khor bar byed pa nyid// khrag dug thun dang bcas par khrag/ bdud yul kha rag sgo dgu nas// bdud mgon ri neg spungs pa yis// 'thibs nad sna tshogs bdag po yin// /
178a3(gi): rgya yul nam mkha' phyad chod nas// rgyal 'gong 'ong lha dkar po yis// shel mkhar nang nas smyo 'bog bdag/ mang yul byang shar mtsho glong na// ma mgon rdo rje bde chen gyis//
178a4(gi): rims dang da la yams bdag mor gnas// klu yul na rag gsing sngon na// klu gnyen srog gcod mgon po nag/ mdze dang shu ba phol 'bras mkhyen// btsan yul zangs
178a5(gi): thang dmar po nas// btsan mgon btsan rje lag rings kyis// bslang thabs kyi rgod las rnams yin// shar lho rin chen thang dkyil nas// gang mgon rdo rje legs
178a6(gi): pa yis// nad kyang gzer thabs pho log mkhyen// dpal ldan mahA ka la ni// g.yas ser g.yon ldang mthing nag dbus// g.yas kyi dang po beng chen la// bar ma
178a7(gi): rdo rje rtse mo lnga// tha ma gnam lcags phur ba 'dril// g.yon gyi dang po dung dmar gsol// bar ma dbyug thos myos par byed// tha ma dug sbrul zhags pa 'phen/
178b1(gi): oM badz+ra pA ni a d+hi pa ta ye/ badz+ra ma hA ka la du na ya/ king ka ra kro d+ha ni tr-ing / g+ha na g+hu hi patra dun/ badz+ra yag sha hriN d+ha sha/ ma ma trag nyed nag sham// tig
178b2(gi): ka li tsa mun ke/ yag sha nag mo tsinya sha ma/ dgra bo'i srog la breng shig chad/ tsit+ti byung / ra ga ta thibasarbad/ rtsal thang thang thum ril rbad/ nri hur thums
178b3(gi): dzadun dun shag/ srog la dun sprugs myags khrims rbad/ rtsi ga ro myags long shag chad/ snying khrag tshal pa yam ling zad thum ri la dun b+h+yob+h+yo/ skam
178b4(gi): pa dza na na/ 'bru bdun dril gtor yab yum sngags// rab nyugasang bar bya ba'o// ru tra rnam pa bzhi 'dod de// gnas lugs rgyu yi ru tra dang // gol
178b5(gi): rkyen lam gyi ru hA dang // gol bsngon 'byung ru tra dang // gol 'gro rjes 'jug ru tra yin// rgyu yi ru tra rnam pa gnyis// grol lam lta bas thabs lam
178b6(gi): dbang dang por kun kyang ru trar skyes// pha ma bla ma g.yog dang bcas// rang nyid ru tAr skyes pa'i dus// mi dge bcu spyad ngan song gsum// las sman thams
178b7(gi): cad rgyal pos 'dren// dbang bskur sangs rgyas sar 'dzin no// thab la lam gnyis bsgreng 'og so// rnam tsakra chos kyi gnas// dbus kyi rnying ngo rgyal 'khor nyid/
179a1(gi): zhor 'byung dpon g.yog nyon mongs sgo// rtsa bzhi ga dam ngag gol ba yis// rigs drug sa bon lus las 'khyams// rang gnas bde gshegs
179a2(gi): phung po lnga// bka' sgros rtog rdzogs sangs rgyas gcad// dug lnga ye shes rang du gsad// rang gnas dkyil 'khor dbang thob ste// bde gshegs yi ge 'bru gsum
179a3(gi): po mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lo mthong // ni ra ma tsakra'i pho brang na// snying po a ni rgyal 'khor nyid// k+Sha ni dge slong nag po ste// de yi drod ni yog por 'gyur//
179a4(gi): bde ba bzhi ni bstan pa'i lam// ma rtogs rigs drug yi ge 'khor// ba sam gtan o dang gzugs med a// rdo rje pad+ma'i sangs rgyas rnams// 'byung bzhi
179a5(gi): rlung 'dul bka' bgros bcad// bde ba mchog pa de bral ba de dang // lhan cig skyes pade dkyil 'khor btsug/ zung 'jug cu gi sar gnas so//
179a6(gi): gal rkyen lam gyi ru tra ni// byi ba mu stegs lam song ba/ sngags dang mtshan nyid ma rtogs pas// thams cad ru trar gol bar 'gro// lha chen la sogs chung
179a7(gi): ba dang / lha sbyin la sogs 'bring po dang // ru tra la sogs rab tu bshad/ gol ba sngon 'byung ru tA la// 'dod lugs gnyis dang bshad thabs
179b1(gi): gnyis nyams su blang lugs rnam pa gnyis// mthar phyin dbyer med gcig tu gnas// dam pa khyed la gsal bar bshad// rang brgyud phyi yi ru tra 'di//
179b2(gi): bden pa yin nam bden pa min// sprul pa nang gi ru tra 'di// bden nam mi bde na spyad pa dang // gang rung gcig tu grub ma 'grub// gnyis ka bden par
179b3(gi): blo dang sbyar// bshad thabs phyi nang gnyis po yang // byo yi ru hA rang rgyud pa// sgra ni ci bzhin bshad pa de// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu gsum// bka'
179b4(gi): bgros bka' bcad pa tul ba gsum// sge ba skrangs dbang bskar lung bstan ga su ma// rgyu ni gsang ba'i bka' bsgo log/ dziji bzhin nyid de ma bcos na//
179b5(gi): dngos po bzhi la gnas bcas kyang // nem mkha' la ni sproni deng sa bzhin// rnal 'byor de nyid dam pa'i lam// slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo bshad//
179b6(gi): rkyen ni yang dag don ma rtogs// sgra bzhin rnal 'byor brgyad 'gyur ba// ngag rtsub ma byin len pa dang // mi tshangs spyod dang srog gcod pa'o// 'bras bu
179b7(gi): ngan song khab rgyur nas// tha ma las kyis srin por skyes// khams g.yul pa lus dbang du 'grus// dus gsum pangs rgyas bkarang gros nas/ 'dzin
180a1(gi): las gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur// zhi dang rgyas pas mi 'dul bas// dbang dang drag pos 'dul bar bshad// ngag gi dbang phyug

180a3(gi): yang zhal mthong nas// dbang bzhi bskur nas phyi ma'i tshe// thal ba'i dbang por lung yang bstan// srog snying phul nas sangs rgyas kyis// bstan srungs
180a4(gi): ma hA ka la nyid// lha srin sde brgyad dpung dang bcas// ma dang mkha' 'gro dpa' bo bcas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor grogs su bskor// dngos su sangs rgyas
180a5(gi): mdzad pas na// rang rgyud phyi yi ru tra yod// thams cad gdug pa mi 'dul ba sa// sprul nas 'dul bar gyur pas na// sprul pa'i ru tra yod pa yin//
180a6(gi): nang gi ru tra rnams bshad pa// sems nyid bla ma rgyal ba'i 'khor// bdag 'dzin slob ma dge slong nag/ dug lnga phyi yi skye ba blangs// smad 'tshong ma yi bu
180a7(gi): ru skyes ma ro rtsa ru bu bzhag shing // rang lus dug gsum shing bu la// nga bdag dbu rtsal grags pas// kun gzhi bag chags ma sha za// tsha grang
180b1(gi): nad dang sngags gzer gyis// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du brdzus// bdud kyi rgyal po ngargyal skyes// lang ka yul gyi ril babs// srin po'i rgyal po dbang du byas
180b2(gi): lte ba'i k+Sha yig gtum mo sbyor// lha yi sde dpon ka ru btul// tshogs dang mthong ba'i lam du sgyur// lam sbyangs rang lus thod pa'i mkhar// lam du bka'
180b3(gi): bgros de bcad do// de bzhin byar so ba ni// mthong lam shes rab skye ba'o// sras bzhog sras gtam 'dom 'thungs pa// sprul pas dngos po bdud rtsi
180b4(gi): byam la sogs mag par 'gyur// tshogs brgyad yul brgyad byin ci log/ chags pa dgang rgyus bdag su rmongs// rten gzhon 'gyod dang gzhan pa yos/
180b5(gi): stobs bzhis sreg dang sbyangs pa byas// de dag thams cad lam lnga las// ji ltar gnas pa 'dir rtogs bya// de ltar bstan pa'i ru tra de// brtsan thabs
180b6(gi): dag tu sangs rgyas sam// 'on te rims 'jug sangs rgyas yin// ji ltar yin pa nges shes byos// zhes pa thabs ldan dag gis dris// gsang bdag rdo rje
180b7(gi): 'dzin pas bshad/ go 'gro rjes 'jug ru tra gsum// bzhi las gol ba'i ru tra ne// mu stegs theg pa'i lam pa yin// d+hu nas gong ba'i ru ni/
181a1(gi): mtshan nyid sdom rnams su sbyin bdun// 'bras bu zhom ba'i rutrU na// gsang sngags lta ba log pa yin// thos byasam sgron dgas ma
181a2(gi): bcad cing // don la nges pa ma skyes na// srin po ru hA'i gnas su lhung // zhes ni gsang ba'i bdag po yis// dam pa'i rigs can lnga po la// khrag 'thung
181a3(gi): gal po'i lung 'di ru// rA t+yA sbyi yo rnam par gsungs// de nas lus ngag yid gsum la// bdag tu lta ba'i ru tA gzhom// de nas dur khrod bdag po dang // phyag
181a4(gi): da na na/ / sa rdzu 'dzini ma/ // semam sa smra sa /
181a5(gi): snang dang ma skyes phyogs rigs med// stegs bu'i steng nas chos 'byung na// thal ba'i gdong gsum sna yon po// kha gtang bya rog spyang ku g.yas// sdigs
181a6(gi): mdzub khra dang 'ug pa can// bdag nyid phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan// sku gsum che ba'i nga rgyal can// ma sdang gzugs ni bsgom par bya// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bkug
181a7(gi): la bstim// dzaHhUM baM ho/ ma tAM ka ru tra dzaM dza hU/ kha tong kha ru tra/ a kar sha ru tA/ hU shar phyogs lam sgo'i 'jig rten nas// yang dag thal bar gcod byed pa//
181b1(gi): 'byung po gtum po nga rgyal can// khyod ni sgrub pa kun la sgrib// yang dag shes rab ye shes kyang // khungs rtsad rtsa bcad bdag las byung // bdaga' dzin bdag gir
181b2(gi): rtogs pa de// bdag med stong pa'i stobs kyis gzhom// bdag 'dzan thabs stobs brtson 'grus kyis// gnas ngan len pa'i ded dpon byed// de nyid rtag pa
181b3(gi): yin pas na// bdag med stong pa'i tho bas gzhom// oM sa man ti ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya hU phaT/ lag cha phrogs pas gzi brjid bral// kha TA rtse
181b4(gi): gsum phyag rgya bcas// ma tang bya ba'i sdig can khyod// sngon yang dpal chen he ru kas// bsgral nas dur khrod chen por mdzad// de yang rnal 'byor dbang phyug ngas//
181b5(gi): bsgral nas dur khrod chen por bya'o// dza hU baM ho/ shri he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba du Sh+ma na sa ma ya mu tA/ pra ban tsakra hU na hU na hU phaT/ kha TA brgyab pas e nang du// nyi zla
181b6(gi): sdong rgan ltar 'gyel bas// rjes su 'jug la gdams par gnang // ro bdag drag po chen po ni// ro yi nya la skabs gan rgyal de// g.yon gyi zhabs kyi ru
181b7(gi): badz+ra ro ni spobs kyis mnan nas ni// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstad// rkangang bya ru brtan// ki zhabs ni galas pa yis// maT ra
182a1(gi): ka mnan nas kyang // thar byed chen po'i 'ging stabs kyis// mu trang gi ni snying gar mnan// lag pa g.yas pa'i khrig ma la// khra dang spyang
