182a4(gi): rgyud/ yum gyi mkha' la sU du gsal// mi ha de ba ru tA dza dza sU// blo srungs pa sgrim la gnas sbar ro// log pa bruM las gyur pa yi// bsgrubs pa'i gzhal yas
182a5(gi): khang pa ni// phyag rgya spel bsnol sdigs mdzub pasgreng // bruM badz+ra kha ta li pra pe sha phaT/ sgo phye hU hU lta bas zhugs// badz+ra a ha sgo bcad nas// hU hu khang pa me dpung

182a7(gi): bcol spyod pas 'phrin las rnam pa bzhis// bro yis yang dag sbyang bar bya// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// shar phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// dngul
182b1(gi): la ma da kar po'i shing rnams la// rtse mo rgya mdud rtse zur zlu ma// rked pa rgya mdu gzhal yas khang // ngos la zhi ba'i lha bkod de// mkhas pas bsgoms shing

182b3(gi): pas rim par sbyar bar bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung gi gal po chen po zhes bya ba'i lung las/ dur khrod bdag po ma trang ru hA'i man ngag bshad pa ste

182b5(gi): pa rgyan gyis 'khor los 'gengs par byed pa 'di gsungs so// lhag par brtags kyis kun mtshan nas// khrag 'thung chen mo bsgrub par bya// slob dpon yi dem

183a4(gi): sham thabs mnab gsol bas// dpa' brjid mnyen lkug sbrul gyi chun po 'di// dpa' brjid che bas bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// mnyen lkug yan lag 'khrim
183a5(gi): bas sbrul gyi tshul// dug lnga dbang sdud 'jigs tshul rgyan du bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku la brgyan par bya// thod pa skam rlon dza ril 'phreng ba 'di// khro bos
183a6(gi): sku gsum thob pa'i dbang rtags yin// theg pa gsum gyis chags pa'i dbang rtags de// dug gsum sems can bla med sgrol ba'i dbang // rnal 'byor dbang
183a7(gi): byuphyug chen po'i sku yi rkyen// chags pa'i tshul gyis rag+ha'i thig le 'di// sgyu la rol pas don du skul gzhag/ ma chags pad+ma spyan gyis mnan te// de phyir thugs rjes
183b1(gi): chags pa'i rgyan du bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku la brgyan par bya// 'dul byed 'grin las rgyan gyis btab pa 'di// 'jigs par byed pa'i 'phrin las rgyan du bstan//
183b2(gi): yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa mnan te// 'khor lo cho 'phrul spyod pa'i sa yang yin// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i sku yi rgyan// gzi brjid don dam bcud kyi rgyan 'di
183b3(gi): ni/ bcud du gyur pas yon tan gzo brjid 'bar// rgyan du bkra bas sku la rgyan du che// kun tu 'od kyis ni mnan pa'i rtags// rnal 'byor dbang phyug skul rgyan du
183b4(gi): bzhes kro d+hi ni la ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma hA ya/ bla mas 'chid la brtags gsum gdabs// he ru ka yi ga nas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'o sa brgyad gnon pa dang //

183b6(gi): tshogs las// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// 'di yang bdag nyid chen po'i rgya'o// oM sarbA ta thA ga ta badz+ra gar+b+ha snyam pa si ho/ de bzhin tshul mchog gdab pa yang //

184a1(gi): oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta snyam pa si ho/ mched ldum kun la mtshan pa yis// lha dang rnal 'byor gnyis su med// dmag gi khrom du ba dan bsnams//
184a2(gi): lug gi spu mtshan lta bur gsal// slob dpon dpal gyi chas dang ldan// slob ma rnam gsum brtag kyis mtshan// bskal ba'i me dpung 'khrigs pa'i bzhin//

184a4(gi): rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag bsgoms// rdo rje dbyings las dpal gyi skur gyur pa// dang ba'i mtsho la rlabs chen 'khrug pa'am// mkha' la dbyar gyi sprin dag

184a6(gi): bskyod spyan gzigs thugs kyi hUM raMnges las// zhi ba las ni khro bor rims kyis gyur// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs bsdus nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
184a7(gi): par bya/ dang po'i chos sku dri med las// gnyis par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// gsum pa sprul pa'i sku yin te// sku gsum ting 'dzin gsum du bsgom//
184b1(gi): / zhe sdang dbyings gsal nam mkha' ni// yum nyid 'byung ba'i rgyu yin phyir// mthong nag b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor nyid// gru gsum ye shes gsal bar shar// rlung
184b2(gi): nag gtams pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// phrag dog mkha' la sgrol mdzad yum// 'degs pa'i shugs ldan ye shes dang // thogs med brten pa'i dkyil 'khor che//
184b3(gi): 'dod chags dbyings dag ra g+ha ni// chags med yum ste pad+ma'i klong // mtha' dbus med pa'i rgya mtsho ni// za grong 'phyo ba'i ye shes yin// 'khor bdag pa'i mtshan
184b4(gi): nyid ni gti mug chos nyid gsal ba'i phyir// gser gyur mchog phran sa gzhir brdal// thams cad skye med ye shes gsal// srid rgyud ye nas dag pa'i phyir//
184b5(gi): rin chen ri ra ba keng rus gsal// tshad med rgyan ldan kha bang che// klong nas shar bas phyed nub dpag/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// nga rgyal mkha'
184b6(gi): la sgrol mdzad yum// rmongs pa'i mun nag gtan nas sel// thams cad smin cing rtas par byed// zla gam dbang chen maN+Dal// dur khrod yon tan tshogs kyis
184b7(gi): brgyan khyi na mad par kun tu snang / gzhal pa nang mkha'i// dur khrod tshon pa'i gzham pas su// dregs pa khyo shug po mo dang // zhi'i che
185a1(gi): bsnol dang brkyang ba'i gdan// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka'i hUM// he ru ka yi snang gru ni// hU rings dbugs kyi rlung bzhi las// cu bzhir
185a2(gi): sngags kyi dgongs pa ni// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi mdangs 'bar// khro bo thams cad 'byung bar byed// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis//
185a3(gi): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro gtum gdug par 'gyur// shin tu gdug
185a4(gi): cing khro ba yis// 'o dod 'bod cing ltung bar 'gyur// shin tu gdug cing khro ba las// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// khro bo
185a5(gi): de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro ba'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma
185a6(gi): lus smos ci dgos// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyangs phyir// dur khrod gar gyis phyag rgyar gsal// he ru ka ni mthing nag sku//
185a7(gi): g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa dmar// dang po gser gyi rdo rje g.yas// bar pa kha Ta rtse gsum pa// tha ma mi mgo cang ha'u 'khrol// g.yon pa dang po dril bu 'dzin//
185b1(gi): bar ma thod pa khrag gis bkang // tha ma rgyu ma'i zhags pa bsnams// zhabs bzhi yum ni sku la 'khril// rdo rjer g+ha dkrug cing 'dren// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams
185b2(gi): cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ khro rgyal ye nas yin pa'i phyir// phyag rgya chen po mngon rdzogs nas// sku gsung thugs su dbang lnga pa skar// de nas
185b3(gi): sna yi rtse mo las// yid ni brten par yang dag gzungs// sna yi dbugs rengs 'gro ba las// rgyal ba'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgyar gsal// thugs las sna yi rlungs bye
185b4(gi): bas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba dang // yab yum mkha' gsang ba snol ma ru// byin brlab sa b+ha ga re ling ga bzhag/ ha brgyad las ni de ka ra mo dang // kun
185b5(gi): mo dang ni rmongs mo dang // thal byed ma dang spos mo dang // ma tshogs rme sha ga tum mor gsal// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo gsung gi dkyil 'khor
185b6(gi): 'di phyung ngo // ma hA su kha hUM/ tsit+ta s+pha ra na phaT/ badz+ra tsat+ti hU/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ brum+ba ra na phaT/ sang ha ra na hUM/ e ya raM bi kau ra e/ e AkaN sha maN+Da la/
185b7(gi): ya karba gra ha/ ra rig t+ta dz+wa la sa mu naSha/ ba rinas dz+wa la maN+Da la/ kaiHni da la ma ny+dza/ raHdzA \u0f88\u0f90 la/ dru bai u/ dz+ra na d+ha dz+nyA nanaNAs bru/ de
186a1(gi): debatir ya/ ma sur+ya maN+Da la/ a tsan tra maN+Da la/ swa pad+mA maN+Dal/ tir baM/ ts+tshaSh+Ta/ oM na ma sar+thaH thAg sa nan/ a sha sid+d+hi nan/
186a2(gi): sarba satwA na na/ sarba shu d+ho na na/ tra swa b+ha ba na na/ sa ma ya ba ti na na/ oM ma hA shr-i he ru ka/ ma hA/ kro tau d+hi sha ri sa ma yA/ de bi ha na shod+ha ya ha na hU phaT/ bru
186a3(gi): b+hi sha b+hI shud d+he pad+ma d+ha ra au/ hU tiShA rat+na sUr+ya au/ sa ma ya g+ho/ sa ma ya ho/ ra ho haM/ rA ga yA mi/ dzaHhU ba no/ hU rbu tsU hu hU/ A badz+ra ko'u ri ha/ au
186a4(gi): badz+ra tsiDU ri hA/ oM badz+ra pra mo ha/ oM badz+ra be ta li ha/ oM badz+ra puM ka si ha/ oM badz+ra kasma hrita/ oM badz+rarma sha ne he/ oM badz+ra tsan ba li ha/ dza hU ba ho/ sha badz+ra
186a5(gi): he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ a gad ta ya aM ga da ka yA/ pra be sha yA/ pra pe sha yA/ ban d+ha ya ba na d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ badz+ra ta ki na na hri da ya/ tsU hU phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra
186a6(gi): shri hi ru ka man+ta badz+ra sarba duSh+ma Na/ sa ma ya mu tra/ pra ban tsakra hU/ b+ha ga ban/ dzaHhUM ba ho/ ru lu ru lu tri sh+ya ho// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stA/ dza hU ba ho// shri ha ru A h+ya ni tr-i
186a7(gi): hos ma ya hau/ sa ma ya stA/ o e badz+ra a la ri hring/ hIng hr-ing hring / dzaHhU ba ho/ badz+ra shra he ru ka/ ru lu ru lu pra be sha phaT/ a be sha ya a/ ma dA kro ti sha
186b1(gi): r-i he ru ka ha ha/ ru lu ru lu pra be sha phaT/ a be sha ya a/ oM badz+ra he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+ma Na/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra be sha ya phaT/ shri badz+ra he ru hUM phaT/ dzaH
186b2(gi): hUM ba ho/ shri he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+mA na/ sa ma ya mu drA/ pra ba na tsakra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra shr-i he ru ka/ ma hA sa ma ya ho/ sarba duShASh+Ta na/ sa ma ya mu dra/
186b3(gi): pra ba na tsakra d+hu phaT/ ka yAM wa ka tsit+ta tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM badz+ra shr-i he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta na/ sa ma ya sa hA/ sta a bap+ta pa ta hU phaT/ oM badz+ra b+hU h+ya tri sh+yas
186b4(gi): ma ya s+thA oM badz+ra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma yanau/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya tri sh+ya badz+ra sa ma ya phaT/ dzaHzhu ba rko/ shri badz+ra he ru ka/ ma hA sarba duSh+Ta na/ sa ma ya mu tra/ pra b+hA na
186b5(gi): tsakra b+ha ga sha ya b+ha ga sha ya/ bidz+nyA sa ya bi d+hA sa ya/ he ba g+ha ban/ bud+d+ha k+She tre/ pra ti b+ha bak+Sha la hUM phaT/ oM shri badz+ra ka ra nug ga nAm/ oM shri badz+ra rA
186b6(gi): gas ma ya ya nA ma/ o shri badz+ra kha To ka pra dza la ya ya nam/ oM badz+ra gan d+he pradzA la ya ya na ma/ sarba ta thA ta b+han d+ha nang ka ro yA mi/ man+ta yo ga ni/ a ti d+ya //
186b7(gi): pra ti dza ho// a'i la ho/ khar la ra khar la ra'ahe/ badz+ra shri he ru ka/ badz+ra krod+haM shwa ri/ ar+d+ha pra tsidzatsa/ mkhati/ o sa tartA ga to ar+d+ha pra tiHho/
187a1(gi): oM sarba g+ga/ k+Sha sa ma na s+ho/ oMsar+b+bA thAthAgs rba ka par+N+Na/ smos pa kra thAg sa tsan rAdzAr+tha/ btsuH/ khris drug ma na/
187a2(gi): Sh+pe/ d+hU pa/ dab/ !n+da/ mings/ zla dzaso/ bribar+tha/ khaSh+mAHhU~M/ 'chi laci 'di/ nga chu no// phreM he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ A rbe sha la ma
187a3(gi): ya[:]pra ba sha ya pra be sha yA/ pra ti dza ho/ shri pany+tsa/ kha kha khA/ khA hi khA hi kha hi/ dzA la ra/ sa ma ho/ sa ma s+thA/ a nu ra ga ho/ ra ga yA mi/ hU hU/

187a6(gi): tsin+tam hA ba su ha/ ma hA pany+dza a mr-i ta/ man+ta ar+d+ha pra ti dza no/ kha kha khA/ le le le/ tsU b+h+yo hu b+h+yo hu b+h+yo/ d+harma ka ya na mo/ saM b+ho ga ka ya na mo/ nir mAN
187a7(gi): kA ya na mo/ dz+nyA na bany+tsa ka ya ne mo/ ka ya wa ga tsan+ti gu na karma hri da ya na ma sarba ta thA ga ta na mo na mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis he ru
187b1(gi): ka thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gsungs so// dbus kyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje kha Ta rnge'u chung g.yas// dral
187b2(gi): bu dung dmar rgyu zhags g.yon// dpal chen ye shes thabs kyi rgya// / shes rab dbyings ma'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas pa
187b3(gi): shes rab thabs la bsnyen// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// kro ti sha ri dbyings kyi rgya// gnas kyi mkha' 'gro phyag rgya ni// ko'u ri rben dmar gyi dbyug rdzo/
187b4(gi): tso'u ri mda' gzhu 'gengs ma ser// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar// bai ta byi shar rdor 'chang nag/ pu ka dkar ser zhi rgyu 'dren// g+ha sa ma dung dmar khrag 'thung
187b5(gi): ldang rma sha mthing nag byis snying za// tsan Da ser skya mchog lus 'brel// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhengs nas kyang // mchod pa zhes dam bskongs mthu dang dngos
187b6(gi): grub stsol// thugs kyi phyag rgya zab mo bcas// dang por bzhes su gsol ba ni// lag pa'i se gol dpung 'gor bsnol// pA na gsan dbab pa'i 'dus ma byas/
187b7(gi): 'a dbyings bya/ rgya rlin tshams bcang // spyan drangs por mo nang du brnob/ sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su dbab// bzhugs gsol mthe bong rtse sprang 'thur/
188a1(gi): mdzub mo gnyis ni mdud par bya// gung mo rtse sprad gzhan ma brkyang // srid pa gsum na gnas pa bstan// bstan bzhugs phyag rgya sor ma
188a2(gi): bsnol/ mthe bong so sor bsgreng bar bya// mi g.yo sor mo gzhan bskum la// mthe bong srin lag gnyis sgreng ste// kha 'gram g.yas dang g.yon du bcas// dam
188a3(gi): tshig gad ra ba'i phyag rgya ni// thod pa tshar gsum phyag rgya bya// mdzub mo mthe bong nang du bkug/ gung gnyis mthe'u chung rtse bzhi sprad// srin lag bsnol ba thod skam
188a4(gi): srin lag ma dzub gung nang du 'byung // thong pa rlon pa'i phyag rgya yin// snying bas bur byas pa ni// thod pa tshal bu'i phyag rgya'o// zil gyis mnan pa'i ma
188a5(gi): bong sbyar// dpung 'gor gshog pa sor mo bskyed// phyag 'tshal phyag rgya'i lha mo bzhi// rgyas 'debs dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// rmongs byed dmar mo khu tshur
188a6(gi): 'khyud/ za byed ser mo kha Ta kha// tshe 'phel ljang khu dril bu thogs// mtheb srin rtse s+phu da e yi rgya// bdud rtsi 'bul dang dngos grub blangs// gtor ma rin chen
188a7(gi): 'bar ba 'bul// ral gri'i phyag rgyas basbrel bar bya// lcags kyu'i rigs ma bkug la sbyar// thod pa dam rdzas btab par bya// dug gsum mchod par 'bul ba ni/
188b1(gi): me rtog bde dang gsal ba yis// sha rus khrag la za bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya 'dzin// yang na dril bu cang te'u sgras// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan
188b2(gi): la che ba'i khyad par rnams kyis bstod// thugs kyi mon ngag zab mo rnams// rtsa rlung bdud rtsi yi ge bsgom// rab tu gsang bar bya ba nyid// de yang snyoms
188b3(gi): 'jug bsgom pa ni// snying ka chos kyi 'khor lo'i nang // dar dkar skud pa sangs rgyas spyan// stong pa chen po'i ye shes gsal// khrag gi dang sa ma rgya mtshal
188b4(gi): chu nyid ma ma ki yin la// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sdud// dbugs kyi deng sa ma sa 'og gser// rlung nyid dam tshig sgrol ma yin// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
188b5(gi): yin drod dngas me long nyi ma'i ngang // smin byed me ni sgril ma gos// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes de// thig le nam mkhar gsal bar byed// dbyings phyug ma ni
188b6(gi): me long gsal// khams gsum kun la yod pa de la lha// de la bltas nas bsgoms na tha da da med// de las de nyid kho na'i grig le sems// yi ge thod du zhu nas rab
188b7(gi): ba ni na // dar dkar skud pa rgyal mtshan gtsol rtsam// dbugs kyi dngas ma mo long nyi ma 'drong // thig le chen po gser zhun 'dra ba dang // rin chen za'u cug
189a1(gi): dang 'dra ba yis// thabs kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang // rin chen ke ke ru gang btags// me long ye shes lhas mthong med// yum nyid gang
189a2(gi): yin yang nyid de// tha dad ma yin 'od du mthong // thig le dngas ma rang bzhin med// nam mkha'i gzugs su khams gsum kun// chos kyi sku la rab tu gnas
189a3(gi): lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo nyid// drug cu rtsa gnyis kun bzang mo// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin bzhugs// khams gsum lhar yang rgyas btab pas//
189a4(gi): ye shes lngar ni lhun gyis grub// chos 'khor dang sa ma'i drod phab nas// kun tu bzang mo 'thur du 'phro// bzang mo thig le gyen du 'bar// dang sa ma gser
189a5(gi): spyi rgyu ba med// bde ba mched bskul thig le mnyam// mgrin pa longs spyod bcu drug dkyil// mnyam sbyor drod bskul bde chen ro// dgyes stobs bde ba'i
189a6(gi): 'phrin la sa 'phro// shes bya byung zad gzigs mo rol// spyi bo'i bde ba chen po na// sum cu rtsa gnyis nam mkha' song // chos skra phyogs dus sku gsung thugs//
189a7(gi): gnyis med kun dngos bdag gyur pas// skur gyur zhal mthong dbang sgyur grub// ye shes ting 'dzin tshogs gnyis brgyan// ro brkyang kun dar 'khor 'das rtsa//
189b1(gi): srog shing rnam pa gsum po la// gnyis rdzogs sangs rgyas thugs rje yis// sgyu ma'i sems can sbyor sgrol 'bul// 'du 'ji g.yeng ba rab spangs nas// thig le
189b2(gi): 'di la bsgom par bya// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpas byin gyis brlabs// dpa' bo dpa' mo mkha' 'gro kun// bde ba chen po'i
189b3(gi): dngos grub ster// de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis// khro bo ma lus thams cad rnams// dpal chen he ru ka'i tshogs su snang bar gyur pas

190a1(gi): spyan drangs mchod pa la sogs 'bul// yang na gdul bya'i ngo snang la// dbus kyi khrag 'thung mthing nag sku// g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa
190a2(gi): dmar g.yas kyi dang po kha Ta kha// bar ma rdo rje rnge'u chung 'og/ g.yon pa ti ri'i dbyug pa 'phyar// ba ra ma dung chen rag+ha gsol// tha ma ba su ta yi zhags//
190a3(gi): zhabs bzhi yum ni sku la 'khril// dur khrod tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// de yi 'khor na gnas pa na// rta ga dong sngon mo lcags kyu 'dzani// phag gdong nag mo mche
190a4(gi): zhags can// lcags sgrog dmar mo nyi zla'i spyan// thal byed dril bu sna tshogs mdog/ mtsho byed dkar mo a ku sha/ 'chi byed sor mo pA sha hU// rlag byed dmar

190a6(gi): par bya gdul bya ga dul phyir 'di ltar snang // dbus na he ru ka ni sngo// g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa dmar// phyag drug phyag na bsnams pa ni// kha Ta thod pa
190a7(gi): dril bu dang // cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu thogs// yum dang gnyis su med par 'khril// rdo rje thod pa yang dag ldan// shar du ko'u ri sir sngo ldang // lho ru peH
190b1(gi): dkar rdzo ldang // nub kyi phra mo sngo ser ldang // byang du tse'u rI ljang ser dmar// shar sto bu kam+b+ha tshogs mdog/ lho nub tsan d+ha ljang sngo ser// nub byang g+has mdud
190b2(gi): sngo ljang byang shar rma sha dmar sngo ljang // lha dgu'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor la// ye shes dkyil 'khor gzhug pa'o// yang ni gdul bya la snang ba// zhal bzhi

190b4(gi): pa 'dzin pa la// thod pa dang ni kha Ta 'dzin// ban d+ha rdo rje zhags pa dang // tshangs pa'i mgo bo brgyad pa'o// de 'dra'i skul phag mo 'khril// yang na 'dul

190b6(gi): pa dang ni kha zla 'dzin// yang ni gdul bya 'dul ba'i phyir// zhal brgyad pa la bcu drug phyag/ dbus sngo g.yas pa dkar ser dmar// g.yon zhal dkar dang sngo
190b7(gi): dang ser// steng gizhal ni dmar po yin// nar 'i pags pa steng du zhe// rdo rje dral bu'i phyag rgya can// thod pa dang ni khaT 'dzin// ral gri lcags kyu rnam par 'chang //
191a1(gi): sdigs mdzub gshibs bcas 'khor lo dang // yid bzhin rin chen tho ba dang // mdung thung dang ni ral gri dang // mgo dang cang te'u rnam par
191a2(gi): bsnams// rdo rje yum dang 'khrel ba la// 'dod pa'i thod pa khro bo sngo// stobs ni dud kha rdo rje gtod// mi g.yo rdur mig sdigs mdzub can// rdo rje mdog
191a3(gi): dmar kha Ta 'dzin// zhal nas sum b+ha'i gsang sngags 'don// yang ni gdul bya dag la snang // zhal bzhi pa la bcu drug phyag/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar
191a4(gi): dbus rdzob// steng gi zhal ni ser bor snang // sdigs mdzub dang ni rdo rje gsor// dril bu dang ni zhags pa dang // bum pa dang ni ral gri dang // mdung thung
191a5(gi): dang ni dgra sta dang // thod pa dang ni lcags kyu dang // gzhu dang kha Ta ga yang bsnams// mda' ni gsor zhing tho ba 'dzin// 'khor lo bsnams dang mi 'jigs
191a6(gi): phyag 'chi ba slong bar byed par bshad// de dag bka' yi las mkhan ni// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad yin// srin mo spug nag rdo rje thod rlon 'chang // tshangs
191a7(gi): ma dmar ser rdo rje pad+ma bsnams// lha chen dkar ljang rdo rje tri shu la// rtogs 'dod sngon mo rdo rje 'khor lo 'chang // gzhon nu dmar ser rdo rje mdung thung 'phen// lha
191b1(gi): sbyin dkar mo rdo rje in tra gdengs// rdo rje ser mo rdo rje tsan d+han 'thung // bdud rtsi dmar mo rdo rje pad+ma bsnams// zla ba dkar mo rdo rje pun da ri// be con ldang
191b2(gi): nonag rdo rje dbyug to 'phyar// srin mo dmar mo rdo rje thod khrag 'thung // za ba ldang nag rdo rje ba su 'dren// dga' ba dkar mo rdo rje ka dar 'chang // stobs chen dkar mo
191b3(gi): rdo rje gshol 'dza ne ma// rdo rje ser mo rdo rje spu gris gcod// 'dod pa da ma ra mo rdo rje mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor srangs dmar mo rdo rje bu ma pa 'ja ni// rlung lha sngon
191b4(gi): mo rdo rje ba dan 'phyar// gsod byed nag mo rdo rje ral griso// mi mo dmar mo rdo rje gsam shing 'chang // phag gdong nag mo rdo rje mche zhugs bsnams// rgan byed
191b5(gi): dkar mo rdo rje zhing chung za// rna cha dkar mo rdo rje thod khrag 'thung // chu lha sngon mo rdo rje sbrul 'dzin ma// rdo rje nag mo rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje ser mo rdo rjer mgo
191b6(gi): zhags rdo rje dmar mo rdo rje lcags sgrog sdoms// rdo rje ljang nag rdo rje dril 'khrol dgyes// dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka la// ma mo brgyad kyis bskor ba dang // 'phra
191b7(gi): man brgyad kyis bskor ba dang // sgom bzhi yib bskor ba rnams// nyi shu'i 'khor du 'dod// de bzhin dbang phyug tshogs kyis bskor// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad
192a1(gi): gtso dang dgu// gdul bya rnams la snang bar 'gyur// he ru ka yi gnas bcu ni// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas gnyis dang // yul ni rol pa'i
192a2(gi): nyes yul rol// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni// 'dus nye ba'i 'du sa dang // tshan d+honya ba'i tshan d+ho yon// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad ni// yul gyi ming ni rgya
192a3(gi): gar yul// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i 'tshal// yul gyi ming ni sing nga'i tshal// dur khrod chen po sku la rdzogs// yul gyi ming ni kha che'i yul// dur khrod chen
192a4(gi): po nye chen rol// yul gyi ming ni thog dkar yul// dur khrod chen po gsang chen rol// yul gyi mngo nau u rgyan yul// dur khrod chen po pad+ma brtsegs// yul
192a5(gi): gyi ming ni bal po'i yul// dur khrod chen po ya ma kha// yul gyi ming ni ze hor yul// dur khrod chen po khu byug klong // yul gyi ming ni lo yi yul// dur khrod
192a6(gi): 'jig rten mngon rdzogs yin// de nas yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas dpal chen po'i tshogs kyi/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi don ma lus
192a7(gi): par 'grub/ dbang bskur ba'i 'phrin las kyi kyil 'khor 'di dag gsungs so// ye shes dkyil 'khor sman drangs te// bzhugs dang brten dang mi g.yo dang /
192b1(gi): dam tshig zim gnon phyag rgya byed// mchod dang stobs dang za ba dang // tshul rigs gom pa'i blo dag gis// ci rigs su ni bstan par bya// dam tshig mchog
192b2(gi): mchod pa dang // bskul tshogs dbyangs kyis de dag mnyes// rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// thal mo legs par sbyar bya yis// /
192b3(gi): thal mo lan gsum brdab par bya// ye shes spyan gyis spyod yul nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// sems can don slad dam tshig dgongs//
192b4(gi): gnas 'dir ma lus gshegs su gsol// dad pa dang nau dam chog gis// tshur gshegs chur gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las kyang // gzugs sku
192b5(gi): 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pa// gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// tshogs
192b6(gi): kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las// sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs su gsol// bder gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor
192b7(gi): di 'grong yum bzla ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang du dko/ sa nas kyang // 'khor bcar rab 'bar gshegs su garol// che mchog sanyam sbyor 'bar
193a1(gi): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dire// gdug pa 'dul mdzad thugs rjes khros pa yis// gsang sngags rmad byung drag po'i 'phrin las mdzad// lhun gyis
193a2(gi): grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// dam tshig pa la bzhengs pa'i// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam// dngos
193a3(gi): grub mchog dag ma stsal na// sku gsung thugs dang 'gal bar ro// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas// pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag
193a4(gi): mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas ngas bsdus so// bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing // byam sa dang snying rje dgra zin mi mnga' yang // gdug pa 'dul
193a5(gi): phyir dus la sa mi 'da' ba'i// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mi gnas mi dmigs chos sku dag pa las// bdud 'dul khro bo mchog gi sku sprul pa// thugs
193a6(gi): rje'i gzigs ldan gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul// bcom ldan khro rgyal ma yang phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo dbang phyug sku la nyer gnas shing // thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i
193a7(gi): dkyil 'khor 'dir// mkha' 'gro mi bzad 'bar pa'i sprin 'phro ma// gdug pa 'dul mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can ga ra yang thogs med cing /
193b1(gi): 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma srang byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rang byung gdod nas
193b2(gi): dag pa yis// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyor ba'i sman// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs bsgrub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga sems can kun sgrol ba'i//
193b3(gi): dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis// thugs dam dbyings nyid bskul ba'i mchog
193b4(gi): 'di ni sngon gyi tha tshags so// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di// bdag cag dang bas 'bul lags kyis// bzheng ste kun tu dgyes mdzod la// 'phrul gyi dngos grub
193b5(gi): stsal du gsol// dpal chen badz+ra he ru ka dang // yum chen kro d+hi shwa ri la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje cher dgongs dbang dang
193b6(gi): dngos grub stsol// mthing ka mchog rnams rdo rje gsang ba'i yum// ke'u ri la sogs khro mo brgyad rnams la// gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma lus la// bdad rtsis
193b7(gi): mnyes par bya ba'o// bde chen dbyings nas rgyal ba'i skur bzhengs pa// dpapa chen khrag 'thung thug za ni ma byas rin po che// ru lu ru bu'i 'brang bas 'khor lo bskor/
194a1(gi): lha dang gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// rtse gcig bsgrubs pa'i ting 'dzani zab mo'i mthus// deng bdag nyid du bdag la stsal du gsol//
194a2(gi): he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal tshon 'khor bcas spyan 'dren te// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar
194a3(gi): rnying sti rer bcas// dmar gyi a rga rgya mtshor ba skyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus pa zhes nas bsnams su gsol// nga ni za byed chen po
194a4(gi): khams gsum ma mus bsgral bi dang // gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// sha ru sa la sogs za bar bya// ku na gzhi'i klong nas rang byung ye shes shar/
194a5(gi): ji ltar snang ba lba yi dkyil 'khor du// nongs pa'i les su gyur ba tha mas cad kun// gnyis su med pa'i nga dra da bshags par bgyis// chos ska ma nyam nyi de dang las
194a6(gi): ma g.yos kyang // thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i byin rlabs las// 'gro ba'i don du khro bo'i sku sprul pa// dpal chen yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// yab
194a7(gi): yum gnyis med thugs las sprul pa'i sras// tshe 'di re thun mong dngos grub grub chen brgyad// phyi mer phyag rgya chen po mchog la sbyor// grogs mdzad mkha' 'gro'i
194b1(gi): tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ zhugs mar gcig pa 'di gsungs so// bsam du med do sems nyid nam
194b2(gi): mkha' che// sems nyid nam mkha' bsam pa kun dang bral// bsam du med pa'i sems nyid nam mkha' ni// nam mkha' mi dmigs pa yang dmigs su med//
194b3(gi): rang bzhin ye shes dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // sgong khams yongs la khyab pa'i thugs rje 'byung // sa le gsal zhing phyogs med mtha' dang bral// dbyibs dang kha dog
194b4(gi): dngos med ye shes 'od// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid dag pa las// sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge hUM du gsal// gzung bas mi zin de bzhin chu zla'i tshul// thig
194b5(gi): le'i dbyings nas rang byung skur shar gsal// 'byung ba chen po lnga ni bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba kun la ye nas rang bzhin gnas// phyin ci log tu rnam par brtags
194b6(gi): gyur yang // 'gro ba rang grol rang byung gzhan las min// kun gzhi byang chub sems ni thams cad kun gyi gnas// dpag cing gzhal du med pa sa rigs pa byang
194b7(gi): chub sems// dus gsum bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i pho brang de// 'du bra med do yum gyi kha' ma rdzogs// bde gshegs lang gis gas ba'i pho brang du
195a1(gi): thabs kyi bye brag mang po cir bstan yang // gnyis med 'bras bu khams gsum rgyas btab nas// mi 'gyur yum gyi klong nas rdzogs pa che// thig
195a2(gi): le'i dbyings nas rang 'byung mngon sangs rgyas// snang srid ma bcos dpal chen he ru ka/ kun la khyab pas gzugs sku dpal chen te// kun bzang rol pas spros
195a3(gi): med chos kyi sku// ye shes chen po lnga dbang bskur// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// oM sarba d+harma bi shu d+he sarba bi shud d+he ha/ oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho pra b+ha wa
195a4(gi): ma hA shu n+yA ta dzI na badz+ra sA b+hA wa At+ma koHhaM/ tr-i sarba kra sta ma ha su kha hU/ dz+nyA na sa twa kro d+ha dU ya/ bruM baM bi shrud+d+he d+harma d+ha tu a A/ d+hA na sa ha krod+ha hU a A/ oM barba
195a5(gi): shri hai ru ka hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA kr-i d+hi shwa ri stA/ oM badz+ra shri hi ru ka dz+nyA na gar+N+Na ba su kha sang ha ra na sU/ au shri he ru ka d+harma d+ha tu pra b+ha ba ma hA su khaM hU/ ye shes dkyil
195a6(gi): 'khor spyan drangs te// he ni bod pa dang po'i sgra// ru ni dbyings su sdud pa'i don// ka ni byang chub sems chen po// zla ba gsal bar shar ba la// mkha' la
195a7(gi): mtshon du med pa bzhin// sems nyid ye nas skur gsal bas// spyan 'dren gshegs gsol mi dmigs te// skye shi med pa'i lam zhes bya// yang sangs rgyas pa'i
195b1(gi): sa la byin// bsam du med do chos sku nam mkha' 'dra// brjod du med do rnam shes gzugs dang bral// 'du 'bral med do yum gyi mkha' la rdzogs// rig pa'i dus
195b2(gi): na gnas la 'pho ba med// spros med rtogs bral mkha' dbyings dag pa la// skye med rdo rje sku gsung thugs mnga' ba// 'gro mgon rang 'byung bcom ldan thugs rje'i
195b3(gi): lha/ 'du 'bral med pa'i klong la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gcig kun la khyab pa sa bdal ba'i sku// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus
195b4(gi): mthing nag/ rdo rje kha TA rnge'u chung g.yas// dung dmar rgyu zhags khyung khra g.yon// yum ni gnyis su med par 'khril// ming dang rtogs la mi gnas pa'i// mi
195b5(gi): g.yo ba ni sku yi rgya// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// dngos su 'byor dang yid dang kyis sprul pa'i// mchod pa bla na mchis dang ma mchis pa//
195b6(gi): ma chags mi g.yo'i stobs kyis mchod par 'bul// dpal chen he ru yab yu ma la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje brtse dgongs
195b7(gi): dbang dang dngos grub phul// pa de gshegs thams pasad ma nas nyid thugs kyi bang// skye rdo rje yu nyung bzang po ni// thabs la mkhas pa'i khro rgyal skur bstan pa/
196a1(gi): na pa smras da// na ga sos byu/
196a2(gi): rgyag sa nga rgyu dz+haM pa // sa tshan dpas ba ma mas bstod// dA dz+nyA seMs mas gyu sa / blu
196a3(gi): dzad// sman gan blo na da 'gyu / ts+tsha// skyes rgyu kun ra ba tsun // don pa khrigs /
196a4(gi): snang ba thams ca m+b+hayi dkyil la'ongs// snying po 'arjod pas sgra'i dkyil 'khor thams snang rdzogs pa'i rgyug// dakhyer ma 'dzas nyid kyi zur b+hu
196a5(gi): la mkhas pa'i gnyis su med par bshags// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rim pa lnga'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i bzlab dang sems pa dmigs/
196a6(gi): bdag byin 'arlabs dang 'od gas pa dang // zung du 'jug dang 'di lta sa// ri rI la yang gsum gsum yin// bla mal dang rnamam su khyer// 'bram
196a7(gi): khyer ba rnam gsus la// re re la yang lnga sngar bshad// tha ma la rdo rje'i 'azlas pa ni// 'gro ba rnams kyi dbugs 'di na// phyir 'dra na 'ong gnas pa dang /
196b1(gi): lus ngag yid du gnas pa ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pa tha mal de// de ni ma rtogs zhes su bya// lam du khyer ba'i bzlas pa ni// 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba la//
196b2(gi): yan lag drug tu tshang bsgoms pas// rdo rje'i bzlas pa lam du khyer// 'bras bu rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni// yi ge gsum pa rnam dag nas// sku gsung thugs su
196b3(gi): gnas pa'o// tha mal sems la dmigs pa ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // rang bzhin brgya bcur shar ba dang // pho dang mo dang ma ni nga ni//
196b4(gi): tha mal sems la dmigs pa'o// lam du bsgom pa'i dmigs pa ni// bde ba gsum dang dga' ba bzhi// 'od kyi snang ba gsum bcas pa dang // de ltar
196b5(gi): bsgom pa la ma yin no// 'bras bu'i sems la dmigs pa ni// lha yi nga rgyal 'chang byed pa// sku dang bde ba byin rlabs gsum// 'bras bu'i sems la
196b6(gi): dmigs pa'o// tha mal ba'i bdag byin rlabs// snang ba rang lus sems can lus// mi lus grub sogs tha mal pa// de la sa lam du khyer tsam na//
196b7(gi): rdo rje'i mus nyid dag ni// rang nyid dmi zhes shing ri 'jog pa// spyod lam nyid kyang rgyur mar lta// de ni kham du bsgom pa'o// 'bras bu'i bdag byin
197a1(gi): brlab pa ni// sgyu ma dang ni chu zla dang // 'ja' tshon bzhin du dngos med pa// de ltar 'bras bu'i skur snang ba// mtshan dang dpe byad rgyun
197a2(gi): gyis pa rgyan// de ni 'bras bu'i rim pa'o// 'od gsal ba yi mtshan nyid ni// tha mal la grab rang bzhin stong // lam yong rang bzhin med pa ste// sems kyi
197a3(gi): dkyil 'khor 'od gsal nyid// 'bras bu yang ni 'od gsal lo// de ni thun mong sangs rgyas so// tha mal zung du 'jug pa ni// thog ma'i dus nas tha ma'i dus//
197a4(gi): sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// gnyis su med pas ye sangs rgyas// ye sangs rgyas pa'i blang dor med// blang dor med pas lam du khyer// zung
197a5(gi): du 'jug pas gnyis su bsdebs// 'bras bu nyid kyang zung du 'jug/ zung 'jug go 'phang la gnas na// slar zhing gang yang mi slob bo// gung las yar gshegs

197a7(gi): bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsnyen par gnang ba'i dbang thob nas// sgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad bstan// 'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs
197b1(gi): nas kyang // bstan pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad// yon tan ldan pa'i bla ma la// dbang lung man ngag ma thob par// ji ltar bzlas brjod brtson gyur yang //
197b2(gi): ngal don chung zhing gol bar 'gyur// 'bru brgyad bzlas brjod skyon spangs te// yid bzhin rin chen gter brnyed bzhin// cir yang bsgyur du btub pa'i phyir// yon
197b3(gi): tan mtha' yas mchog tu bstan// sngags kyi ngo bo lha yi sku// mtshan ma las dbye na smra bsam 'das// don dam byams sems gzhan mi 'gyur// yang dag kun
197b4(gi): rdzob dkyil 'khor lha// nges tshags shes skyob ldan pa ste// ngan song gnas ngan len las skyob// sku gsum 'bras bu thob par shes// mtshan nyid sku gsum ye shes
197b5(gi): lnga sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// mchog dang thun mong kun dang ldan// dbye ba rig sngags gzungs sngags dang // gsang sngags dag tu gsungs pa yin//
197b6(gi): rig sngags ma rig mun nag sel// bud med gzugs dbyibs phyag rgya sgra// gzungs sngags mtha' gnyis mi lhung 'dzin// skyes pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul 'gyur yin//
197b7(gi): gsang sngags snod ma yin la gsang // 'o na dam snying po chos kyi sku// yan lag kun rdzob ljags kyi 'bru// lha yi dkyil 'khoragasal pa'o// sdug kyi byin brlabs
198a1(gi): bstan pa ni// 'bru brgyad dkyil 'khor byin brlabs ni// mi 'jigs seng ge'i sgra dang mtshungs// gzi byin nyi zla rgya mtsho'i rgyun// nam mkha'i
198a2(gi): sprin bzhin mkha' la sprul// oM ni sku dang ye shes nyid// dpal chen 'bar ba seng ge brjid// ru lu ma mo nam mkhar 'gro// mtshogs sprin dang skar ltar 'gro//
198a3(gi): hUM chen nyi zla'i mtsho rgyun 'dra// ma nor re skong mkha' la 'gro// sngags kyi yon tan khyad par 'phags// ru lu 'di ni sgrib pa sbyong // las dang nyon mongs bag
198a4(gi): chags 'joms// ru lu 'di ni rtogs pa skye// sgom nyams sems la rnam par 'phel// ru lu 'di ni ya mtshan che// bdud dang mu stegs ru tra 'dul// drod
198a5(gi): gsum tshad gsum brtag gsum 'byung // phyi nang gsang ba'i drod dang ldan// mar me rgya mtsho shing bal tshad// gzugs dang sgra dang dri yang ston// sngags kyi
198a6(gi): rang bzhin bstan pa ni// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i rang bzhin ni// kun tu bzang po he ru ka/ dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// ye shes snying po 'bru brgyad
198a7(gi): ldan/ rdo rje sngags kyi sgra bshad pa// oM ni ye shes phyag rgyar gsal// ru ni 'bar sreg chags pa'i ngang // lus ni kun bzang yum gyi tshul// hUM ni dbang sdud
198b1(gi): thugs las sprul// b+h+yo ni rnal 'byor ma ru bstan// su ni tshad med yon tan mchog/ dpal chen thugs kyi nga rgyal 'khor nas// srog gi snying po 'bru brgyad spos//
198b2(gi): 'bru brgyad dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyi// srog gi snying po tshang bar yod// de ni dkyil 'khor rang bzhin yin// dkyil 'khor rig pa'i ye shes kyi// dbyings dang
198b3(gi): ye shes gnyis su med// 'bras bu sku gsum dngos grub thob// ru lu'i bye brag bas ma mi khyab// dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug 'grub// shap+ta yi gla/
198b4(gi): blangs pas// rdo rje srin po'i dur skad kyis// gdug pa thams cad spa yang bkod // gardza pa yi glu blangs pas// zab cing 'brug ltar sgra sgrogs pas//
198b5(gi): gtum po gdug pa lhan ner 'gyur// lhung ka de'u glu blangs pas// 'khor ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis// khro bo khro mo'i sprul pa 'gyed// pang ka de'u glu
198b6(gi): blangs pas// 'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra 'byin pas// gnod byed ma lus dbang du bsdus// breng nge ba yi glu blangs pas// sngags kyi yi ge'i sgra bsgrags
198b7(gi): pas de ni dkyil 'khor lha rnams bskyed// dung nge ba yi spu blangs pas// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi 'dren tshul gyis// 'khor rnams thams cad dbang du sdud/
199a1(gi): ru lu'i dkyil 'khor dag tu shes// gsang ba'i mkha' la dkyil 'khor rdzogs// kun bzang mkha' dbyings yangs pa'i gzhal yas su//
199a2(gi): 'byung ba yum rnams 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i mchog bskor nas// rak+ta'i rba glong 'khyil cing 'khrug pa'i dbus// keng rus
199a3(gi): gser rnying brtsegs pa'i ri rab steng // rdo rje brag chen lhams pa'i sa gzhi la// ba na d+ha gsar rnying brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas khang // yon tan rgya cher gru bzhi lham
199a4(gi): pa'i dbyibs// gnam lcags ngur mo'i gzer chen ta la la// ka ba mchog brgyad ldan pa'i ri'u chang dgu// rab 'jigs dur khrod chen po'i brgyan dang bcas/
199a5(gi): bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'gro// chags byas zla gam pad+ma dbang gi tshul// rin chen 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rgyas pa'i dbus// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbus
199a6(gi): kyi dkyil 'khor du// dregs pa khyo shugs bsnol ba'i zhing brkyang ba ting // rab gsal nyi zla 'bar ba'i gnas bshams la// bsod nams mthus grub ting
199a7(gi): 'dzin stobs kyis bskyed// ye shes rang snang dkyil 'khor dam pa las// bdag gi rnams sprul nyid kyi mthus bzhengs cig/ dngas pa'i mtsho dang gsal ba'i nam
199b1(gi): mkha' bzhin// mtshan ma gtan spangs rnam dag thugs mnga' ba// ye shes chos rgya dbyings las mi g.yo yang // blon lam dbang dang 'bral gyi dus mkhyen pas//
199b2(gi): mtsho las rlabs dang mkha' las nyi zla bzhin// lus dang phyag zhabs stong khams rdul snyed kyis// 'jigs byed khro rgyal 'bar ba'i skur ston pa// khro zhi la sogs
199b3(gi): tshul dang rngam brjid bcas// thod sbrul g.yang gzhi la sogs rgyan chas ldan// rdo rje dung chen kha Ta la sogs bsnams// rab 'jigs dur khrod bskal pa'i me
199b4(gi): dkyil na// dkar mo la sogs tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzes// bka' nyan mngag gzhug pho nya 'bar ba'i g.yog dang bcas// dus ngan tha ma'i 'dul ba'i rgyud sbyong
199b5(gi): ba'i dpal chen dpa' bo yab yum 'khor bcas la// sngags tshigs 'bru brgyad legs pa'i mchod pa 'bul// bdag la dgongs shing byin rlabs dngos grub
199b6(gi): stsol gnas dang rten du bcas pa yis// 'bar chen klong gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// ru lu wA ru shes pa yang // 'bru brgyad lha rnams phyag rgyar gsal/
199b7(gi): rtag chan g.yung drung nam mkha'i rang bden/ thugs mchog le nas rdo rje bsal// sku gsum sa bon yon tan 'phrin las rdzogs// zad med ye shes
200a1(gi): rin chen rang bzhin dbyings kyi gter// de nyid las ni dpal chen sku ru bskyed// rab 'jigs khro bo'i cha lugs cir yang ston// nyi zla
200a2(gi): thod 'phreng sbrul nag g.yang gzhis brgyan// kun bzang chos nyid rnam dag yangs pa na// gzugs brnyan shes rab yum gyi skur bstan nas// gang yang
200a3(gi): thogs med cha lugs tha dad cing // gtso mchog thabs kyi sku la dgyes par 'khril// zhi khro'i tshul ston spyod pa bsam yas kyang // rang bzhin dbyings las
200a4(gi): gzhan du mi g.yo la// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i 'byung gnas mdzad// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i yum rnams la// sngags tshogs 'bru
200a5(gi): brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// rtog pa'i skyon bral mtshan ma gtan spangs kyang // ye shes chos kyi dbyings las mi bral bzhin// thabs kyi sku la shes
200a6(gi): rab dgyes par 'khril// rnam thar brgyad ldan pad+ma ge sar la// chags med ye shes rdo rje mnyam bzhag nas// nyi zla da kar da mar 'khrags pa'i 'od zer gyis//
200a7(gi): gzung 'jan skyon bsreg 'gro la dbang bskur zhing // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i bskyed mdzad pa// sngags chags 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul//
200b1(gi): sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel// ru mu spyan drangs shes pa ni// 'og min grub pa'i gnas nas dgug/ dzaHrU baM ho gsang
200b2(gi): sngags phyag rgya bzhis// lcags kyu zhags pa lkugs sgrog dril bu ma// dam tshig phyag rgya rab tu bcings nas ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bru brgyad sngags
200b3(gi): kyis dgug/ ru lu mchod par shes pa ni// ting 'dzani spros pas mchod pa'i gter// me tog bdug spos lha bshos mar me bcas// bla bre rgyal mtshan na bza'
200b4(gi): 'phan dang gdugs// sim snyan rnga dung nor bu mu tig 'phreng // gzugs sgra dri ro reg sogs lha mo'i tshogs// bde chen byang chub sems kyi mchod sprin rnams// dngos
200b5(gi): su bshams shing sems kyis mngon sprul nas// ye shes rang snang zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor la// 'bru brgyad 'phros 'dus 'bul na mchod par bzhes// sku mchog
200b6(gi): gang nadod gzugs su de bzhin snang // gsung mchog rnam par sngags kyi yig 'brugasal// thugs mchog ye shes dam tshig phyag rgyar gnas// yon tan rin chen
200b7(gi): / nad dgos 'od no// 'phrin pa la rnam bzhi 'gro drug rnam par nga // legs pa mchog rnams yon kan mnga' ya dzad la// dang bas rab brjod 'bru
201a1(gi): brgyad rags pas mchod// mchod dang bstod pa'i mchod pa yang // ting 'dzin sprul pa mchod pa'i gter// ru lu phyag rgyar shes pa ni// byag
201a2(gi): rgya rnam pa bzhi dang ldan// gtso bo chos sku phyag rgya chen por gnas// dam tshig phyag rgya yum ni sku la 'khril// las kyi phyag rgya sa mkha' gsang 'khor rnams bskyed//
201a3(gi): zhi ba chos nyid phyag rgya rang bzhin med// phyag rgya bzhi ldan gtso 'khor rdzogs pa'i sku// rnal 'byor lus la lha skus rgyas btab gsal// ru lu 'phrin las shes
201a4(gi): par bya ba ni// thugs kyi 'od zer 'phrin las mchog/ stong gsum phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten na// 'bru brgyad yon tan bsam mi khyab// dpal chen yab yum
201a5(gi): 'khor dang bcas// yun rings dus na bsnyen bsnyen pa// nye ba'i dus su mchod mchod pa// bsnyen mchod 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// dkyil 'khor 'di la
201a6(gi): byin pho ba las// bdag cag rnams la dngos grub stsol// byams mgo na thugs la bya ba rtsa la mi mnga' yang // bdag cag re smon grub par mdzad slad du// 'phrin
201a7(gi): las rnam bzhis 'dul thabs ji bzhin pas// gdul bya rab 'bring tha mar gyur pa rnams// bzang ngan phan gnod rtse gcig sems dpa'i// lha bgegs legs
201b1(gi): nyes byed pa gang yang rung // sbyor ba ngan pa'i bag chags gtan spangs nas// byang chub sems mchog skye bar grub pa dang // thugs rje'i zhing gyur 'gro drug
201b2(gi): sems can rnams// 'khor ba'i mtha' ring mtsho las bsgral slad du// bzlas brjod 'phro 'dus bskul nas 'phrin las mdzod// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho chen por
201b3(gi): 'khyil ba'i dbus// keng rus chen po'i ri rab brtsegs pa'i steng // rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i sa gzhi la// rab 'jigs rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /
201b4(gi): bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// dpal chen 'khor tshogs mtha' yas bzhugs pa ni// ye shes tshad med sprul pa'i thabs mnga' bas// gang mos
201b5(gi): dag la de bzhin skur snang zhing // tsal ci 'dul bzhin du cha lugs ston// thugs mtshan sna tshogs mtshon cha'i char 'bebs shing // ru lu sngags kyi sgra sgrog 'brug
201b6(gi): stong ldi re// gzi brjid spyan bzlog me stag tsha tsha ba khro// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs dug gsum zhal du rngub// ma ngags pa'i pho nya mgyogs byed glog stong 'gyu// bdud
201b7(gi): rtsi dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgyun gyis mchod// 'dzab dbyangs sngagasakyi 'phrang brnga rgyud bskul nas// 'dul 'os bsgral ba'i zhing du 'gyur ro 'tshal// byin pa rlabs tsham
202a1(gi): rngam drag pos gdug pa bsgral du gsol// thugs kyi 'phrin las bdud bzhi 'joms// bskul dang las bzhi drag pos bcom// ru mum+ba
202a2(gi): ni shes pa ni// sgra dbyangs dkyil 'khor 'gro 'du gsal// oM ni dpal chen sku gsung thugs// ru lu gnas kyi phyag rgya yin// ru lu gnas kyi yul yang yin//
202a3(gi): hUM ni thabs chen sgo ma bzhi// b+h+yo ni ma skyong rgya mtsho'i tshogs// cu ni thams cad rjud par byed// zur brgyad logs la 'bru brgyad gsal// 'bru brgyad dbus
202a4(gi): nus 'bru gcig 'bar// sngags kyi 'gro 'du bcol bskul mchod// so nI m+bu mchog kro'u rim// run yon tan tsI'i rim// mu ni gsung nyid tha mos//
202a5(gi): ni 'phrin las be kal-I// phywa ni zho byed bu ka sa// tsu ni rgyas mdzad rdzas mtsho// dz+nyA ni dbang spyad rma shan// tsu ni drag po can d+hu me// kun 'dus dpamachin
202a6(gi): nyid kyi dang // dkyil 'khor lha dgu nyid du gsal// dug lnga rnam dag ye shes mnga' brnyes shing // sku lngar ldan pas dug lnga'i 'gro ba dz+ral// rab 'bar
202a7(gi): lug pa 'jigs pa'i 'gro ba kun 'dul ba// khrag 'thu yab yum gnas yus phyag rgyang bcas// sgo bstang po jal dbang phyug dbangs dang g.yog// bka' nyan
202b1(gi): sprul pa'i khro bo khro mo la// 'bru brgyad rags pas 'bro 'dus mchod pa 'bul// byin gyi rlabs dang dngos grub sbrul du gsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na
202b2(gi): sku yi sprul pa bas ma yas kyang // bla med sku mchog rdo rje la// 'bru brgyad gsal ba'i mchod pa 'bul// sgong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gsung gi sprul
202b3(gi): pa bas ma yas kyang // bla med gsung mchog rdo rje la// 'bru brgyad gsal ba'i mchod pa 'bu la// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// thugs kyi sprul pa bsam
202b4(gi): yas kyang // bla med thugs mchog rdo rje la// 'bru brgyad gsal ba'i mchod pa 'bul// stong gsum phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// ye shes sprul pa ba sa ma mi
202b5(gi): khyab/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar// gsang ba'i mkha' las 'bru brgyad 'gro// khams gsum sems can sdug bsngal bsal// rgyal brgya
202b6(gi): mtsho'i sku la thim// bla med mchod pa dam pa sa bzhes// tshur 'dus pas ni gnas su thim// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi
202b7(gi): dngos grub thob// 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mcho dang 'bul// rtogs pa'i ye shes 'bru brgyad kyis// nyon mongs ma lus bdud bzhi 'joms// yid bzhin
203a1(gi): 'khyil pa'i 'od zer 'di// gsal bar kun la khyab pa dang // cir yang bsgyur tu btub pa dang // ye shes sku mchog rin po che// 'bru
203a2(gi): brgyad 'di ltar 'phrul po che// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// las rnams thams cad byed pa yin// dngos grub thams cad bsdud pa yin// bsam 'phel
203a3(gi): 'bru brgyad mkha' la sprul// 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho sprin ltar rjud// rang bzhin sgra tshags brjod las 'das// ru lu chos nyid shes pa ni// skye med gdod nas spros
203a4(gi): dang bral// sku gsung thugs ni mtshan ma med// snang la spros bral chos kyi dbyings// ru lu dngos grub shes pa ni// sku dang gsung thugs mkha' 'gro la//
203a5(gi): ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// dngos grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// 'bru brgyad kyi ni 'phreng ba dag/ rin chen sna lnga'i do shal bzhin// sna lnga'i 'od zer
203a6(gi): gsal bar 'gro// tsan ka yi 'bru tshad tsam// yig 'bru thugs mtshan phyag rgya'i tshogs// gsal 'tsher thogs med kun tu khyab// par 'phros pas ni gzhan don
203a7(gi): rdzogs/ tshur 'dus pas ni bdag don 'grub// rnam par spros pas bsod nams tshogs// stong par rtogs pas ye shes tshogs// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas
203b1(gi): mngon sangs rgyas// 'bras bur smin pas sku gsum thob// bsdus pas sku gsung phyag rgya ste// dngos grub mchog gi ga ter du 'gyur// de las gsang sngags
203b2(gi): ru lu'i / 'dzab bsnyen 'phro 'du bstan pa nau// phra mo'i ting 'dzan rig pa yis// gsal bas rang gi gnas sbyangs pa// rang gi ting 'dza ni rtsu la spangs te// gnas
203b3(gi): bsnyen zhes ni bye ba 'di// bcom ldan dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes sku mchog mtshon gang rin po che// dran dang srog chags gsol ba gsung gsung
203b4(gi): lha/ bstan cha mgur chu yan lag 'gul 'gul 'dra// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dpal chen dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad steng // bzhin
203b5(gi): la rdo rje yig 'bru 'bar 'bar lta// zur brgyad steng na ru lu 'bru brgyad po// gug pa skyed klad ko ra tsheg par zur phyin te// rnam gsum dus gcig yid la gsal sems
203b6(gi): ra ri khe la khol med par dran gsal rig/ chos kyi rdo rje glu blangs pas// sems nyid gsung gi rang bzhin la// yid la gsang sngags brjod pa ni// gsang
203b7(gi): sngags dag cing yig 'bru zas la// dpal chen thugs kyid kyil 'khor na// ye shes mtshon gang nye ru ka/ dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad ni// srog gi snying po 'bru
204a1(gi): brgyad po// gser gyi ba thag gzings pa bzhin// par 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus rin chen dpal be'u bskang // gnyis
204a2(gi): med byang chub sems su thim// dpal chen gsung gi dkyil 'khor nas// srog gi snying po 'bru brgyad po// gsang ba gnas kyi lam du byung // gsang ba sngags
204a3(gi): rlung gis bskyod// rnang ba mtha' yas thugs dam bskul// shangs kyi rlung sgrom chen por bsdams// lcags kyi cha tsha bsdams pa bzhin// bar 'phros pas ni
204a4(gi): gsung la thim// slar 'dus ljags kyi pad+ma bskang // gnyis su med pas 'gag med gsung // dpal chen sku yi dkyil 'khor nas// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'od zar 'phro//
204a5(gi): gsang ba ye shes rlung gis bskyod// klad pa dung khang gzhal yas su// rnam par snang mdzad thugs dam bskul// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'od du 'phro// rdo rje hUM rings sgra
204a6(gi): yis drangs// spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i bu gnas// 'gal me klad la bskor ba bzhin// par 'phros pas ni sku la thim// slar 'dus sku yi dkyil 'khor gang //
204a7(gi): gnyis su med pas 'gyur med sku// tsin+da rin chen zur brgyad kyi// gsang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ru lu 'bar ba'i yig 'bru brgyad// mgrin pa
204b1(gi): gsung gi lam du byung // gsang ba dbugs kyi rlung gis bskyod// rin chen 'khor mo'i rtswa nas drangs// klad pa lung khang gzhal yas su// mog 'bru 'od kyi 'gro 'du
204b2(gi): gsal shangs kyi rlung sbom chen po nas// rdo rje hUM rings sgra las drangs// yi ge mi 'gyur 'phreng bar 'gyur// dril bu'i sgra ltar rgyun mi 'chad// dpal be'u
204b3(gi): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes sems dpa' he ru ka'i// 'bru brgyad gsang ba'i lam brgyud de// slar 'dus dpal be'u nyid la gsal// bsnyen pa'i
204b4(gi): ting 'dzani 'phro 'du ni// dung khang dkar po'i gzhal yas khang // mgrin pa pad+ma gsang chen las// thugs kha gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rang sems byang
204b5(gi): chub 'bru brgyad nyid// ru lu gser 'greng rin po che// gcig las ma spros dgu ru ldan// bsam 'phel 'bru brgyad rin po che// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs kyi dbyig/
204b6(gi): gdod nas ye shes snying po bas// byin brlabs 'bru brgyad phyag rgyar gsal// drod tshad brtags dang ldan pa yis// de bzhin nyid du shes par bya// 'bru brgyad
204b7(gi): mi shes mkha' ba sgrol// bu gsung 'bar ba'i rgya tsho ni// srog gi snying po 'brub rgyad gsal// gnyis pa khru gsung zhugs kyi // dpa' na rin chen dun
205a1(gi): brgyad la// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'gro 'du spros// gser gyi ba thag gzings pa bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul// tshur 'dus
205a2(gi): pas ni dpal be'u bskang // dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad las// ru lu rin chen 'bru brgyad 'phro// 'gal me klad la bskor ba bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni
205a3(gi): sku la thom// rmar 'dus pas ni 'bru brgyad bzang // yid bzhin rin chen zur brgyad las// ru lu rin chen 'bru brgyad 'gro// lcags kyi tsha tsha brtags pa yis//
205a4(gi): par 'bros pas ni ljags la them// slar 'dus pas ni dpal be'u bskangs// kun gzhi'i rnam shes yul las skur gsal ba// dpal chen yab yum gnyis med
205a5(gi): sku gsung thugs// thugs kyi yon tan yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// thugs mchog rdo rje he ru yab yum la// thugs kyi dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad la// ru
205a6(gi): lu 'bru brgyad rin chen 'phro zhing 'du// par 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul// ye shes lha la bsnyen pa 'bul// slar 'dus thugs kyi dpal be'u gang // dngos
205a7(gi): grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// rnam shes dbang po khro mo'i skur snang ba// phyag rgya cha lugs gcig tu ma nges kyang // gdul bya'i dbang gis cir yang sprul pa'o//
205b1(gi): ko'u ri la sogs khro mo brgyad rnams la// dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad la// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'phro zhing 'du// par 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul// ye shes
205b2(gi): lha la bsnyen pa 'bul// slar 'dus thugs kyi dpal be'u gang // dngos grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// lha dgu rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar// tshul mchog kun la de
205b3(gi): bzhin sbyar// yul bzhi dus bzhi 'phra men sku ru snang // mgo brnyan tshogs kyis dur khrod za mdzad cing // rdo rje mche ga shog 'phra men mgo brnyan tshogs// sing nga
205b4(gi): la sogs 'phra men brgyad rnams la// dpal be'u rdo rje tshul mchog ni// kun la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// phyin ci log bzhi'i gnas su dag byung ste// tshad med bsdu ba pa ni
205b5(gi): yi ngang tshul can// 'gugs byed 'ching sdom byed pa'i las mkhan ma// dkyil 'khor srung ba'i sgo ma bzhi rnams la// dpal gyi bka' nyan dam tshig gnyen bsrung zhing //
205b6(gi): ma sring rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis brtser dgongs te// grogs la lba zhing 'gal ba tshar gcod pa// ma tshogs dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// cha lugs khro 'jigs spyod pa rab
205b7(gi): mdzes pa// gzhan dag sreg mdzad gtsol mnyas stong nga nga // 'dzad pa rnam dag pa po lasgrol mdzad pa// dkyim 'khor myong ba'i srung ma bzhi rnams la// gang shegs
206a1(gi): bzhugs mi mnga' gang yang thogs med cing // rtog pa kun bral thams cad sa le mkhyen// bya brtsal med bzhin gzhan dag tshar gcod mkhas//
206a2(gi): bka' nyan mngag gzhug po nya rdul snyed ma// phyogs bcu'i sa dang nam mkha'i 'jig rten na// lha dang lha min phra rags gzugs 'chang zhing // gsang sngags don la 'chang
206a3(gi): zhing thugs chud pa'i// gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i gnyer blangs pas// rigs 'dzin sngags 'chang rnal 'byor thams cad la// phyogs bcu stong gi 'jig rten na/
206a4(gi): sna tshogs snang ba thabs mchog yab// ma skyes pa nyid shes rab yum// gnyis med gcig pas zung du 'brel// ji snyed brjod pa'i chos rnams kun// thabs dang
206a5(gi): shes rab rang bzhin he// ye shes lha dang dbyer med cing // 'bru brgyad sngags kyi yi ge gsum// spros pas bla med mchod pa 'bul// bsdus pas byang chub sems su
206a6(gi): gnas/ dngos grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// yab yum gsang ba'i mkha' dbyings la// 'bru brgyad dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbyings brgyud de//
206a7(gi): dngos grub gsang ba'i mkha' la rdzogs// pad+ma rA ga 'od kyi maN+Dal nas// byi ru dmar po dbang gi maN+Dal la// ge sar stong gis brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// dpal chen
206b1(gi): he ru ka'i thugs kyang rin po che// bsgrub mchog bdag gi thugs kyang rin po che// gdod nas ma skyes thugs kyang rin po che// thams cad ma lus bde chen dbyings su rdzogs
206b2(gi): mtshan med spros bral bde chen dbyings su thim// ji ltar 'ja' tshon gsal gyur yang // nam mkha'i ngang las yongs kyis 'byung // phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul gsal gyur yang //
206b3(gi): ma skyes ngang gis 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul yin// rang rig ye shes mnyam nyid rol pa las// ma skyes ngang gis rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs// rang rig rtsol dang bral bas dbyings su
206b4(gi): rdzogs/ thams cad ye shes 'arab rgyas byang chub sems// skye med gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin la// 'bru brgyad phyag rgya cho 'phrul cir yang snang // thams cad dbyer med
206b5(gi): byang chub sems kyi ngang // tshig las 'das pas ma bcos lhun gyis grub// oM ru khu ru khu hU b+h+yo hU/ yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yis// a kha o rgyan ma dang bcas// sku
206b6(gi): rnams ma lus lus pa yin// dbyangs dang gsal byed kun la khyab// u bzhis spras pa rnal 'byor gyis// srog sngags zab mo shes pa yin// ha u thig le sgo ma'i don//
206b7(gi): rje tshan bzhi pa'i gsum pa la// band byed yan ma grog sbas/ rje 'byung su dang thig le thug pa// sngags rnams btu ba gsang gdan ni// blo ldan sngags pa yang shes nas
207a1(gi): bzlas yang na rdo rje'i bzlas par 'gyur// cis kyang mi phyed mi shigs pa'i// stong pa'i go cha bla na med// mtshan ma'i yul kun bcom nas kyang /
207a2(gi): / thams cad kun tu rgyal bar gnas// oM badz+ra kA ya babAk+ka tsa ti sa maN+Da hU/ ming dang mtshan ma ra ma grub pas// mi gnas ma byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbyings kyis bsrung
207a3(gi): ba sa na/ rgyal bas kyang ni mo mthong ngo // au ta su r+ya ta bak+Sha hU/ rmad byung gsang sngags dam tshig mnos pa las// nyon mongs dug lnga 'dus pa'i dbang song nas//
207a4(gi): lta ba dmas shes spyod pa rtsing ba yis// rtsa ba zhig cing yan lag nyams pa dang // slob dpon grogs mched thugs dang ci 'gal ba// ye shes lha 'phangs dngos grub
207a5(gi): yal la sogs// nongs pa mchis kyang 'gal ba ma mthong ba// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'dir bshags na// 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pas bzod pa zhes la//
207a6(gi): tshangs pa dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol// bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir// rol pa'i 'phro 'du la sogs gnas gyur te// spen pa'i lung bzhin
207a7(gi): g.yeng ba med pa yis// las kyi bye brag bzhin du bsgrub par bya// ston pa thabs mkhas thugs rje che ba yis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don du gsungs pa yin// he ru ka'i
207b1(gi): gal po las/ ru lu spros pa'i brtag pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po rnams kyis rdo
207b2(gi): rje theg pas bdag gzhan thams cad 'khor ba las yongs su bsgral bar bya ba'i thabs 'di dag gsungs so// gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa nas// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu
207b3(gi): yis/ rtogs pas bdag bsgral thugs rjes gzhan// rdo rje bam pa sbubs gnas chog bya// dang po bsam gtan chos dgu ni// lus ngag sems gsum sbyang bar bya//
207b4(gi): lus dang ngag sems gtan la dbab// byams sems ma dam bla ma dran// 'di dgu rnal 'byor can gyis bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bcad nas// gsung ba'i
207b5(gi): 'khor lo yang dag gnas// lus kham sa bdud rtsi chen po la// sman dang gtor ma rak+ta yin// phyi nang gsang ba'i bshags pa yis// lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkrus
207b6(gi): dang por stong nyid bsgoms pas ni// rang mus dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// rtsa ni gzhal yas sprul pa'i sku// yi ge sngags ni longs spyod rdzogs// lus khams
207b7(gi): bdud rtsa chos kyi sku// ngo bo nyid sku snying po rlung // zhu bzhi rang gnang wA ru rdzogs/ las kyi rlung la 'jug pa bzhi// nyams su blang ba'i gnas rnams ni// bdun
208a1(gi): cu tham pa man ngag gnas// gnas sbyong bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yin// pho mo ma ning thod rgal rlung // khams ni 'dus pa dang po la// rgyun rlung lag
208a2(gi): cha can dag gis// rtsa bral lus sems rmi lam du// nyams kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin// phyi nang gsum la nang 'jug gsum// khong nas kha sbyor dbugs gcig bdun//
208a3(gi): gzhi ni rtse ba'i rlung lnga la// yan lag lnga sde rnam dbye bcu// bcu la mi gnas las dang bcas// zin pa'i gzugs dang ting 'dzin ni// rang skyon bcos thabs bdun
208a4(gi): 'gyur bas// man ngag gnas ni bdun cur gsungs// de dag phan yon bcas pa ni// rnal 'byor rnams kyis bslab par bya// rlung dang lus khams bdud rtsi
208a5(gi): gnyis/ rtsa sngags gsum gyis lam yang khrid// khams ni 'dus pa bar ma la// lag cha bri ba'i rlung gis dril// mthong snang re dogs bral ba'i lam// sad pa
208a6(gi): bzhi dang dgra langs yin// khams 'dus tha ma lag cha bral// sku bzhi gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de nas 'jig rten 'das pa'i kham// sa rnams non par rgyal bas
208a7(gi): gsungs// byi rabs rnal 'byor thams cad la// rdo rje 'chang gis rgyas par bshad// kye ho skal ldan rigs kyi bu// 'khor 'das thun mong 'tshams dang 'das//
208b1(gi): 'jig rten pa dang 'khor lo bskor// 'khor 'das thun mong lam bshad na// snang ba gsum du bstan pa'i lam// kun gzhi lus dang phyag rgya che// rgyu rgyud thabs rgyud
208b2(gi): 'bras bu'i rgyud// bla ma ba sgrub pa bde gshegs dngos// man ngag nyams myong lung 'brel chad// gad ma ngag drug tu bstan pa dang // snyun rgyud bzhi yis gtan la
208b3(gi): bob/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gsum// thabs dang shes rab mthar ltung ba'i// bsrung ba'i bye brag bstan pas na// rnal 'byor pa yis lam bstan bya//
208b4(gi): 'jig rten 'khor lo 'cha' ba'i lam// khams kyi 'du lugs rnam pa gsum// tshom bu rnam pa drug tu gcad// mdor brdzus gnyis su bstan pa yang // snying po drug
208b5(gi): gi lam yang khrid// khams kyi bdud rtsis khris pa dang // rtsa'i yi ges lam khrid do// lam lnga lta bur bgrod pa ni// tshogs sbyor sgom mthong mthar phyin yin// byang
208b6(gi): chub phyogs ltar bgrod pa ni// lam lnga'i yan lag nyid du 'gyur// dbyug gcig rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni// bla ma nyid la zhus byas te// dbugs kyi rgya ba g.yas g.yon
208b7(gi): khams grog rtsol nyams su blas byas nas// mthar phyin ngon tan skyon sel byed// phyir 'gro gtang bar bya ba yang // rtsol bar bkag la srog nas gtang // shugs
209a1(gi): bskyed sna bug gnyis nas gtang // kha nas sgra bcas gtang ba'o// dgang ba'i yan lag rnam pa gnyis// rtsol ba bkag ste srog nas dgang //
209a2(gi): kha nas sgra med dgang bar bya// de nas rlung gnyis kha sbyar la// nyams su blang zhing bsgom par bya'o// man ngag bdun cu tham pa yang // srog 'dzin nam mkha'i
209a3(gi): rluSha ti la// me dang nus pa mnyam pas na// me yi rlung du yang dag gnas// thur du sel ba'i rlung zhes pa// sa dang 'dres pa yi na zhes bya// gyen la rgyu
209a4(gi): ba'i rlung de ni// rlung gi rlung de sna bug gnyis// khyab byed rlung ni chu nyid la// kun la khyab par gnas pa'o// yan lag rlung lnga rgyu ba ni// me yi rlung gis spyan rab
209a5(gi): gsal/ rab tu rgyu ba rna ba'i rlung // shin du rgyu ba sna rlung sa// mngon par rgyu ba chu rlung lce// yang dag rgyu ba nam mkha'i rlung // rtsa ni de nyid la dor gnas// rlung
209a6(gi): la rngan gdags byin pa dang // sems drod byin brlabs drug po dang // steng 'og bde ba rnam gnyis bsgom// lam gyi khrid lugs rab bshad na// rlung lnga rang gnas
209a7(gi): thim pa'i nyams// 'byung lnga'i rlung stobs 'phel ba'i nyams// 'byung ba bzhi ni cha mnyam dang // 'byung ba bcu drug cha mnyam ste// 'byung ba rlung lnga dbang bsgyur byed//
209b1(gi): pus kham sa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// bzhi mnyam gla rtsi chen po dang // si la nyi ma me khas byung // zla ba ga pu ra pha la ste// mang sa chu dang bcas pa ni// de bzhin
209b2(gi): sangs rgyas snang ba'o// rtsa gnas lam ni srog shing gsum// dkyil 'khor bzhi la gnas pa dang // nyams nga myang ngan 'dre yi rtse// g.yal dang mchil ma'i rtsa
209b3(gi): rnams so// yi ges lam ni khrid pa yang // tsha grangs dmyal ba ti nag po// dud 'gro byol song dud ka'i du// yi dgas bkres skom bri yig dmar// ni re yig sngon
209b4(gi): po gleng bzhi mi// su ser lha mine ri rab nang // lha yi a dkar ri rab rtse// 'dod pa'i khams kyi sa bon no// bsam gtan A ni gzugs kyi khams// rtogs
209b5(gi): spyod dga' bder snang ba'o// gzugs med khams ni yi ge a// skye mched mu bzhir snang ba'o// sku yi o la gsung gi A// hU ni thugs te yo na ha na sA// 'phrin
209b6(gi): las yi ge ha yin la// dkar dmar mthing ser ljang ku yin// bru ni gti mug zhe sdang hUM// khang ni nga rgyal 'dod chags hri// phrag dog a nyid dug lngar gnas// bru
209b7(gi): ra ha ni dug gsum sngags// au dang a dang hru las ni// ma zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo gnas// snying po'i a dang zung 'jug hUM// dbyes dang ye shes chos skur gnas/
210a1(gi): khams ni 'dus pa bar ma la// se lkog k+Sha mi yi ge las// srin po ru kA'i snang ba yis// khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i nyams su snang // mnyen
210a2(gi): khyug rnam pa bzhi po las// yi ge'i man ngag a kha ra// dngos grub rang yin re ba med// bar chad dngos grub dogs pa med// sad pa bzhi khas stong pa lnga// lha
210a3(gi): rdzogs rgyan dang spong ba dran// cho ga shes bdud la byin chen 'phrang // yang dag spong ba'i gnyen po bzhi// khams kyi 'dus pa tha ma la// rnam rtog spong ba pad can yul//
210a4(gi): dag rgyud yid 'jug rnam rtog spong // rdo rje'i skyil krung lus ngag yid// thig le rlung yang non pa'o// cho ga shes bdud bcom sbyor lam drod// nang gi sangs rgyas
210a5(gi): srid rtse gnyis// ma skyes bzod thob sbyor lam gsum// 'khor ba'i chos 'das lam rdzogs so// skyon can skyon med rlung sems 'dus// ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan
210a6(gi): nyid yin// 'jig rten pa yi la ma yin no// 'khor lo bskor ba 'jig rten 'das// mthong sgom la ma ni bdun dang brgyad// sa drug rlung 'jug dngas ma brtags//
210a7(gi): rim pas las rnams kun lhan pa// sa gzhi dbang rlung bdud rtsi bcud// yi dgas byin pa rlobs longs sku nyid// sa gnyis dkyil 'khor chos sku stong // stobs
210b1(gi): lnga dang sa ma cher dag pa// sa phyed rdo rje ngo bo gshegs// rlung rtsi bdud rtsi yi ge khrid// mthar phyin 'bras bu 'gros bzhi tha ma// mi phyed mthar gnas gyur pa'o//
210b2(gi): da nas zhing bcu bsgral bar bya// bsgrub rdzas de dag byin gyis brlabs// dmigs med stobs kyi gdeng can gyis// sku mchog 'bar ba'i tshul du ba sam// khams
210b3(gi): gsum khrag tu dmigs nas ni// dur khrod kun tu khyab par bsam// oM dang a hA sA hA bkod// stong pa lnga dang skongs pa lnga// mnyes pa lnga dang 'bras bu lnga// ra maM
210b4(gi): kha gis bsregs sbyangs 'thor// dngos ni a ru byin brlabs nas// rin chen gsal bar bshar ba dang // byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'gro// mos pa'i thugs la gnyis
210b5(gi): bsams nas// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung // phyag mtshan snying po phra mo dag/ bstan par regs nas mkha' la bzhag/ bskul ba'i rang bzhin kun 'dus
210b6(gi): pas des kyang sbyor ba'i lam rnams byed// dngos ni mchod pa'i rdzas su bsngo// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje bkyis bsgrub pa bshad// dngos grub chen po
210b7(gi): blang ba ni// las la grub pa'i dngos grub yod// gsum lam dun ni dbu na brang // khro bo rol pa bya dang // 'phra men 'jo chub brtsal bar bya// gcan gzan rgyal
211a1(gi): po'i sha mi 'phags// stag gzig rol pa'i gdong mi brdzu// rig ngan sle sha spangs byas nas// khung nas dngos grub gshed dang bral// ro ru gzigs
211a2(gi): nas gzhal yas khang // khrus kyis bkru bar bya ba dang // rigs drug 'gro ba'i gnas yang sbyang // rgyu drug sa bon sbyang ba dang // dug lnga'i gnas sbya dag par bya//
211a3(gi): tshe 'das par dor 'khyams pa de// rnam par shes pa rten la dgug/ las dang nyon mongs slob pa sbyangs// zan skal gtad la lha ngo bstan// slob mar shes pas chas
211a4(gi): su bzhag/ chos sbyangs dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bya// ru tra dgra bgegs pa kug la pastim// skr-i gshegs mtshon chas gnas nas skrod// lha ru shes pas dkyil
211a5(gi): 'khor du// rdo rje snying la mkhal ma gshegs// rin chen mcher ba pad+ma mchin// glo ba las te rigs rnams ni// dkyil 'khor dag tu skor bar bya// ri ba sgrub
211a6(gi): zhi be cha ga ser khro// snying ni badz+ra he ru ka/ sa chu me rlung phyogs bzhi khro// rna mig sna lce 'tshems ma ste// gsang ba ya ba yum gyi lha skur bsgom// ro la sa dam rdzas
211a7(gi): 'byung bas na// ka pA la ni dngos grub snod// 'chi bdag kha ru dam sri ma nan// bdud rtsi lnga la mchod pa'i rdzes// gling bu sa bod tsang phu ra pas bsgral// bla rer dbub
211b1(gi): cing nyu le bzlogs// thal ba sku gdung dge bar gdab// bde bar gshegs pa mchod par bya// tshogs gnyis rdzogs sangs rgyas thob 'gyur// bcom ldan steng gi gnas
211b2(gi): mchog na// nyon mongs byang chub 'god mdzad pa'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// thugs dam 'phrin las 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan
211b3(gi): nas dang por brtags pa'i gnas chen du// blangs sbyang byin brlabs kun byas te// khra bo mang po bkram nas ni// bgegs rnams gdul zhing brlags shing byer//
211b4(gi): sngags mkhan bya ba kun byas nas// phyogs skyong khan chags gtang bar bya// bskang gso tshangs pa nod phyir bod// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa tshul bzhin bzhag/ ma nor
211b5(gi): lha ni bsnyen byas la// cha med sangs rgyas kun zhus nas// 'phangs la bsgom gtor gang bas bri// bum pa byin brlabs bzang mos brgyan// rdzas la dbye ba'i
211b6(gi): lha gnyis gcig/ las kyi bye bas bskyed cing dgod// mthong byir rgyan du ze ba ni// ri mor bris pa'i gzhal med khang // dar gyi lding bu la sogs bre// gsal rdzogs
211b7(gi): byin lal pa sti ma mchod la// dam rig thugs lde'i bzhug phral pa TI ga/ bzlubatha dang mchod dang 'phags pa'i tsho gas// lung bzhin las rnams mthar phyin bya// bsgom
212a1(gi): dbyangs mchod bstod bskul nas ni// rgyud lnga'i lam nas btsal drag dgug/ sras 'gyur lam bstan yang dang yang // rgyu drug lam nas drag pos dgug/
212a2(gi): gsal bas thugs rje'i sems la gzung // lha bas bsgral du med lung dbog/ gang yin sras su lung gis bskyed// tsaSh+Ti la ni lha na ne bos// thabs dang shes rab
212a3(gi): ma g.yos pa'o// gru gsum pa sa ni bsgral bar bya// lung bcas sngags dang phyag rgya yis// yab yum gnas su phaT kyis 'phangs// bo de tsat+te la sogs dbang //
212a4(gi): gral bkod longs spyod smon lam bskul// las kyi bag chags bstan sbyangs phyir// ye shes 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin la// tshad med thugs rje'i sku bzhugs nas// rang
212a5(gi): byung me yis sreg mdzad phyir// mtha' dbus med pa'i gzhal yas khang // rim pa'i sgo dang rgyan ldan bri// sgrib gcod 'khor lo rtsa bas brgyad nang // zhal nyid//
212a6(gi): hom khung 'bar ba ru// lha rnams yam shing nyid du spungs// dngos dang yo byad mchod pa bkram// ba shal thag byed pa stabs stabs 'tshams// mchod rdzas
212a7(gi): rgyan bkod byin brlabs te// rdzogs pa'i lung bskyed bsnan byas la// mchod rdzas nyid du dbul ba 'am// mthun pa'i lha la bkram byas nas// ting 'dzin
212b1(gi): rim bzhin bskyed pa dang // las la 'jug tshul snga ma bzhin// khrus byas dbang bskur smon lam btab nas// dur khrod yam shing me sbar te// las kyi sgrib pa
212b2(gi): mtshams bcad la// sregs dang gsal rdzogs pasti ma la sogs// gcig char rims kyis mchod pa ni// so so'i lung mthun 'byor pas 'bul// rdzas kyi
212b3(gi): sgrib gcod smon lam gdab// tshogs mchod gtad phyir dral 'bod gdung // lam 'phar bskul nas mthar phyung las// lhag ma bshags sbyangs spyod bcol
212b4(gi): bskangs// gtang rag gsol cing gnyer du sbas// bsod nams 'phel cing tshe byin pa srung // dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing lus bsrung bgo/ las kyi 'bras bu bsngo

213a1(gi): rtogs pa'i blo can de dag gis// srog lus man chad rdzas kyis rnams// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// dngos grub 'dod par gsol ba

213a7(gi): rnams la stsal du gsol// zhes brjod gar dang bro yis bskor// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi bdag pa ni// ye shes sku mchog rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rig pa byang chub
213b1(gi): sems kyi me tog 'di// gnyis med rig pa'i dbyings su thim nas kyang // bdag lus bem po dus 'dir sbyang ba dang // dpal chen skur 'gyur dngos grub stsal du gsol//

213b6(gi): ru sha chen gru bzhi nyid// nub tu rak+Sha zla gam la// byang du dri chu gru gsum bya// slob dpon ji bzhin stan bder gnas// rdo rje'i tshul du dbang dag sbyin// chos dbyings
213b7(gi): yum gyi b+ha ga na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor lo brang bzhugs// gnyis med byang chub sems rtags chul// spyi nas pastim zhi'i dbang bskur bas/ khyod kyi bag chags dag/
214a1(gi): gyur nas// lus la sangs rgyas bltams par shog/ ka la sha a b+hi Shim+bu a/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ri ni chen tshe// dpag tu med pa'i 'od dang ldan//
214a2(gi): rigs mchog phyag rgya lngar ldan pas// khams gsum bdag por dbang ba skur ro// au rat+na ma ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsi swa ma tra tra tra tra tra/ dbu rgyan mi 'gyur mnga' brnyes pas/

214a5(gi): sprul pa'i sras// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par dbang bskur ro// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i rdo rje dang // chos sgra sgrogs pa'i dril bu yis// de rang khyod la dbang bskur
214a6(gi): bas/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel bar shog/ oM pra dz+nyA sa ma yo ga badz+ra si d+he ga na d+ha a b+hi Shi hU a/ dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas//
214a7(gi): deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i sku ru mdzad du gsol// oM ka ya badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ dpal ldan rdo rje gsung 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas
214b1(gi): dedang bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol// oM thA kra badz+ra a b+hi ShiSh+Ta a/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/
214b2(gi): de nga bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i thugs su mdzad du gsol// oM tsat+ta badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsum mi

214b4(gi): 'phreng ba ste// rin chen rgyu las byas pa yis// byang chub yan lag 'phreng ba ste// 'phags mchod 'gro don byed pa la// bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang // bar chad
214b5(gi): med par dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra ra da na ma le a b+hi Shiny+tse aHbadz+ra na ma mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ mtshan ma'i spros bral ba na d+ha'i rdza sa mchog 'di// sngon gyi skyes mchog

214b7(gi): d+hi shA ri g+ha/ badz+ra ka pA la/ d+harma ka ya/ nir+tha kA baM b+ho ga kA ya/ a b+hi Shi a bag chags nyes pa'i skyon bral zhing // 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi
215a1(gi): gos pa'i// ye shes lnga ldan cod pan 'di// khyod la dbang mchog bskur bar bya// oM badz+ra pa ta la ba na a b+hi Shiny+tsa tr-i/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sgrub rdzas dri chen
215a2(gi): 'dis/ skal ldan bsgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// chos dbyings ye shes rtogs gyur nas// de bzhini rigs kyi dngos grub thob gyur cig/ skye med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin

215a7(gi): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// oM sarba pany+dza na a mr-i ta a b+hi She l+le maM/ kha T+Ta ka ni thabs kyi sku// shes rab Da ma ru ka'i sgra// thabs dang shes rab dbang bskur bas// stong nyid snying
215b1(gi): rje'i dbang thob shog/ o d+ha tu ka ru a b+hi Shiny+tsA maM/ dpal chen yab yum gsang ba'i thugs bsdus pas// skye med dbyings las ye shes me gsal bas// sku gsung lhun rdzogs
215b2(gi): dag pa'i mar me 'dis// kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur spun dgu'i ye shes sbyin// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'i bag chags rnams// sgrib pa phyir bsal ye shes gsal bar shog
215b3(gi): oM ma hA di ba a lo ke a b+hi Shiny+tsA hU/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sku mchog ra sa ya na ni// srid gsum dbang bsdus longs spyod chen po'i rkyen// rang byung dag pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga//
215b4(gi): / rgyud lnga rtsad gcod skye shi med pa'i dbang // grub nas ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin 'dis// rigs mchog rgyal ba lnga ru dbang bskur sbyin// oM a hU sA hA sarba pany+tsa oM mr-i ta A be sha gu ru
215b5(gi): a d+hi tiSh+ThA swa ma/ thugs rje dang nyid zhi ba'i rang bzhin las// ma g.yos sku mchog sku gsung thugs mnga' ba// sdug bsngal log par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams// thugs rje
215b6(gi): mi phyed dbyings su sgrol mdzad pa// bar chod byed pa'i bgegs chen bshig pa'i phyir// khro rgyal 'bar ba'i byin brlabs dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra ki le ya d+ha rod b+ha ba a d+hiSh+ThA na hUM/ dro
215b7(gi): rgyal yab yum gsang ba'i thugs ka nas// bral byed par sha ba na'i mtshom char ldan// bar chod bgegs kyi tshogs 'joms grub rdzas 'dis// dbang bskur bgeshegs kyis mi tshugs go char
216a1(gi): nyungs kar rgyal por byin brlabs shar rem// skam ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur ro// oM a sUd ta sarba ab+hi Sha mu~M ku ru rag shaH/ lhag pa'i thal chen
216a2(gi): mtshan ma 'dis// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// shing chen kun dang gcig pa dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po bskyed pa dang // dbang chen thabs kyis
216a3(gi): bsdu ba'i phyir// 'di ni bdag nyid chen po'i brtags// 'di ni sngon gyi dam tshig ste// grub pa'i dam rdzas chen po'i dbang // brtags kyi dbang rdzas chen po'i sbyin// oM hU b+hI ba sme
216a4(gi): sha saM d+hi a b+hi Shony+tsa ku ru hU/ thugs rje'i dbang gis chags pa'i rag+na ni// pad+ma rag+na dpa' mo rnal 'byor ma'i// dur khrod mnga' mdzad ma dang mkha' 'gro rnams// ma lus
216a5(gi): dbang du sdud pa'i dbang thob shog/ o DA ki ni ma hA ra k+Sha A b+hi Shiny+tsA ma hUM b+h+yo/ kun rdzob snang ba don dam bcud kyis khyab// bcud chen zhag gis nyon mongs tha ba 'dul/
216a6(gi): rtogs tshad 'bul ba'i lang ka kun dang gcig/ chos nyid dbyings la gnas pa'i dbang thob shog/ o d+harma d+ha tu gar+N+Na ma hA ma sa a b+hi Shiny+tsA a/ dbyings la ye shes sgrog
216a7(gi): byed gab pa'i gsung // dam las sdud cing pha rol gnon// ye shes dbyings su sgrol mdzad mchod pa'i gter// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur sbyin// oM ka
216b1(gi): pa la gad+ha ho a b+hi Shany+tsa A/ 'jig rten 'di na srid pa'i zhal zas la// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga mi zad gter// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis//
216b2(gi): yid bzhin 'dod dgu'i gter la dbang bzhin no// A lo ga a laM u li a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma/ mar ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// skal ldan bsgrub pa po la dbang
216b3(gi): bskur bas// dgra bgegs thams cad zhi bar gyur nas kyang // byang chub sems kyis don dam rtogs par shog/ au pa ra a b+hi Shits+tshe maM/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug ga la phyis
216b4(gi): dbang bskur bas// khams gsum thams dbang du sdud pa dang // 'gro ba'i sems can nyon mongs gnas su 'joms// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i mthu ldan shog
216b5(gi): oM b+ha ta a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma/ 'bru bcud kun gyi 'dza' gad dpa' bo yi// skal ldan bsgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// 'gro ba thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang // thams cad bran bzhin
216b6(gi): dbang du sdud par shog/ oM ma hA su ra a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma/ khams gsum dbang sdud zla gam dbang gi zas// skal ldan bsgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs
216b7(gi): cham gnyis rdzogs te// longs spyod chen po'i rkyen du 'gyur bar shog/ o ka pi kAM ya a b+hi Sheng+ku ma gzugs sogs bud med lha mo'i tshogs// 'dod pa k+Sha yi 'on tan dag/ tshas nyid
217a1(gi): dbyings kyi rgyan yin pas// dga' mgur spyod pa'i dbang bskur ro// na mo ha ra na gu na ban+d+ha a b+hi Shim+b+ha A/ skye shi med pa rdo rje tshe yi dbang // sbrul ldan bsgrub pa po la
217a2(gi): dbang bskur bas// tshe ring nad med phun sum tshogs nas kyang // dus gsum rgyal ba kun kyang 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lor sbyin// de nyid rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes su// skye shi
217a3(gi): 'khor ba'o sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ oM badz+ra a yu She a b+hi Shiny+tsa tra swA hA/ de nas gzungs ma mtshan ldan de// rdo rje slob dpon chen po yi// g.yon phyogs gnas la tshul bzhin du// gsang
217a4(gi): dbang shes rab bde chen po// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// de ni byin gyis brlabs pa yang // gar mkhan tshul 'dra sgyu ma'i rgya// yul lnga gnas lngar gsal ba yang // de la 'ja' tshon bzhin
217a5(gi): du gsal// yab yum rol pa'i byang chub sems// 'dod chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// thim pa'i rgyal mor byin gyis brlabs// yab yum bsno
217a6(gi): mar bskul byas la// ye shes dam tshig chen po yis// bde mchog sgyu ma'i brda mtshon te// mkha' gsang bsnol mar byin brlab pa// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// sbyor bas byang
217a7(gi): sems dbab pa ni// dbyings kyi bde mchog 'byung ba de// rang rig ye shes de la 'dod// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba dag/ dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher// byang chub sems ni kun tu dag/
217b1(gi): sgrib sbyangs mchod don byed pa yang // khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang // ma lus snying rjes khyab bya ste// 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung // ye
217b2(gi): shes khu ba'i bcud thim nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni// de dag dngos grub chen po pas// sku gsung thugs dbang slob ma de// ji ltar 'dod par nan tan bya// skye med byang chub
217b3(gi): sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// dkar la dag pas gnyis med byang chub sems// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yab yum
217b4(gi): sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'dis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mnyes// sdug bsngal las grol thabs dang ldan// theg pa chen po rab dga' bas// 'dod chags byang chub lam du
217b5(gi): mdzad sbyor ba'i mchod pa thabs lam mchog/ dbang thob mdzes pa de dag gis// dul ba'i sems su bzhag nas ni// dam tshig chen po bde bar gnas// dbang don bsgom
217b6(gi): bsgrub nyams su blang // bu ma dbang bskyed rim dbyings kyi lam// gsang ste snying mgrin spyi bo ru// las rin rdor chos rnam pa dang // yum dang bcas dbyings bde stong 'jug
217b7(gi): ga ma lab ni// snang rab thong dang zung du 'ju// bram jo bo ga cig la dang // grub mtha' 'khor 'das 'gyeb mer/ ba drug pa rtags dang ldan pa'o//
218a1(gi): 'da' ka rnam pa gsum// snang ba bsgyur ba'i 'da' ka ma// 'od kyi gong bus 'pho ba dang // sgra yis 'pho ba'i 'da' ka ma// 'bras bu rigs 'dzin thob pa dang //
218a2(gi): rang lus rtsa las grub pas ni// rtsa nyid sprul skur lhun grub thob// gsang dbang bdag byin brlab pa'i lam// rlung gi gzhu la me yi me'// byang sems haM gis 'ben la brteg/
218a3(gi): myur du ye shes 'char bar 'gyur// sbyar ba'i sbyor ba med pa'o// kha sbyar lam sbyangs lta ba bskyangs// drod yang byung rgyal btang ba dang // thun ni grangs tshad med pa la// yid kyi 'jug yul khams
