218a5(gi): rdzogs pas// sa gzhi rigs drug skad gnyis shes// grub mtha' ma snyoms mda' ma ka/ rlung ni dbu mar thim pa'o// 'bras bu lus kyi yi ge nyid// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur grub thob// shes
218a6(gi): rab ye shes dbang don bsgom// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo thabs kyi lam// lus ngag 'dod pa byin brlabs ma nyams// skyes pas dag pa'i rig ma rnams// ri dgas can ma dung can ma// glang po
218a7(gi): can dang ri mo can// sna tshogs ma dang sbyangs pas dag/ bsnyen pa skad cig dang po la// dga' ba'i ye shes skyes pa ni// gzugs dang dri las bde ba bsgom// nye ba'i bsnyen pa bya ba yang // bo la ka ko/
218b1(gi): la sbyar zhing // skad cig gnyis pa mchog dga' yis// ye shes thig le 'bar ba'i drong // bsgrub pa bsrubs pa la skad cig gsum// dga' bral bde ba g.yo ba'i drod// zin pa rtags byung nas
218b2(gi): rtsa rtsa la la// rdo rje pad+ma rtsa dang ni// thig le rlung dang bde stong chud// bde ba brtags par bya ba gces// dbab pa dag la ma mkhas na// thig le myur du nyams par 'gyur// dbab pa
218b3(gi): mkhas pa ru sa sbal 'gros// rgya mtsho lus kyi 'gyur ba drug gi ma thil bsrung / ri rab logs la skam// gling bzhi dba' du bsdu ba dang // ro 'jani rang gi gnas su sbyar// dbang po'i
218b4(gi): mchog ni steng du bzhag/ ngag stobs hUM sgra ring du drang // ting 'dzin hUM phaT mda' stob rnal sa gyur/ gzhu 'phang // ga ga pani lus lam mol bkrug lus kyi ro ladzi skye rgan la kyang/ spyod lam ldan byas nas// lag
218b5(gi): spyan gnyis gyen du zlog ste thod lan du dril/ g.yas nyi dris par pa / ma g.yon pa bla// ting nge 'dzin gyis mthil thu drag shul la phaT kyi 'phrul pa'i mda' rdeg ste drug po dus gcig la yod par bya/ pus mo gnyi se ma bsnol ma ra dag pa// hU thu hUM r-i dza
218b6(gi): mdun du dgu// g.yas g.yon dag tu gsum gsum de// bud pa gsum dang rngub pa gsum// 'khor ba dag tu sbyang bar bya// nyi ma dag ni gsum pa la// lba ba sbubs su nub
218b7(gi): par 'gyur// byin gyis brlab sogs byas nas no// srin pa'i lam ni cung zad pa rnams// phung 'jub gnyis ni drag du ga zhig/ mig gzhis steng du bzad par bya// 'dis na rjeg
219a1(gi): le 'dzin par 'gyur// yang na ha la hal drag tu brjod// lus kyi 'khor lo gru bzhi bye// 'dis kyang thig le 'dzin par 'gyur// gzung ba'i man ngag ma

219a4(gi): dud 'gro'i 'gyur ba bzhi// de nas rlung gi ske rags bcing // de bzhin zhags pa 'phang ba dang // lus kyang gtun shing 'khor lo bskor// bu chung spyod lam byas pas ni// lus

223a1(gi): ni/ mgo ni seng ge mgo bo lnga// hur mo seng ge'i ngar sgra sgrogs// srid pa'i gnam sa 'grum pa spyad// ral pa ser sprin 'khrig pa

223a7(gi): grag pa'i sa ni gdan du gting // khams gsum 'jig rten pang du khyer// srid pa gsum ni khur du khur// nyi ma'i skyon ldan spyan nas 'char// zla ba'i
223b1(gi): dmar dang zhal nas 'char// lag na ri rab rtse dgu 'thor// shin tu mi bzang gtum chen mo// klu 'dul chen mo'i dus la ba pa// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya ste
223b2(gi): du sa la bab pa'i e ka ma// o ra ga sha ru dra/ yag sha tshal pa/ ha na ha na hU phaT/ brjod nas g.yas bskor g.yon nas bzlog/ ga nas skabs
223b3(gi): beg zan ras sogs la// de la ling ka rab tu bya// dam can phud btang ye shes bsrungs// las dang 'brel dang rang dang 'brel// phur pa byin gyis

231a6(gi): ba ra ma ti ra kha TA ka/ g.yon pa rak+ta rgyu zhag sa g.yas// oM badz+ra shri he ru ka ma hA tsan+da sarba duSh+Ta Na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM/ sngon du bdun 'bu ma rang lu sa bsrung //

231b1(gi): bzhi dag na 'dzin// srod la bsgrub pa'i drag sngags dang // mtshon cha 'bar ba'i drag sngags bzlas// du ni dun ting du la sa dza/ du ru dz+wa la ni ha na dza/ du ma ra ha te
231b2(gi): tsa b+h+yo dzaHdza du ra dza sa ma ya dza/ dza e du ling sa ma ya dza/ dza ra pra ti sa ma ya dza/ dbye ba'i sngags ni rnam pa gsum// dbye dang 'gugs dang bskrad pa'o// hUM du ri
231b3(gi): pra ba shag/ du ri pra ba chu ma ril/ hU ma ra ya dun phaT/ gzugs la ba stim zhing gzugs la dab ba// gsang ba rab tu bshad pa'o// ma hA ti ru na shag/ du na
231b4(gi): tshal pa dza/ hur tu hu ra tu shag/ shag tshal pa tshal pa dza/ pra ma kus ting hed hed dza/ gsang ba srog la dbab pa dang // las bcol bas na mi ldang sngags//
231b5(gi): dkrugs sngags byol gyis dbab pa dang // thog dang ser ba dbab pa'o// shang ka da ru du na ti na shag/ kang ka da ri du ra mi tsit+ta sa da?/ sha ma ba ri na rtsa nga rI he/
231b6(gi): ma dur ni du shag he ni shag/ ku la ru la he rA na shag/ her thum ram mug ta shag shag/ dun du na tshal pa tshal pa/ du ni dza la hi de ni dzaH/ dun ting du ru hA ni dza/
231b7(gi): du lo ma b+h+yo du ma ra ya/ du ni du la ya ni han hed b+h+yo/ ya ma gsho phob/ mu sha pho ba/ pra ma sha ni pho ba/ phro ma shar hril drag tu pho ba/ 'brub khung ling ka gnas pa
232a1(gi): la/ dug sna khrag sna thun brabs nas// dgra bo gang yin ga tan nas brlags// lha klu rten dbab lo nad 'byung // gsang ba'i drag

232a3(gi): gyur na/ bstan pa gnyen po 'jig pa drang // bla ma'i sku la sngo ba kun// dus ni gza' skar dran la 'jig/ bsgrub pa'i khyad par gang yin pa// gru gsum

232a6(gi): ru re sarba gu khra re swA hA/ a ka dza ti ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo/ he ra shog he ra ma sho ga/ he ra ma thu ma ri la sho ga/ she 'dir thun tsit+ta rba da/ thu ma ri le snying la kha rag sha
232a7(gi): phyig phyig dun b+h+yo/ tsit+tarba da yaM/ shaM ga tsit+ta rba da/ tsit+ta spags rbad/ hUM b+h+yo rbad/ thum dza la gyur pa tirbad/ bsgrub pa'i khyad par bstan pa la//
232b1(gi): grub na mngon sum yong ba dang // ba spu ldang dang mchi ma 'ong // rmi lam bud med legs pa dang // me tog ut+pal yong ba dang // zhag lnga drug na dngos su yongs

234a1(gi): phran ma yi bu mo la// dngul lam dkar po'i phur pas gdab// chu rlung rgyu ba'i dus su sbyar// gti mug can gyi sems can rnams/

239a5(gi): ka'i chur gnas mdzub mo re tsam 'dren// gson po mi rgyas mi thub lam logs yang // ting 'dzin phra mos rang gis gnas su 'gugs// sgong skyes bcag nas

247a6(gi): gsol ba 'debs so// sems nyid gdod nas sangs rgyas kyang // 'on kyang ma rig mun pas ba sgribs// 'bras bu nyid la lam spyod pa'i gsang
247a7(gi): sngags rdo rje theg pa'i don// rgyu 'bras lam du skyed byed med// ye nas sangs rgyas phung po'i sku// bskyed pa'i rim pa legs spyad cing // thabs kyis
247b1(gi): stong pas yang dag pa// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzang po bsgom// bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag la// mchog dang 'bring gyur tha ma'i don// sems can rnams la
247b2(gi): bshang par 'tshal// zhes legs par zhus so// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po nyid gdul bya'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya
247b3(gi): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang sngags kyi don mchog thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin snang ba skye 'gag med//
247b4(gi): de yang 'khor 'das gnyis ka'i bdag/ 'khrul pa'i snang ba tha dad pa// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par snang // gdul bya'i nyon mongs grangs meng yang // de ste
247b5(gi): bstan pa'i sgo rnams gsungs// yang dag sangs rgyas bde chen 'di// dmigs pa'i yul dang sgrub pa'i thabs// 'bras bu yin de rnam pa gsum// ji snyed chos
247b6(gi): kyi rtsa bar bshad// bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba ni// sku gsum lhun grub spros dang bral// chos thams cad kyi mdo yongs su sdud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
247b7(gi): de nas bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhags te 'di gsungs so// yang dag bsgrub pa gcig pu nyid// sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus
248a1(gi): pa/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde// rnal 'byor zab mo'i sku gsum rdzogs// chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i
248a2(gi): ting nge 'dzin to// rang bzhin spros med dag pa la// blo bur spros med nam mkha'i dbyings// dag cing gsal ba'i me long ltar// byed pa med par ye nas gnas//
248a3(gi): sems kyi tshul khrims mig rno bas// rang snang dag pa'i chos nyid mthong // rig pa'i ye shes chen po yis// chos dbyings rnam par dag pa rtogs// yul dag skye
248a4(gi): med rnam par grol// rang rig ye shes dang du gsal// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa// ye shes dbyings la shar zhes bya// dus bzhi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
248a5(gi): rnams/ snang stong yul du rig stong sems// bde stong lus la gnas pa dgra/ sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i rgyun la gnas// skye med rnam dag chos nyid sku// 'khor
248a6(gi): 'dus 'dzin pa rgyu las 'das// sa bcu 'dul dbang longs spyod rdzogs// ye shes sgyu ma'i sangs rgyas sku// 'gro ba 'dul phyir yang dag sprul pa'i sku// 'khor
248a7(gi): ba'i rgyun las rnam par grol// bdag lus ngag yid rnal 'byor rdzogs// mi rtog dbyings las thugs rjes chags// cir 'dul der spro ba yid bzhin sku// thas
248b1(gi): kyis spyod pas kun 'du la yang // brtags pa snang tsam brjod med dbyings// bdag gzhan gyi don mthar phyin par// dmigs pa zhes bya'i ting 'dzin to// gzugs
248b2(gi): phung tshul khrims rnam snang mdzad// gti mug rang byung bcom ldan 'das// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes sku// 'khor ba'i chos las ye nas dag/ rnam shes mi bskyod shes
248b3(gi): rab phung // zhe sdang rang byung bcom ldan 'das// me long lta bu'i ye shes skra// chos nyid rang bzhin ngang gi sa grub// tshor bting 'dzin rin chen 'byung // nga
248b4(gi): rgyal rang byung bcom ldan 'das// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sku// sbyin pa'i bdag nyid gcig pu nyid// 'du shes snang mtha' ye shes can// 'dod chags rang byung
248b5(gi): bcom ldan 'das// so sor kun rtog ye shes che// sangs rgyas bde ba chen po gzhi// kun gzhi dpal chen he ru ka/ dug lnga rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// sku
248b6(gi): gsum rnam dag kun 'dus pa// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can// sgo lnga'i rgyun las rnam grol ba// stong pa nyid la yang dag gnas// 'du byed rnam grol don
248b7(gi): yod grub// phrag dog rang byung bcom ldan 'das// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes sku// rnal 'byor sbas pa zab mo phyung // cir yang ma yin ci ro yang snang / tir
249a1(gi): yang 'gyur la cir yang 'grub// yul drug shes pas ma gzung ba// rtog med spros bral chos skur gnas// phung po ye shes rigs lnga po//
249a2(gi): 'khor 'das longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'dod yon lnga la skyon med rol// rnal 'byor sprul pa'i sku ru rdzogs// 'khor 'das 'byung ba lnga yi dang // dngas
249a3(gi): snyigs med par mkha' la 'gro// 'byung ba lha dang lhun grub gsum// sgyu ma chen por ye gnas pa// gang ltar bde ba spyod pa'i mchog/ mtshan mar mi 'dzin bde
249a4(gi): ba'i lam// dkyil 'khor drug gi ngo bor sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ dpal chen po'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u
249a5(gi): ste dang ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad ting nge 'dzin du gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas 'di tshe bsgrub bya'i
249a6(gi): phyir/ sku gsum sa la sgom par byed// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' bu// phyag rgya 'di yi cho ga yis// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dang por chos kyi
249a7(gi): dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// bsgrubs med yum gyi b+ha ga la// brjod med sems kyi ngang du gsal// mi dmigs chos nyid de
249b1(gi): bzhin nyid// btsal med ma bsgrubs ji bzhin las// kun snang nam mkha'i ngang nyid 'byung // rang byung 'od gsal kun tu snang // med pa'i rgyu las mngon gsal
249b2(gi): ba sems kyi rang bzhin ye shes gsal// dam pa'i ye shes a las ni// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar shar// e la sa nam mkha' mtha' dbus med//
249b3(gi): ya las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// ba las chu yi rgya mtsho 'khyil// suM las gser gyi sa gzhi chags// la las rin chen ri ra ba ste// raM las ye shes me 'od 'bar// 'bru
249b4(gi): lnga'i' phra bkod yum lnga'i rgyu// mkha' dbyings rnam drag dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos lhun grub yum gyi mkha'// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i bzhugs gnas de// rin chen
249b5(gi): 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khung // mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i rgyu// phyi dang nang med kun tu snang // rig pa'i rgyan dang ye shes rgyan// ye shes 'bar ba'i
249b6(gi): gzhal ya sa der// seng ge glang rta ma bya khyud // nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gtso dang 'khor la rab tu gsal// nam mkha'i dbyings na sa ye shes sha ra//
249b7(gi): nges pa las ni rdo rje che// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje sems// gsang ba'i yu ba dang gnyis med 'khril// mi bskyod mthingakadakar da par zhal// rdo rje 'khor lo
250a1(gi): chen g.yas// dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// dbyings phyug g.yas rten g.yon dril sngo// ye shes dam tshig chen po dag/ pad+mo rin chen
250a2(gi): ldan byas nas// bde mchog sgyu mas brda mtshon na// dbyings kyi bde mchog 'byung ba ni// rang rig ye shes de la 'ong // ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba dgra/
250a3(gi): dri med nyi ma'i 'od bsa'itshar// byang chub sems la sa yig 'bru sku// yum gyi gsang ba'i gzhal yas su// byang chub sems las skur gsal ba// rdo rje
250a4(gi): sems dpa' yab yum gnyis// spros zhing dag la thim par bya// rnam snang dkar sngo dmar ba'i zhal// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen g.yas// dril
250a5(gi): bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// sa spyan g.yas bstan g.yon dril dkar// rin chen sar sngo dmar ba'i zhal// rin ser rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas// dril bu pad+ma ral gri
250a6(gi): g.yon// ma ma g.yas bstan g.yon dril ser// mtha' yas dmar sngo dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas// dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon
250a7(gi): gos dkar g.yas bstan g.yon dril dmar// don grub ljang dkar dmar ba'i zhal// ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas// dril bu yid bzhin pad+ma g.yon//
250b1(gi): sgros ma g.yas bstan g.yon dril ljang // sa snying dkar gsal myu gu dril// gzugs ni me long 'gying ba dkar// nam snying mthing ka ral gri dri ba/
250b2(gi): dri ni mA le 'phreng ba sngo// spyan ras dmar skya pad+ma dri la// ro ni 'gi ra ti bi wa da bsnams// phyag na ljang khu rdo rje dril// sgra ni ni ra ti sgro 'dzin byang //
250b3(gi): bya mas dkar klu shing g.yon na dral// d+hU be dkar mo spos phor bsnams// sgrib sel sngon po bo ti bsnams// puSh+pe sngon mo me tog bcas// kun bzang
250b4(gi): snye ma dril bu dmar// A lo dmar mo mar me bsnams// 'jam dpal ut+pal dril bu ljang // gan+d+he ljang khu dri chab bsnams// kun bzang mnyam
250b5(gi): gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+mo dkyil// lha dbang phyag na pa wa nga bsnams// lha min thub pa go cha bsnams// shAkya thub
250b6(gi): pa gsag par mi// byo la song thub pa po ti bsnams// yi dag sa thub pa ri na chan sgro ma// chos kyi rgyal po mi chu bsdams// gshi na rje gshed
250b7(gi): po thod dbyug bsnams/ 'gugs byed dkar mo lcags kyu bsnams// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje bsna mas// A lo ser na gzhags pa bsnams
251a1(gi): rta mgrin dmar nAg thod sbrul bsnams// 'jig rten dmar mo lcags sgrog bsnams// bdud rtsi sdang nag rgya gram bsnams//
251a2(gi): langs ljang nag dril bu bsnams// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa sku yongs su dag pa sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
251a3(gi): hUM badz+nyA d+h+r-i ga/ muM d+ha tu shwa ri/ o dzi na dzi ga/ laM te sha ra ri/ swa rat+na d+hIg/ mi mo ha ra ti/ aM a ro lig/ byaM rA gA ra ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+hI ga/ traM badz+ra
251a4(gi): ra ti/ k+ShI shwa re tsu ya/ hu lA se sa ma ya stAM/ traM a ga ra du ka/ traM mA le sa ma ya ho/ hri pad+ma ban d+ha ma/ hri girti ra go hAM/ dzaM ku ru pA Ni hri/ a nirti rA ga
251a5(gi): ya mi me d+ha ri ni swA hA/ dza du pra be she/ b+hI swa raM pa ya swA hA/ hUM puSh+pa A be sha/ hUM sA ra tsa swA hA/ bA di pa su ki ni/ myaM shri aM raM ga ya swA hA/ ho ga na d+he tsit+ta ho/
251a6(gi): hu hu hu badz+ra hu/ a a a badz+ra satwa sa ma ya oM/ oM mu ni kr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne kr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne suM swA hA/ oM mu ne kra swA hA/ oM mu ni br-i swA hA/ oM mu/
251a7(gi): ni sA hA/ hU ya man ta krid phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU/ hUM bi ga nan ta krid phaT/ oM ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT/ o
251b1(gi): pad+ma ta krang phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hU phaT/ oM pra dz+nyA ta kr-id ta phaT/ oM karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa re dza la ni hu phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
251b2(gi): cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM ma hA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma koHhAM/ oM ma hA a ta ri sha dzA na badz+ra
251b3(gi): swa b+ha wa At+ma ko&hA/ oM ma hA sa ma na ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma koH&hA/ oM ma hA pra ta pra be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma koH hA/ o ma hA kri ta a nu ta na dz+nyA na badz+ra sra
251b4(gi): b+hU we At+ma koHhUM/ dbu rgyan rdzogs pa'i rigs lnga nyid// dbang rtags rigs kyi gtso bo dbus// sems dpa' rigs kyi gtso bo las// sgo ba de bzhin
251b5(gi): rigs su bshad// thub drug dbu rgya na ma gsungs so// / oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma koHhUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wa ka badz+ra
251b6(gi): swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&hA/ sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni// rdo rje'i sku ni thob byed pa// gsang sngags
251b7(gi): lu se dben chen po nyid// de yi lus su rnam par bsam// sngags la dmigs pa'i sngags de ni// rdo rje gsung ni tho ba byed pa// de nyid ngag dben chen po de
252a1(gi): gsung gi dngos grub bstan pa'o// sngags la dmigs pa'i yid de ni// rdo rje thugs ni grub byed pa// de nyid sems kyi rnam dben pa//
252a2(gi): thugs kyi dngos gru ba bstan pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu ra ga badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma koHhUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pu dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kor+Na hAM/ chags pa
252a3(gi): chen po'i mchod pa yi// sangs rgyas zhing khams khyad par spro// dbang dang dngos grub sdud pa ni// gnas su thim pas 'dod pa 'i'agrub// de bzhin gshegs
252a4(gi): pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dmigs med mkha' ltar dag cing khyab pa'i sku// spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol bar
252a5(gi): mi dmigs kyang // thugs rje'i ngang nyid chos sku dag pa las// ye shes sgyu ma rol cing gshegs su gsol// thugs rje lcags kyu'i thugs kyi rgyud bskul zhing //
252a6(gi): byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan 'dren gyis// bka' yi pho nya'i lcags sgrog mas ni gnas stobs la// btang snyoms dril bus bde gshegs bzhugs shing rnam grol dgyes
252a7(gi): par bskyed// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// thugs rje'i mgon gyur ma lus rnams// mi phyed dbyings la 'god mdzad pa'i// bdag la dgyes shing thim par
252b1(gi): bzhugs// rgyal ba'i skul bzhengs bzhug pa mi mnga' yang // ye shes gnyis med dbyings su gcig pa na// thabs dang shes rab ting nge 'dzin dkyil 'khor 'dir/
252b2(gi): mi ga yo dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// badz+ra sa ma ya dza/ oM A ha he b+ha ga ban/ mahA ka ru ni ka dri sh+ya ho/ sa mra ya s+t+waM/ dza hu ba~M ho/ pra be sha ya/
252b3(gi): a be sha ya/ A kA ya bag tsit+taM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// / tsit+tA rim
252b4(gi): chen gzhal yas nas// ye shes sems dpa'i dpal be'u bachog/ phyag mtshan dang sngags 'od du 'gro/ khyang sems thub pa sgo ba dag/ 'od kyi rtse la yi ge
252b5(gi): 'bru/ rang gi rnam smin dag gyur cing // grangs dus mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa dgra/ nyams dang ngag lus yum dang ni// rmi lam dag tu mthong bar byed// oM bo d+hi tsiH
252b6(gi): muhA su kha dz+nyA na d+ha tu ya/ bsnyen pa'i gsang sngags rab rdzogs nas// ye nas mnyam nyid chos sku la// skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// k+Sha yig dmar na ka me
252b7(gi): lce 'bar// lte bar a dmar 'bar zhing 'dzag/ dam tshig sgrol ma'i rang bzhin g.yo// gos dkar mo yi longs spyod kyis// ha la sa nam mkha'i ba yang bzho//
253a1(gi): srog shing gsum gyi ka ba la// dbugs ldan nyi ma 'char ba dang // de bzhin 'jug na zla ba gsal// gnas na gzung 'dzin spangs pa ni//
253a2(gi): rgya skyegs til mar shu shing sad// dmar gsal snying po drang la 'phro// srub shing dmar po 'phra sbom snyoms// srub thag gnyis ni dkar ba ste// dbu ma bsgrub
253a3(gi): cing spyod lam zas// lcag gis rab tu gsal ba'o// lte bar dpa' bo 'ba' zhig la// gsang gnas bde ba'i thig le nyid// snying kar nyi zla kha yang sbyar//
253a4(gi): mdzod spu sgra dkar sa bon haM// rlung gi mtha' dang bcas pa yis// lam drod lha yid khams tshod thun// sbyang zhing byung rgyal bskyang ba dang // 'jug pa'i phul
253a5(gi): rtags tshod bzung zhing // thun tshad med pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
253a6(gi): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad la byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas
253a7(gi): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gdug pa 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ skra khro bor gyur pa 'di gsungs so// sngon gyi bskal pa ga d+ha'i// rlung
253b1(gi): gi bye ma snyed 'das pa'i dus// srid pa dang po bskal pa ni// gdul ka'i 'jig rten sbyang dka' bar// sangs rgyas 'jig rten sgrol ma byung // slob dpon rgyal ba'i
253b2(gi): 'khor lo la// slob ma dge slong nag po yis// gsang sngags mtha' drug don spyad pas// ma rtogs dbang gis gtum khro gdug/ gab don ma shes sbas la 'chal//
253b3(gi): srid pa'i sa bon rdzun mos 'phangs// tsha grang bco brgyad dmyal khams gsum// stong phrag bcu gnyis sdug bsngal myong // de dag srab par gyur pa dang // yi
253b4(gi): dgas gnas su stong phrag drug/ rnam smin de zad srid 'tshams sbyar// dbang phyug chen po lha chen dang / u ma'i bur skyes ru trar smin// gtum khro 'jigs
253b5(gi): gzugs cha yang sprul// nas kyi kha rlangs na bun 'thul// dur khrod rabs 'jigs skyi ga ya'i nang // thod mkhar gsar rnying ro gdan la// srin mo srid
253b6(gi): pas su ma sbyor ba zhugs// mgo brnyan 'phra men ma'i 'khor// bdag tu 'dzin pa las gyur pa'o// ro ga rnam gru tsa mun te// rde te 'byung ba zhi smra la pa'i
253b7(gi): 'khor/ rta zag seng ge khyi yi mgo/ rtag chad bzhi las sprub pa'i 'khor// seng b+ha ga wa spyang mgo can dang // kang ka bya rog zhug pa bzha do//
254a1(gi): yul brgyad las ni sprul pa'i 'khor// la mgo ri zhes bya dang // khA di bya ba dang // de bzhin ro pi ni dang ni// pra ba tsan d+hA/
254a2(gi): dag dang ni// tsan d+ha khe zhes bya ba dang // pra ba pra ti chen mo dang // ma hA sa ni zhes bya ba// bi ra mra tim mo rnams// rnam shes brgyad las sprul pa'i
254a3(gi): 'khor// 'khor la dbyung bskur snod bcud 'joms// lha yi ded dpon ka ru btul// 'bras bu che ba man chad bsdus// srin bu lang ka mgrin bcu
254a4(gi): bsdus// nad dang mtshon dang srog 'joms byed// las kyi bdag po smin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dus gsum bde gshegs rigs
254a5(gi): lnga yis/ shes bya ji lta ji snyed pa// mkhyen pa can gyi thugs rje yis// 'dul bar bka' gros yongs byas nas// kun gyis las kyi gnyer gtad
254a6(gi): ni sa 'dul ba'i bdag por byin brlabs pa// he ru ka la lung bstan cing // las kyi gnyer du 'di skad brjod// sngon tshe 'das pa'i dang po la/
254a7(gi): sangs rgyas srid pa'i sgron mar byung // slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo yis// slob ma dge slong nag po la/ gsang sngags mtha' drug bstan pa la// don de
254b1(gi): steng du ma gyur cing // log pa'i steng du bshad pa yis// dmyal ba yi dag sa kha'akhor te// tha mar las kyi srin por skyes// khams gsum 'khrul pa'i
254b2(gi): bdud du gyur// snod bcud chad pa'i ru tra 'di// bde gshegs bka' yi 'phrin las mdzod// da skad dbang bskur byin brlabs kyis// dpal chan
254b3(gi): rdo rje khrog 'thung gis// dbyings nas yum phyung sbyor ba mdzad// sems sprin khro tshogs 'chol pa spros// lha dmag dregs chen gdan du bting // dbang
254b4(gi): phyug ma tshog sa longs spyod mdzad// ming gis dbang bskur gsal ba'i mtshan// rdzas kyi dbang bskur rdo rje phog/ zas kyi dbang bskur bka' pha ba gan+d+ha//
254b5(gi): granas kyi dbang bskur mu ran bkod// lus kyi gnyer gtang byar bzhag/ srog phul khas blangs mna' bor ro// dregs pa khyo shugs btul ba zhes bya ba'i
254b6(gi): ting nge 'dzin to// dpal chen bdag po'i gnas su byon// sgo bzhir sbyor mdzad sring bzhi srid// sgo bzhir sbyor mdzad sgom bzhi//
254b7(gi): yul brgyad sbyor bas 'phra men brgyad// srin mo brgyad la gnas brgyad bstim// srin mo'i lhums bu gsang ba'i// oM las sprul pa'i he ru ka/ 'byung
255a1(gi): ba'i gtso mo rnams la sras// bltams pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ru tra rang gi sa bon las// ru tra lnga'i gtum
255a2(gi): tshig brjod// sras gtams dpal gyi gsang sngags bsgrang // rdzu 'phrul srid pa'i ltos dang mnyam// sgrol ba'i gan sa sbyong chen po mdzad// sha rus
255a3(gi): khrag la longs spyod cing // las dang nyon mongs shes bya sogs// srabs nas gsol mdzad 'gyod pa phul// sras su dbang bskur byin brlabs nas//
255a4(gi): sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrungs nas ni// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i zhing khams ni// thal ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa ru// sangs rgyas sa la lung bstan no//
255a5(gi): bdud yongs su btul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// khams gsum 'khrug pa'i bdud chen po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yis//
255a6(gi): sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus byas nas// zhi ba sra bstan pa 'dul ba'i// khro bor bsgyur nas bdud rtsi ra bsgral// bsgru ba'i rdzas su byin brlabs nas// /
255a7(gi): bsgral ba'i gnas la longs spyod mdzad// de phyir de bzhin phyis 'byung ba'i// rnal 'byor skyes bu chen po yis// lte ba dang ni spyod pa yis// bsgral
255b1(gi): la gzhal yas khang du brlabs// rnal 'byor bdud las dbugs phyung ngo // rjes su 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsal ba zhes bya ba bdud ldang ba med pa'i ting nge
255b2(gi): 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs su 'dus//
255b3(gi): zhi bas mi 'dul khro bor grwazig sa// gru gsum mthing nag na mA mkha' la// 'degs byed rlung nag 'tshub ma 'phro// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho za klong 'khyil//
255b4(gi): zhing chen bltams pa'i sa gzhi la// keng rus brtsigs pa'i ri rab steng // dur khrod me dpung skyug naga' bar// sdug nag zla gam gzhal yas
255b5(gi): shar/ khyung mchog dregs pa nyi zla bcas// dregs pa chen po 'dul mdzad pa/ zhi ba las ni khro bor gyur// 'bar ba'i gar dgus gdul bya 'dul//
255b6(gi): dur khrod chas brgyad sbrul gsol// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ khro rgyal yi nas yin pa'i phyir/
255b7(gi): phyog rgya chen por mngon rdzogs shing // sku gsung thugs su rang dbang bskur// ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// de nas sna yi rtse mo nas/
256a1(gi): yid ni brten par yang dag bzungs// sna yi dbugs rings 'gro ba la ste// rgyal po'i sbyor ba phyag rgyar gsal// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyin
256a2(gi): nas ni// khro rgyal sku dang mnyam sbyor phyir// khro mo dbang phyug mngon phyung ste// cha lugs 'dzin pa sku la 'khril// mkha' dbyings rdo rje pad+ma ni// pad+ma
256a3(gi): chos dbyings oM dang ldan// rdo rje nyi ma au dang bcas// gsang ba b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor nas// mdzes par lta zhing yid du 'ongs// gcig la gcig ni
256a4(gi): chags shing 'phreng // glu dbyangs dga' ba'i mdang sa dang ldan// gnyis su med par gsal bar bya// ji ltar mkha' la gsal ba dag/ dri med nyi
256a5(gi): ma'i 'od pas 'tsher// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus pa// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// byang chub sems de kun tu dag/ khams
256a6(gi): gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang // ma lus snying rjes khyab byas te// 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes// bad+ma ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// byang chub
256a7(gi): sems sprin 'phros pa las// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung spro// bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrigs pa bzhin// stong khams gang ba'i khrag 'thung
256b1(gi): rnams/ bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun 'dus nas// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzud// dbyings su thim nas yig 'bru sku// de nas dgyes te ha
256b2(gi): brjod pas/ byang chub sems de 'od du zhu// dkar sham dang ni rkun mo dang // rmongs mo dang ni ro langs ma// sbos mo dang ni gtum mo dang // rme sha
256b3(gi): can dang ma'i tshogs// so so rang rang lug cha dang // ngo mtshar chas nas rngam pa'i tshul// dkyil 'khor shar gyi phyogs nas ni// 'khor bar rngam
256b4(gi): pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams rnam par bsam/ dam tshig khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
256b5(gi): ye shes spyan gyi spyod yul nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// sems can don slad dam tshig dgongs// gnas 'dir ma lus gshegs su
256b6(gi): gsol// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las kyang // gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du
256b7(gi): gsol// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// tshogs chematshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// tshogs kyi slob dpon
257a1(gi): gshegs su gsol// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las// sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs su gsol// bde gshegs pho brang dkyil

257a4(gi): che mchog mnyam sbyor 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro rgyal sku sprul pa// gsang sngags rmad byung 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad// lhun
257a5(gi): gyis grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// dam tshig pa las bzhengs pa yis// dpal chan khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma
257a6(gi): gshegs sam// grub pa'i mchog dag ma gsal na// sku gsung thugs dang 'gal bar 'gyur// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas// pho brang dkyil

257b2(gi): yaM karma haM/ ra rak+ta sa mun dza/ ba dza la maN+Dal/ kr-i ni ri dz+wa la/ bruM bi shA bi shud d+he ban d+hA dz+nyA na maN+Dal bru~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ma hA shr-i he ru ka ma hA tsan DA sar+b+ba

258b1(gi): rigs kyi gnas mchog ni// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i khyim dang yid du 'ong // gnas dang sa gzhi brtags pa der// bsrang dang brtag dang sbyang

263b4(gi): thogs med pa'i// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma spong byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i

263b6(gi): chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar ba nas// dmar gyi arga rgya mtshor ba sgril// mkha'
263b7(gi): 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus gshegs nas bsnams su gsol// nga ni za byed chen po ste// khams gsum ma lus bsgral pa
264a1(gi): dang / gdus dka' mA lus 'dul ba'i phyir// sha rus la sogs za bar bya'o// nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// 'khor ba'i
264a2(gi): bas bcings pa kun// dmar chen bskyil ba'i rgya mtsho laM// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro tshogs dang rol// ma rungs 'dod la ma chags shing // dam tshig
264a3(gi): la sdang dgra bgegs rnams// ngo thon stobs kyis bsgral bar bya'o// shri badz+ra ka ra mu kA sha ra ya na mo/ oM shri badz+ra rag sa ma yA na mo/ oM shri badz+ra kha Da
264a4(gi): b+h+ra tsa ma ya ya na mo/ oM shri badz+ra g+ha na De dz+wa la ya na mo/ sarba bu d+ha ga tA ban+na da na ma ka rau mi/ ma hA yo gi ni/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti dza ho/ dza hUM ba ho/
264a5(gi): shri he ru ka i na na/ d+hu pe/ puSh+ma/ di pa ga nA d+ha/ ba ling t+ta/ pra tI dza ho/ hri ban d+ha kha kha khA hi khA dzaHhUM baM ho/ shri he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra/ a be sha ya/
264a6(gi): a be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ prA be sha ya/ pra tI dza ho/ shri ban d+ha kha hi kha hi/ dze[:]hUM baM ho/ shri he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta na/ sa ma ya mu tra/
264a7(gi): ma ra kha khA hi kha hi/ hri da ya si pa hUM phaT/ shri he ru ka/ ma hA mang sa/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA tsit+ta/ ma hA ba su ta/ ma hA pan tsa a mri ta/ ma hA arge pra ti/
264b1(gi): / ga kha le le/ hUM b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo ts+tsha/ 'brar ba'i rgyal po khrag 'thung thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhug grangs dus
264b2(gi): ni brtag pa 'am// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba na// 'byung po mnan nam bzlogs byas nas// 'dod pa'i dngos grub dam pa blang // shes rab kyis
264b3(gi): ni blo phye nas// nges par brtags pa'i sa gzhi la// blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan// gnas tshul skur pa'i rim pa yis// phyi nang gsang ba rdzogs pa'i//
264b4(gi): dbang bzhi rgyu lam 'bras bu'i bdag/ sku gsung thugs dang dbyer med pa// snum pa yi ni dam tshig dang // gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul zhugs can//
264b5(gi): de dag goms nas nyams su blangs// bum pa bskyed pa'i rim pa la// nang gi sang rdzogs pa rdzogs pa'i rim// sprul sku longs sku chos kyi sku// ngo bo
264b6(gi): nyid sku yang dag thob// blo zhan shes rab chung bas ni// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// phung byed gnyis ka sreg pas na// de bas gzhan du

265a1(gi): ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das smin par byed pa'i lam yongs su drag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

265a4(gi): nas// dge ba'i las kyis brten pa'i lha// lhag pa'i lha ni gang yin pa// da lta nyid du khyod la dbang // dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed

265a7(gi): dbyings yum gyi bum pa na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor pho brang bzhugs// gnyis med byang chub sems brtags chus// sbyinas bstim zhing dbang bskur
265b1(gi): bas/ khyod kyi bag chags byang gyur nas// lus la sangs rgyas bstim par shog/ thod pa 'phreng ba dbu rgyan 'di// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can//

265b6(gi): du bang / phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin du// rtag par bsgom zhing bsgrub par bgyis// chos nyid spros bral ka pA la// skra lnga lhun grub ka pA la//
265b7(gi): ye shes lnga ldan ka pA la// mi 'gyur g.yung drung ka pa la// yid bzhin gter ldan ka pa la// skal ldan dbang mchog 'di bskor bas// ci bsems
266a1(gi): 'grub pa'i dbang thob shog/ nyon mongs 'joms pa'i rdo rje dang // chos sgra sgrog pa'i dril bu 'dris// de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas
266a2(gi): thabs dang shes rab 'brel bar shog/ gzugs mchog bud med lha yi tshogs// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan dge/ chos nyid kyi ni rgyun yin pas// dga' 'gyur spyod

266a6(gi): pas/ dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis// thams cad phab nas slar yang ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// khro rgyal 'dus pa sras kyi mchog/ sku

271b1(gi): chen 'phreng ba dang // pi wa nga gar mkhan mchog nyid de// klu shing chos kyi 'khor lo dang // rin chen rnyed dang ut+pa la dang // me tog 'phreng dang spos mchog dang /

271b3(gi): cha bo ti rin chen sgom// me dang chu ni rab tu bstan// mi mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon// thod sbrul chen po gdengs pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon//

271b5(gi): gar gyi rgyur thabs rnam pa gsum// g.yas su bsgyur dang g.yon du bsgyur// de bzhin phyogs bcur gar bsgyur ro// gar gyi rol pa sprul pa 'byung // phyogs

271b7(gi): gzhi kun kyang gar gyis khong // gar mkhan tshul du sangs rgyas shing // gsang gnas bde ba'i mchog de mdzad// ngo tshar chang ba'i lha tshogs la// rnam par grol
272a1(gi): bas mtshon pa'i phyir// dpal chem lag 'thung phyug rgya ni// gal gsam pag drug zhabs pazhir ba skrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus

288a3(gi): gtor ma'i spyod pa ji ltar spyod// gtor ma'i 'bras bu ji ltar bsgrub// sha yi ga tor ma ji ltar lags// khrag gi gtor ma ji ltar lags/

304b3(gi): pa bsnams pa ji ltar lags// kro d+hI shA ri dpal 'bar bsnams// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams pa ji ltar lags// g.yon pa rdo rje ban dra mar
304b4(gi): gtso la stob pa ji ltar lags// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzigs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// phyag rgya'i don
304b5(gi): rnams ngas bshad kyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// dbu gsum sku gsum thob pa ste// rnam thar gsum dang ldan pa'o// phyag drug mdzad pa
304b6(gi): sna tshogs na// ye shes grub pa'i rol pa nyid// sna tshogs chos lad ba bskur ba'o// de la phyag mtshan ngas bshad pa// rdo rje rtse dgu ye shes dgu
304b7(gi): dang ldan// kha T+wAM rtse gsum sku gsung thugs ldan yin// rje'u chung sgra skrag gzhan gyis thub pa med pa yin// dril bu dbyings te ma nor ma bcos rtags//
305a1(gi): ban d+ha 'khor ba dbyings su rtogs pa yin// rgyu zhags 'khor ba dbyings su 'chings sdom yin// yum gyi kha T+wAM sku gsung thugs
305a2(gi): ldan zhing // ban dmar gtso la stob pa yab kyi dgongs pa bskong ba yin// zhal gcig dbyings su rdzogs pa'i zhal+yA// mthing ka gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i
305a3(gi): rtags/ gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// kau ri ba na dmar byi dbyug sngo ba ji ltar lags// tsau ri ser mo mda' gzhu 'greng sA zhes ji
305a4(gi): wAr lags// phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba ji ltar lags// pe ta byi snying rdo rje 'phyar gra nas ji ltar lags// pus ka dmar ser byis rgyu
305a5(gi): 'dren pa ji ltar lags// kas mthong khrag 'thung ba ji ltar lags// sma sha dgra snying bro ba ji ltar lags// tsan du mchog lus 'brel bu ji ltar
305a6(gi): lags/ mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ke'u ri ban d+ha chos nyid spros dang
305a7(gi): bral// khrag ni 'khor ba chos nyid rtogs// zhing dbyug 'khor ba sdug bsngal rdul du ldog/ mda' gzhu chos kyi dbyings su 'bigs// rgyal
305b1(gi): mtshan nub pa'i dus med yin// rdo rje ye shes dgu dang ldan// byis rgyus bla med gnas su 'dren// thod khrag 'khor ba chos nyid yin// byis snying
305b2(gi): chos nyid thugs chud rtags// mchog lus dbyings dang ye shes yin// ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// gnod 'dul lha yis yang
305b3(gi): gsol pa// sing nga ga sol byed bsnol sing dzi ltar lags// bya gri ba snol mar ji ltar lag sa// swi la phyag tsan ji ltar la gas// shro na dgra
305b4(gi): sta ji ltar lags// kri ta rgyu 'drin ji ltar lags// kang ka zhing khur ji ltar lags// kha kha ba na gri ji ltar lags// hu lu sgron khyer ji ltar
305b5(gi): lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ba snol sing dbyings dang ye shes yin//
305b6(gi): bsnol btab chos sku bde ba thob// sri la chos dbyings ro myong yin// shwa nA chos kyi bde ba thob// kri ta mgrin dmar 'khor ba'i rgya mo 'dral// kang
305b7(gi): ka zhing khur 'khor ba'i chos nyid yin// kha kha rgyud 'dri yi de bzhin 'khor lo bsgyur// hu lu sgron khyer can dang ldan// gnod 'dul lha
306a1(gi): yis yang gsol pa// rta gdong lcags kyu ji ltar lags// phag gdong zhugs pa ji ltar lags// dreng gdong nyi zla ji ltar lag/
306a2(gi): thal byed dril bu ji ltar lags// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// lcags kyu bla med gnas su
306a3(gi): 'dren// zhags pas las dang nyon mongs 'chings// nyi zla ye shes spyan dang ldan// yang na mun pa'i sdug bsngal sel// dril bus shes pa'i rgyud
306a4(gi): rnams dgrol// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// dbang phyug mkha' 'gro ma bdun dang // sring bzhi ging dang pho nya la sogs pa/
306a5(gi): phyag rgya phul ba'i yon tan gang // ma phul skyon ni ci zhig 'tshal// nyag gcig ya ba la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka'
306a6(gi): stsal pa// phyag rgya phul ba'i yon tan ni// rgyal ba'i spyan rnams mnyes par byed// phyag rgya ma phul mA shes na// don dang rtags su yongs mi ldan// dbang phyug
306a7(gi): la sogs phyags rgya rnams// rgyud gzhan dag nas gsungs dang mthun// dgongs pa yid kyi bzlas pa yin// 'dza ba ni ngag gi bzlas pa yin// phyag rgya lus
306b1(gi): kyi bzlas pa yin// rab kyis nyin gsum mtshan gsum 'bul// 'bring gis nyin gnyis mtshan gnyis 'bul// tha ma nyin re mtshan re 'dul// yang thams
306b2(gi): grangs dus bzangs la// rgyun ma chad par 'bul bar bya// de las 'das na nyams pa yin// he ru ka'i gal po las/ phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
306b3(gi): / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sman dang bdud rtsi ba sgrub pa de// don dang gtan tshigs 'di lta bu// nya ga gcig ya ba la bdag nyan 'tshal//
306b4(gi): mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// bkra shis nags tshal rgyas pa 'am// shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mu
306b5(gi): dag pa ni mtshams bcad la// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong // de yi mdo don dam pa ni// dkyil 'khor gru gsum shes par gyis// de ltar bris pa'i
306b6(gi): dkyil 'khor du// rgyal rigs rje bu rigs bram ze ste// srid gsum ban d+ha bzang khor yug/ rus sbal mgo 'am 'khar gzhong du// dbus su byang chub
306b7(gi): sems kyis bskor// yi ge hUM gis bzhu btul byas// shar du dri chen rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge au gyis pazhu ba tu la bya// b+ho ru sha chen rdzas kyis bsko/
307a1(gi): yi ge sa yis bzhu btul bya// nub tu rag+ha'i rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge oM gyis bzhu ba tul bya// byang du dri chu'i rdzas kyis bskor//
307a2(gi): yi ge ha yis bzhu btul bya// pha'i rgyu bzhi ma'i 'bral ba bzhi// mthar thug bzhi zhes bya ba ni// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // rdzas lnga tshom bu rdzogs pa
307a3(gi): nas// nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhag gcig bya// nye ba'i bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor du// brdung dang gtsag dang gzhal bar
307a4(gi): bya/ khro bo drag po'i dkyil 'khor du// ru lu gar gyi bro yis sbyangs// 'od dang du ba sgra dang ni// lha mo'i gzugs rnams 'byung ba dang // rta mchog
307a5(gi): dbang gi dkyil 'khor bri// bla ma dag la dbang rnams nod// bkra shis tshigs btsang dag kyang brjod// ye shes lha la ga tang rag ga tang // dpal
307a6(gi): he ru ka'i gal po las/ ra sa ya na'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas mngon rdzogs rgyal pos/ dpal he ru ka'i gal po 'di/ lha gnod
307a7(gi): 'dul dang / 'jam dpal rnon po dang / rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang / gsang ba'i yum lnga dang / 'khor byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo dang / khro mo
307b1(gi): tshogs dang / tshangs pa dang / drang srong dang / 'jog po dang / lha rnams dang / mi'i byang chub sems dpa' li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa dang / 'khor mang
307b2(gi): po rnams la/ ya ba mngon rdzogs rgyal pos mya ngan las 'das pa'i klong ru ma nas bzhengs te bka' stsal pa/ zhal nas gsungs pa thams cad dang / theg
307b3(gi): pa rim pa dgu'i don/ gsang rgyud chen por 'dir gsungs pas/ gsang rgyud chen po 'di rab tu shes par gyis shig/ ces pa ka' stsal to// gtad do//
307b4(gi): zhal nas gsungs pa thams cad dang // theg pa'i rnam grangs thams cad kyang // gsang rgyud chen po 'di la 'dus// 'di la brtson 'grus nan tan skyed//
307b5(gi): rgyud chen 'di yi rang bzhin ni// yan lag drug rnams spros pa dang // rang byung thugs rje bdal ba'i klong // dam tshig kun bzang sku gsung thugs//
307b6(gi): chu srin gre ba dgu brtsegs nas// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba sbas// sdud pa po rdo rje rnon po la gtad do// 'jam dpal rnon po dang / 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho
307b7(gi): rnams la 'di skad ces brjod do// stong gsum ma spangs srid pa yongs kyi ba la// dus gsum bde ba ragashegs pa rnams kyi thugs// dgongs
308a1(gi): pa mtha' dag rnams kyis brnag pa ste// byang chub sems kyi thig le che// bde bar gshegs pa chen po ni// tshig dang yi ges mtshon du med
308a2(gi): ston pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho chen po 'dra// chos nyid mtshan nyid stong ste dmigs su med// kun gzhi'i gting dpag med pas rgya mtsho chen po'i dbyings// sems
308a3(gi): kyi rang bzhin cir yang 'od gsal ba// bde chen byang chub sems ni 'gyur med nam mkha' 'dra// chos dang byang chub sems ni bde ba kun la khyab// ces 'khor
308a4(gi): / rnams la bka' stsal to// de nas 'khor rnams kyis lags so legs so// a la la ho zhes brjod nas/ rtogs te dbang po grol bar gyur
308a5(gi): to// de nas 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces bstod do// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga ldan zhing // snang srid thams cad yongs su gsal// 'khor ba'i rgyun
308a6(gi): rnams kun bkag nas// chos rnams ma lus sangs rgyas par// ston pas bstan pa nyid du rdzogs// zhes bstod do// bsngo ba med pa'i mchod pa/
308a7(gi): 'dod pa med pa'i yon tan/ nam mkha' lta bur kun la khyab par sprul te/ ston pa la mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// ci yang ma bkag chos kyi dbyings//
308b1(gi): lta ba khyung chen nam mkha' lding // spyod pa ma bkag rgya mtsho 'dzings// dam tshig ma bkag bsrung du med/ ba sgrub pa ma bkag yongs su rdzogs//
308b2(gi): 'phrin las ma bkag kun la rol// zhes ston pa la gsol to// de nas ston pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la// gsang ba chen po byin la//
308b3(gi): gsang ba gsang chen de ka nyid// 'khor ba'i rgyun bstan 'byung ba lnga// 'khor ba'i rgyun bstan phyag rgya yin// 'khor ba'i gnas su bstan pas byang//
308b4(gi): chub sems// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba lnga// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// smon pa med pa'i yab lnga dang // chags pa med pa'i yum lnga dang /
308b5(gi): grasang ba'i gnas mchog byang chub sem sa// 'chi ba med pa'i srog kyang yin// go la sa med pa'i lam yang yin// re dog sa med pa'i gnas kyang /
308b6(gi): yin// lhun gyis grub pa'i lta ba yin// 'da' bar dga' ba'i dam tshig yin// che ba rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// nyan thos rang rgyal theg
308b7(gi): ched med pa rjeg/ ta na tre he ru ka'i ga po las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas sdud pa rdo rje rnon pa
309a1(gi): la sogs pa// he ru ka'i gal po'i lha thams cad kyis thams cad he ru kar rtogs te/ rtogs pa phul lo// stong gsum ye
309a2(gi): bdal dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod chen po byang chub lung // rtogs chen mnyam sbyor thugs kyi mdzod// bshud pas nyams pa'i snying po 'di//
309a3(gi): sangs rgyas gzhan nas spyan mi 'dren// nyid las kun rdzogs gzhal yas khang // dngos grub gzhan du mi slong ste// grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
309a4(gi): la shar// re dogs med par ye nas gnas// gzhan nas mi slong nyid la rdzogs// mnyam nyid ma skyes mya ngan 'das// zhes brjod do// shin
309a5(gi): tung ma zhing ngo mtshar skyes nas/ ston pa la rna dbang lhags nas nyan to// de nas yang mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos/ gnod 'dul lha la
309a6(gi): sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gnod 'dul lha la sogs pra khyed rnams la da dras chos 'di bsdus la bshad do// dpal chen he ru ka'i gal
309a7(gi): po 'di ni rgya che zhing don zab pa yin te/ khyod kyis zin par bgyis shig/ rtogs shig/ chongs shig/ sgrubs shig/ he ru ka'i gal po
309b1(gi): 'di ni/ dper na me dang 'dra ste/ chu dran nas che ba ri rab kyang bsreg go/ theg pa chen po 'di ni/ nyi ma'i zer dang 'dra ste/ 'dzam bu gling bzhi dang
309b2(gi): ri'i rgyal po rnams dang / kho ra khor yug dang / gangs rgyud dang / ga ya'u ri dang / bog ri dang / de'u la sogs thams cad gas la te/ blang dor
309b3(gi): drang dbye ba sri mi byed do// de bzhin du ston pa'i thugs rje yang nyi ma dang 'dra ste/ thugs rje la bri bskol med do// de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par
309b4(gi): shes pa yang de dang 'dra bar dbri bskol med do// de yang mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal po sa/ lha gnod 'dul la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ stong
309b5(gi): gi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed la/ lus zhing gi rdul snyed du phul ba bas ni/ ta na tra chen po 'di'i don rtogs pa bsod nams che'o// /
309b6(gi): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba ba sa ni/ ta na tra chen po 'di yi zhal mthong ba bsod nams che'o// gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
309b7(gi): sangs rgyas dang byang chub selas dpa' la phyag btsal zhing bku rab bas ni/ tan tra chen po'i bsgrub pa la/ thang cig yud tsam zhugs pa bsod nams
310a1(gi): che'o/ bskal pa stong du 'gro ba'i don byas pa bas ni/ tan tra chen po 'di thang cig tsam bcangs pa dang / bklags pa bsod nams
310a2(gi): che'o// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gnas ma gyur par thar pa'i lam yin no// sangs rgyas sems can mya ngan 'das// sems ni sangs rgyas kun gyi me//
310a3(gi): yul ni ma bsgrubs bde chen klong // yul sems gnyis med spros dang bral// kun bzang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dri// gla nod 'dul lha yi
310a4(gi): sems la gtod// nuk+Sha he ruk+Sha'i gal po rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka tsi tA la tan tra/ bod
310a5(gi): spyad du/ dpal he ru ka'i thugs kyi rgyud gal po zhes bya ba/ dpal 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
310a6(gi): thos pa'i dus kAN+DI krA na/ com+bu ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams rgyud kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/
310a7(gi): de'i tshe brjod kyis mi leng ba'i yang brjod kyis me lang ba'i 'khor lo/ 'di lta ste/ lnga dang gsum dang brgyad gnyis dang // bzhi dang
310b1(gi): gcig dang bzhi bcu gcig/ mkha' dang 'debs dnga'abar dang gsal// rin chen mchog phran yon tan rgyan// shri ni gnyis med ston pa'i don// he ni dgyes
310b2(gi): pa wi ga da mo ste// ru ni chags pa chen po'i don// ka ni ye shes 'phrin las bzhi// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin sku// lus kyi rnam shes gzugs sku rnam
310b3(gi): snang mdzad// gti mug rnam dag yang dag bcom ldan 'das// kun gzhi'i rnam shes mi bskyod rdo rje sems// zhe sdang rab grub bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// nyon
310b4(gi): mongs rnam shes tshor ba rin chen 'byung // nga rgyal rang grub gcig pu bcom ldan 'das// yid kyi rnam shes snang mtha' yas// 'dod chags rang 'byung sangs
310b5(gi): rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sgo lnga'i rnam shes 'du byed don yod grub// phrag dog rang 'byung sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// kun gzhi'i rnam shes rang 'byung dpal
310b6(gi): chen nyid// dug lnga rang 'byung kun 'dus bcom ldan 'das// rnal 'byor za ba mo'i ngang du sku gsum rdzogs// yang dag grub pa chos sku cig nyid ni// ye nas
310b7(gi): dag pa chos kyi sgo// zhun gyis gnas pa'i longs spyod rdzogs// 'a choms byed ces bye'i dam tshig ni/ bdag nyid lci tshe dkyil 'o// phung po
311a1(gi): nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// nyon mongs pa ni gnas su dag/ skye 'jigs med pa'i gnas la bzhugs// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog
311a2(gi): bde/ tsham rnga ma drag pos lha chen 'dar zhing brdzis// brtul zhugs rol pas rdos bcas phung po bshig/ rnam shes mi 'chi rgyal ba'i gnas su stob//
311a3(gi): nyon mongs mi sdongs sha rus khrag la rol// sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus dpal gyi sku// spos mo dkar ser chom kun rmongs byed ma// 'thing dang
311a4(gi): chags pas 'khro bar byed// rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams dang // dpal gyi bka' nyan lhag ma ru dbang ba bdun// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
311a5(gi): ye shes a ra li// gzhi lam 'bras bur bcas par chos// rnam pa gsum gyi don bshad do// he ru ka'i thugs kyi gal po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste
311a6(gi): dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam
311a7(gi): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byin gyis brlabs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig
311b1(gi): pa'i skye bu chen po'i gzugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di byin gyis brlabs so// byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de
311b2(gi): bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsum pa lta bur gyur te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de'i tshe na ma mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs
311b3(gi): pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba thob ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la sogs
311b4(gi): pa thams cad ngo mtshar che ste/ phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang la rngam zhing bskyod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ byang chub
311b5(gi): sems dpa' don thams cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs pa gang na bde bar gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du longs
311b6(gi): spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi
311b7(gi): de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dbang gi tshul 'di dag go/ rang ba nin lhun grub pa dkyil du// slob ma rab gzhug dbang bskur te// bya bra la yi rdzogs man
312a1(gi): ngag bstan// ting 'dzin bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor du// slob ma 'bring gzhug dbang bskur te// bskyed rdzogs bsgrubs pa'i man
312a2(gi): ngag bstan// gzugs brnyan bsnyen bsgrub dkyil 'khor du// tha ma'i slob gzhug dbang bskur te// rim gyis blo sbyangs mno ngag bstan// rdo rje'i tshul
312a3(gi): du dbang dag sbyin// lha mo dag drang gar byed cing // drer ni rab dges bdag po khrid// pho brang dag byed rab dwags che// rab dges bdag po bde thob ldan//
312a4(gi): seng ge'i bden rab 'joms byed cing // bzhi dang gzhi'i mchog nyid kyis// rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas te// dbyings kyi bde chen de lus so// g.yon phyogs
312a5(gi): gnas la tshul bzhin du// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// dkyil 'khor zla gram zhes gsungs te// mchog nyid yid kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gzhal
312a6(gi): yas khang chen ye shes te// 'khor 'das mnyam po gru bzhi bzhis// sgo bzhi dran pa'i nyer gzhag bzhi// rnam thar brgyad dang rta babs so// rin chen sgo
312a7(gi): stegs thugs rje'i ngang // yang dag spong bzhi tA ra Na// dran pa nyer gzhag sgo khyad dang // rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi'i sgo khyams dang // 'phreng ba byang chub
312b1(gi): yan lag bdun// 'phags lam brgyad kyi ka bas mdzes// lam gyi ye shes rnga yab dang // nyon mongs 'chongs 'joms mu tig 'phreng // dril bu
312b2(gi): ba dan rlung bskyod pa// shes rab chos kyi sgra sgrogs dang // che ba'i yon tan 'dus pa'i rtags// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rgyal mtshan dang // thod
312b3(gi): 'phreng sku gsum thob pa'i rtags// gzhal yas khang mchog dam pa der// phan dang nus mthu dbang yang sbyin// dbu rgyan cod pan 'phreng ba dang //
312b4(gi): go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // snying po lnga dang nus pa lnga// gsang po'i dbang gsumo sbyin byas la// dbang bskur
312b5(gi): man ngag snying po byin// sa lam rims kyis rab tu bgrod// bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad// yang dag lam du zhugs
312b6(gi): la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir sgra mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te// bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang //
312b7(gi): nga rgyal phrag dog yod mi spong // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi sha re na dang // dag pa'i snod bcud mi 'dor ro// yan la bcu'i dam tshig ste// ye nas
313a1(gi): dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// dam tshig nyams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang bskur dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// rtsa ba'i dam
313a2(gi): tshig lnga nyid las// gcig la gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// he ru ka'i gal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ dbang dang dam tshig bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
313a3(gi): ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par smin// sgrub pa dang ni rab tu bsgrubs// bsgrubs
313a4(gi): pa'i 'bras bu blang bar bya// zhi ba'i dgon gnas lha yi ge nas// ri bo chen po 'dus pa'i rtse// / gang sa dkar shel gyi gtams pa'i ba da ba// seng
313a5(gi): chen Sha khros pa'i gnas dang // tsan dan nags dang me tog tshal// yid 'ong dben par rab tu bshad// khro bo'i dgon gnas srin po'i gnas//
313a6(gi): ri bo chen po btsan pa'i ngos// brag dmar gtams pa'i dkyil ngos lnga// stag dred 'thab pa'i gnas su bya// ma mo'i dgon gnas dur khrod dang /
313a7(gi): shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs na// gsar rnying dbugs bral ma bdun khyim// rdo rje rigs kyi dgon gnas ni// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i
313b1(gi): khyim dang yid du 'ong // der ni sa yi cho ga dang // phyi nang las kyi rim pa brtsa ma// gnas su phyin la mtshams gsum gcad// ma dgra bshags

313b3(gi): gi brtul zhugs nod// thig le zla gu ma gcig pa ru// dmigs rten mngon par bzhag nas su// semasra nyid gnas par bya ba'i phyir//

313b5(gi): 'dra dpa' bo'i gzugs// shin tu gtum po 'khor dang bcas// yang na gtso bo gcig pu bri// slob dpon dang ni slob bu dang // gnas dang
313b6(gi): yo byad ldan gyur nas// bsgrub pa'i l-i sa la gzhug par bya// bslang dang brtag dang sbyang ba dang // bgegs bskrad sa gzung dpang po bzhag/

314b3(gi): skyang nul bya// rang 'byung lnga yi khyad par las// sa bon ye shes lnga ru rdzogs// dkyil 'khor zla gam sgo gcig pa// shar du bstan pa byas nas

315b1(gi): bo'i phyag rgyar bstan// gcig dgu nyi shu gnyis dang lnga bcu brgyad// 'bar ba'i rgyal po cir yang smyon par mdzad// bsgrubs dang gsang sngags spyod pa

321a1(gi): de nas yang pa kung byung // sbyi ye g+hu tsigang+gA'i da 'khor du// d+ho r+N+Na bdUd+ma n+ti bzlabapa sad// phunas ma myogs pa
321a2(gi): ldan nas// de nas kyil 'khyor b+hI ba b+hu/ ni kho la ma'i dkyil 'khor bri/ shar du zhi ba'i de b+hu khor du// mcho b+hUSh+mA dang
321a3(gi): bshams// lho ru rgyu sa pa'i dkyil 'khor du// mar me dgu dang gsol byang gzhag/ nub tu dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje'i tshe dang dngos grub
321a4(gi): b+h+yas/ byung du drag po'i dkyil 'khor du// bsgral ba'i rdzu sna mchog gzhag par bya// dbus kyi bAn d+ha sul myed du// rtsu ba brgyad dang lo ma
321a5(gi): stong / smin pa gsum dang yin pa lnga// skyo ba dang yan lag nyi shu bdun// kha tshor skyes dang tsan dan dI// gnyis 'thung la sogs sha s+t+ra skyong // 'bru
321a6(gi): dang rin chen bcud la sogs// gang yang sman chen men pa men// rab tu bsgrims te bsgrub par bya// bar tshod nyams len dus su zlogs// dus ni yir gyi brgyad
321a7(gi): la 'jug/ spyan drang rtog pa bzlog pa dang // sman nyid zhi khro'i lhar bsam ste// sman 'dzab lha 'dzab spel te bsgreng // i ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ o a hU~M/
321b1(gi): sarba pany+tsa oM mra ta hUM hri thA/ oM ma hA su kha dz+nyA na bo d+ha tsita d+harma d+ha tu a/ o A hU badz+ra a mra ta hUM hritha/ sman nyid lha ru rab sbyangs nas// grogs po dpa' la sems stobs
321b2(gi): chakhro bo'i tshul can ging chen de// hu gi sgra dang ldan pa la// chas brgyad khro bcu lus la dgod// mnga' gsol ston la btag btsag bya// ye shes 'od kyi
321b3(gi): snang bar dril// dpal chen skur bsgom dbang yang bskur// dal chen por rab tu bskor zhing // ru lu bro dang drag tu gdug/ dbus su gzhug la slob dpon
321b4(gi): gyis/ bzhi rgyud ldan pa'i dgongs pa bya// tshogs chen mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// gtsang sbra gsum la gnas par bya// tshogs chen gcig gis bsod nams
321b5(gi): skyes la nyan thos brgyar bsags pas// bcu drug char yang mi phod na// mthar thug pa ni tshogs 'khor lo// kA ya bag tsit+ta hUM hUM hu/ hUM hUM hUM/ hU hUM hUM/
321b6(gi): rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// dngos grub chen po blang bar bya// sman chen 'di yi bsod nams ni// lha mnyes dam bskyongs 'phrin las 'grub// rigs 'dzin bzhi dang
321b7(gi): bsgrub pa brgyad// he ru ka yi gsung bzhin du// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon mi za// gal te 'di la gzugs yod na// 'jig rten srog chags thams cad kyis
322a1(gi): brjod par nus pa ma yin no// rdo rje bdud rtsi sman chen de// gsum du bgos la bshad par bya// mdor na mang po smos ci dgos//
322a2(gi): bder gshegs thams cad mchod pa bas// 'di nyid bsgrubs pa'i khyad par ni// lhag pa bas kyang ches lhag go/ 'di ma yin pa'i bsod nam sa ni//
322a3(gi): gzhan na nam yang yod pa min// de bas bsgrub pa 'bad par bya// dpal he ru ka'i rgyud las/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// /
322a4(gi): de nas khrag 'thung chen po des de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha dang / srin po dang / gling dang / lang ka dang / ma bdun dang / sring mo bzhi dang / 'bar ma'i
322a5(gi): tshogs thams cad yi rangs te/ dgyes pa'i gad mo sgrogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i rgyud thugs
322a6(gi): kyi gal po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // u rgyan gyi mkhan po chen po pad+ma saM b+ha ba dang / lo tsa ba dge slong nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur cing zhus te
322a7(gi): gtan la phab pa'o// nub phyogs u rgyan gyi gnas nas slob dpon hUM ka ras bton pa'o// rgyud 'di'i bka'i bsrungs ma ni/ mkha' 'gro ma gtsug gi rgyan
322b1(gi): cig ma dang / srog gi nyu le ma bzhi la gtad do// ba ka'i dus tshags dang nyi tshod las 'das nA mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis chad pa chod cig/ bka' rgya gsum
322b2(gi): mo/ I// // bod skad du/ yang dag pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dang lA badz+ra he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo//
322b3(gi): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs yang dag pa las yi ge i zhes gsungs pas/ skye ba
322b4(gi): med pa las skye ba'i cho 'phrul du 'khor rnams rang bzhin du byung ngo // de nas dpa' bo mchog gisra bka' stsal pa/ yang dag sgrub pa gcig pu nyid// 'di
322b5(gi): ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ lha mo rigs ldan 'byung ba'i gnas// ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs su'o// de bzhin
322b6(gi): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ yang dag bsgrub pa la gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas yang dpa' bo mchog gis shUn+ya ta'i
322b7(gi): sngags kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bkra shis byin can gnas rnams su// blang dang sbya rtags thon na
323a1(gi): thig bzhi re mig dgu pa bri// tshon legs mdzes par bya ba dang // ma hA dam pa'i ting 'dzin bya// rgyu yi sa bon las 'byung ba/

323a3(gi): par grags// tsit+ta hUM dang bcas pa nyid// rgyu yi sa bon ya ba yum 'khril// tsan d+ha b+hU las sangs rgyu sa rigs// spyan mas sa bon tsan da'o// rdo rje ra ba
323a4(gi): bar khyams can// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi drang ldan// kra ba brgyad mchog khyad par can// sUr+ya tsan tri'i steng du dag/ hU~M la sa dkar po rtse lnga grub// rgyu yi
323a5(gi): sa bon rab bsam gsal// rdo rje'i rigs su gyur pa ni// dbus dkar g.yas mthing g.yon pa dam+WAr// badz+ra tsakr-i rat+na drang // pad+me tshon chen yum
323a6(gi): gyi rgya/ mnyam par thabs dang shes rab tu// bud med dbus su 'khor rnams rgyas// kun gyi dbugs kyi 'byung ba yin// hUM tri hri a dza du bi//
323a7(gi): / hUM dang muM badz+ra d+hi ka/ ba dz+ra bu su swa b+hawA At+ma ko&haM/ yaM raM baM dang yi dang sr-i// b+h+r-i dang rnam pa yongs kyis so// hUM muM bzlas pa mthar phyin nas//
323b1(gi): mig rten ri mo mdun du bzhug/ phrin gdags bsod nams tshogs bskyed nas// yab yum gnyis med khyab par las// thal chen khrag dang zhag kyang dgod//
323b2(gi): nyan pa la sogasra rtags kyi mchog/ sa ma ya dang dam rdzas sbyin// lha dang 'dres pa dam pa'i dam// de nas bdag po'i sku las/ thams cad
323b3(gi): lha dang lha mor byin gyis brlabs pa'i thabs 'di dag bka' stsal to// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang dag ni// legs par mchod de sbyin par bya// sangs
323b4(gi): rgyas rnams kyi mdzad spyod bzhin// gsang ba don du gnyer ba'i phyir// srog lus bu dang bu mo dang // rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul//
323b5(gi): ga nas ci ra na mchod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dag grub pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /

324a5(gi): spyod pa ni// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so// dri yi rang bzhin ye shes so// de yi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gsal la dag pa dri ma med// da

324b1(gi): ltar dgu pa yin// bka' yi 'khor lo sbyor ba dang // lha yi pho brang sgyu ma'i sku// mkha' la sogs pa du mra'i rgyu// bya ba'i rig pa thams cad dag

325a1(gi): a nu ra ga gnyis med bde// oM a d+ha ri shra dz+nyA nA sogs/ ka kha ga g+hA d+yA/ tsa tsha dza dzAnya/ Ta tra Ta D+hA Na/ ta tha da d+hA na/ pA pha ba b+ha ma?/

325b1(gi): b+h+yo b+h+yob+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ mthar phyin pa'i yi ge bsam// mtshan gsum bzlas dang spyan drang mchod// ba stim nas gzhan la las rnams bcol// las la

326a5(gi): snying ngo // ye shes kyi.a zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di bsgrags so// khams gsum pa kun la ar gsal lo// chos thams cad ma skyes pa ye shes kyi

326b2(gi): snang bar mdzad do// ye shes kyi skur snang bar mdzad nas/ ma skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzhal yas

327b4(gi): cad ma skyes pa'i dbyings nas skur ba zhengs so// de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM

329a1(gi): skad kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ sku lnga rdzogs par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
329a2(gi): de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po des khams gsum dbang du sdud pa 'di gsungs s+ho// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad hUM hUM
329a3(gi): hUM zhes pas mngon sum du bsdus nas/ nyid la b+hImA pAr mdzad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya sid+d+hi saM hA ra nA hUM/ zhes khams gsum he ru ka nyid sku gcig gis
329a4(gi): gang bar mdzad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka si d+hi saM ha ra nA hU~M/ zhes pas khams gsume gsung gcig gis gang bar mdzad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta sid+d+hi

346a7(gi): bshad pa gang zhe na// dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa lnga pa dang // drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang // dum bu brgyad par rab
346b1(gi): tu grags// bram ze rgyal po rje rigs dang // dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma nges// dkAr dmar dang ni dkar sngo dang // sngo dang de bzhin ser skya ste//

346b7(gi): tu bltas na bdag nyid gsod// 'og tu bltas na rkun po mod// steng du bltas na bud med gsod// lho ru bltas na rigs ngan gsod// snod kyi mtshan

347a3(gi): pa rje'u rigs yin pas// bzhi pa de ni dmangs rigs so// bu ga med dang mang ba ni// mkhas pas shin tu srang bar bya// bong chung ba dang srab pa dang // gang

347b1(gi): tsom med// dbus na shong bu bzhi yod na/ de ni 'dod pa'i ba zhes bya// mdun na shong bu gnyis yod na// yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o// 'di 'dra'i mtshan
347b2(gi): nyid ldan pa'i snod// su dag rtag tu 'chang ba ni// longs spyod thar pa thob par 'gyur// de la lha mo the tshom med// de nas rigs ni rnams bshad de//
